184a4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes pa yi// khro gnyer tsan la phyag 'tshal ba stod// 'phags pa don yod zhags pa lde lnga'i bstod pa// slob dpon chen po tsan dI go mi mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du
184a5(rgyud 'grel): Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha maN+Da la de wa ga Na sto tA bi ma la pra b+hA nA ma// bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs la bstod pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba// bcom ldan 'das thugs
184a6(rgyud 'grel): rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // thugs rje chen pos gdul bya'i snang ngo la// gang la gang 'dul de la de ston pa'i// 'jig rten dbang phyug khyod la bstod par bgyi// 'khor
184b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyang ston gyis ma gos phyir// pad+ma dkar po rang rgyas lte ba la// thugs rje'i chu rgyun 'bebs mdzad zla ba'i gdan// ye shes 'gying tshul bzhugs mdzad khyod la bstod// 'jig rten log rtog ston pa
184b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dul ba'i phyir// rgyal po'i rol stangs dbang phyag cha lugs 'dzin// sna tshogs thabs mnga' rin chen rgyan gyis spras// 'jig rten kun gyis bstod pa khyod la 'dud// don dam chos sku nyag gcig zhal mnga' zhing //
184b3(rgyud 'grel): thugs rjes 'gro la chags pas hrIHlas 'khrungs// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'od dpag med// ral pa'i khur na 'chang ba khyod la bstod// 'gro drug sgrol phyir ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin// rgyal ba'i rgyal
184b4(rgyud 'grel): po rin chen dbu rkyen can// me tog cod pan rgyal sras 'gran zla bral// dus gsum rgya la ba'i bdag po khyod la bstod// nor bu'i snyanr-i chas 'gro la chos sgra sgrogs// smyanau gsas gsum shes dang shes bya mkhyen// 'dzum
184b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zhal mnga' 'gro ba'i don la dgyes// stong nyid thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod// kun rdzob tsam du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi// nyon mongs kun skyob bde ba'i mchog sbyin cing // don dram rnam dag pad+ma
184b6(rgyud 'grel): dkar po bsnams// thabs shes zung 'jug phyag gnyis phyag 'tshal bstod// sred pa'i mes gdungs rgyud lnga'i sems can la// bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bebs g.yas na spyi blugs 'dzin// bdud bzhi'i 'jigs skyob
185a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa skyabs sbyin mdzad// 'khor 'das gnyis med gzigs la phyag 'tshal bstod // snying gsum gzong nas dben par rtogs pa'i phyir// ri dgas lpags pas sku yi sham thabs
185a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad// 'khor 'das rang bzhin spros bral rtogs pa'i phyir// gang sa ri kun da'i mngangs ldan khyod la bstod// khyod kyi thugs rje'i rgyun gyis dus gsum gyi// rgyal ba sras bcas 'gro don la bskul nas// mdzad
185a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'i 'phrin las ma lus mdzad pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor gtso bor bzhugs pa khyod la bstod// pha rol phyin bcu'i yon tan rab rdzogs phyir// phyag zhabs kun la nor bu'i rgyan gyis spras// sa bcu'i stobs rdzogs
185a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mnga' ba'i phyir// mu tig do shal 'phyang la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdzu 'phrul mthu yis 'gro ba drang ba dang // stobs bcu'i rtsal gyis bdudo dpung gzhom pa'i phyir// zha bas gnyis cung zad brkyang bskum rol
185a5(rgyud 'grel): pasdu bzhugs// rtag par gzhan don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// sred pa gsum po dbyings su bskal pa'i phyir// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ltar 'bar ba'i skuso// ye shes rol pa'i 'od zer 'greng mdzad pa'i//
185a6(rgyud 'grel): ma rig mun pa 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod// gzung 'dzin dri ma dang bral pad+ma'i gdan// nyon mongs gdung sel zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs// 'gro don yongs pa mi mnga' bzhengs tshul can// thugs rje chags
185b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mdog mnga' khyod la 'dud// thabs kyi zhugs pas 'gro ba drang ba'i phyir// ha las 'khrungs pa'i tshul ston don chen mdzad// skye med zhal mnga' srid gsum gzigs pa'i spyan// dbu rgyan rgyal ba'i cod pan
185b2(rgyud 'grel): 'chang la bstod// bden bzhi'i phyag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// snying rje'i zhags pas 'gro ba 'dren par mdzadze// rtogs pa'o rdo rjes log rtog mtshan ma 'joms// sgyu ma'i rdzu 'phrul mnga' ba khyod la
185b3(rgyud 'grel): bstod// mkhyen brtse'i lcags kyus 'khor ba bde bar 'gugs// nus ldan bgrang phreng yon tan gter mdzod 'dzin// 'gro don mdzad mkhas zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshu la// me tshan don ldan par bzhugs
185b4(rgyud 'grel): pa khyed la bstod// ma chags pad+ma'i rigs te skyon bral stang // mkhyen pas nyon mongs tshogs 'joms nyi ma'i gdan// bdud dpung 'joms mdzad khro rgyal hUM khaMs 'khrungs// khro bos khro ba 'dul mdzad
185b5(rgyud 'grel): khyod la bstod// rngam pa'i zhal gyis log rtog dbyingasu gsol// dam+bar sde ra ral pas log 'dren bran du 'dul// ye shes spyan gyis khams gsum sku gsum gzigs// rta mgrin rta skad sgrogs la
185b6(rgyud 'grel): phyog 'tshal bstod// rdo rje dbyug pas bgegs dpung rdul du rlog/ rdo rje snyigs mdzub bdud sde skrag par mdzad// gse ra gyi 'khor los 'khor ba'i rtsa ba gcod// chags bral pad+ma 'chad la
186a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstang // rin rgyun sbrul rgyun klu rgya la gdugs pa 'dul// glang chen g.yang gzhi stobs bcu mnga' ba'i dpal// stug+sa sham bA tis 'phrin las rnam bzhi mdzad// khro rgyal
186a2(rgyud 'grel): brkyang bskum bzhugs l-i phyag 'tshal bstod// skyon bri la gdan la rmongs sil nyi ma'i steng // pha las 'khrungs pa'i bdud 'dul nag mo che// rngam pa'i stabs kyis gdug pa sgrol bar mdzad// mche ba
186a3(rgyud 'grel): gi tshogs pas bdud bzhi gsol la bstod// rnam zer phyag brgyad ye shes rno ba'i mtshon// shes rab ral gris gti mug rtsang nas gcod// thugs rje'i zhags pa skyon bral pad+ma 'chang // thabs mkhas brtse
186a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mda' 'phen khyod phyag 'tshal// 'khor los srid pa'i 'khor lo 'joms mdzad cing // dbyug pas bgegs 'dul rtse gsum dug gsum gcod// s+thi sa bral gzhu yis thugs rje'i mnga'
186a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phen ma// 'pha gos lom don ldan nAlA gcig ma la bskyod// khro rgyal kun 'dul dan rgyun rnon chen 'chang // bad+mang dag glan 'dzums khra ma'i rgyu lcags rdzogs// smug lpags shAm thabs snabs bcu
186a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsal mnga' ba'i// rgyal ba kun skyong khro rgyal yum la bster// / skyon bral chu skyes gdung ba sel ba'i steng // bu las 'khrungs pa'i 'phrin las kun rdzogs me// brtse ba'i zhal mnga'i 'phrin las
186b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i phyag/ ral pa'i cod pan rdo rjes brgyan la bstod// thod dbyug bgegs 'dul pad+mos 'khor ba skyob// phreng bas sems can rjes 'dzin 'gro drug la// dam chos bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bebs spyi blugs 'dzin// sgrub
186b2(rgyud 'grel): pa po la mtshig gsol mdzad la bstod// rin chen rgyan 'chang sa dang yon tan rdzogs// ngar sha ma pa ti sa mi 'jigs lha chen 'dul// chags can 'dul phyir chags pa ltar ston pa'o// lha mo khro gnyer
186b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan la phyag 'tshal bstod // kun kyang ye shes 'od dpung klod na bzhugs// thabs la mkhas pas sna tshogs cir yang ston// nyam thag 'gro la kun tu brtse ba tson// thugs rjes rtag tu gzigs mdzad khyod la
186b4(rgyud 'grel): bstod// ye shes rol pa chen po'i bdag nyid phyir// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir// sgeg pa'i tshul 'chang bde ba'i mchod 'bul ma// sgeg cing bzhad par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// byang chub
186b5(rgyud 'grel): yan lag 'bras bu kun ster bas// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir// rin chen phreng ba 'chang zhing mchod pa 'bul// chags bral blta bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// gzing na sa zhi
186b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don la rab mos pas// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir// snyan po'i glu dbyangs sgrogs shing mchod pa 'bul// don ngam rtogs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba mchod par bya phyir skyo
187a1(rgyud 'grel): ba med// brtson 'grus pa rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir// sna tshogs rol pas dgyes pa'i gar mdzad ma// mnyes pa'i gzigs mo mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// sangs rgyas rgyu 'bras
187a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sem sa yin pas// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir// yid 'od me tog rnams kyis mchod mdzad ma// rnam thar sgo gsum rtogs lo phyag 'tshal bi stong // thar par 'jug
187a3(rgyud 'grel): po dbu mar grub pa dang // shes rab pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir// bdug spos sprin tshogs rnams kyis rgyal ba mchod// don dam go bar mdzad ma khyod la bstod// mi shes mun pa lhag mthong gis
187a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzams shing // thabs mchog phra rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir// snang ba'i sgron mas kun du mnyes mdzad ma// ma rig mun sel mdzad mu khyod lA bstod// nyon mongs dri da rab tu 'joms pa dang // smon
187a5(rgyud 'grel): lam pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir// dri mchog byug pA swa rgyal ba mnyes mdzad ma// dri rab bsnams mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal bstod// snying rje chen pos 'gro ba kun bsdus nas// stobs bcu'i
187a6(rgyud 'grel): sa la kun tu dgong bya'i phyir// lcags kyu 'dzin cing zhi ba'i las mdzad ma// shar sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal// byams pa chen pos sdug bsngal ku ni bsal nas// yang dag
187b1(rgyud 'grel): rig pa'i don la dgod pa'i phyir// zhags pa 'dzin cing rgyas pa'i las mdzad ma// lho sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal// dga' ba chen pos 'gro kun bde la 'grod// srid gsum 'gro ba dbang du bya ba'i
187b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir// lcags sgrog bsnams nas dbang gi las mdzad ma// nub sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal// btang snyoms chen pos 'gro kun bdag tu mdzad// ma lus sangs rgyas sa la rab dgod phyir/
187b3(rgyud 'grel): dril bu 'chang zhing mngoni spyod las mdzad ma// phyang sgor bzhugs ma khyod la gus pra bstod// tshangs pa drag po nyi ma zla ba dang // dbang po gshin rje chu lha nor gyi bdag/ drang srong srin po rlung dang dbang bdag ste//
187b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten 'dul phyir zhabs drung 'dud mdzad bstod// bdag 'dra las kyis mnar ba'i skye bo yis// yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i mgron po yis// yon tan cha shas tsam yang ma rig pas// khyod kyi mdzad tshul
187b5(rgyud 'grel): dpag par mi nus mod// mun khung nang nas mo khyer 'od tsam zhig/ khyod kyi mthu yis dad pa'i blo thob nas// rgya mtsho che las skra rtse'i chu thigs tsam// bdagu yis spro bas khyod la bstong pa 'dis// cung zad tsam
187b6(rgyud 'grel): rnyed dge ba dri ma med// gangs ri ltar dkar shas tsom thob pa nges// rgyud lnga'i 'gro bas nyes pa kun spangs nas// mgon po 'od dpag med pa'i gnas thob shog/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor
188a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi lha bcu bdun la don rtags kyi sgo nas bstod pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ kalpa ma na ha ra na nI nA ma log nA tha sto tra// bod skad du/ 'jig rten
188a2(rgyud 'grel): mgon po'i bstod pa yid 'phrog sdig 'joms zhes bya ba// thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// lha dang lha minA mi yis zhabs la phyag byas shing // skye rgu na 'chi ma lus rab tu 'joms pa'i sku// 'jig rten dbang
188a3(rgyud 'grel): phyug thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis ni// mgon med bdag la bsrung mdzad thugs rje mdzad du gsol// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i klong dkyil du ni nub gyur te// nyon mongs dpa' rlabs kyis yang dag nyi ma nyes shing // chos
188a4(rgyud 'grel): nges 'debs pa bdag la btang snyoms ma mdzad par// khyod la bstod bgyid thugs rje chen pos bsrung du gsol// srid pa'i rab rib kyis ni blo mi gnyer gtsos shing // 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa yis
188a5(rgyud 'grel): ni lus sems g.yengs gyur pa// ji srid mi bzad mnar maud gnas su ma lhung bar// bcom ldan spyan ras gzigs kyis bdag la bskyab tu gsol// rmongs pas rgyun du gzhan gyi bud med brten
188a6(rgyud 'grel): bgyis dang // srog chags stong phrag srog dang bral ba la sogs pa// mgon po bdag gis sdug bsngal rgyu ni tshang bar bgyis// lus kyi nyes pa de dag yang dag spyang du ga sol// gang zhig bkur sti'i
188b1(rgyud 'grel): ched dang 'tsho ched du ni// 'jig rten mi bden brdzun tshig brlang po la sogs pa// 'jig rten dbang phyug dag gi nyes pa'i kun sbyor yang // dmyal ba'i rgyu de yun rings ma lus goms par bgyis// sems can rnams
188b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga rang gis gnod pa gang bgyis dang // gzhan gyis bgyis pa la ni rjes su rang ba'i// bdag gi yid kyi sdig de dag ni smre sngags su// 'don zhing mchis pas bsal du gsol dang mgon po kye// lha dang mi
188b3(rgyud 'grel): mi dang la min skye ba rnams dang ni// dud 'gro dang ni dmyal pa yi dgas rnamasu yang // sdug bsngal dang bcas 'gro ba gang gnas de dag la// bsrung ba mdzad ces khyod kyi lo rgyus bdag gis khums// des ni bdag
188b4(rgyud 'grel): la thugs rjes de dag mdzad du gsol// g.yar lus dar la bab pa yal bar nyams la khang// de phyir ji srid dmyal ba'i gnas su ma zhugs par// bcom ldan khyod ni bdag gi zhu ba gsan par mdzod// gzhan
188b5(rgyud 'grel): yang gzhan don la ni rang nyid gshegs mdzad na// bsod nams ma bsags bdag ni spyan sngar mchis kyang spong // khyod kyi thugs rje bsod nams dag la blto sa sam ci// sdug bsngal med la snying rje bya bar su
188b6(rgyud 'grel): lags na// dran pa tsam gyis khyod ni yongasu mnyes nas su// sdig zang mdzad ces bdag gis ma khums legs sam ci// de phyir bcom ldan gzhan phan mdzad la phul du byung // bdag 'dir ma dor bsrung dang
189a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyob pa mdzad du gsol// glang chen dag dang nor bu sras bcas btsun mo dang // gnod med rgyal srid khang bzangs rnam par bkra ba dang // sha dang rus pa dbu ni sku mtshal mthar thug btang // grub
189a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mig sman rkang pa byug pa dag dang ni// grub pa'i gnod sbyin dang ni gnod sbyin mo dag kyang // 'jig rten mnga' bdag khyod ni mnyes par gang su dag/ don gnyer rnams la mthar thug ma mchis sbyin par mdzad// gang
189a3(rgyud 'grel): dag rkang pa lag pa mig dang bral rnams dang / sna tshogs bro 'tshal gyis ni 'jigs pa dang bcas rnams// yon tan zab mo khyod mnyes pa yis de dag gi// yan lag sobs 'gyur bro 'tshal dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur/
189a4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' ldeng sbrul gdugs gnod dang mkha' 'gro mi dang ni// rnal 'byor pa yi gnod kun rtag tu zhi mdzad cing // rgyal ba khyod kyis gang la dgongs pa de la ni// gshin rje'i pho nya rmi lam du yang snang mi 'gyur// mgon
189a5(rgyud 'grel): po bdag no 'jigs pas rnam par g.yengs pa yis// nyin dang mtshan du lag pa gyen du brkyang sdeng du// 'jig rten dbang phyug nges na bdag ni 'gums pa dang / nye ba lags na bcom ldan skyibs med 'khor ram
189a6(rgyud 'grel): ci yul dang dbang po gdul dka' sems kyang g.yo ba dang // mnyam par ma gzhag lus kyis sdig pa mang po bgyis// nyams pa bdag gi 'khor bzhin du ni skye ba 'dir// thams cad kyis ni sdig pa 'ba' zhig
189b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrubs par zad// de phyir da ltar khyod la thal mo sbyar nas ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug gang gis ngan song sdug bsngal dag/ myong mi 'gyur bar khyod kyi spyan sngar bde 'gror ni// mchi bar bdag zhu 'di ni gnad par mdzad
189b2(rgyud 'grel): du gsol// khyod ni 'dod chags zhe sdang rnam par 'joms pa'i sku// khyed ni 'khor ba'i mtsho chen gyi ni chu lin lags// khyod ni ltung bas skrag pa 'dren pa'i lag pa ste// khyod ni brjod bcas mi dge 'dzin pa'i
189b3(rgyud 'grel): sgra gcan lags// khyod ni bde gshegs bla med de nyid ston pa po// khyod ni sdug bsngal mang ldan 'gro ba'i skyob byed yin// khyod ni yid 'joms gdul dka' bdud las nges brgal ba// khyod ni srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i
189b4(rgyud 'grel): pha rol brgal ba lags// khyod ni nung pa me lus nad ni rgyun gi cod sku// khyod kyi sku ni 'gro ba'i nang na mchog tu mdzes// khyod ni dpe med thugs rje'i rgya mtsho chen po ste// khyod ni rgyu med gnyer du 'gro ba
189b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis rtogs// khyod kyis g.yo ba'i dbang po 'bad pa med par btul// khyad ni yul la chags pa yongasu btsam pa lags// khyod kyi thugs ni bsam gtan mchog ni mnyam par bzhag/ khyod kyi thugs ni
189b6(rgyud 'grel): slong ba kun la snyoms par mdzad// thugs rje ldan pa gzhan la phan pa mdzad kyang ni// ma rog sbrul chen rgyub tu zhon nas yul rnams kyi// 'dod pas dge ba nyams par gyur pa bdag la 'dir// khyod ni gang gis yongs
190a1(rgyud 'grel): dgyes par mi mdzad lags// khyod kyi spyan sngar g.yar chab byin cing sme ba yi// sdig ldan bdag la gang gis bsrung ba mi mdzad na// mgon po 'gro ba kun rten thugs rje gang lags pa// de ci khyod
190a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis nyi tshe ba ru bskyed lags sam// mgon po khyod kyi thugs rje ni mkha' khyab po yi// sprin byung cher po'i rgyan ni chu dang skam dag dang // mthon dman yul ni kun la 'bab cing sems can gyi// don du kun la nyin
190a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan rgyun mi 'tshang du 'jug/ de ltar bcom ldan dran pa'i bdag gi bsod nams gang // des ni 'gro ba sdug bsngal mang ldan de dag gis// 'gro nang mdzes pa nam mang rnam par rol pa yin// po ti la yi ri rtser gnas
190a4(rgyud 'grel): pa thob par shog/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa yid 'phrog sdig 'joms zhes bya ba// shwar phyogs bA reNI'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen po tsan drA go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar shar
190a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs ba reNI'i dz+nyA ga tA la'i paN+Di ta chen po dA nA shI las bsgyur ba// rgya gar skad du/ mau hA kA ru Ni ka stau tra/ bod skad du/ thugs rje chen po la bstod cing bskul ba// bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po la
190a6(rgyud 'grel): phyog 'tshalo// thugs rje chags pas rnam gzigs bcom ldan 'das// spyan ras kyis gzigs spyan zur bdag la gzigs spyan zur gzigs pa tsam gyis 'gro rnams kyi// sdug bsngal nyam thig zhi mdzad
190b1(rgyud 'grel): khyod la mnga'// mtha' med g.yang sarar+ya lhung nas sa 'og gi/ mun nag thibs por gtan du 'khyams pa bdag/ nyam thag phongs pas thugs rje mchog sbyin cing // yongasu bskyab pa'i dus la dri ring ba bya// sdug
190b2(rgyud 'grel): phongs gang gis nga ni dran byas na// de yi sa nyams thag nga yis bsil lo zhes// khyod kyis zhol bzhes mngon mdzad deng bdag ni// nyam thag bsal te 'bras bu mchis por mdzod// mthong dang thos de nga reg
190b3(rgyud 'grel): dang dran pa yis// nad gnod thams cad nges bsal zhes gsungs pas// nad kyis gdungs pa'i 'gro ba bdag cag la'ang mchog sbyin nyid kyis zhal bzhes ma bsnyel mdzod// 'gro rnams gang dag sdug bsngal
190b4(rgyud 'grel): de dag gis// nyam thag kun tu bcad par bya'o zhes// dgongs nas mgrin po gzhan du rnam rgya na// bdag cag sdug bsngal khyod kyis ma gzigs sam// gang gis khyod nyid dran pa tsam gyis kyang // de mod
190b5(rgyud 'grel): nyam thag ma bsal 'ga' med la// bdag gling rtag tu nyam thag gzir bzhin du// khyod kyi drin kyis ma skyabs bskal tshungaso// mthu ldan khyod kyi thugs rje'i blo gros kyis// lan la mi re bzhin du phan
190b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dogs la// bdag kyang khyod la skyabasu mchi bzhin du// sdug phongs 'di 'dra'ang mi gzigs kye ma'o brlag/ ji lta ji ltar nyon mongs gyur pa dang // ji lta ji ltar rten med phongs gyur pa// de lta de ltar
191a1(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi thugs rje yang // der ni phyi phyir mngon par 'phel lo skad// sdig ldan bdag gi nyam thag sdug bsngal yang // shin tu mnag dka' rten med skyabs med bzhin// de dag las
191a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag thugs rjes bkolo mdzad na// khyod kyi thugs rje phyogs gcig ci ru rung // 'gro ba gang gis skyes mchog khyod dran na// don med gyur pa sngon chad 'ga' ma mchis// sdug bsngal shin tu drag po nyam
191a3(rgyud 'grel): thag 'das// brlag la khad kyis mgon khyod bdag l-i dgongs// thugs rje'i gnas gyur sdug phongs ma lus pa// phongs pa thugs rje chen pos 'phrogs mdzad pa// khyod kyis gal te bdag la ma gzigs
191a4(rgyud 'grel): na// bdag gi rten gzhan gang lags gsung du gsol// mgon po khyod la sgrubasu mchi dgu li// mod la sdug bsngal ma zhi 'ga' ma mchis// bdag kyang skyabasu mchi yis brtse ba yis// sdug bsngal
191a5(rgyud 'grel): nyams thag 'di las bsgrub tu gsol// khyod kyi mtshan tsam grag la borten pas kyang // sdug phongs ma lus zhi bar 'gyur lags na// bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma mchis pa// de 'dri'i thugs rje ci
191a6(rgyud 'grel): las gyur pa lags// khyod kyis grub brnyes bzhin du sems can rnams// yongs su bskyab phyir smon lam mdzad lags na// bdag kyang sems can grangs las ma 'das pas// mchog sbyin bdag
191b1(rgyud 'grel): gi sdug bsngal dbrog tu gsol// nyi ma'i 'od kyis mun pa'i tshogs bcom bzhin// zla gsal dri med khyod ni rab bzhugs kyang // da rung bdag ni sdug bsngal gyis non cing // sdig pa'i mun pas non pa skal chung so//
191b2(rgyud 'grel): skye bo rnams kyis gang zhus skyong mdzad pa// de nyid bdag gis zhus bzhin mi gnang ba// mtshams las thar bar skal ba med dam ci// shin tu ngan na me cir thal yi re mug/ mgon po khyed ni sems can phan
191b3(rgyud 'grel): po'i phyir// thugs rje chen po ma spangs bzhin du yang // sdug bsngal brnag dka'i rang bzhin gsol 'debs la// skyob pa mdun na gnas bzhin 'o dod 'bod// 'jig rten skye bo'i pha mnga'ang 'di ltar du// kha
191b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs btab par gyur kyang mi skyo bzhin// sems can phan brtson khyod la'ang 'khor ba nas// 'khor ba'i tshe na bdag ni skyabs mchi zhing // nag po'i las kyis nyin dang mtshan du ni// mngon par zil
191b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis non par gyur pa dang // sdug bsngal cher gdungs 'di las thar bya'i phyir// nyin rer 'o dod 'bod kyis ma skyo srungs// de ltar bdag gis bos shing sme ba yis// khyod thugs rjes brlan gyur ba// de
191b6(rgyud 'grel): ltar skye bo sdug bsngal ba rgyas gzir ba// kun la'ang srid bcom khyod ni dgongs mdzad cing // thugs rdo'i dbang gyur thugs ni brtan pa yis// gzhin don 'ba' zhig lhur len yon tan ni// bla ma'i
192a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas gyur khyod ni sdug bsngal kun// 'phrog pa'i nus mthu ldan pa de bzhin shog/ bdag gi srod pa mthar mdzad spyan ras gzigs dbang la// bstod bskul 'di bgyis bsod nams thob pa
192a2(rgyud 'grel): gang yin des// bcos min rab zhi'i bde ldan bde ba can du ni// 'gro kun sdug bsngal gzir spangs rab tu phyin gyur cig/ thugs rje chen po la bstod cing bskul pa nyer bzhi pa// dge bsnyen chen zla bas mdzad pa
192a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ba ra mr-i shwa ra dang // bod kyi lo tsa ba dgos lhas btsas gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ lo ke shwa ra s+pho tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'jig
192a4(rgyud 'grel): rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa zhes bya ba// 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dang lha min gyis ni zhabs btu zad cing // skye rga na dang 'chi ba rab bcom pa// 'jig rten dbang khyod bdag la skyabs mdzad na/
192a5(rgyud 'grel): brtse dang snying rje ldan la skyod par mdzod// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i dbus su nges lhung ba// nyon mongs dpa' klong mnyam gzhag gis ni bcom// kho bos brtan par zung zhes kun du ngu// brtse ba chen po khyod la phyag
192a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// mig la srid pa'i rab rib nye bar 'tshe// lus ni 'chi bas 'jigs pa'i rnam par du// ji srid mnar med nyam ngar ma song bar// bcom ldan kun tu gzigs la bdag la sbyongs// gzhan gyi bud
192b1(rgyud 'grel): med sun par byas shing bcom// mi shes pa yis srog chags stong phrag bsad// mgon po bdag gis sdig pa ma lus byas// so so'i lus kyi nyes pa nyams par mdzod// gang zhig 'tshe dang bkur sti'i ched
192b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams// 'jig rten pa rnams mi 'dod mi bden smras// mA lus dmyal ba gang gis yul ring go mas// de rnams 'jig rten dbang pos zhi bar mdzod// sems can rnams la mi phan bsam pa gang // ring dang
192b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis la'ang yi rang ba// de 'dir bdag gi yid kyi sdig pa rnams// bsal bar mdzod cig mgon po smre sngags 'don// lha dang mi dang lha min skye ba rnams// dud 'gro dmyal ba yi dgas 'gro ba rnams//
192b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can nges gnas rtag par nyam theg gang // de rnams sbyang zhes khyed gtam bdag gis thos// des na bidagu la snying rjekun tu mdzod// lus kyi ling tsho dal par rtogs gyur na// ji srid dmyal ba nyid
192b5(rgyud 'grel): du ma zhugs par// de phyir bcom ldan khyed la gsol bar bgyi// cung zad bdang snyoms mdzad pa gzhan don phyir// bdag gi don phyir bcom ldan nyid dmigs ni// yang na brtse ba bsod names lo bltos
192b6(rgyud 'grel): sem// gang la phangs med mthong ba bskyed par gyis// nyid dran pa yis kun nas yongs tshim na// nyes pa zad par mdzod cig brtso med da ma// de yi phyir na bcom ldan gzhan phan mkhas// rnam g.yengs
193a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad kho bo 'dir ni srungs// glang po rta dang bu dung chung ma dang // rgyal srid tsher ma med dang khyim sna tshogs// sha rus mgo dang khrag gi mthar thug par// don gnyer rnams la khyod kyis mtha'
193a2(rgyud 'grel): yas byin// mig sman ri lu rkang mgyogs grub pa dang // grub pa'i sman dang nor bu rnam dag sngags// grub pa gnod sbyin mo ni grong la 'jug/ 'jig rten dbang po gang gis nyid dgyes pa// rkang lag rnam par lta ba'i
193a3(rgyud 'grel): sman po dang // sna tshogs 'jigs chen nad kyi zhu ba dang // khyod mnyes pa las de rnams lus rgyas shing // nad med yon tan zab mo rnam rel 'gyur// mkha' lding sbrulnga dang gza' dang mkha' 'gro ma// sbyor ba pa rnams
193a4(rgyud 'grel): rtogs par zhi'i thob cing // khyod mnyes gang yin de yi mdun du ni// gshin rje pho nya mi 'gro rgyal bar 'gyur// de phyir lag pa spyi bor thal sbyar te// spyi brtol mi brtan ngag gis nyin re bzhin// du ba skyabs med
193a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni 'chi ba la// bcom ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug 'dor ramu ci// mi srun yul la g.yo ba'i yid dbang po// mi brtan lus kyis sdig pa mang byas shing // lto ba'i ched du 'khrul zhing 'bras bu med// bdag 'di
193a6(rgyud 'grel): ni skye ba thams cad lugs// gang gis lus kyi sdug bsngal ma myong bar// khyod kyi mngon sum du ni bzang 'gro ba// bdag 'dir thal sbyor rab btud bdag ge de// 'jig rten dbang phyug da lta nyid du mdzod// rmongs
193b1(rgyud 'grel): dung zhe sdang rnam par nyams pa'i rgyu// khyod ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i zam pa ste// g.yang sar lhung ba gyen du 'dren pa'i phyag/ khyod ni nyes lci'i mtshan mo'i sgra gcan nam// bde gshegs bla med bstan pa de kho na//
193b2(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni sdug bsngal mang po'i sems can skyong // rgyal dka' yid dkrugs bdud las nges rgyal zhing // khyad ni srid pa'i mtsho los pha rol bairgal// nang kun mtha' yas nges par gcod mdzad lus// khyed sku 'gro
193b3(rgyud 'grel): bA kun li mchog tu mdzes// dpe med thugs rje'i rgyu mtsho bcom ldan 'das// khyod ni rgyu med gnyen du skye bos shes// byed pa rnams bcom rol pa rig cing sgeg/ khyod ni yul la zhen pa yongasu boro// lha
193b4(rgyud 'grel): yi bsam gtan la sems mnyam gzhag/ khyod ni slong ba po la snyoms pa'i nor// thugs rje can khyod gzhan la phan mdzad kyang // kho bo 'dir ni srung ba mi mdzad cing // gti mug lto 'phye chen pos sos btab
193b5(rgyud 'grel): la/ yul la rlom sems pa yis dge las lhung // khyed kyi thugs rje gang de mtha' yas pa'i// skye bo kun la 'phro na gang gi phyir// sdig ldan bdag la srung ba mi mdzad pa// nges pa lags sam mdun nas
193b6(rgyud 'grel): dung mo 'byin// mgon po khyed kyi brtse ba mkha' yangs su// sems can rnams la chu 'dzin sbyin ji ltar// snyam pa chu dang mtho dman yul mang por// ma lus rgyun du rgyun ma 'chad par 'bab// de ltar
194a1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan dran pas bsod nams gang // des ni kho bos 'gro ba skyo med 'dir// po ta la ke g.yo ba med pa'i gnas// rnam rol sna tshogs mdzes par skye bar gyur zhes pa 'di 'phags pa spyan
194a2(rgyud 'grel): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la// tsar+ya DI zhabs kyis bstod pa rdzogs so// / sgra mkhan chen po rgyal ba snyan gyi zhal snga nas// lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang
194a3(rgyud 'grel): pos bsgyur ba'o// rgyu gar skad du// Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha pany+tsa de ba sto tA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa// 'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga la phyag 'tshal lo// sems
194a4(rgyud 'grel): can sdu ga bsngal me tshogs kyis gdungs la// thugs rje'i char rgyun bsil bas zhi mdzad cing // rang bzhin pade ldan gnas su 'dren mdzad pa// mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo// thugs rje chen
194a5(rgyud 'grel): po'i zhigs pas pas 'gro kun gyi// gnod pa nges sel ba de la ba gong mdzad cing // sna tshogs sprul pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// don yod zhags par grags la phyag 'tshal lo// ma tshugs pad+ma'i rigs
194a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi sprul pa ste// klu rgyal tshul gyis gdugs pa 'dul mdzad pa// dbang chen bskal pa'i me ltar rab sbyin 'bar// khro rgyal rta mgrin rgyal la phyag 'tshalo// chos nyid spros bral ro gcig mngon
194b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur tshul// ral pa gcig 'chang lha mo'i skur ston cing // bgegs tshogs 'dul phyir khro mo'i ma lugs 'dzin// ral pa gcig ma khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yon tan gzhir gyur
194b2(rgyud 'grel): cing // skal ldan rjes mthun 'gro don mdzad la brtson/ mgon po'i 'phrin las ma lus rdzogs mdzad ma// lha mo khro gnyer can la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa don yong zhags pa lha
194b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i bstod pa// paN+Di ta chen po e ra pe tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang // lo tsa ba ba ri rin chen grags pas bsgyur ba'o//
195a1(rgyud 'grel): // 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyag la bstong pa gru sa chos cher po bcwa rjes mdzang ba bzhugs/
195b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra s+yA tsar+d+ha Ti ru tsi tA sto tA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyu kA la tsaN+DA TIs bstod pa// 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshalo//
195b2(rgyud 'grel): lha mi lha gyis ni zhabs la btud// skye rga na de 'chi ba rab tu btsom// thugs rje'i ngang can 'jig rten dbang po khyed// skyabs med bdag la snying rje mdzod cig kyi// nyon mongs rlabs chen tshogs kyis 'joms
195b3(rgyud 'grel): byed cing // sna tshogs sgra sgrogs 'khor ba'i chu gter dbus// bying ba bdag ni zung la bsrung bar mdzod// brtse ba chen po khyed la bstod pa bgyid// srid pa'i mun pas mig la nye ru 'tsho zhing // 'chi ba'i
195b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa chen pos lus nyi ma chung // ji srid mnar med mi mnyam 'gro min par// bsrungs la bcom ldan bdag la kun tu gzigs// rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med gzung ba byas// mi shes pa yis srog
195b5(rgyud 'grel): chags stong phrag bsad// bdag gis sdig byas dang du mgon po yis// lus can skyon rnams ma lus nyams par mdzod// gang zhig 'tshe ba dang ni bkur sti'i phyir// bden min 'jig rten 'dod pa min pa
195b6(rgyud 'grel): smras/ dmyal ba yun du goms pa'i sme ba can// de kun 'jig rten dbang pos zhi bar mdzod// bdag gis sems can phan min gang bsams dang // gzhan gyis byas la'ang rje su yi rang ba// mgon po
196a1(rgyud 'grel): de la du bar bgyid pa na// deng bdag yid kyi sdig pa bsal du gsol// lha dang mi dang lha minA ris rnams dang // dud 'gro dmyal ba yi dgas 'gro bar ni// gnas shing rtag tu gdung ba'i
196a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can gang // khyod ni de rnams bsrung zhes bdag la grags// dri phyir gzhon du nyid srong lus la ni// thugs rje'i gzigs pa bdag gi steng sproso shes// dmyal bar zhugs pa min pa ji srid du// smra bar bgyi
196a3(rgyud 'grel): yis bcom ldan khyed kyis gson// 'on kyang gzhan gyi don la btang snyoms pa// dor zhig bcom ldan bdag don ma mdzad do// yang na brtse ba'i dbang gyur khyod kyis ni// bsod nams bskyeng mdzod rgud pa ma gzigs
196a4(rgyud 'grel): sam// dran pas kyang ni khyod ni yongs tshim na// sdig pa dor bar mdzod cig ma gzigs sam// de slang bcom ldan gzhan phan la mkhas pa// bdag ni 'dor bar ma mdzad 'di ru bsrungs// glang chen rta dang bur
196a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas chung ma dang // dmog bcas rgyal srid khang po sna tshogs dang // sha rus mgo dang khrag gi mthar thug pa// don du gnyer la mtha' dag khyod kyis byin// su zhig 'jig rten dbang po khyod mnyes byed// ri lu
196a6(rgyud 'grel): mig sman 'chil lham grub pa dang // grub pa'i sman dang nor bu rnam dag sngags// gnod sbyin mo dang grong 'jug sgrub par byed// gang dag mig dang rkang lag sman pa yi// sna tshogs nad kyi 'jigs chen nyams thag pa//
196b1(rgyud 'grel): khyod mnyos na ni ngo rnams yongs rgyas lus// rnam sgog nad med yon tan zang mor 'gyur// khyod dgyes gang lags rgyal 'gyur ga ra Da// gcan gzan gza' dang mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma// rtag tu zhi 'gyur de yi mdun
196b2(rgyud 'grel): du ni// gshin rje'i pho nya rgyu bar mi byed do// 'jig rten dbang phyug dgyes bzhin skyabs med bdag/ 'dor ba ci zhes bcom ldan bdag smre te// nyi ma so sor lag pa bsgreng byas nas// tshig 'khrugs pa yi skrag pa zhi bar
196b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzod// 'khrugs pa'i lus kyis song ba'i skye bar bdag/ yul drug la ni dbang po g.yo ba'i yid// sdig pa mang byas 'dir ne ma lus pa// bkres pa'i rgyu yis 'khor zhing rnam par 'dzings// gang gis ngan song
196b4(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal ma myong bar// bde 'gro mngon sum 'gro de khyed kyis mdzad// deng bdag 'jig rten dbang la phyag dang zhing // sna tshogs thal sbyar 'di ni phyag gi'o// khyod ni rmongs dang sdang ba 'jig pa'i rgyu// 'khor
196b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i chu gter chen po'i zam pa lags// ltung zhing skrag po slong ba'i dpung pa khyod// sdig lci mtshan mor byed pa'i sgra gcan// bla med bde gshegs kyis gsungs de nyid kyis// khyod kyis sems can sdug bsngal
196b6(rgyud 'grel): mang po sbyangs// rgyal dka' yid bsrungs bdud las khyod rgyal te// kun tu grol ba srid mchi'i pha rol lo// nang kun gtsang par mdzad pa khyod kyi sku// ma lus 'gro bar mchog tu lus mdzes pa// bcom ldan dpe med snying rje'i
197a1(rgyud 'grel): srin d+hA khyod// rgyu med gnyen du skye bo rnams la grags// rol pas dbang po 'joms shing rnam par 'byed// khyod ni yul la kun nas chags pa 'dir// lha yi bsam gtan mnyam bzhag khyod kyi thugs//
197a2(rgyud 'grel): nor ni slong ba po dang thun mong logs// brtse ldan khyod ni gzhan la phan mdzad kyang // gti mug lto 'phye chen pos sos zin cing // yul la kun rtog dge ba las ltung ba// bdag ni tshim par mi mdzad ci ltar lags// mtha' dag 'gro/
197a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don bsten snying rje gang // khyod kyis smos de nges pa lags sam ci// khyod kyi spyan sngar sna tsho gos sgra sgrogs pa'i// sdig ldan bdag las gang las bsre ba mi mdzad// mgon khyod snying rje na mkha' las yangs te// sems
197a4(rgyud 'grel): can rnams la chu 'dzin chu rgyun ltar// mya ngam chu dang mtho dma'i yul kun du// ma lus nyin mtshan par med 'beb par 'gyur// bcom ldan bran las bdag gi bsod nams gang // de ni 'gro 'dis bde blag thob gyur
197a5(rgyud 'grel): te// dpal ldan po ta yi ro bor gnas// mdzes shing sna tshogs rol pas skye bar shog/ 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa grub thob chen po tsaN+Da Tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar shar phyogs kyi piN+Da ta
197a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po nags kyi rin chen gyi zhal snga nas dang / lo ts+tsha ba 'gos gzhon nu dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// /
198a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dang phyan ni stod pa brgyam bzhug
198b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ lo ke shwa ra sha ta ka sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa brgya pa// 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshalo// mtho ris mgon po'i yan lag mchog btud cod pan
198b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin la 'od dang ldan pa'i nor bu lta bu'i 'od// mtsho skyes stan lhun gus pas rab 'dud mgo bo lA naM dzA ti'i me tog rgyas 'phreng 'od ltar te/ bde byung dbu yi dbu rgyan ri dag sa mtshan ldan dkar ser mi dman dman
198b3(rgyud 'grel): zhing nyams pa nyid bgyid pa// 'jig rten dbang po'i zhabos sen dri med ri bor 'dzin pa'i mdzes pa zhi slang 'jig rten la gyur cig/ ral khur 'dzin pa'i zla ba ra gsol ral pa dmar ser deng 'gregs ldan cig bkra
198b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zer rnams kyis// nges par mi rdzi 'phrog byed kyi ni dman pa min pa'i cod pan nor bu'i 'od rnams kyis kyang min// lha tshogs rnams kyi sgra 'phreng mdzes pa nag po dag dang 'phrogs pa las ni rnam par mi nyams pa//
198b5(rgyud 'grel): mi bzlogs 'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs sen 'od zer khyed rnams ngag gi mun pa zhi ba'i slad gyur cig/ yongasu rdzogs shing rgya che'i bang mdzod rab tu gsal zhing dpal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyi rgyu//
198b6(rgyud 'grel): sdug pa dang ni ring du gyur pa'i skye bo rnams kyi mi bzang 'jigs pa'i dogs pa rnam par sel// sprin rnams kyis kyang bsgrib par mi nus mun can gdug pa'i gza' las byung ba'i 'jigs pa zhi gyur pa// 'jig rten
199a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang po'i zhabs kyi sen mo bsil zer ldan pa'i sngon med zer gyis khyad rnams dag gyur cig/ nyon mongs phung po'i bud shing dag ni lus pa med par sreg byed me chen por gyur pa'i rtse// 'jig rten
199a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum po dag tu rab dkar gsal zhing gti mug tu gnag dge gi smag ru ma 'thibs pa sol// dmyal sde gzhir ma yi phung po rnams la bdud rtsi'i chu bo rgya chen rgyun ni 'bras bcas pa// pad+ma 'dzin zhabs las 'khrud
199a3(rgyud 'grel): sen tshogs 'od zer rnams kyis khyed kyi 'khor ba yang dag sel gyir cig/ rang gi 'dun pas bcod pa'i 'dod pa sbyin la shin tu mkhas gyur yid bzhin nor bu bsam yas shing // shin tu 'jigs pa'i dogs pas
199a4(rgyud 'grel): gdungs gyur zhi bar bgyid pa'i bsil bu'i 'od zer yid ni rab 'phrog la// yon tan du ma'i tshogs rnams 'dzin pa gsal bar gyur cing mdzes pa dang ldan me long dag gi gzugs// 'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs las
199a5(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i sen mo des bskyed bod zer mdzes pas khyed rnams sbyang gyur cig/ 'od zer da pag med las 'khrungs che ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes pa dang ldan gtsug phung chen po ni// mdzes ldan mgon po'i rab tu
199a6(rgyud 'grel): mo dzes zhabs sen mo'i 'od zer tshogs ni de la mchod mkhas lho rnams kyi// mgo yi rin chen mchog gi tshogs las nges par 'phros gyur shin tu rab bkra'i 'od zer tshogs rnams kyis// bde sogs dga'
199b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gzhu la nye bar spyod byed 'di dag gis ni khyed rnams yun ring dur gyur cig/ mngon par 'dod pa'i yul rnams 'thob pa'i sbyin pa las ni dpal dang ldan pa'i longs spyod kyis mtho zhing // kun tu rnam par
199b2(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yo'i 'od ni bston byed snod rnams dag gi mgu ba bskyed par bad gyur la// dri ma dang bral mtshungs pa med pa'i gzugs ni ri bong can las lhag cing skyon gyi mun so la ba// nor bu'i 'od zer lta bu phyag
199b3(rgyud 'grel): na pad+ma'i zhabs kyi snga khyed rnams dag la tshim pa sbyin gyur tsog/ rab mdzes phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs kyi pad+ma las 'khrungs sen mo'i tshogs rnams dag gi 'od zer ni// rgyan chang med par snying rje'i chu yis nye bar bran pa
199b4(rgyud 'grel): de yi sku lus ngag gis gzhi la// khyad 'phags yi shrIs sa bon btab pa las skyes ma chung dpag bsam shing gi mya'i tshogs rnams dang // mtshungs pa gang yid yis khyed kyi srid pa'i 'jigs pa rab mang mthu
199b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs nyams par byed gyur cag/ 'jig rten dbang po'i zhabs pad+ma las skyes son mo'i 'od zer bdud dang dag spu bdag la skrag ster zhing // sut+pal dra mar mdog drod par don yod mda' rnams mdo rtse gyen
199b6(rgyud 'grel): du bstan bcug 'od zer ltar mdzes la// 'jigs rung 'khor ba'i dong du rtog tu lhung ba'i skye bo 'dren byed sra mkhregs thag pa'i dpyid thag 'dis// shin tu rnyed dka'i phun sum tshogs pa chen po mtho ba'i go
200a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phang dag la khyed rnams 'god gyur cig/ 'od dang ldan zhing nyon mongs lus kyis rang dbang med du ba 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par gcod la dma'// skyon gyi dmigs pa las ring gsal zhing mAl+la
200a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bla ma skye bo rnams kyi sgrol bar byed gyur lA// kun du dga' ba rab sdug ster zhing ri bong 'dzin dpal mtha' dag 'dzin gyur dri ma dang bral ba// bsam yas phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs 'khrungs sen mo gang yin
200a3(rgyud 'grel): de yis khyed kyi bsam pa rgyal gyuraro cig/ ci zhig bde 'byung gis 'di zla du ma rnams kyis mchod par bkod byas 'od dang ldan pa'i dum bu 'am// yang na nges par khyad 'phags yid gyur byang chub dpal mos
200a4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen phreng ba bkod dam ci zhig yin// lha rnams kyis ni lha yi me tog rmad byung mtshungs pa med rnams phreng ba rgyus dpyangs pa min nam zhes blo gros bskyed pa 'jig rten mgon po'i zhabs las 'khrungs pa
200a5(rgyud 'grel): sen mo'i phreng bas khyed rnams dgyes gyur cig/ gang du 'di ni pad+mo las skyes phyag bgyid 'chi med mgo bor nor bu'i khri ston mthon po la// zhabs rdul dag ni rgyun du gzims shing gang du yang ni 'dzin byed
200a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhi la mgo 'phyang rab 'dud pa// de ltar rab bskyed 'od zer tshogs kyi so ring gsal zhing bzhang gang bgyid 'dra 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ zhabs skyes sen mi gang yin de dag rnams ni khyed kyi mtha'
200b1(rgyud 'grel): bral mun pa gzhil ba'i smad gyur cig/ tsha gdung sel byed dpa' bo dka ra bsil mchog ldan bdud brtsi'i thigs pa'i char gyi rgyun ni 'bebs mdzad cing // mi bzang mnga' chen char gyi rgyun ni drag po rab
200b2(rgyud 'grel): 'grems bdud la gnod byed phyir ltar gyur pa// phyag pad+ma'i zhabs kyi sen mo'i 'od zer dpal mdzad dag gis khyed kyi 'khor ba'i rnam pa yi// khongs chen brtson rar rgya che'i sdug bsngal rnam mang 'jigs su
200b3(rgyud 'grel): rung rnams yang dag 'phrog par byed gyur cig/ 'jig rteni dbang po'i zhabs las rab skyes sen mo'i gnas la snang ba dag ni shin tu bzlog dka' ba'i// bdud kyis kun nas rab 'phangs mda' yis khyab
200b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams sgrib par byed pa'i yol por 'khrul pa bskyed byed cing // kun nas nyon mongs dpung rnams brlag 'gyur bsal bar go byed mjug rings chen po'i tshogasu brtag bya ba// 'jig rten gsum gyis mi nus
200b5(rgyud 'grel): nus pa stong pa gsum las rgyal ba'i ru mtshon chen pos rgyal gyur cig// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyi zla ba kun nas mdzes ldan 'od kyi tshogs pa lta bu dang / nyon mongs nges bskyegs
200b6(rgyud 'grel): thal ba'i tshogs rnams grol ba'i lam gyi rlung gis bdas nas bgrod pa lta bu dang // mi bzad bdud rnams kyis ni rnam par mi phyed mi chung rdo dkar grogs bu bkod pa lta bu yis// nye bar mtshon 'od
201a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs skyes sen mo'i 'od zer tshogs kyis khyed rnams bsrung gyur cig/ mtshan mo'i mgon po nges pa kho nur phyogs la zad cing rang nyid dman pa skyengs par gyur pas ni// skad cig
201a2(rgyud 'grel): brtag par bya ba mtshungs med mun pa spongs mkhas dri ma dang ni zad pa mi mnga' zhing // mi dman dgra yi srid po zang byed pha rol 'gro skyong rdzi ba med pa'i brtul zhugs nyer mtshon po// 'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs
201a3(rgyud 'grel): sen gang de rnams kyis mi khom 'phan pa dag las khyed rnams bsrung gyur cig/ phun tshogs dam pa'i sgrub byed rab tu stobs ldan pad+mo 'dzin pa'i zhabs kyi rdzing la gnas bcas shing // 'jig rten gsum dpal
201a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bar bzhed pa sen mo'i 'od zer tshogs ni mtshungs med mngon par rab 'thob// pa shes gnyen 'char bsau thob pa'i rab gsel rjesu 'grogs ldan shin tu phul byung 'phel ba rnyed gyur pa// rgud pa kun gyi
201a5(rgyud 'grel): dgrar gyur theg chen yang dag 'grub pa'i rgyu des khyed rnams phongs las srung gyur cig/ gtsug phud la ni zla phyed rgyun 'dzin bzhed par gyur pa'i phyugs bdag 'di ni ngo tsha dang bral la// nub par mi 'gyur
201a6(rgyud 'grel): nor bus mngon par mdzes 'dong khyab 'jug dag kyang ji ltar mkhas pa lta bu yon// dbang po yi ni mgo po che la nor bu 'di yang don yong mini zhes phye ga na pad zhabs kyi// sen mo'i tshogs 'di mthong gyur
201b1(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig mdzes pas sems zin 'jig rten gyis bsams de yis rgyal gyur cig/ rgya khyon cher byas ring du steng du 'gro zhing 'og tu 'ang dmyal ba rnams kyi sgrol bar byed par gyur// bsil zer ldan pa 'char kar
201b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur ltar dkar zhing dgra rnams bzhin ni nag po nyid du 'gyur ba'i rgyu// nus mthu rnam par shes par bya ba dkar zhing ma lus 'gro bas mchog tu gsal bar mthong zhing snang // dbu la sangs rgyas kyi ni zhabs
201b3(rgyud 'grel): pang la gnas sen mo'i 'od zer tshogs kyis khyod rnams srung gyur cig/ lha dbang dgyes pa'i mchod pa la mkhas lha mos rab gter ga pur phye ma kun nas 'thul ba yi// 'od ltar snang zhing gus pa'i khur thogs/
201b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog byed phyag 'tshal ral pa'i thal bar rnam par 'khrul pa'i sa// dpal mo mchod pa 'bul ba'i lag gi pad+ma'i gi sa ra rtse yi rdul phran zug pa ltar mdzes pa// phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs las skyes gyur sen
201b5(rgyud 'grel): mo'i 'od zer tshegs kyis khyed rnams phrong sde las srung gyur cig/ lhun po'i 'od zer ser po min+da bgying lha yi glang chen li khri'i tshon gyis gsal byas dmar po'i dpal// nyams par byed pa dpa'
201b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing rta ljang can gyi rta yau mi dman ldang ba nyid ni 'phrog bgyid la// sngon po'i snang ba nyams bgyid 'chi med bu mos 'o ma'i chu gter lung bab rnam brtags skrag gyur pa// pad+mo 'dzin pa'i zhabs kyi pad+mo
202a1(rgyud 'grel): las 'khrungs sen mo'i 'od zer tshogs kyis khyed rnams bsrung gyur cig/ lha rnams khyod kyi rtswa yab bsil zer byed ltar dkar pa dag gis 'di la mdzes par mi 'os te// kA ye ram b+he dgos
202a2(rgyud 'grel): pa med pa'i ga bur phye ma gus pa'i rtsom pas yongasu 'thor ba ci// bde sogs khyed kyi me tog dkar po rnams kyis rab tu gtor bso tsaM zhes mtho ris sa yi rje// mchod la sngags mdzad phyug na chu skyes zhibs

202a4(rgyud 'grel): byugs shing nyid ma'i rta yi 'od zer ljang gu nyid kyang dkar por mdzad// mchod mkhas lha yi skye bos gautwor ba'i ku no ta'i zil lus bsil zer can gyi dum bu ltar gyur rnams// ci zhig la dgos 'jig rten

202b5(rgyud 'grel): na pad+ma'i zhabs sen+da zla ba mdzes pa dang ldan zla ba'i 'od 'dis khyed rnams srung gyur cig// lha yin chung skye bo mdzes ma rnams kyis 'dod 'o su 'khrul mig tshugs lta zhing mchod gyur la// sen mo'i

203b2(rgyud 'grel): mtsho skye su 'khrul bung ba'i phreng bas glu blangs nyid la glu rnams kyis ni ci zhig bya// rab mdzes sen mo 'di la nor bu'i phreng ba rnams kyis mdzes pa nyid du bgyi bar nus min zhes// gang zhig mchod pa lta

206a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig pu 'jog rten dbang ba'i zhabs ni khyud rnams 'byor pa'i slad gyur cig/ mdun sa gang du lha yi ral me mkhan rnams mdzes pas yid gzung mchod pa bgyid par ma nus te// gang

206a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyu byi ni nang du ba'ang gyur lta bas mi ngoms gzugs can mAtshwa skyes can des rgyal gyur cig/ dpal ldan par medo rab tu mtshungs pa med cing cher gyur 'dod pa chen po'i khang pa mchog gi sa re// lhag

206a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba// mgo la 'od dpag med pas khyed kyi gti mug gis bskrun rab 'joms rgya che'i 'jigs pa 'joms gyur cig/ brtan pa'i rab 'jigs rung bas skor zhing sgra ldan bcings pas dam bcings ring
206a6(rgyud 'grel): por gsal ba'i sgra// drag po shin tu 'jigs rung dmyal ba'i gro nga khyer nyid kyi rnam par 'dzin pa dgra bo rnams dag ni// btson khang nang du gdung ba drag pos shin tu 'jigs par gyur rnams dran nas skyabs/

206b2(rgyud 'grel): rlabs phreng ba rnams// sgra drag sgrog sa shing thor thor dang ldan chu srin tshegs kyis gang ba 'jigs rung chu yi chu gter ni// gang zhig dmigs pa nyid na mthon mthing dri mo med pa'i tshogs chen bkram brtse dga' dag gi
206b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas// nyams rab dga' bar 'grub 'gyur pad+mo can de shin tu myur bar 'gro rnams srung ba'i slad gyur cig// du ba'i tshogs kyi 'ching bas bcings pas zla ba nyi ma'i 'od zer nyams shing 'bras bu med par byed//
206b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gog pa bskyed pa'i bgegs la mkhas pa'i lha yi chung ma rnams kyang brtan pa'i mthu rnams nyams 'gyur pa'i// du ba'i rgyal mtshan can yang gang gi ming brjod rgyun 'dzin 'dzin byed rnams la rab tu nyamaso/
206b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas 'dzin pas khyed la nyams dgur rgyun chad med cing sgrub byed dang bcas legs pa sgrub gyur cig// khro bas rab bslang lag pa dus kyi mtshon cha dang 'dra 'jig su rung ba'i srung ces sgrogs//
206b6(rgyud 'grel): par byed// chang gis bsgos pa'i 'gram pa dag tu bung ba'i tshog sa gtibs glo bu ra gnag gyur ngar zhing che ba'i lus// lag ldan dbang po 'ong ba gang gi mtshan gyi lcags kyu mnag dkas btab na zhum zhing skrag 'gyur ba//
207a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang po'i thugs rjes rab 'dod yo byad de ni khyed kyi 'dod pa'i bya ba mdzad gyur cig/ sud ces dbugs ni 'jigs rung khro ba'i rang gnas za bas bsreg byed mi chung dug gi du bar ldan//
207a2(rgyud 'grel): so yi bza' ba mthong bas mgo bo shin tu rab tu gdengs gyur nyes byeng sde rtse ldan pa rnams// ring gi mtshan ni dug so'i dbang po'i dgrar gyur blo la rnam par bzhugs pas nus med nyams 'gyur ba// 'jig rten dbang
207a3(rgyud 'grel): de kun gyi nyon mongs phung po shin tu mi bzod mngon gyur zhi bo'i slad gyur cig// spos dris rab tu bslang ba'i dregs pa che 'dzin glang chen tshugs rnams za bar sgrogs shing 'jigs pa'i shugs// khro bas rtse gcig tu
207a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro mgrin pa'i phug zab dag nas drag po'i ngar sgra zab mo sgrogs byed pa'i// ri dgas dbang po 'khol byed kyis bkol 'os pa nyid du kang gi yon tan brjod pas ldan 'gyur ba// yan lag mchog mthor bde gshegs/
207a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas shing rnal 'byor ldan des khyed kyi ngan par 'brel pa sel gyur cig/ rab mang gnod pas rjesu dpag bya brtse bas zad pa'i snying ldan 'jigs pa sgrub par byed gyur pa// mkha' la gnas shing ri yis nye bar gzhal//
207a6(rgyud 'grel): bya bung ba ma he mngon 'gyur 'od lta'i lus kyi tshogs// sbyor babs legs ldan sgyu ma'i rang bzhin lta bu gang zhabs brjod pas dman zhing brtson 'grus me nga ba dang // rnam par nyams par bgyid ldan bde bar gshegs
207b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas nges khyed rnams rnam par rgyal ba'i slad gyur cig/ glang chen tshogs kyi chu srin rab rgyu ral gri mdud rings 'od dang ldan pa'i rba rlabs 'khrug cing rgyug// rab bslang dkar zhing g.yo ba'i tog gi dbu ba
207b2(rgyud 'grel): legs par gsalo ldan skrag pa'i gnas kyi sar gyur pa// mtshungs med sgra rnams yang dag 'a grogs pa'i sde brtan chu bo dag ni gang zhig brtan pa legs pa'i grus// spro ba dang bcas yang dag rgal 'gyur mtsho skyes
207b3(rgyud 'grel): can des khyed kyi bde min bde bar sel gyur cig// sa 'dzin tshogs rnams 'byed pa'i mthu ldan 'od zer re ba mang 'byor pa'i 'od la spyod cing 'jigs byed pa// rab tu bkra ba'i me 'od rnam 'dzin 'jigs pas
207b4(rgyud 'grel): zil gnon 'byung po rnams ni rmongs shing 'khrul bskyed pa// rdo rje 'jigs pa'i spyod hU~M mngon du lhung ba dag ni gang la gus pa'i mthu las myur nyid du// rnam par nyams pa'i sar 'gyur mdzes ldan mtsho skyes 'dzin pa de
207b5(rgyud 'grel): yis khyed kyi srid pa 'byed gyur cig// kun tu gzir bas brtan nyams 'odri pa'i sgrub byed nye gyur lha ngan 'khros pas mkhar rje zhan gyur pa// zug gzer mnag dka' drag pos 'gog byed rnam pa sna tshigs mang po'i
207b6(rgyud 'grel): nad kyis rab tu gzir po'i lus// gang gis bsam gtan nges brjod bdud rtsi 'dzin byed kyis gzung 'gro ba blo ldan zug rngus mi rdzi bar// lhag par dga' bskyed mgo la sangs rgyas de yis khyed rnams blo ni byang chub slad srung
208a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig// ring nas bod bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bdag mtshungs med dgra rnams nyams shing rab tu gdung bar byed pa'i glu/ drag tu len cing khrims lugs grags pa pha mes bdag po'i grags pa las
208a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal khrims lugs dag dang ldan// 'byor pa rnam kun brlag pa bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur khros pa'i blo can gang zhags brjod pa'i nus po yis// mchog tu mdza' bar 'gugs byed rgyal ba'i khyu mchog gnas nges khyed kyi
208a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa yang dag 'phrog gyur cig// tshangs pad dman pa nyid gyur bla mo yang ni bla ma min dang ma nyams par brjod nyams pa nyid// khyab 'jug mi smra'i ngang tshul dbang phyug kyang ni tshig rnams rnam par 'god pa'i khengs/
208a4(rgyud 'grel): pa med gyur la// tshim zhing gsal bar bstod 'dod rnams kyang de ltar lha rnams gang gi yon tan brjod la mkhas min te// rgyal ba'i thugs kyi spyod yul nang gi yon tan chags mnga' phyag na pad+ma dag gis rgyal
208a5(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig/ yab kyis ya mtshan la ste lha dgu'i dgra yis spyod pa dang nr-i mig gsum ldan pas mig dag la// rigs kyi dgra yis rigs lnga bla ma yos kyang gshegs pA la ste mtshan mo'i bdag pos kun la'o// grogs//
208a6(rgyud 'grel): po yis ni byams pa la ste a tre'i bu yis 'gro kun bu ltar gyur pa'i mnyes gshin le// 'di bstod bstod pa'i snod gang mtha' yas sbyin mdzad phyag na chu skyes de yis khyed rnams srung gyur cig// gang la
208b1(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pas rang gi zhal rnams mang po nyid las mang po legs par bzhed dang ldan pas bstod// kun dgas khengs shing phung pos kyang ngo klu rnams ngag gi mgon pos kyang ni spyi bos 'dud par bgyid// brgya byin 'dren byed brgya
208b2(rgyud 'grel): phrag bcu rnams bsngags pa bgyid cing gang ba rnams gzigs rgyun chad med par ni// 'dren byed dga' bas phyag 'tshal bstod pa'i snod gyur 'jig rten gnyen des 'jig rten gsum rnams srung gyur cig// pad+ma 'dzin
208b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gdung med rab gsal 'jig rten pa rnams snang ba'i don du yod pa min nam zhes// mkha' yi lam la nyi ma'i 'gron po 'di ni ngal zhing snang byed 'od zer 'bras bu med par glong // blo yi nor can blo ldan rnams kyis bstod
208b4(rgyud 'grel): pa bgyis pas 'dun sar rags pa'i snang ba sgrub byed la// gang gi bka' drin myur du dgra rnams nyams par byed pa de las 'gro ba dge legs ldan gyur cig// phyag 'os gang la phyag 'tshal bkod pa las kyang bsod
208b5(rgyud 'grel): nams snod rnams shin tu mtho ba nyid 'gyur la// thun mong min pa'i mchod blos gcig pu mchod kyang gus pa'i snod rnams nye byar bsags pa shin tu mang // gang gi bsam gtan gnas pa dran pa yis kyang 'byung
208b6(rgyud 'grel): bo'i 'jigs pa dag ni 'phral la brjed 'gyur la// mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab 'jig rten phan pa'i sgrub la 'jig rten mgon des khyed rnams srung gyur cig// dbang po'i rdo rje brdzun te lha yi dgra rnams nyams
209a1(rgyud 'grel): bar gang gis byas shing stobs ldan 'phrog byed ni// shin tu rno zhing yid 'phrog mngon par me tog mnga' can dag la me tog can ni 'bras bu med// khyab 'jug 'khor lo la ni 'khar la dAn yod mun
209a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes skye bo tshegs kyis nges par brjod ces nas// mtshon tshogs bzung ba med par dgra yi skye bo dga' bas bcom pa mtsho skyes ldan pas rgyal gyur cig// 'jig rten 'das pa'i bde ba 'dzin par gyur kyang 'gro ba'i sdug
209a3(rgyud 'grel): bsngalo drag po dag gis sdug bsngal ldan// rtag tu rje su chags pa btang bar gyur kyang skyabs med sdug pa'i srog chags gting ba dag las grol// 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po nyid du gyur kyang mi mnyam srid ldan pa gro la
209a4(rgyud 'grel): brten zhing 'dud pa bgyid// mtshungs bral bsam yas spyod pa sgrub mdzad mag la sangs rgyas gang des khyed rnams yun ring srung gyur cig// rgyun mi 'chad par 'jig rten gsum du dpe myed mnyes gshin+da sbram blugs
209a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba dag las zhi bar ni// gang zhig mi gshegs stobs ldan mi chung mu stegs rlung 'tshu bo dag gis rab tu rnam par mi g.yo zhing // gzhan phan rgyu la brtson pa rab brtan sdong bu mi nyams 'od zer dang ldan sring pa'i khang
209a6(rgyud 'grel): por ni// gti mug mun nag rab tu 'thibs pa sel byed 'jig rten dbang po'i sgron ma de yis rgyal gyur cig// gang du 'dri ni kun la byams ldan mi bzang mang por gyur pa'i nyon mongs dgra rnams ci la ba sreg/ gang du grong
209b1(rgyud 'grel): bar nus pa'i mthu ldan snying rje'i zhags pa brtan pos g.yo ba med par ci la 'ching // gang du btang snyoms phyogs nyid la brten gzhan la phan par bgyid skad nI la 'khrug ste de yi phyir// rnam bkra ngo mtshar phyag na pad+ma'i spyod pa
209b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro las 'das pas khyed rnams dman las rgyal gyur cig// kun las phan zhing kun gyi rang bzhin du gsal rgya che tshul ldan dus kun du ni kun gyi mgon// kun gyi don chen thams cad sgrub slang gang zhig 'dul
209b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sgrub byed rnam pa kun ni ster bar bgyi// bla mor gyur cing che ba'i yon tAn kun gyis kun las 'das shing khengs po kun ni zhum par 'god // kun ni kun la rab sbyin mgo la kun mkhyen des ni srid chen khyed rnams
209b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bras dang bcas gyur cig// dbang po rje bo skye dgu rnams bdag 'chi med bla ma 'jig rten skyong ba dag dang dbang po che// 'od ldan dang ni dgra thul dbyug pa gzhan las rgyal ba'i stobs ldan laste rgyal nor
209b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin rgyal ba'i zhab sa// don ldan ming gi snod ni rgya bo bo nyid ces khyod bshad kyis khengs 'khor gyi skye bos skyes pa las// lha mo skye bo ngo mtshar gyur rnams gang la phyag bgying phyag na chu skyes de yis rgyal
209b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig// gtso bo 'phags pa rnams kyi mchog gyur bsdoms pa dag ni pha rol phongs pa rab tu sel ba'i mtsharab tu mang ba'i mchog sbyin rgya che'i tshogs kyi chu yi char drag gsal zhing che ba'i
210a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyun tshogs kyi// sbyin pa'i mi dman rgyan 'dzin gyur cing bzlog dkar rab brtan bdud kyi dgra yi dpa' bos mi thul pa// dpag med 'od zer 'dzin pa'i dpa' bo yis ni khyed rnams ngag gi dpa' bo'i
210a2(rgyud 'grel): dgra rnams bzlog gyur cig// gang du phyag na pad+mo mdzes ldan nus pa mchog gyur mthu dang ldan zhing rtag tu sbyor ba la// 'khor ba'i chu bdag la ma zhugs 'jig rten mgon po mtha' dag mgon dang bcas zhes
210a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam der bsams nas ni// sangs r+b+ba sau snying rje mi chung kun gyi sgron mar gyur don dang ldan pa dam pa ci'i khur po dag/ rnam par dor nas yang zhing mya ngan 'das pa 'thob par dgyes 'phel de yis khyed
210a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams srud gyur cig// 'gro ba'i bya ba tshegs kyi khur ni bla mar gyur pa'i bde gshegs bzhin du gtsug gis legs par blangs// bsngags par 'os pa pad+mo'i rgyanA ni gus pa'i snod la rang nyid bzhin
210a5(rgyud 'grel): du lag tu legs par gtod// sems can tshogs kyis zhi ba dag ni dmyal ba rnams kyi dmyal me bzhin du yun ring 'thob par bgyid// gang gis nyon mongs rab 'ching rnams ni
210a6(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mi bzad 'gro bzhin du zhi mdzad des khyod srungs// gang zhig sgyu can min yang rang bzhin sna tshogs mtha' yas ston byed gsal bar grags pa'i sgra dang ldan// 'jigs kun yang dag zhi yang
210b1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu snying rje ldan pa nyid kyis 'jigs par gyur ba'i kun spyod mdzad// khro dang bral ba yin yang gdug pa'i bsam pa 'dul la mkhas pa'i khro ba rtag tu rje su 'brel// bsam gyis khyab pa min yang chen pos bas
210b2(rgyud 'grel): bya mgo la rdzogs sangs rgyas mdzes ldan des rgyal gyur cig// yan lag dam pa kho na ma lags sku lus mchog kyang dpag med 'od kyis mngon par dga' ba 'dzin// gang gi pad+mo kho na ma lags dgra sde dag
210b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang ci 'jigs bzod par dka' ba dag kyang san+d+hu lam// gang gis ral pa kho na ma lags nus pa dag kyang 'gro ba'i dgra 'joms byed par chas shing bsdams// mkhas pa 'jig rte ni mgon 'dis gshin rje khros
210b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bzhin ni snang bdag las khyed rnams bsre nga gyur cig// ma lus sems can don gyi bya ba bgyi slad nus pa dag ni kun nas rab tu bsngar byas shing // chas kyis bsdams pa gang gi tshe na srid pa'i chu
210b5(rgyud 'grel): gter dag ni skems kyis dogs nas 'dar byed cing // nyon mongs don mthun rab 'bros byang chub snyoms dpa' ngal so thub pa rnams kyang mya ngan 'das pa lnga// dge zhes bsngags shing gzhol byed mgo la bde gshegs
210b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas des khyed kyi rab 'dod dri ma zhi gyur cig// bgegs kyi tshogs rnams gnod pa ngag gis rnam par 'joms pa mi bzang yid kyi'ang spyod yul min pa'i las// gcig tu nges par bde ba gcod pa'i 'gro ba'i
211a1(rgyud 'grel): dgra bo bcad pa'i phyag na pad+mo ni dbang med myos bzhin shin tu 'jigs ldan rnam par mi 'gyur gang gis sgo byed mgon po dag gi yang // lci bar gyur pa'i jo bo brtse ba des ni khyed rnams brtse med mthar byed
211a2(rgyud 'grel): ngag las srung gyur cig// / zil gyis mnan pa'i sa nyid ma yin shin tu 'jam pa yin yang ji snyed 'jig rten khams mtha' yas// brtson 'grus shin tu bzlog bya ma yin dus gcig la yang rab tu snang ba dag gis khyab par
211a3(rgyud 'grel): byed// ma lus shin tu gsal ba ma yin gzi ldan gzi yang me khyer 'od kyi cha shas rjes mthun pa// 'jig rten dbang phyug gzi brjid de yis 'jogs pa zhi slang khyod kyi gti mug mun chen 'phrog gyur cig// ma lus nam
211a4(rgyud 'grel): mkha'i khams ni skye bo bzhin du kun nas yongasu rdzogs par byas gyur re bu'i phyogs// ltung ba'i phung po thams cad sna dA ba bzhin du rnam par nyams par rab brtson phul byung med par bgyid// gang gis rdzu 'phrul che ldan
211a5(rgyud 'grel): yid kyi bdud ni mun pa'i tshogs dang lhan cig zhi bar 'gro bgyid pa// mtsho skyes ldan pa'i snang ba de ni khyed rnams dag ni rab mang 'byor pa 'phel ba'i slad gyur cig// gzhan gyi 'od rnams nyams byed dbang phyug
211a6(rgyud 'grel): cig shos 'od kyis mtshungs dka' mun pa'i phung po'i stobs 'bigs shing // sems can 'tshe ba'i bsams pa can rnams khyad par du ni gdung byed bkra ba'i 'od zer mi nyams pa// sna tshogs mtha' yas g.yo ming la
211b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs bsgribs pa'i yul rnams ngag ni gsal bar byed pa'i nus pa'i 'dzin// 'jig rten dbang po'i snang ba gcig kyang 'chi med tshogs mtshungs de ni khyed kyi 'jigs sel slad gyur cig// gang du sems can ma lus
211b2(rgyud 'grel): rab mang+ga 'a dod pa'i chu la chu ba'i bde ba rnyed dka' phun tshogs shing // don med mu stegs ngan pa'i skye bo ri bo lta bu rgal bar dka' ba'i gting du 'gro byed la// bzlog dka' kun nas rab rgyas 'gro ba'i snying pa nyams par
211b3(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i rlabs phreng rab tu 'phel ldan pa// phyag na pad+ma'i 'od zer chu gte kye gi nags me'i 'jigs pa zhi slang rnam par 'phel gyur cig// ches kyi bdud rtsi'i chu bo gdul bya la yod gal te dmyal ba'i me rnams zhi
211b4(rgyud 'grel): ba 'di ni ci// bcing bar byas pa ral pa'i phung po la yod gal te dgra yi tshogs rnams 'gro ba bral ba ci// spyi bo'i khang par rgyal ba rab lci gnas gyur gal te mgon po 'jig rten gsum rnams dud pa ci// de ltar 'jig rten
211b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyen gyi rnam par bkru ba'i tha snyad dag gis khyed kyi dgra rnams 'joms gyur cig/ mngon par dga' bos rgyas pa gcig bu nyid kyang sems can bsam pa'i dbang byas rnam pa tha dad pa// dbye dka' yang dag min+da
211b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rtog pa g.yo med mi g.yo dag la rtsom pa chen po rdo rje'i rtse// dam pa'i blo gros ku mu da la zla ba'i 'od zer mu stegs don med can brjod mun pa la// nyams par byed po'i nyi ma 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs pa'i
212a1(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa khyed kyi srid 'byed slad gyur cig/ sna tshogs rnam par rtsod pa'i gnas kyi 'dun sar 'dus pa rgya cher dregs pa'i cha las smras pa po// bzlog dkar rab gyur bskyon pa'i sgra chen ldan pa rkun mig
212a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs dman pa dang bcas zhum 'gyur cing // bag med myos pa'i skye bo rnams kyis rnam par ltung ba rab sel mkhas pa rnams kyi dga' bskyed pa// mgo la rgyal ba'i sku lus 'od zer phun tshogs dge gi dngos po
212a3(rgyud 'grel): skye med gsung des rgyal gyur cig/ dgra rnams dngang 'gyur rgyal ldan mtshan gang 'od zer tshogs ni rab tu mdzes shing 'gro ba dag gis bstod// mya ngan dmyal ba'i gnas rnams ngag la rgya cher gdung ba rab tu
212a4(rgyud 'grel): 'joms byed rnam par rgyas pa'i chu// dgra yis 'phangs pa'i mtshon phreng dag la stobs ldan rdo rje srid gsum mtha' dag 'jigs par gyur ba rnams// nyams par bgyid pa la bsngags phyag na pad+ma'i phyag ni
212a5(rgyud 'grel): khyed rnams chags nyams med pa'i slad gyur cig/ 'jig pa'i mthor rlung dag gis dkrugs ltar yul gyi ri bo rab mthor ljon pa'i phreng po'i rtsa ba rnams// rtsad nus 'byin pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing dgra yi glang
212a6(rgyud 'grel): chen dregs pa ni chung nyams pa nyid du bgyid// slong ba'i sbrang rtsi byed 'gugs sbyin pa'i rgyun 'bebs 'jig rten dbang phyug phyag gi sdong po la dga' ba// bzang po dag ni khyed kyi dgra yi grong khyer srid pa 'joms
212b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i slad du brtul te 'jug gyur cig/ dam pa'i khongs ni gang zhig nor la sred ldan skye bo'i tshogs kyi re ba mi 'chang grub pa'i gter// gang zhig yu ba dag ni rdo rje'i rjes mthun dgra rnams skrag bgying 'dab ma dam par
212b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rtse// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal mos gnas bgyis yon rten bsngags par 'os ldan rnam par ma bdang ba// 'jig rten mgon po'i phyag gi yongs rdzogs pad+ma de ni khyed rnams dag gi grol ba'i rgyar
212b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig/ rtag tu sred pa rnam par 'phel zhing mgrin pa'i phugs skabs dman par gyur pa'i yi dgas phung po rnams// kun tu dga' ba skyed byed dam pa'i bcud ldan mchog tu byang chub dpal mo lhag par gnas pa
212b4(rgyud 'grel): can tu 'byor 'dod yid dang ldan pa rnams kyis legs par bsten gnas dam pa'i pad+ma gsal zhing mdzes pa yi// tshogs kyis rab spras zo ba dang ldan 'jig rten dbang po'i chu skyes gang des khyed rnams srung gyur cig/
212b5(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs nyi ma sdug bsngal tshigs kyi 'od zer chung ba ma yin stug por gyur pa'i tshe gdung gis// gdung zhing dman pa'i skye bo gang dag rnams la tshad pa'i gdugs dang mtshungs par rje su sgrub byed cing // mi dman gdung bar
212b6(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur mi 'gyur ma lus 'jig rten dag la mo tshang med 'ong steng gi blo rer bris// 'jig rten dbang po'i phyag na 'byor pa'i dri med pade mos khyed kyi sdig pa nyams par 'gro gyur cig/ stobs rnams kyi gnas bdag nyid
213a1(rgyud 'grel): che rnams che bar dar ba'i gzhi dang 'od zer grags pa dag gi khyim// dgra rnams skrag par 'gyur ba'i gnas dang mnag par dka' ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i sa gzhi nyid gyur pa// sdug cing mdzes pa'i
213a2(rgyud 'grel): bsti gnas dang ni 'gro las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus phung po rgya cher gyur ba'i gnas// 'jig rten dbang po'i dpung pa 'gro ba rnams kyi dgra mang tshar gcod gtum po'i dbyug pa nyid gyur cig/ gang zhig rnam mdzes bdud rtsi'i
213a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gyi 'gyur bag ldan yang dgra bo rnams ni 'jigs pa kho nar bgyid// mthong pa rtsol bar bgyid pa min nyid de lta na yang ltu byed rnams kyi dga' ba chung ba min// rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu mdzes pa'i khang pa yin yang
213a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro kun rgyan rnams mdzes dang bral bar bgyid// 'od ldan chu skyes can gyi gos ni gcig pu de yis khyed kyi bde min bde bar sel gyur cig/ gang zhig rab mdzes rgya mtshor gzugs kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal nub cing bsod
213a5(rgyud 'grel): nams snod kyi lha byed rnams// 'gro ba 'bras bu dang bcas srid pa skyes pa yang ni mi gnas rab tu g.yo bas 'joms 'gyur ba// mtshungs med rab tu mdzes ldan ri bong mtshan mA tsan sogs grangs med rnams ni
213a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu bgyis sam zhes// rnam par 'gyur zhes de yi pad+ma las kyang rgyal ldan phyag na pad+ma'i bzhin des rgyal gyur cig/ gang du rgyun tshad med par mdzes pa'i chu tshogs ldan pa'i sprin rnams kyis bsgribs dgra rnams
213b1(rgyud 'grel): snod la ni// shin tu rab gsal lan cig ma yin 'tshig pa ster ba'i yul ngan du gyur lus can rnams la yang // shin tu rjes 'brel dri ma mang po'i snag tsha'i 'dam gyi tshogs kyis rab tu bsgos rnams 'khru bar bgyid//
213b2(rgyud 'grel): mgro la sangs rgyas khang pa'i bzhin ni shin tu bzhin bzang khyed kyi rnam bkra'i bya ba mdzad gyur cig/ phyag na bzhed po'i chu skyes dag gis skyo ba med pa'i ral pa'i thor tshug sa dag ni rab gsal zhing // che bar
213b3(rgyud 'grel): brtsigs te bkod pa'i nang na rnam bzhugs gsal ba dang 'dres 'od dpag med kyi 'od gsal tshogs// tha dad du byas 'od ni gsal ldan gyen du brtsams shing bcings pa'i steng gi stag po bkod pa ni// mdzes
213b4(rgyud 'grel): pas tshim pa mi mthong dgra rnams rab 'jigs gsal zhing sgra ldan go cha sA khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ rgyun chad med par rnam 'phro shin tu kun dga'i rgyur gyur 'ong dpag med 'od chu yi tshogs lta bus/ bran
213b5(rgyud 'grel): bya las ni shin tu phul byung dag cing mdzes pa'i 'phel brnyed gyu re lhag pa'i dri bzang can// lha yi me tog rmad byung tshogs rnams yongasu rdzogs pa'i pad+mo 'dzin pa'i ral ba dag gi ni// dpag bsam 'khri shing
213b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ni khyed rnams dag gi bsam pa'i don rnams phun tshogs 'grub pa'i rgyur gyur cig/ gang zhig bcings par gyur kyang rnam par grol bar nges par bgrod byed gang zhig lus la lhag gnas pa// gzhan rnams
214a1(rgyud 'grel): nges par spangs kyang thun mong min par mgon po 'od dpag med kyis rnam par brgyan par mdzad// dri bzangs thams cad spangs kyang gang zhig mtshungs med dri bzangs mang pos mA lus phyogs rnams
214a2(rgyud 'grel): byugs gyur pa// 'jig rten dbang po'i shin tu che ba'i ral pa de yis khyed kyi nges par thob bya'i 'ching ba 'phrog gyur cig/ rwal tshogs ma lags skyes po ma lus rnams kyi yid bzangs 'ching bar bgyid pa
214a3(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa'i phung po lags// mdzes sdug ma lags 'on kyang sdug bsngal me yis rnam bcom 'gro rnams gso byed bdud rtsi ngag gi rgyun// pad+mo ma logs ma rungs mthar byed rta rgod 'dul lcags rgyal ba'i ri
214a4(rgyud 'grel): bong can sbyar ska yi dpal// khyed kyi nyon mongs skyon rnams shin tu 'dzums shing mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub sbyin par mdzad gyur cig/ ma lus phyogs rnams sreg byed lhag par kun tu dmar ser
214a5(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid ldan pa rnam par bkod gyur pa// 'jig rten gsum po rmongs shing 'jigs la skyabs med zla ba'i tshogs 'bar bskal pa'i me ltar brtag bya ba// so bsnams sdang mig rab tu 'bar bA'i rta mgrin dag gis
214a6(rgyud 'grel): rjesu kun nas gtad de gzigs pa las// mtshungs med brtse ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug skad cig 'jigs pa'i gzigs stangs skyes pas khyed rnams srung gyur cig// 'jig rten rnams ni brlag par rab gtong/
214b1(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba ma lus sa 'dzin che rnams de ring myur bar ni// phye mar 'gyur bgyid 'dzin par byed pa yang ste mtha' med chu yi gter rnams skam pa nyid bgyid pa// de ltas gang zhig khro ba bzung ste khro gnyer rab rgyas
214b2(rgyud 'grel): bsdus gyur 'jigasu rung ba'i dpral ba las// des mthon lha mo mtshungs med dpung stobs can gyis mthong nas sgeg 'gyur mtsho skyes can des rgyal gyur cig/ bstod 'os rnams kyis bstod cing bla ma rnams kyi
214b3(rgyud 'grel): 'ang 'gro ba'i bla ma phyag bya rnams kyi phyag byas pa// mi nyung bskal par bsgrubs pa'i tshul med nus ldan mtha' dge 'gro ba'i skyabs gyur mtshungs pa med pa yis// brtse ba rAng nyid lus cin bzhin du 'jig rten
214b4(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal gzhil phyir pad+mo can las legs 'thon pa// sgrol ma yis ni khyed kyi 'khor ba'i btson re'i rlung du lci bar gyur pa'i gdung bying 'phrog gyur cig/ tshig mtha' ldan pa'i tshogs kyis grangs ni bgrang bar lha
214b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing tshig bdag mchog tshig gis sde chen ya.a/ r+d+he su gzung bar nus pa ma yin dang pa'i 'gro sna dang drag po'i tshig rnams kyis kyang gsal bar ni// brjod par rtogs dka' brjod bya min tshigs ni cha shas chung ngus gus pas brjod
214b6(rgyud 'grel): de yongs rdzogs pa// bde gshegs tshig gis yang dag brjod bya chu skyes ldan pa'i yon tan tshogs kyis khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ skye ba skye ba rnamasu spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ zhabs la gus shing rang bzhin shin
215a1(rgyud 'grel): tu drang ba dang // blo gros mi g.yo gzhan phan bla ma'i bya ba dag/ bya bar ldan zhing snyan ngag mkhan du'ang 'gyur bar shog/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa brgyu ba// snyan ngag mkhan chen po shrI badz+ra de ba zhes bya
215a2(rgyud 'grel): bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // yon tan phul du byung ba dpag tu med pa dang ldan pas spras pa bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po dang / mi'i dbang po dpon chen shAkya bzang po'i bka' lung gis// rgya gar gyi mkhan po snyan dag
215a3(rgyud 'grel): mkhan chen po ma hA paN+Di ta lak+ShAM kA rA dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shong ston gyis bsgyur ba'o// // 'di'i brgyud pa ni/ sangs rgyas/ slob dpon badz+ra de wa/ karma nA tha/ A ri t+ya/ mahA paN+Di ta shrI bA na rat+na pA daH// rgya gar skad
215a4(rgyud 'grel): lo ke shwa ra sto tra/ bod skad du'i 'jig rten dbang phyug la bstod pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten bla ma sa gsum gyis phyag byas// lha dbang tshangs pa mchog gis bstod pa ste// thub mchog rgyal
215a5(rgyud 'grel): po myur du dngos grub stsol// spyan ras gzigs mgon mchog la phyag 'tshalo// bde gshegs rang bzhin bdud rtsi'i ngo bo 'chang // sna tshogs mtshan gyis spras pa'i sku lus mchog/ bde gshegs 'od dpag med pa'i dbu
215a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyan can// gser gyi pad+mas g.yon gyi phyag rgyan pa// dri med ral pa 'khyil nag cung zad ser// zla ba'i dbyibs 'dra gsal zhing rdzogs pa'i zhal// pad+ma ltar yangs mchog tu mdzes pa'i spyan// mkhur ba gangs kyi dum bu lha/
215b1(rgyud 'grel): bur dkar// ri dgas rgyal po'i dga' bzhin zhal sgros dmar// nyi ma 'char ka ltar dmar btsod kyi mdog/ pad+ma gzhon nu lta bur mchu dmar la// ston ka'i sprin tshogs lta bur sgra sgrogs pa// dpung gnyis sna tshogs mtshan gyis
215b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa ste// phyag mthil pad+ma gzhon nu lta bur 'jam// ri dgas pags pa sku yi bstod na mnapas// snyan gnyis rna rgyan g.yo zhing mdzes pa mnga'// phyag ni yongs shing lte ba zab pa ste// pad+ma dri ma med pa lta bu lags// gser
215b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog sku rigs nor bu'i rgyan ldan pa// ni bza' mdzes pas sku yi smad brgyan pa// rgyal ba ye shes rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin// bsod nams du mo lus ni 'khrungs pa'i mgon// rims dang nad 'joms bde ba mchog bskyed pa//
215b4(rgyud 'grel): srid pa mthar mdzad mkha' le rgyu ba dang // kun tu rgyu ba'i sku mchog la bo stong pa// bdud ris sna tshogs stobs ni nges par 'joms// zhabs mchog rkyang gi dub mchog gis sgra sgrogs la// glang po dregs dang ngang pi'o stab
215b5(rgyud 'grel): su gshegs// bdud rtsi chen po thugs chung yongs rdzi gas brnyes gser bzhin rtag tu dgyes pa'i rgyan mnga' ba// ri bo gru 'dzin na ni dgyes par bzhugs// 'jig rten dbang phyug la bstod pa// dge slong ma dpal mos
215b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du// ma Ni dI pa ma hA ka ru Ni ka de ba pany+tsa sto tra/ bod skad du/ nor bu gling gi thugs rje chen po lha lnga la bstod pa// rje btsun spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo// nor bu'i gling du thugs
216a1(rgyud 'grel): rjes sku 'khrungs dpal ldan+d+ha pad+ma'i rigs// ri rgyal po ta la yi rin chen brag phug nyams dga' bAr// pad zla'i dbus na thugs rje'i sku ni 'gying zhing rol pa'i nyams// thugs rje'i sman gyis bdag nad gso ba mgo/
216a2(rgyud 'grel): bopo thugs rje can// ma rig thibs po 'gro ba'i myin sel rje btsun rab rib sel// skye rgan 'tshe thar dka' yang srid rtsibs drug 'khor lor chung // srid pa'i 'khrul 'khor bzlog dka' sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor byeng // mgon
216a3(rgyud 'grel): po ches kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad thugs rje'i sku yis sgrol// zla ba ltar dkar phyag gnyis pad+ma gdung ba sel ba'i phyag/ dpag med cod pan rin che ni mdzes brgya nA gzhon nu zhi ba'i sku// thugs rje bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis zug
216a4(rgyud 'grel): rngu'i nang dang sdug bsngal sal// thugs rje ri dgas lpags 'dzin srid pa'i bla ma phyag 'tshalo// thugs rje'i thugs gdungs spyan g.yas cha ba las lha mo thugs rje'i sku// yid 'ong sgrol ma ljang sder bde ma rin chen rgyun
216a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzes sgeg/ pad+ma'i sku la phyag mtshan ud pal kha 'byed phyag gnyis kyis// bcud rgyus nu mas gso mdzad 'gro ba'i yul la phyag 'tshalo// sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas snying rje'i chu las mdzes ma 'khrungs
216a6(rgyud 'grel): khro gnyer zhi ba se 'i rin chen sku brgyan thugs rjes bgyi // rje btsun mgon gzigs phyag mtshan gus pa'i phyag rgya dbyug pa bsnoms// mchod sbyin bum chu sa 'gro ba'i re skong yum la phyag 'tshalo// thugs rjes
216b1(rgyud 'grel): phrin las dregs pa tshar spyod dbang mdzad khro rgyal sku// sbrul brgyan 'od dmar rta gdong ljang gu spyi bor rta skad bzhad// mgon po pA ne la 'dud pus btsugs rdo rje dbyug pa bsnams// pad+ma'i rigs sbrul thugs rje'i brlan gyis sgeg khro
216b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshalo// phyag na pad+ma 'a drung na dam chos nyer zhu chang dpon bu// nor bzangs sbas paM gser mdog skal ldan nyid bzhugs rin chen brgyan// e ma bla ngal gus thal sbyar bus gtsugs po ti bsnams// bzhin bzangs khye'u dang
216b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan nor bzangs bu la phyag 'tshalo// rje btsun gsung gi dbang phyug kha s+yarba ni 'khor bcas la// bdag gis gus par bstod bgyis zla ltar dge ba dri med nges// srid mtsho skems shing thugasi rje'i chu yis skye 'gro kun
216b4(rgyud 'grel): ngoms nas// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bo tA la ru skye bar shog/ sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rgya chen pha rol rab tu brgal gyur pa// thub pa rgyal ba 'gro ba'i gtso la bstod pa yi// bsod nams ci mchiso des ni 'di na
216b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba ma lus kun// byang chub rin chen rab mchog zhi zhing bde lo reg par sho ga/ nor bu'i gling gi thugs rje chen po lha lnga'i bstod pa// slob dpon rta dbyangs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba
216b6(rgyud 'grel): lo ki te shwa ra ya sto traM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa// 'jig rten dbang phyug le phyag 'tshalo// pad+ma dkar po 'dab brgyad kyi// ge sar dkyil na spyan ras gzigs// man 'dzi'i r-i dang
217a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod phreng g.yas// g.yon pa pad+mo zhugs pa 'dzin// spyan gsum dbu la 'od dpag med// shel gyi ri ltar dkar ba ste// rin chen rgyan gyis rnam par smras// ma chags dkyil 'khor gtso la bstod// don yang
217a2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa sdug bsngal 'dren// spyan gsum phyag bzhi rgyun gyis klubs// rdo rje dang ni zhags pa g.yas// g.yon pa pad+mo lcags kyu dang // 'od dpag med kyis dbu rgyan mtho// dmar brkyang phyed bskum phyed ldan bstod// k+Sho d+hA mgrin
217a3(rgyud 'grel): sngon gdug ba sel// zhal gcig spyan gsum phyag bzhi ste// g.yas na rdo rje be tsen 'dzin// sdigs mdzub pad+ma zum paM g.yon// sbrul dang rtag lpags sku brgyan pa// dmar po dbur ldon khyed la bstod// do kerari gcig mi byin
217a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nyan// spyan gsum phyag brgyad shin tu khro// rdo rje ral gri be con dang // thod pa g.yas na 'dzin pa ste// dgra staM shag ti thong zhag sa g.yon// mthing nag glang gzigs dpa' gang bstod// khro gnyer can ni bka' bzhin byed//
217a5(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig spyan gsum phyag bzhir ldan// bgrang phreng phyag 'tshal thal mo g.yas// g.yon na dbyug pa g+hun+d+he badzin// rin chen rgyan ldan shel ltar dkar// skyil krung phyed pa'i gang ldan pastod// tshim par mdzad dang mdzes
217a6(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad/ snang bar mdzod dang bde bar mdzad// rgyal ba'i yon tan mdzes tshul 'dzin// lha mo rmad byung bzhi la bstod// sgo yi dbus na bzhugs pa gang // lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// tshad med bzhi yi ngo bo
217b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid// sgo skyong rnam pa bzhi lnga bstod// tshungs dbang drug po nyi zla dang // phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong la sngogs// gtsang ma rigs kyi srung mar bcas// rnam kun 'khor ldan kun la bstod// mi rtog ye shes khyad par las// sem
217b2(rgyud 'grel): can kuni las thugs brtse'i phyir// phrin las bzhi yis don mdzad pa// dkyil 'khor gra gnos bzhi la bstod// khyod kyis yon tan dpag med las// shin tu phra ba'i cha blangs nas// mngon sum lta bur dang dmigs pas//
217b3(rgyud 'grel): khyad ltar yon tan rab rdzogs shog/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa la bstod pa// slob dpon tsan+ta go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
218a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa thugs rje chen po la bstod pa smre sngag su gsol pa bzhugs/
218b1(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// dri med dung mdog mchog tu gzugs bzang ba// rnam dag 'od gsal zla ba'i dkyil bzhin mdzes// ji ltar mkha' la nyi stong 'bar ba bzhin// dpa' bo 'od
218b2(rgyud 'grel): zer tshogs kyis rnam par mdzes// srid pa gsum gyis mkhan ston par grags// khams gsun 'gro ba yongs kyi gnyen gcig po// thugs rje'i lha khyed bdag la dgongasu gsol// thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan
218b3(rgyud 'grel): ras gzigs// bdag ni thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas// lam ster lam log srid pa'i 'khor bar 'khyams// sngon tshe las log sdig pa byas pas gnod// sdig pa'i las ni ci byas rang gnod 'gyod// drar zhing rgyas pa'i las
218b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang de btsan pas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsher bying gyur te// zhe sdang 'bar ba'i me yis rang rgyud bsregs// gti mug mun pa chen pos shes rang rmongs// 'dod chags rgya mtsho'i nang du rnam shes bying // nga rgyal
218b5(rgyud 'grel): mthon po'i ri bris ngan 'gror mnan// phrag dag rlung na tshub mas 'khor bar g.yengs// bdag tu 'dzin po'i mdud pa dam pos bcings// 'dod pa me dang 'dra ba'i 'ob su ltung // sdug bsngal drag po'i mda' drag tshor du bab// me
218b6(rgyud 'grel): khams nyi ma'i gdugs ni steng nas tshe// chu khams sa yi brlan ni 'og nas drang // phyi rol ser bu'i dang ni mtha' nas tshe/ bang kan rlung mkhris nad ni khong nas ldang // de 'dra'i sdug bsngal drag po bzod dka' nas// sdom pa'i
219a1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig gshig par ga la rung // sdug bsngal kun dang bsngos nas sdom bsrungs zhing // mos shing dad pas 'phags mchog mi gtong na// 'phags mchog 'gro don mi mdzad ci la dgongs// byams mgon ci
219a2(rgyud 'grel): slang bdag la thugs mi brtse// ye shes spyan can khyod kyi sgra ni stA ru// bdag 'dres smre sdigs gsol bar mi rigs kyang // shin tu bsgrag pa'i smre sngags gsol lags na// thugs rje chen pos bdag la dgongasu gsol//
219a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag 'dra'i skye bo las ngan sdig po che// las kyi dbang gis snyigs ma'i dus 'dir skyes// skyes pas 'gyod kyang las dbang bcos su med// las kyi shugs ni chu bo'i rgyun dang 'dra// las dbang chu rgyun 'phral lag
219a4(rgyud 'grel): la blugs// bka' la zhugs kyang bka' bzhin rngo ma thog/ lus ngag yid gsum ldog pa'i dbang du thal// las kyi 'bras bu dran pas shin tu bsreg/ las dbang bsreg pa'i me ni rab 'bar zhing // rnam shes dbang po
219a5(rgyud 'grel): myu gu gdungs gyur na// phung po'i sgyu ma'i lus kyis mi bzod pas// byams mgrin thugs rje can gyis bzod lags sam+b+ha// ye shes spyan can khyed kyi spyan snga ru// sdig pa'i rnam grangs mU lus 'thol bshags na/
219a6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje chen pos dag par mdzad du gsol// de nas bzung nas sdig pa mi bgyid spong // bka' yi don la mngon sum phyogs par bgyid// nam yang sdig pa'i dbang du ma gyur cig/ nyi ltar 'od gsal zla ltar 'od
219b1(rgyud 'grel): dngas pa// thugs rje chen po'i zhal mthong 'tshul lags na// thog ma med nas ma rig ling tog gis// sgribs shing nongs pa'i nI ga gos mya mthong na// 'gro ba'i mgon khyed da lta gang na bzhugs// sdug bsngag
219b2(rgyud 'grel): drag po shin tu mi bzad pas// shin tu bsregs pas skyi g.ya' rab 'jigs shing // da dung gdung ba'i smre sngags nyid 'dod na// nyam thag phongs pa'i 'os 'o dod 'bod// byams mgon thugs rje can gyis gsan lags
219b3(rgyud 'grel): sngam laphongs pa gang gis dA ya mtshan thos na// de yi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya'o zhes// 'gro la nyid kyi thugs rjes zhal bzhes nas// bdag cag 'gro ba sems can thams tsod la// dug lnga dug gsum nad gyi bzir lags na
219b4(rgyud 'grel): mi bzad nad ni thugs rjes zhi bar mdzod// thugs rje'i thugs kyis bdag la dgongasu gsol// thugs rje'i spyan gyis bdag la gzigasu gsol// thugs rje'i gsung gis bdag le sgrog tu gsol// bdag ni shi 'phos
219b5(rgyud 'grel): lus sems brjes pa'i tshe// gnyen bshes grogs dang bral nas glu shin rjes 'khrid// de dus 'jig rten nye dus maM phan pas// las kyi mnar bas bdag rang gcig pur 'khyam// de dus bdag la mgon skyabs ma
219b6(rgyud 'grel): mchis na// thugs rje chen pos mgon skyabs mdzad du gsol// las kyis mnar ba'i skye bo bdag 'dra ba// thog ma med nas phyin ci log rtog pas// khams gsum 'khor ba'i 'odam las ma thar ste// skal po dpag med
