220a1(rgyud 'grel): skye ba grangs med du// gdos bcas lus blangs skye ba dpag med zhig/ sha rus bsngags na 'jig rten gtos dang mnyam// snag khrag bsngags na rgya mtsho chen po tsam// las 'phro bsags na mtha' yas brjod
220a2(rgyud 'grel): mi lang // khams gsum grangs shing skye ba'i kha rgyud kyang // byasngo pa'i las rnams don med chud re gsan// bka' yi gtan tshigs zab mo ma khrol cing // shes rab zab mo'i mig du ma bye bas// srid pa'i yo byad gtong
220a3(rgyud 'grel): b.ram phod cing // phung po sgyu ma'i lus la tshogs shing zhe na// las kyi dbang brtsan nyon mongs stobs che bas// sha khrag dra ba'i lus blangs 'khor bar khyams// sdug bsngal drag po'i mi bzad 'di lta bu'o// nyes pa thams cad
220a4(rgyud 'grel): rang gi las las byung // thug rje chen pos las ngan rgyun bcad de// nyon mongs las kyi rgyun ni bzlog du gsol// nyon mongs las kyi rgyan ni dbang btsan pas// ma rig mun pa'i nang du gtan 'khyams te// ye shes nyi
220a5(rgyud 'grel): ma'i 'od kyis bsal du gsol// nyes byas las kyi 'bras bu mi zad na// thugs rje chen pos 'phrin las mdzad du gsol// dug ga sum sdug bsngal nad kyis gzir legs na// thabs mkhos thugs rje'i sman gyis
220a6(rgyud 'grel): gsol bar gsol// phyin ci log gi g.yang sar lhung lags na// myur 'gyod thugs rje'i phyag gis gzung du gsol// srid pa'i chu bos bdag cig khyer lags na// zag med ye shes gru yis bsgral du gsol// rgyal
220b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mtshan brjod yon tan bas ma mi khyab// yon tan gzhung las ji ltar byung ba bzhin// ma lus bdag la myur du stsal du gsol// rgyal ba'i thugs kyis bdag la byin gyis rlobs// phyag 'tshal bstod dang sdig
220b2(rgyud 'grel): bshags skye gsol dang // dge ba'i las ni cung zad ci bsags pa// thams cad bla med byang chub chen por bsngo// mi dmigs bsngo dpa gsol btab smon lam dang // spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje'i byin brlabs
220b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ zhing rab dam pa'i gan su skye bar shig/ zhing rab dam pa'i gnasu skyes nas kyang // rgyal ba sras bcas zhal mthong gsung thos shog/ thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// mchod pa'i yo byad/
220b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag la ma mchis pas// smre sngags chen pos khyed la gsol 'debs nA// mchog gi dngos grub ma lus stsal du gsol// thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzi gas// gang dang gang la mgon dang
220b5(rgyud 'grel): skyabs med pa// de dang de yi mgon skyabs zhal bau zhes nas// skyabs med sdig can rnams la skyab tu gsol// skyabs med tshe 'das rnams la skyab tu gsol// skyabs med 'khor par 'khyams la skyab tu gso
220b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// nyin re bzhin du sdig pas zil gyis nan// las ngan sgrib pa ci ma ches bsal du gsil// thug sa rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigaso// bdag ni nyon mongs
221a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang du mi 'gro bar// sdig pa'i las ni gang yang mi byed cing // nyin dang mtshan du chos la spyod pa ru// thugs rje chen pos byin gyis brlab tu gsol// thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/
221a2(rgyud 'grel): nas brjod pa tsam gyis sdug bsngal rnams// zhi bar mdzad pa khyed dong 'jal gyur na// bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bum mchis na// thugaso rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// khyed kyi gzung sngags brjod pa'i phan
221a3(rgyud 'grel): yin na me// yon tan bzhung las dzAM ltar bshad pa bzhin// mA lus bdag la myur du sbrul du gsol// thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// bdag gos khyed bsgoms snying po bzlas pa dang // phyag 'tshal
221a4(rgyud 'grel): bstod dang sdig bshags skye gsol bas// mgron po khyed kyi zhal mthong gsung thos nas// khyod kyi go 'phang myur du thob nas kyang / bdag kyang khyed ltar 'gro don byed par shog/ thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/
221a5(rgyud 'grel): ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe// de srid bdag gis lus bskyed pas// lus kyi mgon po mchod byed cing // lus kyi tshogs ni rdzogs par shog thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// ji srid bdug ni
221a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i tshe// de srid bdag gis ngag skyes pas// ngag gi mgon po'i mtshan brjod cing ngag gi tshogs ni rdzogs par shog/ thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe// de
221b1(rgyud 'grel): srid bdag gi yid skyes pas// yid kyi mgon po rjes dran zhing // yid kyi tshogs ni rdzogs par shog/ de ltar lus ngag yid gsum gyis// thugs rje'i dbang phyug bsten bgyis pas// lus ngag yid gsum skyon bral
221b2(rgyud 'grel): nas yon tan phun sum tshogs par shog/ de ltar lus ngag yid gsum gyi// thugs rje'i dbang phyag sku gsung thugs// rtag tu dang gus bgyis pas na// thugs rjes dbang phyag spyan ras gzigs// srid gsum re ba'i
221b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas gcig po// yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa// de 'dra ba dag kyang 'grub gyur nas// srid gi sume re ba rdzogs par shog/ srod gsum 'dod dgu 'byung bar shog/ srid pa gsum gyi sems can la// dpes sam
221b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyud pas phan thogs shog/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la// slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis bstod pa smre sngags su gsol pa rdzogs so// /
222a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa spyan dus gtsigs dbang phyug la smre sngags kyi sgo nas bstod pa byin rlabs can slob dpon zlab grags pas mdzad pa btsugs
222b1(rgyud 'grel): na mo lo ke shwa rA ya// thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// dri med dung mdog mchog tu gzugs bzang ba// rnam dag 'od gsal zla ba'i dkyil ltar mdzes// ji ltar mkha' la nyi 'od stong 'baru bzhin//
222b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo 'od zer stong 'bar lhame mA ga/ smad pa gsum gyis mkhan ston par grags/ khams gsum 'gro ba kun gyi gnyen gcig po// byams mgon thugs rje'i lha khyed bdag la dgongs// bdag ni thogs ma med pa'i dus
222b3(rgyud 'grel): mtha' nas// lam log lam gtor srid pa'i 'khor bar 'khyams// sngon tshe las log sdig pa spyad pas nongs// sdig pa'i las rnams ci byas rang gnod 'gyong // drar zhing drag pa'i las de dbang btsan pas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
222b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtshor bying gyur te// zhe sdang 'bar ba'i me yis rang rgyud bsgregs// gti mug mun po'i tshogs kyis shes rgyud rmongs// 'did chags rgya mtsho'i nang du rnam shes byeng // nga rgyal chen po'i ri bos ngan 'gror mnan// prig dog
222b5(rgyud 'grel): rlung dmar chub mas 'khor bar g.yengs// bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mdud pa dam pos bcings// 'dod pa me mdag dong 'dra'i 'ob su lhung // sdug bsngal drag po'i 'dom rdzab char ltar bab// me khams nyi ma'i gdugs ni steng
222b6(rgyud 'grel): nas cha// chu khams sa yi rlan ni 'og nas grang // phyi yi ser bu'i ngang ni thad nas tsha// kun nas 'khrugs pa'i rlung ni khong nas ldang // de lta'i sdig bsngal shin tu bzod dka' yang // sdom pa'i yi dam gzhig tu ga la rung /
223a1(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal kun dang bsdoms nas sdom bsrung zhing // mos pa'i dad pas 'phags mchog mi 'dor na// 'phags mchog 'gro don mi mdzad ci zhig dgongs// byams mgon ci slad bdag la thugs mi brtse//
223a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag 'dra'i blun rmo ngas las ngan sdig po che// las kyi dbang gis snyigs ma'i dus 'dir skyes// skyes pas 'gyod de las la yi re chang // yid chad 'gyod kyang las dbang bco su med// las kyi shugs ni chu bo'i rgyun dang 'dra//
223a3(rgyud 'grel): las dbang chu rgyun zlog par shin tu dka'// bka' la zhugs kyang bka' bzhin rngo ma thogs// lus ngag yid gsum sdig pa'i dbang du song // sdig pa'i las dbang drag po'i me 'bar bas// rnam shes dbang po 'i myu gu
223a4(rgyud 'grel): gdungs gyur to// phung po sgyu ma'i lus 'dis mi bzod na// byams mgon thugs rje can gyis dgongs lags sam// nyi ltar 'od gsal zla ltar mdengs gsal ba'i// thugs rje'i zhal nyid blta bar 'tshal lags na// thog
223a5(rgyud 'grel): ma med nas ma rig ling tog gis// ljongs pa'i chu bu raM mig gis ma mthong na// 'gro ba'i mgon khyod du lta ga na bzhugs// sdug bsngal drag po shin tu mi bzod pa/ shin tu skrag cing skyi g.ya'u rab 'jigs nas/
223a6(rgyud 'grel): dung dung gdungs pa'i smre sngags 'di 'don cing // nyam thag 'phongs pa'i nga ros 'o dod 'bod// byams mgo ni thugs rje can gyisi gas ni lags sam// nam zhig 'chi 'pho lus sems pa rje ba'i tshe// gnyen bshes grog
223b1(rgyud 'grel): dang phral te gshin rjes khrid// de tshe 'jig rten nye dus mi stongs te// lus kyi dbang gis bdag rang cig pur khrid// dus der bdag la mgon skyabs ma mchis na// byams mgon khyed kyis 'khor bar bdag gtong ngam// lA
223b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis mnar ba'i skye bo bdag 'dra ba// thog ma med pa'i dus nas lam log pas// khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas las ma thar te// bskal pa dpag med skye ba ji snyed du// sngon chad lus bla mangs yang zhig gyur te// sha rus
223b3(rgyud 'grel): bsags na 'jig rten gtos dang mnyam// rnag khrag bsags na rgya mtsho chen po tsam// las 'phro bsags na bsam 'das brjod mi lang // khams gsum bgrang zhing sgri ba mang brgyud kyang // byas pa'i las rnams don
223b4(rgyud 'grel): med chud re zos// skye ba grangs med ji snyed de tsam la// skye ba gcig cig kho na tsam gyi las// bla med byang chub don du rab 'bad ni// de tsam byas pa'i las la'ang don re yod// las ni dbang btsan nyon mongs stobs che ba/
223b5(rgyud 'grel): sha khrag 'dus pa'i lus blangs 'khor bar 'khyams// sdug bsngal drag po'i srid pa'i btson rar chud// mi bzod sdug bsngal drag po 'di myong na// nyes byas thams cad rang gi las las byung // byams mgon
223b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje can gyis phod lags sam// thugs rje chen pos ngan song rgyun bcad de// nyon mongs las kyi rlung ni zlog tu gsol// nyon mongs las kyi rlung ni dbang btsan nas// ma rig mun pa'i gling du gtan 'khyams na//
224a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sgron me'i zer gyis mi gzigs sam// nyes byas las kyi 'bras bu mi bzod na// thugs rje can khyod phrin las mi mdzad dam// dug gsum bzod dka'i nad kyis gdungs lag na// thugs rjes thabs
224a2(rgyud 'grel): mkhas sman gyis mi gso 'am// phyin ci log gi g.yang sar lhang lags na// thugs rjes myur mgyogs phyag gis mi 'dzin nam// sdug bsngal drag po'i las dbang me 'bar na// thugs rjes bsil ba'i chu rgyun mi 'bebs
224a3(rgyud 'grel): sam/ sdig bsngal chen pos mnar ro ra mda' mdzod// re sras bslu bar ma mdzad spyan rasau gzigs// gang la gang 'dul 'gro ba'i don mdzade par// zhal bzhes mang po'i dam btsam mdzad dam// mthong thos dran reg 'byung
224a4(rgyud 'grel): bar ma gsungs sam// snyigs ma'i dus kyi ngan spyod ma gzigs sam// ngan song rgyo 'bras bsgrub pa maM gzigs sam// sdug bsngal sba klong 'khrugs pa ma mkhyen nA ma// nus mthu dpag med mnga' ba ma lags sam// byam/
224a5(rgyud 'grel): mgon 'gro don mdzad pa 'phyis pa tsam// khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnasu sbyangs sbyangs nas// nam zhig rang gis 'bras bu thob pa'i tshe// 'phags pa'i thugs rjes ci 'tshal don ma mchis// sems can
224a6(rgyud 'grel): las 'phro rang sar bzhag na no// 'phags pa'i thugs rjes la ci zhig bgyi// thugs rjes 'gro rnams sgrol bar zhal bzhes pa'i// dam bcas don de de ring dgongasu gsol// 'phags mchog khyed la thugs rje'i
224b1(rgyud 'grel): stobs mnga' na// yal yol le lo btang snyoms ma mdzad par// snying nas gzigs shig thugs rje rgyal ba'i lha// re sa gzhan na med do thugs rjes bzung // byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la smre sngags
224b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgo nas bstod pa byin rlabs can 'di nyid// lnga brgya pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu lta bur gyur pa// mthong lam rgyud la skyes pa'i gang zag/ slob dpon chen po zla ba grags pa'i zhal mnga' nas mdzad po rdzogs so//
224b3(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje chen po 'phags pa sman ras gzigs// 'gro la nye ring med pas khyad du 'phags// sems can rnams la sman ras gzigs mdzod las// kun gyis rang ngo shes par byin gyis brlobs// rang don du chos sku/
224b4(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa// gzhan don du gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis kyis// mthong thos dran reg gi sgo nas// 'gro ba yongs la phan thogs pa// 'gro ba yongs kyi don rlabs po che// 'grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol// na mo rat+na tra yA
224b5(rgyud 'grel): na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mA hA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ma kra ba ti/ tsi tra ma ni/ ma ha pad+ma me ru/ ru ti sh+tsA/ dzA a kaR+ShA ya/ hUM phaT swA hA/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags oM pad+ma tsa ni ti mA nr-i
224b6(rgyud 'grel): dz+wa la hU~M snying po'o// oM ba ra ta pad+me hUM/ nye ba'i snying po// // rgya gar skad du/ kA ru Na sto tra/ bod skad du/ snying rje la bstod pa// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// pad+mas brgyan pa lhun po lA
225a1(rgyud 'grel): byang ba// pad+ma dri med phyag gi dbus na bsnams// thor tshugs can la gzugs ldan cod pan thogs// spyi bo 'od dpag med brgyan phyag 'tshalo// thugs rje byams pas gzigs pa'i bcom ldan 'das// phongs gyur
225a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba la ni khyod lta bu// gzigs pa tsam gyis zhi ba mdzad pa po// spyan ras gzigs kyis bdag la gzigasu gsol// mchog sbyin bdag ni rab tu sdug bsngal// mun nag btibs pa snang ba med pa bzhin// ri bo g.yang sa'i
225a3(rgyud 'grel): kha na gnas 'dra yi// dus 'dir thugs rje ldan pas gzigasu gsolo// 'phongs pa gang gis pa ni dran byas na// de yi sdug bsngal bsal bar bya'o zhes// dang po'i smon lam mi 'gyur de legs na// bdag la de 'dra'i 'bras
225a4(rgyud 'grel): bu mchis par mdzod// nga ni mthong thos reg pa 'am dran yang rung // nang rnams kun gyi gsos su gyur cig ces// bdagi ni mi bzang nad kyis thebs lags kyis// mchog sbyin dam bcas de dag dgongs su gsol// gang
225a5(rgyud 'grel): zhig sdug bsngal gang gis nyam thag pa// de dang de yi sdug bsngal bas lo zhes// 'gro la dgongs pa khyod kyis rgyun 'byung na// mgon po ci slad sdug bsngal bdag ma gzigs// gang gis khyod ni rjes dran tsam gyis kyang //
225a6(rgyud 'grel): de yi mid la mgon pos gnod bsapa na// bdag ni rtag tu 'di na bro 'tshal kyang // thugs dpag ma mdzad pa ni bdag byung ngam// mthu ldan sgyu med phan mdzod blo gros can// thugs rje ldan pa khyod la brten kyang ni// ci ste 'di
225b1(rgyud 'grel): dag zhi bar ma gyur na// bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur te kyi hud kyi// gang dang gang dag sdug bsngal nyam thag cing // gang dang gang dag mgon med gyur rnams la// de dang der ni khyod kyi thugs rje ni// mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur zhes de
225b2(rgyud 'grel): skang gda'o// de ni las ngan nyon mongs bdag lags shing // sdug bsngal brjid dka saM lus gzir skyabs ma mchis// skabs med bdag la ci slad thugs mi rje// nyi tsher gyur ni thugs rje ma lags mod// ga'i tshe sngon cha
225b3(rgyud 'grel): rmongs pas 'jig rten na// khyod nyid rje su dran par ma bgyis pas// bdeg ni nyon mongs stobs kyis shin tu gzir// mgon po 'gum du nyen thugs rjes gzigs// thugs rje'i 'byung gnas thugs rje che rgyas pa// sdug bsnga
225b4(rgyud 'grel): ma lus zad par mdzad khyod kyis// ci ste bdag ni spangs par gyur na yang // bdag gi mgon bgyid gzhan ni su lags gsungs// khyod la skyabasu mchis pa tsam gyis kyang // de yi mod la sdug bsngal sel mdzad pas//
225b5(rgyud 'grel): mgron po khyod ni bdag go skyabs legs kyis// thugs rjes mi bzang 'di las bskyab tu gsol// mtshan nas brjod pa tsam gyis nyam thag po// zhi bar mdzad pa khyod dang 'jal gyur la// bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma
225b6(rgyud 'grel): mchis na// khyed ni thugs rje can du rung lags sam// khyod kyis sems can po skyab phyir smon lam gang / btab par gyur te'ang 'grub par 'gyur lags na// bodag kyang sems can grangasu gtogs pas na// mchog sbyin
226a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi duHkha bsal du gsol// khyod la bdag ni skyabasu mchis kyang ni// ci ste de ni nyam thag gyur na go// nyi ma mun pa'i tshogasu gyur pa bzhin// zla ba'i 'od zer sreg par byed 'dra gang // khyod ni 'jig rten
226a2(rgyud 'grel): dag la gsol 'debs na// bdag ni khyod la gsol po bgyid gyur pa// bdag ni skye bo ngan pa skal pa chung // bsod nams min pa'i dri ma ngan pa can// mgon po thugs rje che dang ma bral bas// sems can don la bskul lta
226a3(rgyud 'grel): ma 'tshal kyang // sdug bsngal rang bzhin du ni bdag gyur pas// skyob pa'i spyan sngor yang ni gsol ba 'debs// pa dang ma la gang zhig slong na yang // shin tu skye ba med pa ji bzhin du// sems can don+da brtun d+he ni khyed
226a4(rgyud 'grel): lags pas// tshe rabs kun tu bdag gi skyabs mdzod cig/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pas ni bdag gdungs pas// bcom ldan 'das la rtag tu 'bod sgrogs kyi// nyin cig bzhin du sdig pa'i las kyis ni// zil non
226a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di las bdag la bsrung du gsol// de ltar bdag gis shin tu smre gsel bas// khyod kyi thugs ni thugs rjes brlan pa ltar// 'gro ba sdug bsngal brgya yis gzir ba la// srid les sol bas de bzhin gzigasu
226a6(rgyud 'grel): gsol// thugs rje'i dbang du gyur cing sems brtan la// gzhan don brtson zhing yon tan mchog gi gnas// khyod bzhin bdag kyang sdug pasngal thams cad kyis// gdungs pa sel ba'i mthu dang ldan par shog/ de ltar
226b1(rgyud 'grel): skyid pa mthar phyin spyan ras gzigs drubang la// bdag gis bstod pa bgyis pa'i bsod nams gang thob pa// des ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal spangs shing bcom pa yi// rang bzhin bde ldan bde ba can du 'gro bar shog/
226b2(rgyud 'grel): snying rje la bstod pa/ dge bsnyen kun sbyin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
227a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa spyan ram gtsigs dbang phyug rgyag tos 'i skyeb sapas slob dpon chu sgrub kyis mdzad pa bzhug so//
227b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra sa ha sra b+hu dza sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// spyan ras gzigs
227b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang 'jig rten gsum gyi mgan// 'das pa'i dus su mngon par sangs rgyas kyang // thugs rje'i dbang gis sa bcu'i tshul ston pa// thabs tshul dpag med rig la phyag 'tshalo// de la dang po re zhig 'jig rten dang phyag sgrub par
227b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad spangs la 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyi mi bskyod pa ri lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas sa phyogs shin tu nyams dga' ba me tog dang 'bab chu dang ljon shig 'bras bu sna
227b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs yod pa'i sar gnas khang shin tu nyams dga' bar sku gsung thugs kyi rten ci rigs par bkod pa'i sar stan nang tshangs can la kha nub phyogasu bltas nas khrus kyi rnal 'byor rnams byas la// oM AH
227b5(rgyud 'grel): big+h+nAM tA kr-it+ta hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams bsal bar bya'o// de nas rang gi don yongs su dor ba'i bsam pas gsum la skyabasu 'gro bar bya'o// chings po'i gnas bzhi bsgom par
227b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de la sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar 'dzin pa ni byams pa'o// kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub cing yun ring du sdug bsngal nyam su myong bar gyur te zhes
228a1(rgyud 'grel): bsam la// 'di nas lag tshar du nga yis 'khor ba sdug bsngal gyi mtsho las gdon par bya'o// snyam pa snying rje chen po'o// sems can thams cad zag pa med pa'i bde ba rgyan mi 'chad pa la 'jog par
228a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa ni dga' ba'o// bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / bstod pa dang / smad pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po mgo mnyam par rtogs pa ni btang snyom so// /
228a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad kyi don du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i go 'phang thob par byas la// mngal nas skyes pa dang / sgo nga las skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te
228a4(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i sems can 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sa la gzhag par bya'o zhes pa bsam pa brtan po bskyed la// de nas rang gi snying khar chos kyi dbyings skye med/ sten par byed pa'i yi ge las zla ba'i
228a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bsams la de'i steng du hrIHdkar po tshig drag dang bcas pa las 'od zer 'phros pas lus khyab sdig sgrib sbyangs nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po phyog stong par bskyed// de'i snying
228a6(rgyud 'grel): kha nas hrIHlas 'od zer 'phros pas mdun gyi nam mkha' la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug phyag stong pa 'khor dang bcas pa dang bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa bsams
228b1(rgyud 'grel): la// de rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i sngags// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAk+ShI t+ta pra NA mye na badz+ra ban+d+ha nAM kA ro mi zhes brjod do// de nas gdan dbul ba'i sngags// oM sarba tA thA ga ta pU dza swa s+thA nA ya At+ma nAM ni r+yA ta yA miHzhes
228b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod do// de nas hrIMHlas 'od zer 'phros pas me tog thogs pa'i lha mo dkar mo dpag tu med pas mchod par bsams la// oM badz+ra puSh+pe AHhUM swA hA// de'i rjes la oM badz+ra d+hU paM AHhUM swA hA/ zhes brjod pas bdug spros
228b3(rgyud 'grel): thogs pa'i lha mo gzugs dang lang tsho ldan pa na mkha' khengs pas mchod par bya'o// de'i rjes la oM badz+ra dI pe AHhUM swA hA/ zhes brjod pas rin po che'i sgron ma thogs pa'i lha mo dpagi tuM med pas mchod par bya'o// de'i
228b4(rgyud 'grel): sa la oM badz+ra g+han+d+he AHhUM swA hA/ zhes brjod pas dri mchog thogs pa'i lha mo ser mo dpag tu med pas mchod pa rI bya'o// de nas oM badz+ra nai bi t+ya AHhUM swA hA/ zhes brjod pas zhal zas thogs pa'i lha mo ser s+ya ma
228b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin bAsgribs pa tsam gyis mi chud par bya'o// de nas oM sarba bI shaM s+thA pU dza mI g+hA pra sa mu dra AHhUM/ zhes brjod cing skyong kha'i sa bon las 'phros pa'i gdugaswaM dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / p+la bre dang / 'khor lo
228b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i rin po che sna bdun la sogs pos mchod par bya'o// de na sa sdig pa bshags par bya ste/ thogs med 'khor ba'i 'gro bar gtogs pa yis// byas pa'i nyes byas ma lus mi bzad 'di// gang zhig
229a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams na// bzhugs pa'i rgyul ba'i spyan sngar bshags par ba// oM sarba pA po sho d+ha da ha na badz+ra swA hA/ sdig pa bshags pa'o// sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems
229a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ni// sna tshogs thabs mkhas pa yis phan mdzad dang // phyogs bcu'i lo kA dgo na gang dag gzhan// bsod nams byed pa de la yi rang ngo // oM sarba te thA ga ta shUn+ta dz+nyA a nu mo da na pU dza mai g+ha sa mu dr-i s+pha ra NA sa ma/
229a3(rgyud 'grel): ye hUM/ rje su yi rang ba'o// sangs rgyas kun dang byang chub sems dpa' ni// 'gro ba'i skyabs gyur pa la gsol ba ni// phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed thams cad la// chos kyi sbyin las cher chen dbab tu gsol/
229a4(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hISh+ThA na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dr-i s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ bskul ba'o// so so'i spyi bro'i sa dang nyes byas rnams// mA lus par ni myur du spangs nas ni// sbyin med chos kyi sku ni rnam dag par// bshud pa myur du
229a5(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa nyid mdzod cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta na ya d+hi sa ma ye/ sarba satwe he dAr+tha d+har+m+ma d+hA tu s+thi tin+na pa tuHgsol ba gdab pa'o// sems can thams cad la ni phan pa'i phyir// bdag gi dge ba gang dag ci bsags pa/
229a6(rgyud 'grel): skye ba la sogs sdug bsngal thams cad ni// nye bar zhi phyir bdag gis bsngo bar bgyi// oM sarba ti thA ga ta pU N+ya nir+ya ta na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ bsngo ba'o// skye sogs sdug bsngal rnams kyis nyer gtses
229b1(rgyud 'grel): shing // mi shes log pas nyer bcom bdag nyid can// srog chags rnams la phan phyir byang chub sems// rin chen mchog gyur bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// rtag tu srog chags rnams kyi skyabs dang ni// gnas dang dpung gnyen
229b2(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid gyur cig/ oM bo d+hi tsit+taM u pA da yA mi/ bo d+hi tsi tAM mud pI ta taM ta thA ha sa ma pi ta bo d+hi tsi t+ta u t+sa ta ya mi// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'o// de nas rang gi dgos pa'i don thams cad gsol ba gdab par
229b3(rgyud 'grel): byo'o// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rigs kyi bu legaso shes gsungs nas rang rang gi gan su gshegs par bas mo// de nas oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ho haM zhes brjod pas
229b4(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad rang bzhin dri bzhin de nyid las mi 'du' bar stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o// de nas oM shU n+ya dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes brjod pas chos thams cing spros bral na mkha'i ngo bo lta bur bsam mo//
229b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas stong pa nyid du gnas sems can thams cad kyi don mi 'grub pas snying rje chen pos kun nas bslang bas paM las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa yangs shing rgya che ba'i steng du chos dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par
229b6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i yi ge a dkar po 'od du zhu bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yangs shing rgya che ba bsam// de'i steng du hrI/ dkar po las 'od zer 'phros pas/ phyi snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad 'ja' tshon lta bur gyur// nang bcud
230a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems can thams cad// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang por gyur nas// hrIHla thim pas gser gyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa gcig tu bsam// de la 'od zer 'phros pas sems can thams cad spyan ras
230a2(rgyud 'grel): gzigasu bsgrubs nas thim pas bdag nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs phyag stong pa sku mdog dkar la 'tsher ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lha'i pany+tsa li ka'i dar dmar pos sham thabs pa ri dgas nag
230a3(rgyud 'grel): bo'i pags pas nu ma g.yon pa bkab pa rin po che'i rgyani rnam pa sna tshogs du mas brgyan pa khyad par du yang lha'i rin po che rnam pa bdun gyis brgyan pa// rtsa ba'i zhal kun nas dkar ba spyan gsum mnga' ba g.yas
230a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ljang gu/ g.yon pa dmar ba/ zhal thams cad kun nas 'dzum pi'i nyams can de'i steng ma ljang gu/ de'i g.yas dkar bA/ guyon pa dmar ba// de'i steng ma dmar po/ de'i g.yas ljang gu/ g.yon dkar po// de'i
230a5(rgyud 'grel): steng na khro bo'i zhal mthing nag mche ba gtsigs pa/ dbu skra ser po zhal bcu po ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'o// de'i steng ma ban+d+ha ka'i me tog ltar dmar ba mgrin+d+ra pa yan chod 'thon pa tshangs par spyod pa'i cha lugs rgyan
230a6(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa dbu'i thor tshugs dang ldan pa'o// des ni skye ba rnam pa bzhis sangs rgyas sgrub par byed pa'o// rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis thugs kar thil mo sbyar ba// de'i 'og ma g.yon pa gser gyi pad+mo rtse ba dang bcas pa 'dzin
230b1(rgyud 'grel): pa// g.yas kyi 'og ma bgrangs phreng 'dzin pa// g.yon gyi gsum pa na ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa// g.yas kyi gsum pA na yi dwags kyi bkres sgrom gyi gdung pa sel ba'i mchog sbyin mdzad pa// g.yas kyi bzhi pa na 'khor
230b2(rgyud 'grel): lo 'dzin pa// g.yon gyi bzhi pa na gzhu 'dzin pa'o// de nas g.yas kyi phyag rnamasu go rims ji lta ba bzhin du yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang // sprul pa'i sku rgyal ba shAkya thub pa dang / me long dang / shel gyi gdu
230b3(rgyud 'grel): bu dang / dgra sta dang / phu ba dang / ril ba b+hi ga ra dang / rnga yab dkar po dang / rin po che med pa dang / rin po che chu shel dang / skyabs sbyin pa dang / rin po che'i kha T+wAM ga dang / rdo rje dang / ral grI dang / lhung bzed dang / rdo rje'i
230b4(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa dang / rin po che bsnams pa'o// g.yon pa'i phyag rnam su go rim ji lta ba bzhin du rgun 'brum gyi snod thogs pa'i phyag dang // pad+mo'i steng du 'od dpag med pa dang // rin po che'i za ma ti ga dang / rin po che'i
230b5(rgyud 'grel): shing dang / rin po che'i gzhal med khang dang / rin po che'i dung g.yas su 'khyil ba dang // 'khar sil dang / rin po che'i mda' dang / rin po che'i dril bu dang / thod pa'i 'khor ba dang / rin po che'i lcags kyu dang /
230b6(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i mdung dang / pad+ma le brgan dang / sprin rnam pa lnga dang / rin po che'i phyag rgya dang // rin po che'i glegs bam dang / pad+ma sngon po bsnams pa'o// phyag stong gis nye bar mdzes pa de las gzhan pa'i phyag
231a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mchog sbyin pa phyag gi mthil na spyan re mnga' ba'o// 'jigs pa thams cad skyob pa'i spyan ris gzigs dpag tu med pa 'phros g.yasu don yod zhags pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
231a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dud pa'o// g.yon du rta mgrin dang sgrol ma 'dud pa'o// phyogs bzhir rgyal po bzhi rang rang gi 'khor dpag tu med po dang bcas pa'o// steng gi phyogasu lha'i bu dang drang srong mchod pa thogs pa dpag tu med pa lhags
231a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de nas thugs ka'i hrIHlas 'od zer 'phros pas ye shes pa spyan drangs la phyag dang mchod pas mnyes par byas la// dzaHhU~M baM ho zhos brjod pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcings pas mnyes par
231a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de nas thul mo sbyar la pad+ma kha phye ba'i byas te snying gar gzhag pa 'di ni pad+ma rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// oM pad+mo h+NA bA ya swA hA/ de nas hrIHlas 'od 'phros pas/ rigs lnga spyan drangs la snga ma bzhin du mchon
231a5(rgyud 'grel): dau// byang chub rdo rje sa sangs rgyas li// ji ltar mchod chen gsol mdzad pa// bdag kyang rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir// na mkha'i rdo rje dang bdage stsol// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga yum drang bcas pas dbang
231a6(rgyud 'grel): bskur bar bsam zhing tshig tu// dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che// gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung // khams gsum po yis phyag byas pa// de ring khyod la sbyin par bya// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM zhes brjod
231b1(rgyud 'grel): byas// de bzhin gshugs pa 'ad dpag med pa zlan sbyang du ba stu// dun sa duN+Dal g+hun+d+ha m+b+ha shAng+gA na du// ma d+hAmA cu sa thA sas A rbA / nas pas/ d+hAm brgyun gyu// danas gams can/
231b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed nus gsang sngags 'di 'bum phrag/ cig bzlas par bya'o// ma ts+tsha d+hU mAM yA/ na ma / bid+d+hi satwA yI/ mU hA satwA ya/ mAr+d+ha kA NAM kA ya/ sar+b+bA wAn ts+tsha na
231b3(rgyud 'grel): ka rA ya/ sar+b+ba b+ha baM sa mu dro ts+tshe Sha No yaM ka rA ya/ sar+b+be b+hU d+hi pra sha ma na ka rA ya/ sar+b+baM t+yaM pa dra ba bon+ta shaMka rA ya/ ser+b+bA b+ha ye Shut+sA NA ya/ ta s+ya na maHkr-i tA i daM AR+ShA ba mr-i ki te shwa r-i ta ba nI le kair+t+r-i nA ma ba ra ma hUM daM yau
231b4(rgyud 'grel): bar+N+Na yi Sh+ya maM/ sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha nAM/ shu b+hu tsi twA nAM/ sar+b+baM saMtwA nAM/ pA pa mArge bi sho d+haM kaM/ tad+ya thA a bA lo kI lo ka ma taM/ lo kaM ga ni/ A di ba ti/ lo kA ti kran+te/ au h+ye hi/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he bo d+hi satwe/ he mA hA bo d+hi sat+su ha ma
231b5(rgyud 'grel): bid+d+hi sa/ hUM b+hU ya bid+d+hi satwA/ k+ShAr+ra ka sne rI dza da yaM/ oM hU~M/ s+yAR+YA ba mo kit+ti rA/ pU ra ma maM d+hI / krAr+Ya/ g+haR+Ya g+haR+ShA kam+mA/ s+yAd+b+ha ya biH/ ts+tshidI hrI/ mo a r-I/ g+hu ma~M gA ma/ baM hi grA ma/ sid+d+ha sid+d+hi yo ka
231b6(rgyud 'grel): du hu du hu bIr+yan+te/ ma hA bIr+yan+te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+hA ra NI shwa ra/ dza la dz+wa la bi ma lI mUte/ Ar+yA ba lo shi te shwa ra/ gr-iSh+Na dzau ne dza TA mu ku TA li kr-i ta shi rI ra lam+ba pra laM ba bi laM ba/ ma hA sid+d+ha/ bi d+yaM d+ha ra pa la pa le ma hA baM la maM la ma la/
232a1(rgyud 'grel): mahA ma la/ tsa la tsa la/ mahA tsa la/ kr-iSh+TaM bak+ShA/ kISh+NA bar+N+Na kaSh+Ta pA sha nIn+na ta na/ he pad+ma hwAs+yA/ tsa rA tsA ra nI sh+na ra wa ra/ kr-iSh+NA sar+b+ba kr-i ta ya dz+nyo pa bI ta/ a h+ya hi bI ra mu kha/ tI pu rad+ya hu nu shwa ra/ nA rA ya nA/ ba la ru pa be ShA
232a2(rgyud 'grel): rI/ ha nI la kAr+N+Na/ haM ma hA hA la hA la bi Sha ni dzi tA/ lo kaM s+ya rA ga biM Sha nA sha naM/ dr-i ShaSha nAM sha naM/ mo haM bi Sha nir mo k+Sha naM hu lu hu lu ma~M la/ pha la pha la hA re/ ma hA pad+mA nA b+hA/ sa ra sa ra/ si re si ri/ su ru su ru/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bo d+h+ya bo d+hA/
232a3(rgyud 'grel): bibo d+ha yA mi/ mi ti nI la kar+N+Na e h+ye hi nI la kaN+Tha/ e h+ye hi bA mas+thi ti/ saM ha mu kha ha sa ha sa/ muny+tsa muny+dza ma hA T+Ta D+hA hA sa nIrnA de ni/ e h+ye hi b+ho b+ho ma hA srid+d+ha yai gI shwa ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ba tsa/ swa d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi d+h+yaM/ smar \u0f7fsma ra tA/
232a4(rgyud 'grel): b+ha k+ka pAn+d+he/ lo ka bi la ki tA~M/ ta thA ga tA/ da dwau hi me daR+sha naM/ ka ma s+yA daR+sha naM/ pra hA da ya ma naM swA hU~M/ sid+d+ha ya swA hA/ ma hA sid+d+ha ya swA hA/ s+yAd+ha yo gI shwa rU yaM swA hA/ nI la kaSh+NA ya swA hA/ ba ru ha mu khA ye swAhA/ sid+d+ha mu khA ya swA hA/ ma hA ma
232a5(rgyud 'grel): nI ri siM ha mu khA ya swA hA/ sid+d+ha bid+yA d+hA rA ya swA hA/ pad+ma ha s+thA ya swAhA/ ma~Mny+dzu pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ badz+ra hastA ya swA hA/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kaM taM ya dz+nyo pa bI ta ya swA hA/ mahA kA la muM ku Ta d+ha rA ya swA hA/ tsakra a yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swA hA/ shaM
232a6(rgyud 'grel): she b+ha nin+ta nga na ka rA ya swA hA/ ni kho d+he naM ka rA ya swA hA/ b+h+r-i ma~M skan+d+ha daM sha s+thi ta kiSh+Tha dza nI ya swA hA/ bA ma hasta bya g+ha tsarma ni ba sa~M nA ya swA hA/ lo ke shwa rA ya swA hA/ ma hA lo ke shwa rA ya swA hA/ sarba sid+d+hi shwa rA ya swA hA~M/ ne mo b+he ge ba taM/
232b1(rgyud 'grel): An+t+ra ba ma gau ta shwa rA ya/ b+ha d+ha satwA ya ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sad+d+han+t+ra ma man+ta pa dA ni swA hA/ oM hrIHtrai lok+Sha ba tsa ma a mo b+hA pA sha a pra ti ha ta heHhaHhUM phaT swA hA/ oM pad+moSh+TA Sha bi ma le hUM swA hA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tA re swA hA// gzu/
232b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di lan cig brjod pas rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi byung ba yang ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyu ro// 'di 'dzin pa'i gang zag de la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rgyun mi 'chad par mig stong dang ldan pa'i thugs
232b3(rgyud 'grel): rjes gzigs par 'gyur ro// phyag stong gis skyob par 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang nye ba lnga dge 'dun gyi dkor rku 'phrog byas pa rnams kyang lan cig brjod pa sa ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro// the tshom za ba
232b4(rgyud 'grel): ni ma gtog so// gshes ngan du 'chi ba'i 'chi ltas bco lnga 'byung bar mi 'gyu ro// / skye ba bzang po bco lnga yongasu 'dzin par 'gyu ro// sus snying po 'di'i ming thos pa de ni bskal
232b5(rgyud 'grel): pa du ma'i skye ba dang 'chi ba'i bsags pa'i las lci ba rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur na brjod cing 'dzin pa lta ci smos// rgyun ma 'tshod par bzung nas bcu'i 'bras bu thob pa la dka' ba med na/ 'jig rten pa'i bsod
232b6(rgyud 'grel): nams kyi 'bras bu thob pa lta ci smos// yul gang du yams kyi nad byung la yul der rgyal pos chos kyi yul srung zhing rgya che ba dang gtsang mar bya// sems can thams cad gtams las mi gcad do// nyes pa byung ba
233a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la bzod par bya'o// zhag bdun snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na yul der yams kyi nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// yul gnas pa'i mi ma yin pa rnams la gtor
233a2(rgyud 'grel): ma byin la// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la// rig pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod nas rol mo sna tshogs kyi lan gsum du bskor ba byas
233a3(rgyud 'grel): na rims nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyu ro// tshon skud sna lnga la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la mgul du gtag so// gal te sa ris so sor dgra rgyun du 'ong zhing yul du gnas pa'i sems can rnams la gnod/
233a4(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa dang yul der nad byung ba dang // char chu dus su mi 'bab pa dang // zla ba dang nyi ma drang por mi 'gro ba dang / ltas ngan pa de snyed byung na rgyal po des spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs
233a5(rgyud 'grel): byas la gang du yams kyi nad byung ba de'i ngos su bzhin bstan la gzhag/ shin tu dud pa bdug pa dang me tog dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa ci 'byor pas mchod par bya'o// de nas sgrubs pa pos zhag/
233a6(rgyud 'grel): bdun du brtson 'grus brtan por byas nas ris so so'i dgra thams cad phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur// sems mthun par 'gyur/ phan tshun grags por 'gyur/ skye bo yongs dang rgyal bu rnams kyang byas pas ga
233b1(rgyud 'grel): zhing legs par byed par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i btsun ma na 'a bar rnams kyang de la dga' ba bskyed par 'gyu ro// nad dang gnad pa glang byung yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang mig snang /
233b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa'i mdun du mchod pa byas la gzungs sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyu ro// su zhig ha la ha la'i dug zas na de gu phul gyi bdug pa dang / gA bu ra cha bsnams /
233b3(rgyud 'grel): khron po chu lhag mar ma gyur pa bskol la khyer gang lus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs na dug zhi bar 'gyur ro// su zhig mig nyams te 'ong bar
233b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa dang / mig gi 'bras bu'i steng du ling tog byung ba dang / mig tu ru skyes te mi mthong bar gyur pa des a ru ra dang bai ru ra gcig dang / skyu ru re gcig zhib tu gtags la sbrang rtsi dkar po dang / khye'u'i ma'i 'o ma dang
233b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bar bya ste/ sbyor ba'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas/ brjod cing byis pa gsar pa btsas pa'i bud med dang / khyi dang phag gis ma mthong ba ro rol du byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du lan
233b6(rgyud 'grel): stong rtsa brgyad bzlos brjod byas la/ dben pa rlung mi 'ong bar 'dug ste/ nyi ma bdun gyi bar 'dug ste/ nyi ma bdun gyi bar du sman 'di mi'i 'o ma dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te mig gi nang du blugs na mig gi 'bras bu skye bar
234a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// ling tog mud cing lags par mthong bar 'gyuraro// su zhig 'byung ba'i gdon nam mi ma yin pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur na glu yul gyi dud pa la lan nyi shu rna gcig bzlas brjod byas la snar
234a2(rgyud 'grel): bdugo/ yang na ri bong gi sdug pa tsam gyi ri la bu byas la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la bza'o// sha dang chang dang sgog pa dang 'thab mo spong ngo // 'on kyang sos par 'gyu ro// shu dag dkar po la lan brgya
234a3(rgyud 'grel): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te// dpung pa g.yas par gtags na 'thab mo las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// ba lang dkar po'i gi'u wang lag 'thil du bcug la byang chub sems dpa'i drung du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
234a4(rgyud 'grel): byas te yan lag rnams bskus dpral bar thig le byas na/ lha dang klu dang 'byung po dang / mi thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// khyo shug me dang chu ltar mau mthun par gyur na byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du ngur ba'i
234a5(rgyud 'grel): mjug sgro la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas lus la btags na mdza' bar 'gyur ro// rin po che sna tshogs phunu sum tshogs shing phyug par 'dod na yid bzhin gyi nor bu thogs pa'i phyag la mchod par
234a6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// mi bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtses par gyur na zhags pa thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// khang pa ri nad rnams yod par gyur na rin po che'i lhung bzed thogs pa'i phyag la mcho do// 'dre gdon thams cad gdul
234b1(rgyud 'grel): par 'dod na rin po che'i ral gri thogs pa'i phyag la mchodado// lha'i bu'i bdud thams cad gdul bar 'dod na/ rdo rje thogs pa'i phyag la mchodo// phas kyis rgol bar dgra gzhom par 'dod na rdo rje'i tho ba thogs pa'i phyag la
234b2(rgyud 'grel): mcho do// 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i gnas thams cad la thar bar 'dod na 'jigs pa med pa'i sbyin pa'i phyag la mchodado// mig mi gsal te 'od dang mi ldan par gyur na me shel gyi nor bu thogs pa'i phyag la mtsha
234b3(rgyud 'grel): tsha ba'i rims kyis thebs te bsil byar 'dod na chu shel gyi nor bu thogs pa'i phyag la mchodado// blo na thabs mthon por 'dod na rin po che'i gzhu thogs pa'i phyag la mchodado// grogs po mdza' bshos dang myur
234b4(rgyud 'grel): du phrad par 'dod na rin po che'i mda' thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// lus la nad sna tshogs kyis thebs par gyur na lhag ma thogs pa'i phyag la mchodado// lus kyi bgegs ma lus pa bsal bar 'dod na rnga yab
234b5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// thams cad mthun pa'i 'khor du 'gyur bar 'dod na bum pa thogs pa'i phyag la mchod// stag dang 'phar sbyang dang dom dred dang gcan zan ma rungs pa thams cad spong bar
234b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod na phub thogs pa'i phyag la mcho do// gnas dang dus thams cad du rgyal po'i bgegs la thar bar 'dod na dgra sta thogs pa'i phyag la mchodado// bu dang bu mo dang g.yog 'khor gyi phyir shel gyi gdub 'khor
235a1(rgyud 'grel): thogs pa'i phyag la mchodado// yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phyir ni pad+ma dkar po thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// phyogs bcu'i zhing yongasu dag par 'dod na// pad+ma sngon po thogs pa'i phyag la mchodo//
235a2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab chen po dang ldan par 'dod na// rin po che'i me long thogs pa'i phyag la mcho do// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon sum mthong bar 'dod na/ pad+ma thogs pa'i phyag la mcho do// sa gter
235a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byin par 'dod na/ rin po che'i za ma tog thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// drang srong gi lam mngon par bsgrub par 'dod na/ sprin rnam pa lnga thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// chings par skye bar 'dod na/ rol pa thogs
235a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag la mcho do// lha'i gzhal med khang du/ skye bar 'dod na/ pad+ma le brgan thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// phyogs gzhan gyi phyir rgole bA bsal ba 'dod na ral gri dang mdung thogs pa'i phyag la mchodado// dge
235a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lho 'dre thams cad dgug par 'dod na rin po che'i dung thogs pa'i phyag la mcho do// lho 'dre thams cad 'khor bar 'dod na thod pa'i khar ba thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas myur
235a6(rgyud 'grel): du gshegs nas phyag gis byug par 'dod na bgrang phreng 'dzin pa'i phyag la mchod do// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mchog thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'dod na rin po che'i dril bu thogs pa'i phyag la mcho do//
235b1(rgyud 'grel): tshig gi spobs pa gya nom pa dang ldan par 'dod na rin po che'i phyag rgya thogs pa'i phyag la mcho do// dge ba'i lha rnams dang klu rnams rtag par 'ongs te bsrung zhing yongasu skyob par 'dod na lcags kyu thogs pa'i
235b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag la mchodado// byams pa dang snying rjes sems can thams cad skyob par 'dod na 'khar gsil thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// sems can thams cad kyis rtag par phon tshun gus par bsnyen bkur brtse
235b3(rgyud 'grel): bar sems par 'dod na thal mo sbyor ba'i phyag la mchod do// skye bo'i skye gnas thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mi bral bar 'dod na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa'i phyag la mcho do// skye ba'i
235b4(rgyud 'grel): tshe rabs thams cad du rtag tu rtog par de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang du gnas nas mngal gyi snying por skye bar mi 'dod par gyur na gzhal med khang thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// mang du thos pa'i shes
235b5(rgyud 'grel): rab rgya chen po dang ldan par 'dod na rin po che'i mdo sde'i glegs par thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// da ltar gyi lus 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi sku la thugs pa'i bar du rtag tu byang chub kyi sems las ldog
235b6(rgyud 'grel): par mi 'gyur bar 'dod na phyir mi ldog pa'i gser gyi 'khor lo thogs pa'i phyag la mchodado// mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sbyin pa rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba tshim par 'dod na mchog sbyin pa'i phyag la
236a1(rgyud 'grel): mcho do// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams myur du gshegs nas spyi bo nas phyag gis byugs tAM lung bstan par 'dod na spyi bo nas sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa'i phyag la mchodado// shing
236a2(rgyud 'grel): thogs dang 'bras bu rnams 'grub par 'dod na rgun 'brum thogs pa'i phyag la mchodado// de ltar mngon par sgrub pa'i mchog rnams stong yod kyang // de mngon bsdus nas bstan pa yi no// luso drang por srung ste snying ga
236a3(rgyud 'grel): thal mo sbyar nas sor mo thams cad phan tshun thad kar bsnol lnga g.yon pa'i sor mo rnams kyis g.yas pa'i ser mo rnams lu 'khyud de mdzub mo gyen du bsgrengs la rtse mo gnyis sgrango // mthe bo gnyis kyi tshigs dang
236a4(rgyud 'grel): por rig par bgyi// lag mthil la ma 'byor bar bgyi'o// 'di ni gzung sngags thams cad kyi phyag rgya yi no// bskal pa du mar tshe rab su bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa mi dge ba rnams byang bar 'gyur ro// tshe phyi ma la
236a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub brnyes par mdzad pa'i tshe bdud thams cad kyi mthus brtsams pas na phyag rgya 'dis btul te/ de'i tshe zhi ba dang bde
236a6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang bsam gtan dang snyomos par 'jug pa yang brnyes par gyur to// de'i gsang sngags ni 'di yino/ tad+ya thA/ sarba d+harmA maN+Da lA ye e h+ye ha sarba shud+d+ha satwA ya swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs phyag stong pa'i
236b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga brjod par bya ste/ thog mar ri rnams dang nye ba ma gzhis gcad cing bkra shis pa'i sa phyogs btsal bar bgyi'o// der sa brkos te gseg ma dang gyo mo dang rus pa dang mi gtsang ba rnams bsal
236b2(rgyud 'grel): la dri zhim po dag dang ba'i lci ba dang 'jam pa bsres te byug par bya/ dkyil 'khor dpangs mtho gang gi tshad du sgo bzhi gdod do// rin po che du mas spras pa'i rta babs dang sgo khyud dang bcas pa tshang bar bgyi'o// shar
236b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi sgor ni yul 'khor srung // lho'i sgor ni 'phags skyes// nub kyi sgrar ni spyan mi bzang // byang gi sgor ni rnam thos sras// de dag g.yas g.yon du rang rang gi 'khor thams cad dri'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu 'phags pa
236b4(rgyud 'grel): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong pa gzhag par bgyi'o// de'i mdun du sgrol ma dang khre'u bzhag ste khre'u'i steng du gzungs sngags 'di gzhag par bgyi'o// g.yas phyogasu ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'o// rgyab tu
236b5(rgyud 'grel): nA nor bzangaso// g.yon du n+ye rta mgri na// mtshams bzhir go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / byams pa dang / 'jams dpal dang / phyag na rdo rje'o// dkyil 'khor de la bdug pa sna tshogs
236b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis bdug go/ me tog sna tshogs dgra ma mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o// sgog pa rnam dgu dang sha chang mi dbab bo// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu rgyun mi chad par mchod pa gsar ba rnams brje'o// bstod
237a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbyangs dang rol mo sna tshogs kyis mchod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' mar ni mchod rten bdun bdun la tshon sna lha'i ba dan btsugs la gzhag par bya'o// de'i tshe rtsa ba'i sngags stong brgya rtsa
237a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs dang kun dga' bo'i gzugs kyis der 'ongs ni sa sgrub pa po de la ci 'dod ces gtam smra bar 'gyur ro// sgrub pa po des mchod
237a3(rgyud 'grel): pa sna tshogs kyis mchod lan gdab par bgyi ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du gzungs sngags kyi rang bzhin 'tsha lo zhes brjod par bgyi'o// yang 'di skad du 'di ni lu nga bstan pa'i dus
237a4(rgyud 'grel): lags pa snyam bgyid na thugs rje dang ldan pas bdag la nges par thugs rje chen po bskyed du gsol// bdag ni ci rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang grags pa mi 'tshal gyi nam zhig na sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin
237a5(rgyud 'grel): du lta ba dang yongasu skyob par 'gyur snyam du semaso// yang 'byung po gnyug mar gnas po thams cad bdag gis bsgo ba bzhin du gnas par gyur cig snyam du semaso zhes brjod par bgyi'o// gal te yid la bsams
237a6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di thob cing dngos grub de thob na gzhan la ma brjod par bdag nyid 'tshal bar bgyi'o// gal te chos 'di grub na bzlas par bgyi gcig tu gzung bar bgyi'o// 'di ni bslab pa gcig tu gsang ba'o// su zhig sna tshogs
237b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal ba des a ka ru nag po'i chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis la rtsa ba'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// yid la bsams pa yongasu rdzog bgyid pa phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o// 'on
237b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'tshal ba yongasu rdzogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe glegs pa ma 'di bzhin du sems shing su zhig 'di bzhin du mchod par bgyid na gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos sangs rgyas
237b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par gzigs 'jig rten tu byon pa'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyis bdud btul ba'i tshe lus las mig stong sprul te mig re re las sangs rgyas re re sprul te/ de dag la bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong
237b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ngo // lag pa stong las lag re re las 'khor ltos sgyur ba'i rgyal po rI re sprul te de dag la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgya la po sbyong 'byungango // bdud btul ba'i nang na byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni mchog/ de nas
237b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom par bya ste zab pa dang phra ba'i rdzog sa rim ni bla ma'i ma na ngag las shes par bya'o// de nas dza hi zhes brjod pas mdun gyi na mkha' la gshegs la bstod pa dang mchod pas mchod la/
237b6(rgyud 'grel): mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'khor dang bcas pa dgongasu gsol// bdag nyid gcig pu sdug bsngal las thar nas bde ba la gnas par 'dod pa ma lags kyis phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad phyag
238a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa'i ched du 'phags pa sgrub pa la sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thams cad thob par byin gyis brlabs dmya pa mdzad du gsol zhes brjod la// oM khyod kyis sems can don
238a2(rgyud 'grel): kun mdzad// rje su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol// sangs rgyas yu la du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol zhes brjod la// oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba
238a3(rgyud 'grel): sataSh+Tha She b+hag kye+e5Sh+Tha/ a nu raka to me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su ts+tsha me/ tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM/ ha haM ha ha hoHb+ha ge ban sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra mA me muny+tsa badz+ra b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa A/ zhes pa la nI bdun brjod la
238a4(rgyud 'grel): gshegasu gsol// gzhan yang dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po nas gsungs pa/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran pa yis// ngan song sdug bsngal dbul ba'i sdug bsngal dang / na ba'i sdug bsngal 'tshe ba'i sdug bsngal ba/
238a5(rgyud 'grel): kun nas thar bar spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs// gal te gsod pas mo yi dong du yang // gsad par bya ba'i phyir nI byer ba yis// spyan+da rAs gzigs kyi dbang po dran nas ni// chu btab bzhin du me dag zhi
238a6(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur// rgya mtsho dang ni mya ngan rgal na yang // spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran nas ni// chu'i nang du na mo yang mi 'chi'o// rab tu sdang ba'i yid kyis gsad pa'i phyir/ ri rab lhun po'i rtse nas bor na yang // spyan ras
238b1(rgyud 'grel): gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// nyi ma lta bur bar snang gnas par 'gyur// gal te rdo rje yi ni ri dgas dang / gsad pa'i phyir ni spyi bor 'ongs na yang // spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// ba spu'i khung tsam gtses
238b2(rgyud 'grel): par mi nuso// gsad pa'i sems kyis lag na mtshan thogs te// dgra tshogs mang pos kun tu bskor na yang // spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// de mi thag tu byams pa'i sems su 'gyur// gal te gsod pa
238b3(rgyud 'grel): nye bar 'ongs nasu// gshed ma'i mi'i dbang du gyur na yang // spyan ris gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// de yi maM tsho nu cha dum bu dum bur 'gyur// sngags dang stobs dang sman dang rigs sngags dang // ro langs pa dang
238b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po lus 'jigs pa// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// gang nas rab tu btang ba de slar 'gro/ dri ma med pa dri brel ba yi 'od// 'od dpag med pa ye shes nyi ma'i 'od// sprin gyis chod pa med
238b5(rgyud 'grel): par gyur ba'i 'od// 'jig rten dag na lhang bye lhag ger mdzes// 'phags pa lha yis gsol ba legs btab nas// 'phags pa 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs byas// mi dbang rgyal po bde spyod 'khor
238b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas rnams// tshe 'dir 'jig rten mgon po mthong bar shog/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub bdag nyid chen po mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje ldan pa sa drug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin yang
239a1(rgyud 'grel): sa dang po'i byang chub sems dpar byin gyis brlabs pa/ dper na nga'i nye gnas kun dga' bo sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yin yang so so'i skye bor byin brlabs pa lta bu'o// zhes
239a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyis gsungs pa la// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du gshegs te/ sa brgyad pa la gnas nas lus gnyis su byas te/ gcig ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med
239a3(rgyud 'grel): pa la mched par byed/ gcig ni dga' ldan du byams pa la mdo 'di nyid kyi don 'dri'o zhes gsungs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams dang ba'i 'od ces bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas
239a4(rgyud 'grel): 'od ces bya bar lung bstan pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI pa ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge

240a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dang phyug gi mi ga drug pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/
240b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ Ar+yA b+hA lo ke t+ye shwa ra ShA T+Ta k+Sha ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyug
240b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// gang zhig don dam thugs chu nga snying rje'i dbang gis ye shes skur/ gnas mdzad 'gro la bu bzhin mnyam gzigs nas// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i 'jigs las sgrol mdzad pa'i// skyob pa'i dbang po 'jig rten
240b3(rgyud 'grel): mgon la rabyA btude// yai nas rnam dag sems nyid ma rig pa'i// glo bur dri mas bsgribs pa'i 'gro la phan don du// bstan pa rgya mi tshe'i nang nas theg mchog rdo rje'i lam+ba// sgrib pa myu ra se lo bdud rtsi lte bu bri bar bya// bla
240b4(rgyud 'grel): ma dkon mchog gsum gus shing // snying rje byang chub sems sbyangs te// dbang thob dam tshig ldan pa yi// sgrub la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bkra shis yid 'ong byin chags pa'i// dben pa'i gnasu phyin nos ni//
240b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod sbyin la sogs sngon song bas// rten dang mchod pa rim bzhin bsham// de nas 'tshe dogs kun sbyangs nas// khrus byas bde ba'i stan 'dug ste// rang nyid snying gar hrIMHbltas la// 'od kyis 'phags pa spyan drangs
240b6(rgyud 'grel): na // phyog 'tshal mchod 'bral la migs pas// bas na mam chags ni bsags par bya// 'grol TI chen po dang / byang chub se mas kyang ba sgom par bya/ mi ma shu na don par sa ng+ge'i
241a1(rgyud 'grel): ko haM// dngos rnams thams cad rab sbyangs te// stong pa nyid kyi dang nyid las// rlung dang bdud rtsi'i ri rab ste// b+h+rUM l+yas rin chen gzhal yas khang // glu bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs la sogs rnam
241a2(rgyud 'grel): par mdzes// pho brang chu skyes 'deb drug la// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// de dbus pad+ma zla bu'i steng // hrI las 'od 'phros don byas nas// slar 'dus yongasu gyur pa las// 'jig rten dbang phyug sku bskyed
241a3(rgyud 'grel): de// zhal gcig pA la phyog bzhi pa// dang po thugs kar thal mo sbyar// g.yas na mu tigA phreng ba 'dzin// g.yon paM pad+ma dkar po bsnam so// sku mdog dung dang kun+da da 'am// khya ba'i ri ltar dkA R+sha ba laM// thugs rjes
241a4(rgyud 'grel): yid tsam dmyur ba'i spyan// zhal ni 'dzum pa'i madrangs dang ldan// sgo ni mi 'gyur drang po ste// zha byas gnyis mAnyam pa'i skyil krung bzhugs// dbu skra mthon mthing lhung lor 'khyil/ a mr-i de byas spyi gtsug
241a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan// mtshon bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // dpe byad bzang po brgyu dA cu ldan// rin chen sna tshogs rgyun gyis smras// le bArga n+yA daR+sha gyi na bza' 'phyang // 'jig rten ga sum gyi mgon pa ni// yumra dang
241a6(rgyud 'grel): sras bcas bskyed par bya// de nas gnas gsum byin brlab ste// spyi bo mgrin pa thugs ka ru// rdo rje gsum mchog snying po 'di// kha dog gsumo ldan yi ge dgod// phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs/
241b1(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs nas// mchod de gsol bya btab pa yis// ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis// dbang bskur rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan// de nas thugs ka'i sa bon las// 'od zer spros te 'og min nas// ye shes
241b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' spyan drangs la// mchod cing gnyis med bsre bar bya// rang sems rnam dag lhar ga sal ba// snang la rang bzhin med pa yi// chu zla me long gzugs brnyan nam// na mkha' yi ni 'ja' tshon ltar// mtha'
241b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis las grol lha yi sku// sku btsas sku ni med pa yi// zung 'jug sgyu ma lta bur ni// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu bsgom// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang // dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyis// byin gyis
241b4(rgyud 'grel): brlabs pa'i gsang sngags 'di// rgyan mi 'chad du bzlas par bya// oM mA Ni pad+me hUM/ 'di ni mtshon gyi rgyal po ste// mi mthun dri ma spong byed cing // 'dod pa'i 'bras bu kun ster bsdu// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'o// de nas thugs
241b5(rgyud 'grel): ka'i 'od zer gyis// snod bcud sbyang sa te sku la bsti// sku yang gsung yig rimi gyis ni// thig le mi dmigs gzugasu bste// mtshan ma'i rtog pa rab zhi pa// chos dbyings dag pa'i ngo bo nyid// rang bzhin kun tu 'od gsal/
241b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i// de bzhin nyid kyi dang du gzhog/ de las cung zad lha yi skur// langs te spyod lam rnam bzhi ru// ma yengs chu bo'i rgyan ltar bsgom// snang grags sku gsung thugasu khyer// gzhan yang bsod nams tshogs bsags phyir/
242a1(rgyud 'grel): mdun gyi maN+Dal dbus nyid du// rten las dam tshig dkyil 'khor bskyed// ye shes dkyil 'khor dbyings nas ni// spyan drangs khrus gsol bstim bzhugs shing // phyag 'tshal mchod cing bstod bya ste//
242a2(rgyud 'grel): thugs nyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// gsang sngags dmigs shing bzlas par bya// de nas bzod gsol ye shes gshegs// dam tshigo dkyil 'khor rang la bsdu// rang yang mi dmigs rgyas btab ste// lha yi rnam par langs
242a3(rgyud 'grel): te gnas// thun bzhi la sogs thun par du// chos kyi spyod pa rgya cher bya// de los byung ba'i bsod nams kyang // 'gro don byang chub chen pos bsngo// zla drug bsgom pas 'grub 'gyur gyi// mtshan bzang mthong na rin chen brnyes/
242a4(rgyud 'grel): sum byi drug 'bum thon nas ni// sna tshogs las kyi rim par sbyar// lnga brgya'i tha mar 'jig rten du// thub pa'i bstan pa rgyas 'gyur te// 'jig rten dbang phyug rnal 'byor gyi// myur du bdag gzhan don 'grub 'gyur// thugs
242a5(rgyud 'grel): rje pad+mo rgyas pa'i ge sar las byung ba'i// rgyas byed bcud ldan sbrang rtsi cung zad bdag gis 'thungs// 'di ni gzhan phan bsam pas man ngag zur tsam bkod// nyes gyur thugs rje'i dang du bzod pa mdzad par rigs// 'dab

243b2(rgyud 'grel): lte ba zla bas rnam brgyan pad+ma la// 'bar ba'i rgyan mnga' kun nas mun sel zhing // kha ba'i ri 'dra ri dwags pags pa 'dzin pa// 'dzum bcas bzhugs la spyi bos gtugs byas te// 'gro ba de yi gnas thob 'dod pas 'dir//

243b4(rgyud 'grel): snying ka ra a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam zhing / de'i steng du dro ba rnams kyi bzhi pa me'i bu la pi rten pa nga ro bzhi pas mnan zhing gzhon nu ma'i nu mas brgyan pa lta'o// de nas sa bon gyi ye ge las 'od zer rnams
243b5(rgyud 'grel): byung bas bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rje btsun spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan drangs te/ de dag gi mdun nyid du phyag 'tshal ba sngon du song bas// oM badz+ra ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha AHhUM swA hA// oM badz+ra d+hA
243b6(rgyud 'grel): baM AHhUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe AHhU~M swA hA/ oM badz+ra A lo ka AHhUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he AHhUM swA hU~M/ oM badz+ra n+yai wi d+ye AHhUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra gI to AHhUM swA hA/ gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mcherje ba'i tshogs phul la/
244a1(rgyud 'grel): yang bdag gis dus kun tu// sdig par bgyis pa gang gyur pa// skrag pas rmi 'drar 'chags bgyid cing // deng nas brtsams te 'byung mi bgyid// dge ba rnams la rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis
244a2(rgyud 'grel): gzung // thams cad byang chub mchog tu bsngo// de thob lam la gnas bgyid cing // dam pa'i skyabs la skyabasu mchika de nas byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms te tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi rimi gyis mngon du byas/
244a3(rgyud 'grel): laH oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+maHsA b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM zhes brjod do// rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad rang rang gi de bzhin nyid las mi 'da' ba su rnam pa dag lnga bsams te// bdag kyang rnam par dag par bsams la/ yang oM shU n+ya tA/
244a4(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ki haM zhes pa'i rjod// kun nas stong pa nyid du bdag nyid kyang bsam mo// de'i rjes la mdun du paM las pad+ma 'dab ma sna tshogs pa bsam zhing / de'i steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de'i dbusu yongs

244b4(rgyud 'grel): nas dkar ba/ g.yas pa ljang ku// g.yon dmar ba// zhal thams cad kun nas 'dzum pa'i nyams can/ de'i dbus ljang khu/ g.yas dmar po// g.yon dkar po/ de'i dbus dmar po/ g.yas dkar po/ g.yon ljang gus

244b6(rgyud 'grel): tor dang bcas pa/ rgyan spangs par spyod pa'i cha lugs can// mgul pa dang bcas par bying ba// zhi ba'i gzigs pas 'dzum pa'o// phyag gnyis thug sa kar thal mo sbyar ba// g.yas dang po phreng ba 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa na
245a1(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi pad+ma rtsa ba dang bcas pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas gsum pas yi dgas skom pa sel ba/ g.yon gsum pas ril pa spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ g.yas bzhi pas 'khor lo 'dzin pa/ g.yon bzhi pas mda' dang gzhu
245a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa/ lhag ma dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po rnams kyis mchog sbyin pas phyag pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar 'jam pa 'di lta bu rnam par pos mo// de nas rang gi snying ga'i pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge gnas pa las byung
245a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'od kyis btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan drangs te/ yang dag par mchod la bdag gi nang du zhugs par bas mo// de nas sku gsung thugs legs par gnas pas dbang bskur ba'i mthar thugs par bsgrub bo// de rjes
245a4(rgyud 'grel): la rang gi snying ga re pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon kun nas dkar po 'odi dang bcas pa mgo gyen du 'grol ba bsams te/ de las byung ba'i sgra rnams 'phros pa 'khor lo'i rnam par byang bar bsam zhing bsgo mo// gang gi tshe skye
245a5(rgyud 'grel): bAnA sta bon gyi yi ge yid la 'dzin pas nor bu'i mtsham su phyag 'tshal ba dang bcas pa'i mngon du gyur pa'i tshig spangs te/ ya~M d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi rau/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsi li pra tsa le ku su me ku su ma/ ba ra ma
245a6(rgyud 'grel): mi li tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ye swA hA zhes bya ba 'dod pa bzhin bzlaso// skyo bar gyur na ye shes sems dpa' mdun du bzhugs pa la mcho do// gsol ba gdab pa dang / bzod par gsol ba dang / gshegs par mkhyen par bya ba'i phyir a hi zhes
245b1(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsus b+ha rjod // langs nas mchod rten la sogs pa d+hA// 'dir gang dag de snad kyi phyug rgyu dag dmigs par mi nus pas phyag brgyad pa'am// sh+'u lA gtsug phyug bzhi pa 'am/ gnyis pa yang bsam nyung phyag gnyis

246a1(rgyud 'grel): // 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug la klu'i rgyal la nang rgyal gyi dus bstong pa bzhugs/

246b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag byas pa// tshangs pa mchog dang 'chi med bdag pos bsngags pa ste// bstod pas grub par mdzad pa thub pa'i rgyal po mchog/ spyan ras gzigs pa'i dbang phyug mgon po mchog gyur pa// gzugs bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po'i

246b4(rgyud 'grel): bAr mdzad// dri med dmar ser ral pa gya gyu ba 'dra// zla ba'i gzugs baR+Sha na yang dag rgyas shing gang 'dra'i zhal// mchog tu mdzes pa'i spyan ni pad+ma lta bur yang sa// kha ba'i dung ltar dkar ba'i 'gram dogs can// lte ba'i gnas ni chu

247a1(rgyud 'grel): na chu ga mdzad par rgyus bzung gi zhangs// glang po rnam+b+ha par sbyin pa drug dang dru pa'i 'gyum/ bzhin nur bu dpag b+h+yasam+b+ha shing 'dra da char gzugs/ dpa la ldan pa tA la ye gnas dus bcugs rgyu/
247a2(rgyud 'grel): ma gtan cani la mnyam par gnag pa'i spyan mnga' zhid// dga' dang snying rje'i nga bzhin gim zhing mdzes par gzigs// baidU gInas don b+h+rUM b+hag gis rims dang nad 'phrog byed// da gling ni byung bde ba med por mdzad pa
247a3(rgyud 'grel): ma med bcu bar bsngags pa'i byug sa m+bu/ slong gas su mye byings dang rnam rnams kyis// bsngags pa'i sman rnas pa sna tshogs me Sh+Ta m+b+ha/ / 'o na'i na gtud rgya mtsho lha zer rtag tu gnas/

248b4(rgyud 'grel): pa po/ mdzes pa'i 'od zer skya reng dmar pos brgyan pa po// pad+mar mtshungs pas phyed ni dmar bar byas pa po// ston ka'i sbyin gyi 'brug sbyar ldan zhing gzhon pa pau// rin chen mang pos dpung pa gnyis ni brgyan pa po// 'o ma'i mtsho lhur phyu

249a1(rgyud 'grel): bsags pa po// rtag tu bde ba'i 'byung gnas rga nad sel ba po// lus can mchog ste bdud dpung 'khrugs las rgyal ba po// gsum thar mdzad cing mkha' spyod spyod pa ston pa po// yongs rdzogs nye bar bsags shing brtan

249b5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan blta bas mi ngoms sna tshogs sku// thugs rje mthar phyin phyag stong 'gro rnams sgrub// shes rab mthar phyin dri med spyan stong gzigs// 'jigs pa kuno nas skyob la skyabs mchi// thugs rje gsal mdzad zla bu dri ma med/
249b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag ba'i sku mdog zla ba'i 'od // skyabs sbyin rnga yab pad+ma chu shel 'dzin// me yi 'jigs pa skyob la sgrubasu mchi// sems can re skong yid bzhin 'khor los bsgyur// zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog gangs ri'i mdog/
250a1(rgyud 'grel): skyabs sbyin rin chen pad+ma 'khor lo 'dzin// chu yi 'jigs pa skyob la sgrubasu mchi// yon tan rab rgyas nor bu 'dzin pa po// zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog gser dang mtshungs// sbubs sbyin nor bu pad+ma po ti 'dzin//
250a2(rgyud 'grel): seng ge'i 'jigs po skyob lo skyabasu mchi// 'gro rnams smin mdzad nyi ma rab tu snang // zhal gcig phyag baT+wAM sku mdog bac+doM ma 'dra// skyabs sbyin ut+pa la pad+ma me shel 'dzin// glang po'i 'jig pa skyob pa la / sems can yongs sgrol
250a3(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje don yod zhagaso// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ skyabs sbyin lcags kyu pad+ma zhags pa 'dzin// rgyal po'i 'jigs po skyob lo skyab su mchi// dbang bsdus chen po chu srin 'dzin khro dpal// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ku sha'i
250a4(rgyud 'grel): mdog 'dra ba'i// skyabs sbyin rgyal mtshan+da pud+ma gaN+DI 'dzin// klu yi 'jigs po skyob la skyabasu mchi// dug gsum 'jom mdzad ha la ha la cha zhal gcig phyag bzhi bai DUr+ya 'dra ba// skyabs sbyin rtse gsum pad+ma ba dan 'dzin// mkha'agrol
250a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa skyob la skyabasu mchi// dngos po'i stobs 'joms mthu chen rab thob po// zhal gcig phyag bzhi in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ skyabs sbyin rdo rje pad+ma dril bu 'dzin// mi rgod 'jigs pa 'joms la skyabasu mchi// mAM chu seng ge glang
250a6(rgyud 'grel): chen lcags sgrog sprul// mkha' 'gro mi rgod 'jigs pa brgyad las ni// gang la gang 'dul 'phrin las rnam pa bzhis// smin mdzad spyan ras gzigs la skyabasu mchi// gtso bo 'jigs pa kun los skyob mdzad cing // sprul pa'i
250b1(rgyud 'grel): sdi gang+yas b+hA snang ba la// bAzlas pa dbang dang drug rdul d+hA// sgrubs dang smyanan smra ga zigs lnga sgrub sgyu mAn/ yAn+ta d+han rAh+ma r+b+hasadz+nyAnA rnams kA b+h+yas brgyam/ blams pa na papa thugs rna byu d+ha Sh+Tam+b+ha/ drung chu
250b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi dab tu ga so sgrog pa gyis rnam/ 'jigs gzugs spyanA sa gzigs la swA su~M mAn+te// mthun pa khyor gyi man tan brjod pas / ng+tha gA'i klung gi byi stongs oM rgya mo la/ steng phrag dang mchong byis gyur pa yi/ don lda
250b3(rgyud 'grel): ras gzigs la skyabasu mchi// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gri bstong pa// dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
250b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ b+hoT+TA ra ka ma hA kA ru Ni kA sto tra/ bod skad du/ rje btsun thugs rje chen po la bstod la// thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje can// skyon gyis ma gos sku mdog dkar// rdzogs sangs
250b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi dbu rgyan tsa naM// thugs rje spyan gyis 'gro la gzigs// spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshalo// thugs rje dang ni shes rabo gnyis// mnyam par sbyor ba'i thugs mnga' zhing // phyog gnyis thugs kar mnyam sbyor ba// dpal
250b6(rgyud 'grel): ljon mnyam sbyor la phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po gautso// gsang sngags rgyal po'i bgrang phreng mchog/ mu tig ltar dkar g.yas na 'dzin// rig sngags 'a chang la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor ba'i
251a1(rgyud 'grel): bdam gyis ma gos pas// dag pa'i shel ltar 'od gsal ba// pad+ma dkar po g.yon na 'dzin// phrug na pad+ma phyag 'tshal lo// chos dbyings rnam dag dri ma dag/ zla ba'i 'od ltar rgyal ba'i yum// gzugs
251a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi lha mo yid 'ong sku// yig drug ma la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' yas 'od ldan gser mdog can+d+ra// yid bzhin nor bu chen po ltar// sems can re 'dod stong mdzad pa nor bu 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// rang
251a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin mi dmigs stong pa'i dang // bud med gzugs kyis 'gro ba 'dul// gsang sngags ngo bo shes rab bskyed// rig sngags che la phyag 'tshal lo// chen po la bstod pa dge slong ma
251a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
252a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs brgya rtsa brgyad pa sleb dpon chen po gup+tas mdzad pa bzhugs so/
252b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ aSh+Tot+ta rA sa ta Ar+ya ba lo ki te shU ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan rus gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ rje btsun thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag
252b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshalo// gang gis tshogs rab gnyis bsags pas// de nyid zab mo mngoni gzigs te// brtsibs 'gro la sna tshogs thabs// ston mdzad 'jig rten gsum mgon 'dud // stong nyid snying rje las byung ba// rnam lnga byang chub che bdag nyid
252b3(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs kyi thugs dag pa// 'jig rten mgon po mkhas pas sgrub// pad+mo zla dbus gzhon nu'i sku// skyil krung phyed brkyang 'gying bag brtan// zla ba rgyas pa'i zhal mdzes las// sa gsum bdag gi rI mdzad gzigs pa'o// mchog
252b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pad+mo'i g.yas dang g.yon// rgyal ba'i cod pan rin chen brgyan// 'od dpag med kyi sna spyi gtsug mdzes// de yi thugs ni pad+mar rgyas// hrIHyig rang sems 'od gsal ba// sa gsum sbyong mdzad yi ge bzhi// 'khor lo rnam gsum
252b5(rgyud 'grel): ngom chog bzhi// sgyu ma brag cha mkha' 'dra'o// thug sa rje chen po khaM sar+b+ba d+h+r-i'i sgrub thabs tshig su bcad pa bzhi pa rdzogs so// // thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// srid gsum gtso bo zhi ba'i lha// thugs rjes mi brnyel shes
252b6(rgyud 'grel): rab kyis// chag sa bral 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ zhabs kyi pad+mor spyi bo sa 'dud// gsum la skyabs song sems bskyed pas// byams sogs tshad med legs sbyangs shing // brtse chen ye shes snying gi mes// lus can sgrib bI
253a1(rgyud 'grel): bud shing bsreg/ rnam lnga byang chub las 'khrungs sku// gzhon nu dkar mdzes phun tshogs tshul// mchog sbyin pad+mo g.yas dang g.yon// 'od dpag med kyis dbu brgyan sgom// de snying pad+ma 'dab bzhis te// lte bar rang
253a2(rgyud 'grel): sems hUM yig ni// oM dang AHdang hUM bzhis// bskor ba'i ngag gi swa saM gsum sbyang // me long gzugs dang drag cha'i sku// mkha'i 'dra dag dang dri med dang // ye shes 'phrin las sbyar b+ha yis// sems 'di lha yi bdag nyid 'gyur//
253a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs rdzogaso// // thugs rje chen po ye she sa sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// rnal 'byor dbang phyug byams pa dang // snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms las// byung ba'i byang chub sems kyi
253a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag/ 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal// de zhabs pad+mo la reg pas// 'jig rten sdug bsngal bsgral ba'i phyir// ji bzhin ji ltar sgrub pa'i thabs// mdor bsdus bdag gis bskrun par bya// mkha' ltar dr-i med stong nyid dbyangs
253a5(rgyud 'grel): las dbang po'i gzhu ltar gsal ba'i dngos// pad+mo zla ba rgyas pa gsung thugs 'odi 'phro sgyu ma'i rnam thar sprul pa'i sgra// rab ma dzes sgra ni gzi brjing garta ni mdzes 'bar ba'i 'od zer dkar 'khrigs pa// skyil krung phyed ba
253a6(rgyud 'grel): dul ba'i phyag g.yas mchog sbyin pad+mo g.yon gyi phyag/ pad+mo sdong mdzes dri med 'dab rgya so gzhon nu sgeg po'i thugs kar 'dzin// shel ltar dri med ut+pal spyan ring kun nas yid 'phrog 'od 'bar zhal// brtan po dkar
253b1(rgyud 'grel): gsal zla rgyas stong lhag ral pa'i cod pan thub pa'i gdan// 'bar ba'i rin chen dri med sna tshogs shin tu 'od sbyangs legs spras mdzes// mkha' la nyi ltar lham me lhung de na mkha'i mtha' gtugs 'od 'gyed pa// dpe byang
253b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan rdzog sna gcig pu spyod pa skyabs k+ShiM dam pA bla myed ni// shin tu rtogs dka' de nyid gzhir gyur snying gi pId 'dab hrIHyig gis// gang ba'i phyogs rnams de bzhin de gzugs oM dang AHdang hrIHhUM ba sam// dkar sog
253b3(rgyud 'grel): kha dog ngag gi phreng ba yid ni ye ro zhes yig 'bru'i dngos// brtse ba'i rlung bskyed ye shes me 'bar 'gro ba'i sdig tsho gsaM bud shing bsreg/ zhi ba'i ngang nyid gnyis med mi dmigs mkha' ltar spros bral ro gcig ro// bde
253b4(rgyud 'grel): chen 'byung gnas ye shes dri med mnyam gzhag chen por bsgom par bya// de rjes mchod sogs dag pa'i yan lag cho ga ji bzhin ye shes sems dpa' legs bcug ste// rnam gsum 'khor ba dkar dmar sngo tshul
253b5(rgyud 'grel): go rim ji bzhin sku gsung thugs// mtho rim sa steng ngan 'gro'i sar glunas skye dgu'i snying rab sim byed pas// brtun g.yo'i mtshan nyid dam pa'i zhal bzhin mkhas pas rab tu shes par bya// thugs rje chen po ye shes

254a2(rgyud 'grel): popo la ni gsal byed dmar pos brgyan to// snying khar ni chos kyi bdag nyid kyi rang ba ma pacu drug pa'i pad+ma 'bur ba bya ru'i kha dog ca no// de'i snying po la ni dbyangs yig dkar pos brgyun to// lte bar ni sprul pa'i bdag nyid kyis
254a3(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs drug cu rtsa bzhi ral gri'i kha dog ca no// de'i snying po la ni 'bebs pa sngon pos pa rgyan de// gsum ki'i srog shing ni rtsa mchog go// lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i rlung gis bskor bar bya'o// 'og mas ni sbar bar bya'o// thog mas ni
254a4(rgyud 'grel): dbab par bya'o// byar mas ni bskye bar bya'o// thams cad las ni ye shes rang byung ngo // 'dzag pa la sogs pa'i rim pa yang phreng ba'i 'khor lo la'o// rab tu gsal ba dang bde ba chen po dang rnam par mi rtog pa

254b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o zhes brtags nas dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor mngon par bskyod pas// skye bo nyon mongs sgrib tshogs sprin gyi phung po shin tu 'thug po gtibs gyur la// tsham chom med par drag po'i shugs kyis

255a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' ni na mkha'i mdog can ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can hUM gi snying po can rdo rjes mtshan pa'o// rin chen 'byung ldan ni gser btso ma'i mdog can ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rmya can tra gi swA
255a2(rgyud 'grel): po can rin po ches mtshan pa'o// 'od dpag med ni me lce 'bar ba'i mdog can ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can hrIHyi snying po can pad+mos mtshan po// de ni yod grub pa sA lu ldang ba'i mdog can ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya car a
255a3(rgyud 'grel): snying po can ral gris mtshan pa'o// 'di dag dbus bcas phyogs rnam su// rim bzhin las lnga mdzad pa la// brtson pas ting nge 'dzin bzhugs pa// bdag sbyang ba dang gzhan sbyang gnyis// oM A swa pA rAR+YA dz+nyA na swo b+hA ba shud d+ha

255b1(rgyud 'grel): la stong pa nyid ston bzhengs// de rjes yang dgra rjes 'gro ma yin dang // dmigs bcas dmigs bral mngon par 'du byed dang // de yi nges pa'i sar chung mtshan med shin tu zhi ba yis// yid brtan byas la lha bzhi rnam par sprul par

256b1(rgyud 'grel): mong thun mong mya yin pa'i// rnal 'byor rim pas bzlas par bya// lha'i rim pas sngags rim bzhin// rnam gsum rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang // mkhas pas 'bad de bsgom par bya// dpal 'jig rten mgon po yi ge drug pa'i

257a1(rgyud 'grel): skyes 'dab bzhi'i thugs// rtsa ba'i yi ge bzhin mtshan pa// rang gi snying po sa byon bcas// gsal byas ye shes gzhug par bya// de nas dub pa ngal so'i phyir// cho ga'i sbyor bas 'gro ba yi// sems dul dal

257a3(rgyud 'grel): dmigs bcas dang // dmigs brel rnam par mi rtog la// rnal 'byor gnyug mar gnas na ni// ma lus mtshan ma rnam grol bsgom// gang phyir gang du gang gis gling // ji ltar bcing bas bdag dub pa// de phyir de yis der

257b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dang 'khor lo chen po thams cad 'tshig par 'gyu ro// tshig pa rnam par rtog pa'i yi ge gsum yang nub par 'gyur te// bde ldan zad pas chags pa dang // 'bar byed zad pas sdang ba nyid// sa bon zad
257b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir gti mug kyang // brlag 'gyur yi ge las yig med// lus med sems ni mi 'gro ma 'ong gnas pa med// sgyu ma'i skyes bu dga' dang gdung ba gang thob pa// 'di nyid chos kun na mkha' lta bur sgrub po la// yi ge
258a1(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i rnal 'byor zab mo ston pa yin// gang zhig yid la byed na yang // de tshe de ni de nyid yang // dngos po 'ba' yang mi byed phyir// bdag nyid yi ge med par brjod// gang du snang ba'i yi ge ni// de gnas pa
258a2(rgyud 'grel): ni myi 'gyur te// gnas med gnas par rab snang ba// snang ba phyi nang med yi ge/ tshes kun yi ge med mtshan nyid// de ni gdod nas yod min zhing // slar yang yod par mi 'gyur bas// yi ge thog mtha' med ces bshad//
258a3(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo gnas dang dus yig med// namakha' la ni sgra blo bzhin// bsam sogs reg par mi nus pa// de bzhin nyid yig med pa'o// ji ltar ji ltar rtog pa nub// mnyam par gzhag pa 'od gsal brjod// de ltar de ltar
258a4(rgyud 'grel): rnaM kun rtog/ thams cad de nyid mtshan nyid do// zab mo lkog du ma gyur dang // byed bcas byed pa med nyid dang // ci tsam snang ba de tsam du// dmigs pa chad phyir yi ge bral// de nas thun gyi dus la babya pA na slar yang
258a5(rgyud 'grel): gdul bya dang rang gi bsod nams dang smon lam gyi mthus// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs brtson pa'i cha lugs cani rgyan spangs par bltas nas// mtshan ma g.yeng byar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir// mchod rten la sogs

264b1(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+ho haM/ chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis// rang gi rang bzhin stong pa nyid// mkha' ltar mnyam par bzhag nas ni// de nas bdag lus dkyil 'khor bsgom// lus gang yin de gzhal med khang // sems 'dir lha yi bdag nyid de// sngags
264b2(rgyud 'grel): pi'i ngag ni sngags yin la// kun ni dri ma med rtog spangs// hrIHpad+mo bzhi dbus 'jig rten mgon// zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas dang g.yon// mchog sbyin pad+mo 'dzin dkar zhing // chos dbyings ye shes rang bzhin no// haHshar
264b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'dab mar don yod zhags// phyag bzhi zhugs pa lcags kyu dang // rdo rje phreng thogs rab zhi dmar// me long ye shes bdag nyid do// hUM lho yi 'dab mar rta ma cho ga zhil// phyag bzhi dbyig pa 'khor lo dang // sdig mdzub pad+ma 'chang
264b4(rgyud 'grel): khros pa// mnyam nyid ye shes bdag nyid do// pha nub kyi 'dab mar ral pa gcig/ phyag bzhi gri gug thod pa dang // ral gri ut+pal bstims rnga ma nag/ kun rtog ye shes ngo bo'o// Ta byang gi 'dab mar khro gnyer cen+ya// phyag bzhi dbyig
264b5(rgyud 'grel): pa phreng ba dang // pad+ma ril ba ldan khyo s+thA// don grub ye shes dngos nyid do// a A a~M s+yai u A r-i r-I l-i l-I ai e o oM a aHpi wing gling bu rnga rnga rnga zlum bzhang ma dang // sgeg mo glu ma gar ma me tog bdug spos mo// mar mo
264b6(rgyud 'grel): dang gzugs ma ro ma reg ma dang // chos ldan lha mo bcu drug rgyan spud khyams bzhir dgong // ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+nyA nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+Shagater ma la sogs sprin 'dzin
265a1(rgyud 'grel): par// sum cu nye ba'i mchod pa yi// lha mo'ang de bzhin khyams kyi mthar// mkhas pas de bzhin dgod par bya// dza hUM baM hoH/ ljags kyu dkar dang zhags pa ser// lcags sgrog dmar po dril bu ljang /
265a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ni// gtso bo las phyung rim bzhin bzhugs// de'i 'og tu dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gsal bar bkod pa la// ye shes bcug na mkha' ji snyed pa'i sems can la phan par 'dod pas/ rang rang
265a3(rgyud 'grel): dang rjesu mthun pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba spro zhing don gnyis cig car sgrub pa'i sems kyis sngags brjod par bya'o// oM AHhrIHna maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM sarba ta thA ga ta A baM lo ki te ma hA kA ru Ni mur+t+ta ya hUM dzAHswAh+ma/ bcom
265a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyi snying po'o// oM hriHtrai lokya bi dz+nyA ya/ a mo g+ha pA shaM ya/ a pyA tI hA tA d+hIHhUM hUM phaT swA hA/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM haM khA da b+huM dzaM swa dA ya swA hA/ rta mgrin gyi snying po'o// oM e ka dz+nyA
265a5(rgyud 'grel): TI me hA ro Sha Ni trA sa ya sa ma ya prA sa ma na hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ ral gcig ma'i snying po'o// na meHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sarba b+ha bA san+d+ha rA nA hUM phaT pa tA ya Da~MswA hA/ khro gnyer can gyi snying po'o// spros pas ting 'dzin ngal ba
265a6(rgyud 'grel): nidakyil 'khor mchog cig dri ma med// lha dang sngags sogs rnam grol ba// ye shes mchog la mnyam gnas bya// rtse gcig pa yi rnam par 'byed// bkram pa dang ni sdud pa dang // rjes 'gro lhan cig spyod pa yi// rim
265b1(rgyud 'grel): pas rdzogs par shes par bya// de ltar bsam gtan la sems rton pa'i rnal 'byor pa stong pa nyid dang snying rje chen pos yongasu zin pa'i cho ga ji srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar de srid du yongasu bsgoms nas ldang bar 'dod pa na/ bkug
265b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bskyed pa'i 'khor lo gshegs par bya ba dang / dmigs pa thim pa'i min ngag gis bzod par gsol ba dang // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gzhan du ma gyur par yongasu bsngo bar bya'o// dpal ldan ye shes 'khor lo
265b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi ni// gnas mthong bla ma'i zhal gyi drin thob nas// ji bzhin mdor bsdus sgrub thabs 'di bris pas// skye kun thugs rje che mnga' zhal mthong shog/ dpal kha sarba Ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rdzogaso// /
265b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa spyan ras dbang phyug yid bzhin nor bu la phyag 'tshalo// de nas yid bzhin nor bu dkyil 'khor 'khor lo zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o// kho na nyid thugs gsung dang sku/ yon tan phrin las dam
265b5(rgyud 'grel): tshig bcas// dpal ldan dkyil 'khor char btud de// yid bzhin nor bu'i sgrub thabs bshad// bdag nyid chen pos phun tshogs gzhir// chos kun rang bzhin nyid dran pas// snying rje las grub drang srong bskyed// hrIHyig la
265b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas ting 'dzin bsgrub// ye shes rgyal ba bcu ga na su// nyid kyi snying po las spros pas// lhar bcas gzhal yas khang bsams te// mar me las nas mar me ltar// ha hUMHhUM phaT/ 'dab brgyad shar sogs phyogs bzhi la//

266a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs rtsibs bzhi las te// dza hUM baM hoH/ dbyangs can la sogs yum mtshams bzhir// a i u ra li e o aM/ de mthar rtsibs brgyad sems ma brgyad// A I u r-I l-I aM oM aHde bzhin de mthar sems dpa' brgyad//
