266a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni mchod pa'i lha// khor yug dur khrod kun rtogs ldan// dam tshig 'khor lo zhes byang grags// de rjes dkyil 'khor chen po yi// ye shes ri mchog las bkug gzhug/ me lcong gnyis gzug sna brag cha dang // mkhar 'drar
266a6(rgyud 'grel): dag pa rtogs par bya// ji srid gnyis med mnyam 'jog pa// de srid de yod mi 'gal ba 'am// yang na ro gcig bsam gtan gnas// skyo bar gyur na gsang sngags bzlas// oM AHhrIHbadz+ra dz+nyA na tsin+ta ma Ni rat+na maN+Da la tsakra pra
266b1(rgyud 'grel): tis+thi ti hUM sarba bud+d+ha d+hA twA gan+d+he krA ya wa k+ShIt+ta gu Na karma sa ma ya pra sid+d+ha hUM/ sarba ta thA ga to dz+nyA na gan+d+he bi shud d+ha badz+ra ta tA a d+hiSh+TA na dz+wa la dza la s+pha re s+pha ra/ sarba pA pa b+hi k+ka na/ da ha da ha/ ha ra ha ra/ shan+ta ka rA ye/ hUM phaT/ swA hA/ de bzhin
266b2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs kun sgorjepo 'dis// dkyil 'khor bdag po kun mnyes byed// dad dang snying brtse bden stobs mthus// ma l+r-i sa thugs bskul 'od 'phro 'gyur// rang rang rjes mthun don bsgrub nas// sa gsum mgon po'i sras
266b3(rgyud 'grel): byu rte sa tan sbyi ga ci las rna me po kun mcho yo pa ma b+ha cos lda ba ga sbyor medang 'a bras sa gru du nas pa ba ste/ da b+h+yo mu ga kyi ma na tha thams rgyu bye ga 'as sa byang ra byar gyu sa da'i sde sa nang skye pa

267a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs phyogs dang mtshams rim bzhin// 'khor lo rin chen pad+mo las// phyogs kyi kha dog gzhon nu'i tshul// gter chen bum pa bzhis gang ba'o// A IM U aM/ de mthar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// phyogs min phyogs kyi
267a3(rgyud 'grel): kha dog can// gti mug rdo rje sgrol ma can// bag chags rdo rje rdo rje 'dzim// 'dod chags rdo rje zhags pa thogs// zhe sdang rdo rje ral gri bsnams// oM aM aM aHbyang sha ra la sogs mtshams bzhir yum// brtan pa'i rdo rje ri rab 'dzin
267a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba'i rdo rje zla ba dang // 'bar ba'i rdo rje nyi ma tsan// stobs kyi rdo rje bdun thogs// kha dog phyed gzugs sgeg mo'i tshul// ka tsa Ta ta/ khyams kyi shar sogs phyogs bzhir yang // phyog mdog gar gyis rol pa mo// rdo rje gzugs
267a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzes me long can// rdo rje sgra snyan pi wang steng // rdo rje dri mchog byug pa thogs// rdo rje ro bzangs zhal zas 'dzin// pA ya sha k+ShaHde bzhin byang shar sogs grwa bzhir// rdo rje reg ma gos mchog thogs// rdo rje chos ma chis 'byung

267b1(rgyud 'grel): tshul// de ltar kun phyag g.yon pad+mo// brtson pa'i cha byad pad zla la// rang gi sa bon las gyur mtshungs// de rjes sgyu ma ting 'dzin la// gnas nas dag pa rtogs par bya// gnas dang lus rab rnam par dag/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo
267b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes byar brjod// de bzhin lus dang sems rab dag/ nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid do// pheM pheM pheM pheM/ de nas ye shes pa kyil 'khor lha// ji bzhin bkug la mchod sogs bcas// gsol btab dam tshig mthu bskyed de// rig pa'i ting

267b4(rgyud 'grel): yis// skyo bar gyur na sbyor bral ba// shin tu dmigs med zhi ba'i rgyu// mkhas pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom// nam zhig de las ldang 'dod tshe// snying rje chen pos blo bskyed la// dpal ldan nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag/ dkyil 'khor
267b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod sogs bya phyir 'bud// bdun phrag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum// ji ste brgya 'am bdun phrag bcus// dam tshig bsam gtan ldan spyod la// dngos grubo the tshom mi bya'o// rdo rje 'dzin pas rgyud dang ni// bla ma
267b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas 'drar bshad de// rgyud bral bla ma spangs pa la// dngos grub yod par ma gsungs phyir// mtshan ma tsam mthong bdag gis 'dir// bla ma'i gsung gis rgyud don bsdus// dge 'dis 'gro kun po ta la'i// ri
268a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog nam zhig bgrod par 'gyur// dpal thugs rje chen po po ta la ke ri'i rtse mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// // 'phags pa thugs rje chen po 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// de nas 'khor lo sgyur

268b1(rgyud 'grel): ngos la nyi shu rtsa bzhis mchod pa yi// lha mo rnams dang de bzhin sgo bzhir lcags kyu zhags pa sogs dgyes rol pa'o// mu khyud khor ga bkra shis kyi// rdzas bcu grub pa nyi shus bskor// dpag med lha rdzas yo byad kyis// shin tu
268b2(rgyud 'grel): phraphun tshogs brtse ba yin// oM AHhrIHtsakra warti maN+Da la sid+d+hi phaT swA hA/ shes rab thabs byung skad cig sbyor bas bdag nyid 'khor los sgyur rgyal gsal bskyed la// snying po las 'phros lcags kyu'i zer gyis ji bzhin nyid

269a4(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa dgod par bya ste/ lha rigs rnam dag 'chi 'pho med// dbang po rdo rje gur ku ma mdog/ me tog phreng ba'i chun po 'dzin// dregs pa ma lus spangs pa'o// a lha min rnam dag 'khrugs pa med// drag po rdo rje rgya skyegs/
269a5(rgyud 'grel): mdog/ ral gri dang ni 'khor lo 'dzin// phrag dog ma lus kun spangs pa'o// oM mi dbang rnam dag brel 'phongs med// dbang phyug rdo rje rdzog sngar mdog/ rdo rje dang ni dril bu 'dzin// rnam par g.yengs pa kun sbyangs pa'o//
269a6(rgyud 'grel): u dud 'gro rnam dag blun rmongs med// seng ge rdo rje du ba'i mdog/ dgra sta dang ni dbyig pa 'dzin// bag med btul ba kun spangs pa'o// e yi dgas rnam dag ser sna med// gshin rje rdo rje char sprin mdog/ thod pa dang ni zhags
269b1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dzin// 'jungs pa'i srid pa kun spangs pa'o// oM dmyal ba rnam dag tsha grang med// 'jigs skyob rdo rje byu ru'i mdog/ bum pa dang ni lhung bzed 'dzin// mi bzang ya da kun spangs pa'o// e 'di dag ni mgo nas brtsams te g.yas
269b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i rtsibs drug gi lte bar bsgom par bya'o// dam tshig lus dang sems la ni// ye shes sku dang thugs bcu ga nas// sa bon gsung gi yi ge bzlas// tshe 'di nyid la mchog 'grub 'gyur// thugs rje chen po lus kyi 'khor
269b3(rgyud 'grel): lo 'bar ba rdzog so// // 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dag thub can la phyag 'tshalo// de nas dka' thub chen po dka' thub mnyes// zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o// 'dir 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
269b4(rgyud 'grel): phyug la dad pa thob pa'i skye bo spyan thub pa rnams kyis// dus dang cho ga'i khyad pa ral ma ltos par shin tu myur du 'gro ba bskyang bar 'dod pas// zhalo gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam bdun gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das drang
269b5(rgyud 'grel): sring chen po dka' bub yid la byed pa dang mi 'dul bas bsgrub par bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug drang srong che// mya ngan ma pa'i sdong bu'i 'gram// ming gas stan can dka' thub tshul// rgyun spangs snying rjes gdungs pa bsgom//
269b6(rgyud 'grel): mgon po'i rten ni gang yang rung // ye shes ldan de der bcug mdun/ phongs pa dag ni mya ngan gyi/ cha byad kyis slang khas phung 'jug/ lag pa gnyis mi 'gram brten cing // mi ro 'anon du nang brkyang ba// bza' btung spangs pa
270a1(rgyud 'grel): gos bral dang // mchi mas gdong khebs smre sngags brjod// spyod lam gnyis te 'bre ldog dang // ring du zag pa dor ba'o// de bzhin ngag gnyis smre sngags pa sngags// sems pa yang ni gnyis nyid// snying rjes skye bo
270a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgral pa dang // thabasu 'phags pa mthong 'dod pa'o// dzi ste smra pa la mngon+do par dga' ba zhig na sngags kyi dam tshig 'di dag kyang brjod par bya'o// na ma shrI l-ikya nA thA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ma hA satwa ma hA ka ru ni kA ya/ mA mA ta mu kaM ma hA
270a3(rgyud 'grel): duHkha ka le sha sarba a ba ra Na kha sa kha se me kha se me phaT phaT/ mA ma shI g+h+raM a nu gra ha a nu gre ha hUM hUM yid la byed pa gzhan gtang ste/ lha mchog sems pa gcig pu yis// skye bo nyon mongs gzings 'di dag/ zhi bar bya phyir
270a4(rgyud 'grel): smyung bar gnas// yun rings phan pa'i don mthong nas// cung zad bde ba ci dga' rung // sems can tsho gso mang don du ni// bdag gi sa dka' thub bzod par byos// bag med lus dang sems 'di ni// gnod par byed kyis phan mi
270a5(rgyud 'grel): mi byed// de ring dka' thub spyad pa yis// lus can kun gyi don smra 'o// ji ltar dgra po khros pa la'ang // thal sbyar snying rje skye 'gyur na// thugs rje che mnga' 'gro don sdod// bdag la ji ltar gzigs mi 'gyur// de ltar bstan pa brjod
270a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas// nyin 'ga' sbyang bar spyod na de// dngos dang gzugs brnyan rmi lam du// 'phags pa nges par rje su 'dzin// thugs rje chen po dka' thub can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs rtag pa'i
270b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor la phyag 'tshalo// de nas spyi gtsug cod pan rtag tu 'dzin zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o// 'jig rten mgon po 'jig rten gyi// rtsa lag gcig pu la btud de// de snying cod pan gtsug tor gyi// rnal 'byor
270b2(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bdag gis bshad// dben pa'i gnas 'dug 'khor ba'i me 'obs 'bar ba dang // bde ba'i rkyen tshogs yid skyo mngon dga' drag po yis// thar pa'i grong khyer rdul bral skyed mos tshal bzang du// zhugs nas rjes 'jug
270b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ba dam pas sems dul byas// de nas rnal 'byor zhi ba 'dis// blo ldan rgyud rab brlan gyur pa// de nyid rjes thogs dpal gsum gyi// cho ga dam pa bsgom par bya// e ma'o spyi gtsug rin chen khang // bkru shis
270b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten dri ma med// thub pa stong gis spras pa'i sgo// mgon po nyid kyi se dbus mdzes pa'o// 'dam skyes dmar 'dab stong gi snying // a stong de dbus sems yig hUM// 'od gsal dkar 'khyil rnam par 'phro// bum
270b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mur me 'bar ba bzhin// de bzhin lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus// nyi ma 'am zla ba la gnas pa'i// rlong gi rgyal po me yaM dbus// bde ba'i chus brlan mkhregs pa 'i sa// rnam dag rnam par 'phral pa'i rgyu// 'byung
270b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i rang bzhin raM yig bsam// de las 'od 'phros ca reg 'dis// rtsa mchog 'dis brgyud skyob pa yis// thugs reg thugs bskul thugs byung ba'i// byin brlabs zhi byed dag byed dang // dri ma med byed 'od 'phro byed// rnam
271a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bdud rtsi'i rgyan dbang bya// gang tshe ye shes mchog 'di babs gyur pa// de tshe mi g.yo 'od gsal rnam par dag/ kun 'byung mtsho chen nyid 'od sgron mchog dang // na mkha'i yid bzhin nor bu ji bzhino// pade chen
271a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyisu med nyid la// ji srid bzod par nus ri srid// mnyam par gzhag bya mig nas na// de tshe dge tshogs dpag med bsgrub// dpal thugs rje chen po rtag tu bya ba'i rnal 'byor rdzogs so// // dpal spyan ras gzigs
271a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug bla ma'i rnam par snang ba la phyag 'tshalo// de nas bla ma 'gro ba'i dges// zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o// srid dang bzhi pa 'di dang de bzhin tshe rabs gzhan pa'i bde legs dang // dngos grub mchog
271a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub yid bzhin nor 'dra phyogs bcu dus gsum gshegs pa yi// bla ma rnams kyi bsgrub pa'i snying dbus dri med ye shes mchog gzhug phyir// spyi gtsug gdan la nyin mtshan rgyun du brtan bzhugs byin brlabs mdzod
271a5(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rab skom cing // bde chen snying dkyil sad mdzad pa// skul ldan ston pa rdo rje can// bla ma btud de de bsnyen bshad// re zhig sgrub po pos skyabasu 'gro ba dang // sems bskyod pa rab tu nges par byas nus//
271a6(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba bla ma dam pa kho na yin no zhes rtse gcig tu rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis// kun nas dang ba'i rlan phun sum tshogs pa las byang chub kyi sems rin po che'i ljon
271b1(rgyud 'grel): pa legs par bskyed de/ yid dang rjes mthun la sogs sam// ci rigs pa yi ga na su ni// dad ldan rnams kyi dngos grub rtsa// dpal ldan bla ma bsgrub par bya// tha mal lus kyi cod pan rtser// rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin dbang po// longs
271b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod rdzogs sku gsal bar blta// de yi thugs ni ye shes hUM/ snying gi pad+mo 'dab stong dbus// bdag gi skyong pa mi dbang pos/ gcer bu rus pa'i rkyen ldan po// skyil krung 'dzum zhal bsgom par bya// 'dab stong lce la sangs rgyas
271b3(rgyud 'grel): sdong // ze 'bru khyad skor nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bskor ba// mkha' la zla dkar lhor gsal sprul// de'i rjes la spyi bo'i gcig gi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs kA'i thang so nas mdun du 'dom gang mngon
271b4(rgyud 'grel): bapapa gzhal ba'i na mkha' la rang gi rje su 'dzin pa'i yi ma gyi lha bsgom par bya'o// de'i thugs ni rang gi sa bon no// oM gyis sna grangs pa'i a li dang / AHsa sna grangs pI kA lI dang / hUM gis sna grangs pa'i lha'i sngags
271b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams phreng ba'i tshul du gshibs pas mtha' bskor ba'o// de nas bdun rnam par dag pas mchod la// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ltos pa nye bar dor ba'i sgo nas skyibasu bzung zhing 'di ltar mthong ba'i 'khor ba'i 'jigs
271b6(rgyud 'grel): pas skrag pa la sogs pas rten la mi phyed pa'i dang pa drag po dang / 'dun pa dang / mngon par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mi gtong ba'i blos gsol ba gangang par bya'o// ji snyed mchod pa rab 'byam na mkha'i mthas klas sa
272a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gang bar gyur pa dang // bstod dbyangs sbyin pa sna tshogs rgyal ba mnyes 'gyur 'gro ba'i don bsgrub dngos gang yin// 'di dag byas la mi bzad gdungs pa yang ni rdo rje 'dzin dang yid kyi lha// skyabs mchog
272a2(rgyud 'grel): nges bya nga yis mi gtong thugs rje'i lcags kyus cha mo tshom med par 'dzin par bsam// de nas lha yi sa bon dang // yi ge'i phreng ba las byung ba// gsal zhing dri med rnon po yi// 'od zer gyis ni spyi bor dgye// byin gyis brlab
272a3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di yi mthus// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs bskul zhing // de las thur du lhung ba'i 'od// bdag snying bla ma la reg 'gyur// de rjes skyob pa las spros zer// lha yi thugs kar dad pa yi// tshwa zer yong ni rab tu spro// de nas byin
272a4(rgyud 'grel): brlabs thag gu yi// brgyus pa'i ye shes yig phreng dag/ lha yi smani mtshams nas byung ba// spyi bo'i skyob pa'i tshangs bug nas// zhugs gyur thugs gtams bdag gi bar// de ltar yis kyi 'od kyi rgyan babs pas bdag
272a5(rgyud 'grel): gi rgyud la de kho na nyid rnam par nges pa 'di lta ste/ gnyug ma nyid dang / rang grol ba nyid dang / lhun gyis grub pa ces bya ba'i don gsum gyis lus dang sems rab tu gang ba'i ye shes dam pa gang yin pa mngon du bltas
272a6(rgyud 'grel): la/ yi ge de dang de dag nyid gsal bar bklag pa ma yongs par bya ba ni thabs yino// de yis slob dpon sku gang ba// lhag gyur rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spro// de las de bzhin nyan thos sogs// phyi rol srid thar spro bar
272b1(rgyud 'grel): bya// sna tshogs mdzad pa ma lus pa// phrin las bye ba phrag brgya yis// 'gro ba'i don bsgrub brtser bcas pa// skal ldan rnams kyi blo gros las// mdun gyi spyi bo'i lha la bsdus pa las// rtag tu dran pa'i rgyu mi
272b2(rgyud 'grel): brjed pa'i gzungs nye bar gzhag pa yongasu bsam zhing // de las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bla ma lta dang byacus pa'i grub pa'i rgyur rnam par 'phang bar bya'o// dpal 'jig rten mgon po bsgrub pa'i
272b3(rgyud 'grel): man ngagra rdzogs so// // dpal thugs rje chen po mchod sbyin gyi dbang po la phyag 'tshalo// de nas gtso bo mchod bya mchod sbyin ba zhes// zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan
272b4(rgyud 'grel): ras gzigs dpal nyid// gtsor bcas sangs rgyas sras ban+d+ha sa la// dad pas skyobasu song nas ni// snying rje chen pos gAtor ma sbyin// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor pas// lce dang log pa snod dang bcu do//
272b5(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags rgyal pos byin brlabs la// gzo bsgyid zab cing rgya ches mchod// hrIHAHhUMHa A I I u A/ r-i r-I la l-I/ e aM/ oM au aM iHlce byin gyis baR+Sha baM pa'o// A a hrIM hUM/ ka kha ga
272b6(rgyud 'grel): g+ha pa/ tsa cha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta br-i Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pheM ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ lag pa byin gyis brlabi pa'o// hUM ka tsa Ta ta pa ya Sha k+Sha/ bcud byin gyis brlab pa'o// oM AHhUHbaM hoH
273a1(rgyud 'grel): gzi byin bskyed pa'o// oM a kA ro mu khaM sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma NAMHA d+ha nud+g+han+ta twAt+tA bi shud+d+ha swA hA/ zab par bsgrub pa'o// oM A hIHs+yArba ta thA ga to a d+hiSh+mA na sarba pU dza me g+hA swa mu dra s+phA ra Na badz+ra mU tra dr-i D+harmA/
273a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya che bar bsgrub pa'o// oM IHhrIHshrI lo ka nU tha sar+b+ba bud d+hi bo d+hi satwa sa ka laM aSh+NI de ba tai sarbaM d+harmA pU la puSh+TaM d+hU paM/ dI paM gan+d+haM nAM bi byaM/ shap+sA/ maN+Da la/ bi l-i ta/ kha khaM khA hi khA hi/ sarba gardza pa ri pu d+yaM/ ma ma
273a3(rgyud 'grel): rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hU~M phaT swA hA/ dbul ba dang las btsal ba'i sngags so// dpag med 'jig rten mgon 'khor lo// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pas// legs bskor 'od zer lcags sbubs kyis// bdud rtsi'i gtor
273a4(rgyud 'grel): ma bzhes par 'gyur// thugs rje chen po'i gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// // thugs rje chen po rnam par skyo ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dkyil 'khor bzang po dges pa po zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs
273a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad par bya'o// dkyil 'khor bzang po'i sa nyid dang // rin chen rang bzhin ngos mnyam la// dri zhim pa yi byug pas phyug/ mu tig me tog nor bu dgod// dbu su 'dab brgyad 'dab bzhi yi// me tog
273a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po sa bon can// gzhag la de steng thub pa bzhugs// gdugs dkar gyis ni steng nas dpung // sgrub po pad+ma'i phreng ba yi// nga rgyal 'dzin pas rdo rje lag/ gnyis gshibs gyen du bskyod pa'i rgyas// sa
273b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gtso blo sbar bar bya// rab tu dbyibs legs kha dog mdzes// dri ba su ro mchog reg bzang ba'i// mye tog spangs pas go rims bzhin// gling sogs bkod pa ji bzhin brtag/ oM AHbadz+ra tsa tur+t+ti ba hUM/ oM A/
273b2(rgyud 'grel): badz+ro pa yaSh+Ta dI pa hUM oM AHbadz+ra Sh+Ta rat+na hUM/ oM A badz+ra Sh+Ta maM ga la hUM/ oM AHbadz+ra sid+d+ha bi shwa ti hUM/ oM AHsUr+ya tsan+d+ra hUM/ rnam dag zhing du phun tshogs gling dang rin chen dang / bkra shis grub pa ri ma gsum phreng ba
273b3(rgyud 'grel): legs bkod la// gsal byed sgron mi 'bar ba gnyis kyis brgyun gyur pa// sngags 'ching rdo rje rol pa'i bar gyis bstobs pas dbul// de nas lus can thams cad la// 'jig rten mgon po nyer 'khor gzugs
273b4(rgyud 'grel): dpag med rnam par 'phrul pa yi sa// zhing rnams kun tu yog don spyod// ji srid snying po byang chub par// de dag nam yang yang 'dren pa'i mthus// ngan 'gro'i sgra yang mi grag cing // rtag tu dga' sgyid 'tsho bar byed// gal
273b5(rgyud 'grel): tAM blo gsal spobs spyod na// sku gsum la sogs gang bshad pa// cho ga de dag bzlas pa yang // gdon mi za bar bya ba nyid// gang tshe bsdu bar 'dod pa ma// sre gol brdabs pasI sbyar byas lo// bzod par gsol dang
273b6(rgyud 'grel): smon lam gdab// dran pa'i rgya yis gzungs bya ba// thugs rje chen po'i meN+Dal gyi cho ga rdzogs so// // dpal thugs rje chen po po'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la phyag 'tshalo// dngos grub
274a1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi rgyur gyur pa// sgrub po la pan+da byed pa'i thabs// mchod sprin rgyal mtshan rtse mo yis// bsam myi khyab byed mchod pa pri// me tog bdug pa mar me dri// zhal zas rol mo maN+Da la rdzas// 'byor pa'i khyad par
274a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis bkod de// nyid kyi nga rgyal gyis byi na brlab// oM badz+ra puSh+pe AHhUM/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe AHhUM/ oM badz+ra dI paM AHhUM/ oM badz+ra gan+d+haM AHhUM/ oM badz+ra naM bi d+ye AHhUM/ oM badz+ra shab+da AHhUM/ oM badz+ra maN+Da la AHhUM/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
274a3(rgyud 'grel): can gyi// sna tshogs mchod rdzas bsum mi khyab// rgyal mtshan rtse mo 'i rig pa yi// sprul nas 'phags tshigs mchod par bya/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka puSh+pa pu dzaM me g+ha sa mu dra ke tu ra dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra
274a4(rgyud 'grel): hA te sa mya ki saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puSh+pe/ puSh+paM/ puSh+pe/ u pa b+hA be/ puSh+pa a waM kI ra na swA h+ma/ me tog dbul ba'i sngag so// de bzhin du/ d+hU pa dang / dI ba dang / gan+d+ha dang / na bid+ya dang / shap+da dang / maN+Da la zhes bya ba la sbyar ba'i rim
274a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis bdug pa dang mar me dang / dri chab dang / zhal zas dang / rol mo dang / maN+Dal dbul bar bya'o// gos bzang gyon cing brgyan bzang btag sa// yi ge gsum dang ldam pa yi// rdo rje'i glu gar sngon song bas// sangs rgyas la
274a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs ma chod par bya// bang ga nyid sprin rgya mtsho yi// dbus bzhugs mchod kun la mnga' brnyes// mgon po 'khor los sgyur rgyal tshul// rgyal mtshan rtse mo gser mdog bskyed// ye shes snying po las byung ba'o// sna tshogs
274b1(rgyud 'grel): lha mo mdzes rnams kyis// re re lus kyang dpag tu med// sprul pas rim gro rdzogs par blta// mi phyed gus pa mang yod pas// gzungs 'di lan gsum cho ga 'dis// nyin re dus gsum mchod byed na// bye ba bsam mi khyab
274b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod 'gyur// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// // de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs smon lam gyi dbang po la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal sras rnams kyis bsgrub pa ni// sems can rnams la
274b3(rgyud 'grel): phran brtson pas// smon lam rgya mtsho spyod pa'i phyir// de yi dbang gyur 'di bshad bya// sngon nas bsnyen pa'i rim pa la// 'dris 'gyur snying rjes yid gdungs pa// mig dang smin mtshams snying dkyil du// byams sogs
274b4(rgyud 'grel): thig le gsum bsgom bya// nyi ma'i 'od dang zlo ba'i 'od// de ni thugs rje mi phyeng 'od// lus can rnams kyi snying dang ni// nyon mongs me l-I de nang gnas// de bzhin spyi gtsug grangs bzhin du// pad+ma zlum dang re rdo rje// gang
274b5(rgyud 'grel): skye bo don tshol ba dang / don myi tshol ba gcig dang mang po yang rung ste/ bdag gi dbang po'i spyod yul du 'bab pas lA la sbyar du rung bar gyur pa dang / cho ga 'das rnal 'byor du byas la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
274b6(rgyud 'grel): lo gsol ba btab ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su myur ba kho nar sems can khyed cag bdag gi smin pa'i gdul byar gyur cig ces smon lam btab la// nyi 'od thig les de dag pad+ma kha phye nas// zla 'od can gyis gdung ba
275a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi par bya// mi phyed zer gyis lus bkang rdo rje'i rgyus btab la// ci dgar khyed spyong ma lus myu ra du bdag gis bsgral// de rjes chos dang zang zing sbyin// mgu byA kun gyis sems bkug nas// glang chen myos
275a2(rgyud 'grel): la lcags kyu bzhin// mkhas pas 'gro ba dbang du bya// me tog la sogs bzlas gtor ba 'am// yang na lag pa rkang pa reg/ yun ring dmigs ltas mda' bsnun pa 'o ma// bdag nyid chen po thabs la mkhas// khab rnams kyis
275a3(rgyud 'grel): ni kha ba len dang // bung ba rnams kyis me tog bzhin// de ni mi 'dod nyin gcig kyang // dbang med skye bo 'du bar 'gyur// smon lam du bya ba rdzogs so// / dpal bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba mnyes pa la phyag 'tshalo// spyan ras
275a4(rgyud 'grel): gzigs dpal bdud rtsi brnyes// bza' dang bca' dang myang ba sman// btung ba sna tshogs nyid mchod bzhes// skal ldan byin gyis rlob par bshad// dus dang dus mtshams dga' ston dus// bza' dang bza' mon bza' min bza'
275a5(rgyud 'grel): yin te// rnal 'byor rgyal po dam tshig spyo// rab gus mchod byed sbyin la brtson// skad cig dran pas lhar bskyed nas// bzhi pa'i yi ge sbyor ba yis// mgrin pa lce stengs byin brlabs la// a dang ka phreng gnyis med pa'u// sgron ma gnyis
275a6(rgyud 'grel): steng rdo rje 'chang // de bzhin seng ge rnam po sgyings gnyis// rgyur byas thabs dang shes rab bskyed// phreng ba gnyis kyang dgod par bya// ka pA la sogs pad+ma can// sna tshogs bza' bas bkang byas la// snod bcud sbyang dang gzi bskyed
275b1(rgyud 'grel): bas// gya nom gyur pa rnal 'byor tshogs// oM AHhrIHbaM ho/ dri bsal spyod byed bdud rtsir byed// phun sum tshogs dang dges byed pa// dam tshig phyag rgya rnam pa lnga// 'od kyi sbyor bas rnam par rtsen// dpag med bdag lus
275b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la// bsam mi khyab sbrul rtsi yis mtshon// lus lnga dag ni bsgrub pa'i phyir// sgrub pa pos ni mchod par bya// oM AHhrIMHshI lo ka nA tha sarba bud+d+ha bo d+h+waM sa b+hu pad+ma bi shud+d+ho a mr-i te rA dza b+ha k+Sha ta kha kha khA hi khA hI/ a ne ka/
275b3(rgyud 'grel): satwa rA sa ma ya sid+d+hi sma ra sma ra hUM hUM hUM swA hA// zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod paso// de nas lhag ma bsdus lnga gtor ma bya'o// bdag lus rdo rje spyan ras gzigs// phung po sangs rgyas rnam pa lnga// bde chen gnyis med phyag
275b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya che// dpal po rnam par rol pa yi ni// oM AHhrIHoM U e o oMHma hA su kha badz+ra da tA sarba dz+nyA na swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha ho ho hau zhes glu blang bar bya'o// dpal spyan ras gzigs bdud rtsi brnyes pa'i zas kyi cho ga rdzogaso// /
275b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gi lus la lhag par chags// nad ni rnam pa ming ldan pa 'am// yang na bsod namaso tshogs don gnyer// des ni lus sbyin cho ga brnam// re zhig longs
275b6(rgyud 'grel): spyod dang lus lo rmi lam dang sgyu ma lta bur rtogs shing 'du byed thams cad dri za'i grong khyer ram// mtshon che'i sbyor ba lte bur yongasu shes pas// thog ma kho nar mchod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa ni// rnal 'byor
276a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi lus nye bar sbyin pa 'di'o// de lngas yang rang nyid bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs rnam par dkar pa 'od zer bcu drug gi rnam pa can du bsgom par bya'o// de'i thugs ni hrIHkun da lta bu'o//
276a2(rgyud 'grel): de las byung ba'i 'od zer 'bor ba'i gzi brjid kyis gdug pa can 'dul ba'o// lte bar raM da mar po lngas skyes pa'i me yi phreng ba gsal kyi 'khor lo can no// de bzhin thugs kar yang a dkar po las skyes
276a3(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs kyi 'khor lo yang ngo // mi dang lha dbang klu rgyal gyi// mgo gsum sgyed bu'i steng du ni// lha yi smin mtshams byung ba'i// pha ti kA yi gri gug gis// bdag gi thod phyed bcangs nas ni// phru ba'i tshul du dgab
276a4(rgyud 'grel): por bya// lha yi lte dbus raM yig las// maM lce bskyod la spar bar bya// de yi nang du bdag nyid lus// gcer bu cog krung 'dug pa yin// gnas gsum yi ge gsum bsams la// khu ba dmar pos bzhu bar
276a5(rgyud 'grel): bya 'bru gsum lan gsum brjod pa yis// dag par byas dang bdud rtsir bya// phun tshogs dgyes pa'i rgyu bsams te// thugs ka'i hrIHlas bdud rtsi dgug/ dam tshig ye shes 'dres 'gyur ba// rdo rje kha phye'i
276a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dang // oM AHbadz+ra kA ya shud+d+ha bi shud+d+ha ka ro mu khaM oM mr-i ta sa b+hA wa ma hA ba li ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM kha kha khA hi khA hI/ sarba sa twAr+tha haM// sngags 'di lan gsum bar du dbul mgron gsum
276b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor cho gas so// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI mi tra'i gdams pa/ lus sbyin pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// // thugs rje chen po rgyan gyi phreng ba can lnga phyag 'tshalo// snying rje chen po can gyi rnal 'byor pas/
276b2(rgyud 'grel): yi dgos la sogs pa phongs pa rnams la chu'i sbyin pa byin pa la brtson par bya ste/ rgyu gcig sngon du song pa yis// 'phags pa nyid ni dran byas la// mgrin pa lag pa 'khor lor bcas// rdzogs pa'i sbyor
276b3(rgyud 'grel): bas rdzogs par byas// phyag g.yas zla dbus ye shes can// a phreng gis bskor gsol ba yi// ming med rtse nas mi 'gyur bdun// 'bab pa bdud rtsi'i rgyun rab mdzag/ pad+ma rgyas btab rin chen snod// bsil/
276b4(rgyud 'grel): zhim dngas pas bkang ba'i chu// pad+ma'i mtshol tshwar rgyun bzhin// ye shes bdud rtsir 'bab pas bskye// 'jungs pa'i mya ngan rgud pa yi// gzugs can ji snyed 'jig rten rgyu// ngo snying phyag mthil 'od zer gyi// mdu
276b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma ra sa gzhi gang byur bya// oM AHhrIHmahA kA rA Ni ka pr-i sA da sarba pre ta pra t+yAd ta shI g+h+nAM dza dzA dza de rjes 'od zer skur mda' yi// sngags dang phyag rgya gsal ba yis// ma lus lce la 'bar ba yi// sbubs bsams yi ge
276b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi brjod sbyin// oM AHhrIHhUM/ zas kyi bdud rtsis tshim byas nas// gnas gyur lha lus thob pa ni// bde gshegs bka' yi tshig sbyin pas// dub pa'i sems kyang tshim par bya// mthar ni smon lam gyis smin pa #
277a1(rgyud 'grel): byar byas pa la lam bstan pa'i phyag rgyas bka' bsgo la ci bde ba re dengs su gzhug/ chu sbyin gyi cho ga rdzogs so// // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs mchod sbyin mang po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo//
277a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas snying rje chen po can chu gdor gyi mchod sbyin la mngon par dga' bas gang na ri dang thang dang 'bab chu dang ne'u gsing dang / lha khang dang phug la sogs pa ci rigs pa'i gan suM yo byad phun sum tshogs par byas nas
277a3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i yid dang ldan pas 'dug ste/ gsum la skyabs song nas brtsams te/ byang chub mchog tu sems gzung bar// byams sogs tshangs pa'i gnas bcas pas// nges par byas te cho ga brtsam// thams cad stong pa nyid
277a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyings las// pad+ma zla dbus sa bon mtshan// yongs gyur sbyar bas lha mchog bskyed// phyag rgya sngags kyis yongs dag cing // rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba// gnyis brkyang gung mo mdzub gnyis mdung // mthe bong
277a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje pan sbyar la// spyi gtsug steng du gsal gzhag ste// ni maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ badz+roSh+T+r-i ShA hU~M hUM/ zhes bya bas gtsug tor gsal bar bya'o// rdo rje thal mo gnyis sbyar la// gung mo gnyis brkyang srin lag mdzub
277a6(rgyud 'grel): rtse sbyar phan tshun 'khyod bskor nas// gtsug tor steng du gsal byas nas// oM AHhri badz+ra a mr-i te pa s+thi ti hUM hUM/ zhes bya bas 'od dpag med kyi cod pan bsgrub par bya'o// klu mchog chos 'chang las skyes pa/
277b1(rgyud 'grel): gung mo dang ni mthe bong gnyis// gshibs brkyang rtse mo lhan cig pa// dmigs la nye bur btud nas ni// oM AHhrIHbadz+ra dz+nyA na tsak+Shu pra sa ka sa hUM/ zhes bya bas ye shes kyi spyan dang ldan pas gsal bar bya'o// lag gnyis mnyam
277b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thal sbyar bas// mdzub gnyis gung mo la mdud cing // mtheb gnyis gung mo la btud nas// lus kun kun tu bskor myul bas// oM AHhrIHbadz+ra naM badz+ra tsakr-i b+ha wa ke pa Ta hUM zhes byas pas rdo rje zhu blabs kyi go
277b3(rgyud 'grel): bgo bar bya'o// de rjes rnam dag chos nyid rgyu dang na mkha' mdzod dang bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang // shugs chen skar mnga' dbang du byed bshang rgyal ba spyan ras gzigs dbang rgya// sngags bcas grangs kyi dri bral bsam yas
277b4(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i mtsho chen sbyin 'khrigs dang // dpag myed lus kyis phun tshogs mchod sbrul ma lus ci rigs dgos dgur+ya mchod// oM swa b+hA wa bI shud+d+ha sarba d+har+m+ma sU b+ha ba bi shud+d+ho haM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ bI shwa mu khe b+h+ya/
277b5(rgyud 'grel): sarba b+hU khaM ut+se s+phA ra NaM hi mo ga ga na khaM swA hUM/ oM AHmu tA grAr+N+Na la ha na ha na hUM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki taM/ oM saM b+hA rA saM b+hA ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA naM a pa l-i ki ti sa man+ta s+phA ra NA rasmai b+hA ba sa ma ya ma hU~M ma Ni du ru du rA
277b6(rgyud 'grel): ya dz+wa la ni hU~M/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM gra hi shwa ri pre b+hA ba dze tau ma hA sa ma ya swA hA/ na ma sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya swa ra shrI a ba l+li ti ma hA a d+hiSh+ThA na dz+wa la dz+wa la nA nAM pu dza me g+ha s+pha ra Na hUM/ paM las pad snod rgya chen ni/
278a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bru gsum las gyur sna tshogs bcud // zab cing rgya che'i sngags phyag rgyas// byin brlabs de steng sman shing bskyed// a dang ka sogs las grub pa// grub pa nyi shu sogs rdzas kyis// legs spras dam tshig gtor
278a2(rgyud 'grel): ma la// ye shes bstims la ji bzhin mchod// dpal ldan thugs rje che stobs mthus// srid zhu yon tan phan 'dogs dang // snying rje'i gnas gyur ltos chags mgron// tshim byed ma chod sbyin 'di rab bsngags// dpal thugs rje chen
278a3(rgyud 'grel): bo'i cha ba gtor gyi tshig rdzogs so// / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug me dpung 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal// bsod nams ye shes tshogs myur du// dngos grub byed dong zang zing rnyed// gzi brjid bskyang dang mthu
278a4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed dang // sdig 'joms bya phyir me dpung mchod// dam tshig can gyi sngon du lha 'dris par byas nas nags dben par song ste// khru bzhi pa dang khwa do dang // khru gang pa dang mtho gang ba'i tshad kyi shing bu bzang po bsrung ba blangs te/ sems can
278a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la byams pa dang lhan cig pa'i dad pa drag pos mchod pa'i yid ma brjed par byas la/ ji tsam rig par mchod rten gyi gzugs lta bur brtsig go// ji skad zhi ba'i sbyin sreg tu// gang gsungs sreg rdzas mchod pa'i rkyen// de dag
278a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'di shes bya// khyad par du ni rab bsngags brgyad// sa yi bdag po'i yo byad rung ba sna tshogs phye mar byas pa dang // dbang phyug rnams kyi 'bru nor dang ni de bzhin tshong dus chen po'i sa// gzi ldan mthu chen sgra dang sen mo'i
278b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho ba'i dang por byas pa'i phung // rang nyid lus skyes dri ma sna tshogs phun sum tshogs min ling ga'o// de la thog ma kho nar mye sbar ba dang cho ga ji lta ba bzhin byas te/ 'bar ba'i dbus su ye shes kyi lha spyan drungs te/ mchod pa dang bstod
278b2(rgyud 'grel): pa sngon du 'gro bsngo bsreg rdzas dbul zhing rab tu bsngags pa'i chus yang dang yang du khrus gsal ba dang bsangs gtor bya'o// de nas yang mchod pa la sogs pa thams cad byas te glu dang gar dang rol mo la sogs pa btab cing pi wang
278b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgreng pa dang lhan cig tu man ngag dang ldan pas phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i ling ga bsregs la sngags bzla'o// AM AMHhiHa ki ni dz+wa lA dza la ma hA dza g+hA dro// ma ma ta mu gaM las che ge mo thams cad sid+d+hi sid+d+ha ma hA ka ru Ni ka ho// zhes bya
278b4(rgyud 'grel): bas so// me dpung 'bar ba spyan ras gzigs dbang mi yi las// mchod pa gang brnyes zhal gcig phyag gnyis dza ka'i mdog/ shin tu gzib rjing sgrub pa'i bsod nams sgrub brtson pa// yid bzhin nor bu me thab g.yas g.yon 'dzin
278b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// de yi las bsgrub mo yi bu zhes bya ba'i lha// rkang pa gnyis bteg dga' ba'i gzi mdangs dkar dmar mdog/ rin chen phreng thogs nyid kyi thugs ka las 'ongs nas// sbyin bdag mdun sdong don kun nges par bsgrub pa'o// sras
278b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas lha mchog me lha gnyis// mnyes gyur rmi lam nang du ston// de nas gshegs gsol thal ba bsdus// dpung pa g.yas su bdugs par bya// thugs rje chen po me yi lha// de yi nyin mo tshur bcas la// rtag tu bu sdug lta bur ni// dgongs
279a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur 'dod pa thams cad bsgrub// me'i mchod pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// / thugs rje chen po sku gsung thugs ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa la phyag 'tshalo// de nas sku gzugs kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/
279a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma mthong ba'i sgrub pa pos dam tshig sbyangs te/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku la bdar ba'i chus lus bkrus la gnas phun sum tshogs par bdag gi ltos pa dor bas brtsa mo// rgyu dang ngo bo kha dog dang // rab tu gnas pa rnam
279a3(rgyud 'grel): par dang // yon tan dang ni 'phrin las rgyun// brgyad po la ni cho ga brgyud// thugs dang sku dang gsung nyid dang // ye shes dang ni de kho na// lha ni yi ge lngar bcas la// gzhan gsum rang bzhin yi ge gsum// hUM oM AHhriHhe ho phaT swAhA/
279a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jim pa dang rdo dang shing dang ras dang rus pa dang rtsig ngos dang rin pa che la sogs pa'i rgyu rnams ni rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi pad+mo'i dbus kyi hUM rdo rje sems dpa' las 'phros pa'i thugs rdo rje'i rdul phra rab kyis ga
279a5(rgyud 'grel): zhing gtams par bya'o// zhi ba dang khro ba dang tshul gnyis pa la sogs pa'i sku gzugs kyi ngo bo rnams ni 'khor lo son dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi 'dab mo'i dbus kyi oM 'khor lo sems dpa' las 'phros pa'i sku thugs rje
279a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rol pas rab tu brjid pa'i bdag nyid du bya'o// dkar ba dang dmar ba dang ser ba dang ljang khu la sogs pa'i kha dog rnams ni pad+ma can dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi 'dab ma'i dbus kyi a pad+mo'i sems dpa' las
279b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pa'i gsung nye bar bkod pas shin tu khyab par bya'o// ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa mkhyen pa me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes rnams ni rin chen 'dzin dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi pad+mo yi dbus kyi hriHrin chen sems
279b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' lus 'phros pa'i ye shes chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par byang chub par bya'o// dag pa dang dri ma med pa dang ye shes chen po'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa rnams ni sna tshogs spyod dbang dbang phyug gi nga rgyal
279b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis snying gi pad+mo'i dbus kyi ho// sna tshogs sems dpa' las 'phros pa'i rnam par dag pa mthar son par bya'o// de'i 'og tu bral ba dang phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams ni sgo gsung thugs ye shes kho na
279b4(rgyud 'grel): lnga po nyid gnyis med dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi pad+mo'i dbus kyi ho gnyis med sems dpa' las 'phros pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// lhun gyis grub dang rgyun mi 'chad pa la sogs pa'i
279b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phrin las rnams ni sku gsung thugs ye shes de kho na lnga po nyid rang byung ba'i dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi pad+mo'i dbus kyi phaT rang byung sems dpa' las 'phros pa'i 'phrin las rtog tu rtsol ba mi mnga' bar
279b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa rnam par 'phrul bar bya'o// sgrub pa po dang rjesu 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rgyun rnams ni sku gsung thugs de ye shes de kho na lnga po nyid nye bar sbyor ba'i dbang phyug gi nga rgyal gyis snying gi pad+mo'i dbus kyi swA hA nye
280a1(rgyud 'grel): par sbyor ba'i sems dpa' las 'phros pa'i rgyun na mkha' ji srid par sbyor ba dbang du 'gyur bar bya'o// rang rang cho ga rjes mthun pas// ji ltar bsgrub pa dga' bzhin du// dka' yang skyo ba med spyod na// mi de
280a2(rgyud 'grel): myur du dngos grub byed// gang zhig gang gi don 'dod pas// lhag mos rab tu snying brtses 'jug/ de dag rang bzhin stong zhid shes// brtul po 'phags skyes phyir mi ldog/ sku gzugs kyi cho ga rdzogs so//
280a3(rgyud 'grel): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzi brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// 'jig rten mgron po mnyes byas pa 'am// mnyes 'dod drad pa thob pas kyang // mang po'i spyod yul 'gyur ba ra ni// mchod rten la sogs brtsam par bya// gzi
280a4(rgyud 'grel): brjid rgyal po zhal gcig pa 'am// yang na dpag tu ming zhal phyag/ bsam gyis mi khyab spyan mnga' ba// bsod nams bsgrub phyir spyan drangs mchod// bdag nyid hrIHyig las skyes pa'i// rtsa ba'i rgya lnga ba gang bsgoms pa/ de
280a5(rgyud 'grel): yis byini brlabs dbang bskur nas// rgya mtsho la ni chur rgyan bzhin// 'jim pa la sogs yo byad la// rdo rje 'bar bas pa gegs bsal te// rig pa'i rgyal pos gabyi bskyed lo// rnal 'byor ldan pa'i byin gyis brlab// oM AH
280a6(rgyud 'grel): hrIHsarba a b+hi ka naM ha ra ha ra pra ha ra hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM AHhrI sarba d+har+m+ma nirma la bi shud+d+ha swa b+ha wa sarba ma hA g+hu na a nu ban+di ta ye swA hA/ oM AHhUMHhoHde nas rten la tshogs bsags te// stong pa nyid dang bsam maM khyab/
280b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dgongs mdzad pur// sngags pas mchod rte nu bzhengs par bya// o na mo b+ha ga wa te/ lo kri shwa ra ya/ pU d+hA rA dzA ya/ ta thA gra tA ya/ aR+YA de/ samyak+kham+mad+b+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM su k+Sh+me su k+Sh+me sa me sa ma ya/ shAn+te/
280b2(rgyud 'grel): dIn+te/ sa ma ro pe/ a nA laM/ ta raM be/ ya shro wa taM/ ma hA te dzaHnI ra ku li/ nir bA na/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a d+hiSh+ThA na/ a tiSh+Thi te swA hA/ gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i gzungs 'di brgya rtsa brgya de bzlas shing las la 'jug pas bcom ldan
280b3(rgyud 'grel): 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug dran pa dang / mi 'bral bar byed na/ des ji srid yo byad la gnas pa'i rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi mchod rten sku gzugs byas par 'gyu ro// de rjes gzi brjid nyid dpal gyis// ye shes spros
280b4(rgyud 'grel): la rab gnas bya// na mkha' ji srid bzhugs gsol nas// bzod par gsol to mchod pas mchod// sgra gzugs dang mchod rten gyi cho ga rdzogs so// / bcom ldan 'das ye shes 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal//
280b5(rgyud 'grel): theg pa mchog zhugs de nyid ye shes ma mthong dang // mthong ba ji srid rnal du mi gnas res 'ba' nying // de bzhin rnam g.yengs thibs por gyur dang mthar mi 'gro// blo gros lam ltos de dag las 'phags 'dir bshad bya//
280b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag lus spyi gtsug cod pan la// dpal ldan bla ma brgyud pa'i rim shes shing rta'i rtsa mchog lam// drang dang bar ma chang dang dngas// de mtha' slob dpon rdo rje rtse// bdag gi tshangs gnas na mkha'i sgor// AHhUM gnyis mtshan
281a1(rgyud 'grel): reg bsgoms la// steng rim nas ni gsol ba gang ba// ma lus ye shes can rnams kyis// yang dag rim mdzad sa bon hUM// pad+ma la ni ge sar bzhin// mkhas pas rab dang thugs kar bsgom// zla ba la yang
281a2(rgyud 'grel): skar ma ltar// rdo rje 'chang chen 'od mthar ni// bcu dang gnyis bcas a phreng gis// bskor bltas gsang sngags bzlas par bya// oM rat+na gu ru shAM a ba lo ki te shwa ra sarba aSh+Ta de ba ta ma ha tiSh+Tha ne ma ma tsi ta ta ta ta dz+nyA na dzA
281a3(rgyud 'grel): la dz+wa la/ prA ti dz+wa la pra ti dz+wa la/ prA t+yA pan+d+ha hriHda ya dz+wa la dz+wa la s+pha ra Na hUM hUM hUM/ gsang sngags rgyal po rig pa che// rdo rje 'bebs pa gdon mi ze// rnal 'byor phyag rgya nges pa 'di// thugs bskul ye shes 'bab par
281a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// rdo rje dbang phyug sa bcu'i snying // bum pa las ni rgyun bzhin du// rim gyis bdag snying sa bon la// bab gyur de yi gzi brjid bskyed// 'cha r-i ka'i 'od ltar dmar ba dang // zla rgyas dkyil 'khor ltar dkar
281a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid// dbang po'i gzhi mdog lta bu yi// 'od kyis bdag lus gang bar bya// gang phyir bskal pa bya bar yang // 'bad byas dral bas yang mi na la// bde chen 'od gsal rnams mi tog/ bla ma'i drin thob thob par 'gyur//
281a6(rgyud 'grel): chu gtor che las brlan pa'i rlangs bskyod dri med mkha' la mi zad sprin 'khrigs dkar ba med// rta bdun shar tshe thibs pos ma rungs gling rnams mi gsal snang bar byas la dka' ba med// na mkha'i dngos la shugs
281b1(rgyud 'grel): drag rlung 'khrugs glo bur sbyin sgrings dngas par byas la dka' ba med// de bzhin bdag gis chos kyi rjer gyur dam pa'i mthus kyang ye shes 'bar bar dka' ba med/ ye shes sbar ba'i gdams pa rdzogs so// /
281b2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tsha lo// gang zhig byang chub sems bskyed na// bdag gam gzhan gyis don 'jug pa// de tshe shes dang mi shes pas// dri ma rab tu mang skye 'gyur// de la mgon po spyan ras
281b3(rgyud 'grel): gzigs// thugs rje chen pos byin brlabs pa// ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu rgyan gyis// bkru ba dam pa 'dir bshang ngo // rab tu gnas pa mchog gnas pa'i// rten gang byin gyis brlabs pa zhig/ mdun bdar me tog bdug
281b4(rgyud 'grel): spos sogs// mchod pa du masaM legs mchod bya// phyogs bcu dus gsum gshegs pa yi// rgyal ba sras bcas rin chen gsum// sprin gyi phung po ltar dkrigs pas// na mkha'i ngos la gang bar lha// nyes dmigs
281b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa mang dran pas// gdung ba'i yid kyis 'gyod pas ni// thog med nas bsags sdig pa'i tshogs// ma lus so sor bshags shing bsdam// 'gro ba dge ba'i rtswa rnams la// rje su yid byed yi rang ba// 'di ni bas ma mi khyab
281b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i las// ming la phun tshigs khyad par 'dod// de nas 'phags tshogs spyan sngar bdag/ gus pas phyag 'tshal rab dang bas/ sdig ldan pa dag la bskyang pa'i phyir// thugs rje chen pos dgongasu gsol// gti mug thi bos
282a1(rgyud 'grel): pos non pa bdag/ mi zad sdig pa'i dbang gyur te// 'gro ba ngan song nges pa'i sar// gdon mi za bar myur ltung 'gyur// de bas skyob pa rnams kyi mthus// mgon med bdag ni gnas skabs 'di// gzigs nas myur du
282a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyab du gsol// khyed las skyabs bzhin bdag ma mchis// de ltar sna tshogs gdungs pa yi// smre sngags du mas sme ba rjod la// rtse gcig ma yengs thal sbyar nas// re ba'i yid kyis mdun du 'dug/ de tshe lha mchog 'dus po yi//
282a3(rgyud 'grel): tshechogs rnams thugs rje'i thugs bstod de// de dag las sbrul 'jig rten mgon// dkar bzangs bum pa 'dzin 'ongs bsam// yang ni mi byed dad dang dang // mchod byas gsol ba gdab par bya// de rjes mgon po'i thugs ka nas/
282a4(rgyud 'grel): 'od phyung mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i sgras// dbyings 'byin dri ma bsal ba dang // bkrus dang yongasu sbyang ba bya// de la 'od zer rnon po yis// dI mo bsregs pa dang po ste// bdud rtsi chu rgyun phreng ba yis// bkru ba gang yin gnyis pa'o// yang
282a5(rgyud 'grel): dag ye shes mnyam gzhag la// mnyam 'jog yongasu rdzogs sbyong ba bshad// dag dang dri med 'od gsalo dang // sgrub pa las la sbyar ba yis// don bsgrubs nas ni dkyil 'khor gnyis// slar bdag snying khar bsdu bar bya// dri ma
282a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag gi cho ga rdzogs so// / bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// sngags pa gang zhig yul lam dbang po dang las kyi stobs kyis gal te phyi dang nang gi dam tshi ge nyams
282b1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'ga' zhig lta bu byung bar gyur na// de 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dran par byas la/ lus dang longs spyod dang // gdam ngag la lhag par chags pa yang spangs te/ cho ga rnams las ji snyed
282b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'i bshegs pa dang / sbyang ba rnams kyis shin tu gus pararab tu drag par bya'o// de'i yang cho ga rnams kyi gtso// dpal ldani 'jig rten gsum rgyal po// dri ma stong pa'i brtag pa las// gang bshad bdud rtsi
282b3(rgyud 'grel): chu rgyun 'di// pad+mo dkar rgyas 'od ba stong rnam par bye ba yi// lte bar rang sems dri med hU~M gi snying po can// sgrib tshogs chags nyams du ba khug rno dngul gyi tshul// mi long ngos la g.ya' dang ji bzhin khebs par bsam// de yi gtsug
282b4(rgyud 'grel): tor nas brgyu da pi// d+hu ti rin chen spangs pa yi// sbu gu dkar pi gyen 'greng ba/ spyi gtsug bar du gsal bar bya// bdag nyid cod pan nyi zla'i gad na stengs 'bar ba la// bla ma mgon dang a haM yab yum phyi nang rim// ji bzhin snyoms
282b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jug bde chen stong nyid bsam gtan la// rtag tu dges bzhugs bdag gi nyams pa gso mdzad bsgom// phyi nang gsang gsum mchod pa dang // bstong sogs rgyas par byas nas ni// 'gyod dang sdom dang bar bcas// rtse gcig
282b6(rgyud 'grel): blo yis gsol bar bya// thog ma kho nar bla ma snyoms zhugs byang chub sems kyi rgyan rab dmar// sbyor mtshams nas sam nyid kyi rdo rje rdo rje rnam dag rtse lnga las/ byang ba'i me lces bdag lus kun khyab rlung gi shugs
283a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas dkrugs pa dang // mngar ba'i shugs kyis ji snyed chags nyams dri ma ma lus bsreg par bya// rdo rjes lha yang snyoms par zhugs// thig le dkar hUM bkru ba dang // de bzhin thabs dang shes rab kyang // snyoms
283a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jug thig le sngon pos gso// cho ga dam pa 'di yis ni// mi gang shes dang mi shes dang // ma dad pa rgyal mang ba dang // bsnyen sogs rgyu yis lam nyams pa// de dag myur du gza' las thar pa'i zla ba bzhin// zla ba gcig gam yang na
283a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis nyid de ste gsum// brtson dang gus drag the tshom yangad gnyis bsal nas ni// rig ma mchog bcas snyoms par zhugs na nges par grol// chags nyams gso pa rdzogs so// / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
283a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// rab tu snga bar langs nas ni// dri zhim chu yis bkang ba yi// bum par brtson mdzad spyan ras gzigs// bzhu ba'i rgyun gyis lus bkru bya// dge ba'i khang bu dam par ni// brtse ldan skyes bu che rnams
283a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ dul ba'i blo gros dran pa dang // bag yod dbang po rab bsdams pas// zhugs la sna tshogs mchod pa yi// rdzas rnams chal bar bkram bya zhing // dri bsung bdug pa mchog gis bdug/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags bzlas bya/
283a6(rgyud 'grel): oM a b+hi ka nan sarba to Sha pra ha na hUM phaT/ de nas lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// ji bzhin bskyed dang rdzogs pa yi// cho ga rim pas sngon btang la// pha Ti ka yi sbyor ba brtsam// rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya dang // smin mtshams 'phro
283b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'od zer gyis// brtson pa'i 'jig rten gsum dbang po// skad cig tsam gyis mdun du drang // shel ltar dri med yangs pa yi// pho brang rin chen sgron ma can// rab tu nyams dga' lhum me ba// brgyan rnams kun gyis phun tshogs
283b2(rgyud 'grel): lha/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i e ra kA rab snyan bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab las// bstan pa gang dag shin tu rnam nges rtag dang bde dang gtsang ba dang // bdag tu chags pa'i lte ba'i kun sel mi rtag sdug bsngal mi gtsang
283b3(rgyud 'grel): dang // bdag med chos ston na mkha'i mthur thug skye dgu'i snying ram simya byed bsam// dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi// gzhal med khang brtsegs dam pa dag/ kun tu 'od 'tsher rgyal ba yi// sku mdzes mang po sa rab brgyan pa
283b4(rgyud 'grel): khang bzangs re yang mchod pa yi// lha mo bcu drug bcu drug gis// mngon par rol byas rtag tu rtse ni// thams cad ting 'dzin bskyed brtson pa'o// de yi phyi rol nye 'khor du// phyogs skyong bcu yi bu rnams kyis// gtsor byas mchod
283b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sprin phung las// lus phyed mngon phyung btud pa'o// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi// smin mtshams mdzod spu byung ba yi// skur mda' ltar dkar 'od 'phros pas// khang bzongs rgyal ba'i thugs bskul bya// 'di ltar
283b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par g.yeng kun gyis// rtsa ba 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir// mkhas pa ting 'dzin myur 'dod pas// 'dzin pa mtha' dag spang bar bya// de 'dzin pa rnam pa bzhi ste// longs spyod bshes dang lus nyid dang // dge ba'i tshogs la
284a1(rgyud 'grel): mngon zhen pa'o// 'di dag gzhan gyi don du bsngo// de nas me ldong zla rgyas dang // dbang po'i gzhu dang 'od kyi khyim// ston gyi namakha'i gung rnams kyis// sbyor ba brtan pas rnam par bsgom// 'jig rten mgon po'i ting 'dzin
284a2(rgyud 'grel): thogs med 'od dpag med nyid kyis// dbu rgyan hrIHyig snying po can// smin mtshams nyi mas mtshan gyur lta/ oM AHhrId+ham ma tsi tA sa mA ya d+hi badz+ra mu tru pra t+yad to pho pheM pheM dz+wA la dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM hUM hUM/ sngags 'di rgyal ba'i sku gsung
284a3(rgyud 'grel): thugs// ting 'dzin dbab pa'i phyag rgyas te// rang bzhin pad+ma 'dab stong dbus// thig le dkar 'tsher rdo rje'i rgyu// nyi ma'i zir gyis pad+mo dbye// thig le las ni 'od tshigs spro// de yin mun pa kun bsregs pas// thogs med pasam gtan
284a4(rgyud 'grel): rang byung 'gyur// ting 'dzin myur du bskyed pa'i gdam ngag rdzogs so// / spyan ras gzigs tinge 'dzin rab tu brtan pa la phyag 'tshalo// gang zhig ting 'dzin ri dbang po ltar g.yeng ba'i rlung gis mi bskyod
284a5(rgyud 'grel): cing // shin tu 'od gsal ston ka'i mkha' la nyi 'od dru pa bkram 'dra ba// gnyis med bde chen rtogs dka' rtog pas rtag tu dwages bzhugs 'dzum pa'i zhal// bsam gtan mchog gi phyag rgyas mnyam gzhag mnyam med mo gon
284a6(rgyud 'grel): po nyid rtag 'dud// sgrub po gang zhig sgrub pa'am// ngo bo nyid kyis rnyes pa yi// ting 'dzin rab tu mi brtan pa// de dag brtan pa'i thabs 'dir bshad// shin tu dben pa'i gnas nyid du// lus dang sems ni rab dal ba// rgya chen
284b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod sbyin byas na su// man ngag gsum gyi dang po bsgom// ma lus 'gro la byams sogs tshad med tshangs pa'i gnas pas legs gnas la// ji skad bshad pa'i ting 'dzin phyag rgyas dpa' bo chen po mnyam gzhag bya// de rje mtshan
284b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas mtshon med cho gas mgon po la gus gsil btab la// sbyor ba gsum pa'i rnal 'byor rgyal po rtse gcig brtan par yang dag bsgoma?/ thA mal rang lus dkyil 'khor dbus// snying dkyil pad+mo dbye ba'i ning // rdo rje
284b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa legs bsgoms la// de yi nang na'ang mgon po nyid// de bzhini de yi snying po nyid// dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs pa// sgrub po'i ting 'dzin brtan pa'i rgyu// ye shes chen po hrIHyig go// de ni gnyisl-i med sems rgyu//
284b4(rgyud 'grel): de la sa bon yang dag brten// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes dngos// 'bru bzhi phyogs bzhir rnam par bsam// mgon po nyid mthar I li ste// bla ma'i mthar yang kA l-i'o// dbus nas brtsams te sngags bzla zhing // 'od zer sbyor
284b5(rgyud 'grel): bas don gnyis bsgrub// skye ba lces ni phyogs bcu'i mthar thugs gang dge bsam gtan ma thob pa 'am// thob kyang gang zhig rnal du mi gnas ri yi rtsa rtse ltar g.yo ba// de dag de ltar skad cig yud lce ri rab spo ltar brtan pa yi//
284b6(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin la bkod pade chen ro myang 'chi med mnyam gzhag cher gzhag bya// bsdus pas phyi ma phyi ma'i rim// thim gyur nang ma nang ma la// dag dang dri med brtan pa zhes// bya ba'i ming can ting 'dzin gsum// go rims ji bzhin
285a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms nas ni// gcig tu 'gro ba snying brtsegs// thun gsum zhag bdun yid byed na// de yi ting 'dzin ri ltar 'gyur// ting 'dzin brtan par byed pa'i gdam ngag rdzogs so// / 'phags pa mi
285a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba'i ting 'dzin can la phyag 'tshalo// mi gang sems g.yo 'gog 'dod pas// skad cig sbyor bar spyan ras gzigs// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho dus drug du// mtshan ma drug ni bsgom par bya// de la g.yon pa brtan par bya ba ni/ phyi'i
285a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma ri mo dang ri mo med pa la rtse gcig tu 'jug pa'o// nang gi mtshan ma yi ge med pa la b+h+yo gcig tu 'jug pa'o// gsang ba'i mtshan ma skye ba dang skye ba med pa la rtse gcig tu 'jug pa'o// mi g.yo ba brtan par byed pa ni phyi'i
285a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma rgya mtsho dang na mkha'i sbyor ba'o// nang gi mtshan ma bum pa lta bu dang ri mo lta bu'i sbyor ba'o// gsang ba'i mtshan ma ni// thig le sbos po'i sbyor ba'o// phyi rlung gsang g.yo mi g.yo bas/ dbang gyur dmigs par rang gnas
285a5(rgyud 'grel): na/ de yang de tshe byed bral du// dub pa ngal bso mkhas pas shes// sems brtun par byed pa rdzogs so// / dpal ting 'dzin gyi rgyal po byin gyis brlabs pa'i gter lnga phyag 'tshalo// dpal ldan pad+mo
285a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin dbang gis// sngags mthu ma grub grag pa dang // nyams chag gso ba'i cho ga ni// mkhas pas 'bad de bsgom par bya// tha mal lus kyi snying 'ad ba dbul// phyogs kyi kha dog can hUM yi ge/ rnal 'byor rgyal po reng sems
285b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhi// dkar 'khyil gzi brjid 'od mdzad bsgom// kha dang rna ba sna gnyis dang // mig gnyis bshang dang gci ba'i sgo// de bzhin rkang pa lag gnyis ni/ gtso bo las spros rdo rje bdag/ gsung ba'i dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin//
285b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma ut+pa lA rdo rje phra// nyi zla rdo rje haM khung zum// rgya gramA rdo rje rtsi mang nyid// a phreng ka phreng dkar dmar gyis// bskor bas khrag 'thung 'jigs pa'i sngags// thugs rje 'phros pa 'od zer las// skyes pa'i sbyor ba yid dag

285b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor la// mnyam gzha ga phrin las bcu lhag spyod// mkhas pas som nyi med par spyad// rtag tu sems can la phan dang lhag pa'i lhas de de nyid shes/ rnal 'byor cho ga la brtson pas// zla ba drug na rtags mthong 'gyur/
285b5(rgyud 'grel): lus nang me dong lce 'bar be ra ltar cha me 'od rna ma par 'khrug pa dang // rdo rje'i spu skye sa kha nas me 'bar skye bo mang po'i mgo btung bstod/ lag na rdo rje ral gri 'bar thogs ha la'i sgra sgrogs phyogs bcur rgyug/ mig
285b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras rab gsal sgron ma'i 'od blo gros nye bar zhi ba'o// byin gyis brlabs mi zad pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// re zhig sngags po blo gros
286a1(rgyud 'grel): dam pa phul du sbyangs pa dag gis zla ba rgyas pa'i tshe kha shar du bltas la btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dpung phyug yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bas/ thog mar skyab su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed pa la mngon par
286a2(rgyud 'grel): brtson par bya'o// de'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i gnas pad+ma la legs par gnas pa'i shes rab shin tu sbyangs pa yid la bya'o// me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang // 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshig su bcad pas bstod pa dang /
286a3(rgyud 'grel): byas pa la 'gyod pas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa de dag nyid kyang ngo // de nas rang lus rgyal ba yi// pho brang 'khor lo dkar mdzes su// skad cig tsam gyis mngon bltas la// rnam dag gsu

286a5(rgyud 'grel): ser dmar ljang dud mdog rnams// rims bzhin me long gzugs ltar dgod// sgyu ma smon lam rnam thar gyis// don du grub pa med pa yang // snang ba mi dmigs rgyud du 'brel// rtog pa mtha' gnyis las grol ba'o// de rjes
286a6(rgyud 'grel): lte dbus sems kyi gzhi// brtan pa'i hrIHyig dkar bsams te// de steng bde chen thig le bsgom// sbyor ba gsum pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bsdu dang dbang du bya ba dang // nges par rtogs pa'i rim gsum gyi// mkhas
286b1(rgyud 'grel): pas bde chen 'bar ba yi// khu ba zhu ba bsgom par bya// 'gro ba'i don bsgrub rdo rje yi// 'khor lo mgal me bskor ba zhes// bya ba 'di yang bla ma yi/ man ngag gis ni de rjes brtsam// brtse chen byang chub sems bzang gi/ rlung
286b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyod ye shes 'bru lnga yi// phreng ba 'khor lo bskor ba las// chos kyi sgra dbyangs snyan bsgrag bya// mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med stong // mtshan med smon pa zad pa yis// gsung rab drang dang drang ba min// phyogs bcur

286b5(rgyud 'grel): par rol pa la phyag 'tshalo// gsung gi dbang phyug dag gi bdag/ rtag tu spobs pa mchog bskyed mdzad/ so so rang rig mgrin par gnas/ dpal ldan spyan ris gzigs phyag 'tshalo// blo ldan rab dang snying rje'i chab kyis

287a1(rgyud 'grel): yid dga' ngag gi mthu bskyed gsung gis rol pa 'di bsgom bya// re zhig sngags pas skyabasu 'gro ba dang sems bskyed pa dang dbang bsgyur ba yang dag par rje ste dran pas lha'i rnal 'byor chen po yud
287a2(rgyud 'grel): tsam gyis mngon du byas la// hrIHyig las yongasu gyur pa'i pad+mo sdong bu can gyi 'dab ma'i lha dang steng du a dang hUM las zla ba dang rdo rjer bskyed pa nas de'i mthar A li dang kA li dang phreng ba 'bar ba dkar dmar g.yas

287b1(rgyud 'grel): ral gri ni gnyis gnyis so// rdo rje ni re re'o// mthar phreng ba phreng rgyud gcig la dgod par bya'o// rdo rje'i las ni ngag gi skyon 'jig par byed do// ral gri'i las nI ngag gi mthu rnon po yang dag par 'byin par byed pa'o// rdo rjes yi

287b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyu byas spro dang bsdu ba'i 'od dbyung bya/ de ltar sbyor ba dam pa 'di nyid dang ldan pas nam langs pa 'am/ nyi ma 'char ka 'am srong thog thag gam mtshan phyed dam rtag tu yang rung ste/ gzhan la brtse ba drag po bcas

288a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub shing lo 'am// de bzhin rtag tu rlung gis bskyod// kha dog dri bzang tshal ba'ang rung // bsrung ba byas nas 'khor lo bca'// ci tsam g.yo bar sla ba yi// bzo bcos lte ba pad+mos mtshan// brgya ched

289a1(rgyud 'grel): dngos med dngos bral rnam par dag/ 'od gsal chen po nyid la nyid// mngon gsum mi g.yo brtan par gzung // tshul 'di rang bzhin mkha' 'dra ste// rnam pa thig le bde ba che// ngo bo kun tu ma 'gags

289a3(rgyud 'grel): na de rjes rmi lam nyid du'ang de mthong 'gyur// gal te sgrib tshogs bud shing tshang tshing gis bsgribs pas// yang dag ji bzhin de tshe mngon du ma gyur na'ang // rnal 'byor rgyal pos re bA chad par mi bya ste// gIms
289a4(rgyud 'grel): pa cung zad gcig tu brtson 'grus gsel mi bya// mdun gyi mkha' la sangs rgyas byang rgab sems dpa' dang // nyan thos rang rgyal lha yi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba'i// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor sprin gyi phung
289a5(rgyud 'grel): po ltar mthong 'gyur// de tshe de nas ring po mi thogs 'od gsal 'thob// rnam dag 'khor lo pad+mo 'dam nas skyes pa bzhin// gnyid kyis myos 'gyur ma rig gis bslang blo gros 'di// rang gis rang dben
289a6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la nya ltar spros bral du// rtsol ba med nyid rang dbang mngon sum 'chang bar byed// rmi lami skyes bus rmi lam gyi// grong du dga' dang mya ngan la// bzung ba rloms sems can yin la// de tshe de yis shes par
289b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// me long gzugs brnya nA gsal ba ni// yod dang med dang gnyi ga dang // gnyi pa ma yin brjod min pa/ de tshe yid ches mthong bar 'gyur// na mkha'i ngos la dbang po'i gzhu// de bzhin ser sbyin 'brug sgra ts+tshanra/
289b2(rgyud 'grel): thog mar skyes dang 'gag mi dmigs// 'od gsal la gnas skyes byas shes// ji ltar smig rgyu'i rgyun 'bab pa// shar sogs nas ni gang zhig nas// ma 'ongs gar yang mi 'gro ba/ rmi lam mthong po yis hUM
289b3(rgyud 'grel): dri bu dang ni pi wad sgra// brag cha la sogs 'du byed nI/ rnam pa ra thar pa gsum gyi sgros// za bo mi rnam par dben pa yang // snang dang mun+na pa thibs po dang // 'od gsal bye brag med gyur pa// shin tu sbyangs pa'i

290a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis log pa na// ma 'ongs bkru shis min pa yi// lhas gang byur 'gyur de/ dpa' ba'i lhas bstan mthong bar 'gyur// 'di la btsun pa spyan ras gzigs// dang pa thob pa dka' thub can// brtse ldan dbang po

295b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyan par bya// de nas sngags pa kha shwar blta ste// gos mchog phyi dang dkur dmar lhub// me tog phreng bas sgras go na te// g.yas g.yon rdo rje'i tha~Md bzung 'dug/ 'jig rten mgon po bde chen sgra// dkar la dmar gsal mdangasaM/
295b3(rgyud 'grel): mnga' ba// rdo rje rin chen rus srung // rdo rje thod 'dzin nga rgyal bya// de mdun rdo rje phreng ldan ma// dmar la dka ri gsal shin tu mdzes// rdo rje gri gug mgo phyed can// bcing ba'i phyag rgyas 'khyad pa'o// phyi nang gsung bcas
295b4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gyi// cho ga bla ma'iman ngag bzhin// mchod byas ye shes pa bkug le// 'dod pa drag pos gsol pa gdab// bde chen 'jig rten gsum mgon ni// shes rab rdo rje 'bar be dang // snying rje chen po ka pA
295b5(rgyud 'grel): le// gnyis med ye shes hrIHyig 'dzin// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rdo rje can// dkar mo sgeg mo byed+me ster ma// gri gug dang ni thod pa thogs// gtso chenA gtsomo nyid phyag 'tshal// e ma'o stobs bdag baN+Di slad du// ka pA la ni
295b6(rgyud 'grel): bde chen snod// dngos grub phyir ni shes rab thabs// snyoms par 'jug pa mdzad du gsol// de ltar bstod dang gsol ba yis// gtso bo'i thugs kar bskul ba na// 'dab bzhi lha mo phyogs kyi lhas// rang rang rjes
296a1(rgyud 'grel): mthun mchod par bya// de nas shes rab thabs snyoms zhugs// dkar dmar a phreng ka phreng rgyun// bde chen phyi nang byug sbyangs nas// ring srel la ni lha bstim bya// 'tsheg dang 'grul dang 'phar ba dang // 'od 'byin
296a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang sgra grag dang // rdzas rnams 'phyang ba mthong nas ni// mchod pa chen po rnam par bya// dpal rdo rje thod pa'i dngos grub bsgrib pa'i thabs rdzogs so// / spyan ras gzigs mi 'jigs sbyin pa la phyag
296a3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// 'phags pa spyan ras gauzigs dbang gi/ mi 'jigs sbyin pa brtag pa yis// sngags lnga phyi nang gsung dag grI/ bar du gcod pa lus sems bsrung // rang lusau ji srid rdo rje yi// rang bzhin rin chen shel 'od
296a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzes/ wa shrIs sgo stong mchod rten dbyibs// bcu drug phrag bu rgyu rdo rje 'dzin// de nas sems ni snying gyi pad+mo gsar pa'i 'ad // dmar ba'i 'od chags ge sar bye ba stong gi rtse rA// A stong ye shes rdo rje sems dpa'i
296a5(rgyud 'grel): spyan ras gzigs// chu dang me long zla ba byed kyi gzugs brnyan bzhin// dbus su dpal chen thugs rje che// sor rtse bcu drug gzi brjid brtan// bcu bdun sum cu brgyud zhal phyug/ hrIHyig gnyis phreng gis brgyun pa'o//
296a6(rgyud 'grel): pho brang mchog la rab tu gsal ba'i 'od zer sngags bcas gzi chen kun bkram 'bar ba yi// rdo rje'i rdul dang ral gri bo con dgra sta mdung zhags kha T+wAM gr-i khug mda' chen dang // tshe zer glog 'khyag rgya rgyu 'phros la sau rno ba
296b1(rgyud 'grel): lho phyung 'jigs pa'i rgyu gang 'di dang gzhan// ma lus da ltar byams pas nyer brlan snying rje'i stobs yid gcig pus nyer zhe brlag parabya// mgon po yi ni sngags/
296b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod cing // bdug pa mchog gis bdug byas la// 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa 'jigs meng byed// mkhas pas stong nyid bsgom par bya// mtsho chen nang du ri rab gzugs sha ra de nang me long dri med la// 'dam skyes mdzes 'khrungs sna
296b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bung ba dar dir sgra sgrogs khyu mang 'khrigs// mkha' la 'od 'gyed glog rgyun 'obab pas rmi lam yul gyi dgra 'joms pa// dpal chen rnams kyi rig snga gas bla med ma lus 'jig pa kun skye bo yin// dus dang dus
296b4(rgyud 'grel): min 'chi ltas dang // mya ngan phongs pa ltas ngan dang // phun sum tshogs min dgra rnams las// legs skyob 'jig rten gsum mgon rtog/ dpal mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// /
296b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa spyan ras gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo// zla ba dung dang kun da gangs ri ltar 'tsher ba// gzhon nu rab mdzes rin chen phreng bas rnam brgyan cing // mchog sbyin pad+mo 'od dpag med kyi g.yas g.yon phyag/ spyi
296b6(rgyud 'grel): gtsug legs spras 'jig rten gsum mgon la phyag 'tshal// rang lus dkyil 'khor pho brang 'dab stong gsal ba'i dbus// zla rgyas mdog lha'i sems nyid ngo bo ye shes hrIHyig 'od 'bar gyis// thig le
297a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam dgu bde chen rang bzhin rlung sems bcud gang yin pa de// legs bsdus ni blo ldan dpa' rnams gnyug ma mchog la brtan gnas bya// de yi snying po las smras pa'i//
297a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer lcags kyu rnon po yis// rgyal po'i pho brang po ta la'i// dbus nyid nas ni 'phags pa bskyod // shin tu dkar gsal stong gyi zla ba bye ba brgya yi 'od 'khrigs pa// bdag gi blo gros pad+mo rgyas pa'i kha dbye'i
297a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir ni bde gshegs 'bum gyi 'khor dang bcas// skad cig yud la rta bdun lam gang mgon po nyid mchod sbyin rum 'khrigs pa'i dpung bkod pa// shes rab snang bas gsal bar bltas la mchod sprin rgyo
297a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshos rab tu mchod// lha yi dbang phyug pad+mo'i rigs// pad+ma stong ldan stong bu 'dzin// phyogs bcu nas 'ongs phyogs bcu'i char// bzhugs bltas de dag mgon mchod bsam// tshangs dbyangs sna tshigs
297a5(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs bstod mnyam med dag sbyin bral bas// yon tani kun brjid 'dod pa drag po so shin tu gsol btab gus byas la// dzaHhUM baM hrIHsa bdegashegs sa bon zla 'od 'bar ba la bstim bya// thi ma gyur
297a6(rgyud 'grel): rjes thogs zang cig de nyid bcu drug phyed phyed thig ler gyur// de yang yud kyis de bzhin du// spyan ras gzigs dbang gzhon nur gyuraro// de bzhin de yi thugs kar yang // rgyal ba'i snying po hrIHpas ma mo//
297b1(rgyud 'grel): de las zer bskyod dang pa'i zhags su rdo rje'i thig gu bzhus pa yis// thub dbyang thugs stabs skad cig de la thugs rje che mnga'i thugs bsgral gyurA// dus gsum gshegs pa'i 'dren pas byi na brlabs phun tshogs 'od
297b2(rgyud 'grel): zer dmar mo rjes zheng // gyen du 'grong ltos smin mtshams mdzod sgra'i sgo nis thogs med tA la phyin phyung // zla zer 'od ni nyi ma yin// zer yin de yi lces reg pas// snying gi 'dab stong kha
297b3(rgyud 'grel): dbye zhing // bye ba'i da bus na bskyeb de'i b+h+rUM/ 'ong+ga dpung rgya mtsho gang ba 'dis// zhig bcu phrag gsum nyid na de// blo ldan yid kyi sang+ga sel+la zhing // dI mA ma was rnam par 'khyud//
297b4(rgyud 'grel): sa la dang skyong rjid kyi sku/ sdud byed rlung gi shugs can gyis// 'dab stong bdud rtsi'i bu ma 'thung // ting nge 'dzin yin 'khrul 'khor mchog/
297b5(rgyud 'grel): Ni pad+ma kha 'byed kyi man ngag rdzogs so// / bcom
297b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das thugs rje chen po gzugs brnyan gyi rnam par snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// ting 'dzin goms pa'i gang zag gi/ bden rtog ma lus bzlog phyir dang / lha yi dri ma'ang spang bI phyir/ gan
298a1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can man ngag bri// skye bos rab dben nyams dga'i gzhir// 'dab rgyas pad+mo phye ba yi// maN+Dal yid 'ong legs bris la// de dbus 'dren pa snang bar bya/ shar gyi 'dab mar khri btsugs la// de steng shin tu dri med gzugs//
298a2(rgyud 'grel): brtson pa'i cha byang rgyan mang mnga'// dkar dmar la sogs bdag yid ltar// chu nang rab dang zla ba dang // gzugs ltar de yi sprul pa gsal// shel dang me long la sogs ngos// dkyil 'khor lte bar mngon par bzhugs// drang srong gtso bo sgyu ma'i rnam thar ni// gdul
298a3(rgyud 'grel): ka gdul phyir sna tshogs skur ston yang // de tshe de don de nyid gzugs mi mnga'// de nyid 'dir ni stong nyid gzugs zhes brjod// ma dag lus kyi dri ma thams cad las// shin tu ring gyur phun tshogs skur snang la// de nyid mkha' ltar dmigs pa rab zhi pa// dus gsum
298a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i ye shes sku yin no// byis pa rnams ni kha dog dbyibs// dbye bas snang ba ji bzhin don de bzhin zhes rtogs// mkhas rnams ji ltar snang ba sna tshogs nyid// gang snang de ltar de tsam zhi bar shes// ji ltar lha yi sbyor ba 'dir mtshan med// de ltar
298a5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs sogs dngos kun yang dben na/ shes rab kyis brtags blo gros rim gnyis la// mkhas pas mtshan mar mi bya smos ci dgos// de ltar lnga dang lha'i rang bzhin dang chos thams cad kyi dag pa rtogs par byas nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas
298a6(rgyud 'grel): sngon par sprul pa'i lha'i sku phyag rgya chen po dmigs te/ bdag nyid rim pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i sku gsung thugs mtshan nye bar zhi ba'i mthar thug par gyur dang bsre bar bya'o// de nas khrus dang byug pa la sogs pa sngon du song bas/ phyag 'tshal ba dang bskor ba
298b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i sgo nas sdig pa spang ba dang / tshogs bsgrub ste/ dngos su 'byor pa dang yid las byung ba'i yo byad dpag tu med pas yang dag par mchod de/ dri ma sbyang ba'i phyir sngags 'di bzla'o// oM AHtIHma hA ka pra ti bi pA ru bi bi shud+d+ha ta tA dz+nyA nA ma mA tsit+ta
298b2(rgyud 'grel): ma d+ye pra tistA ra hUM/ rnam dag ye shes mchog sprul pas// sku bstan nyid kyi thugs hrIHyig/ 'od mdzad me yis 'gro kun gyi// 'dzin pa gnyis bsregs gzugs bstan gyur// dri ma med dang rnam mi rtog/ gdul bya dang ni yang dag li// snang dang mi snang
298b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyer med gzugs// bsgrub pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'o// thugs rje chen po gzugs brnyan la brten pa'i bsgrub thabs rdzogs so// / 'phags pa me tog gi snying po'i gau sar la phyag 'tshal lo// dang ldan meng du thos blo sbyangs// g.yeng bral rtse gtsi/
298b4(rgyud 'grel): yid byed pa// de yid 'phags pa me tog gdan// dngos grub nye phyir bsgrub pa'o// yul gang me tog ku ni gsal rgyas// 'bras bu bzang rnams smin pa dang // nyams dga' byi dor rgyas ldan par// sdig pa spangs nas brtson 'grus brtsam// dkar dang
298b5(rgyud 'grel): dmar dang ser dang sngo// kha dog gnag dang kha dog gcig/ sna tshogs kha dog can me tog/ bsung zhim dri yis bsangs byug bya// gser sogs nor mang bkod pa dang / mu tig lnga sogs rgyan de bzhin// gdugs sogs yo byad lhab lhub
298b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor brgyan phyir bgod// gang tshe rang yid dga' bas khengs// spro bas don kun baM sgrub brtson pas// dpal chen dngos grub nyer spyod pa// de yi dus ni de yin no// bcal bkram pa dang phung po dang // tshim
299a1(rgyud 'grel): bu stegs brtsegs chun 'phyang lding // dra ba dra ba phyed khang brtsegs// ji srid mchod 'os de snyed de// sngon du bsnyen pa mthar phyin pas// dri zhim khang par dad pa yis// g.yas bskyod zhugs la rnal 'byor gsum// dran byas
299a2(rgyud 'grel): khri bzang la mnyam gzhag/ shin tu byin brla bas lhag pa'i lhas// dngos grub phyir bstan mgyon po sku me tog kun bkod mdun pa di ru la// rim gnyis las byung bzlas par bya// res 'jog skyes da skyes lan gyi// hrIHyig bdud rtsi'i bum
299a3(rgyud 'grel): gang bzang // cig car rtag tu pad+mo'i dbus// dam tshig la ni ye shes 'jug/ thun mtshams rtag tu bya ba yang // khrus gsol me tog phreng sogs gdags// bsam mi khyab dang mchog rab zha// sangs rgyas sras bcas 'dab stong mchod// khyung
299a4(rgyud 'grel): dkor kun tu dga' ba yis// lta bu lha mo dang bas yid// myos 'dud ri re'ang dpag ming rdzas// mchod phyir thogs pas brtson bskor bya// thub sogs dngos grub ma lus dbang can yang // mchod bsnyen sgrub bya don phyir thugs g.yos pas//
299a5(rgyud 'grel): dum gcig gyur me tog rdo rjes mtshan// zang rgyun chang dbang lte ba'i sgrubasu 'jug/ oM AHd+hI/ a a u a a A A/ hrIhrIhrI hrIH/ hU~M hU~M hA \u0f7fhaM hU~M hU~M hU~M hUM \u0f7fhU~M/ dpal me tog gi gdan can gyi sgra'i thabs rdzogs// / 'dzis
299a6(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum las rgyal ba'i mtshan ma can la phyag 'tshal lo// thub dbang mtshan ltas bde gshegs me tog 'dab stong dang // bdag nyid chen po'i pad+mo 'ang maH phyag mtshon pa// skal bzang rgyal ba byang chub phyogs brgya'i lha tshogs can// chos
299b1(rgyud 'grel): 'chad phyag dbus g.yas g.yon sdong bu mdzes rgyas mdun// skal pa bzang pos snga dro'i dus// dben pu'i gnas su maN+Dal bri// rin chen khri bkod pad+mo'i steng // rgyal dang de sras rin chen bzhugs// bstod dbyangs sngon du 'gro bas mchod// rkang pas
299b2(rgyud 'grel): bro brdung lag gar bsgyur// se gol gdogs pas spyi gtsug gzhag/ khrus gsol de nas rgyan sogs dbul// mchod pa lnga dang ldan pa yi// gtor ma chen po dbul byas la// rol mo dang ni bdug par bcas// lan grangs nyi shu gcig
299b3(rgyud 'grel): bskor bya// me tog du mas bkang ba yi// bum pa bzang po bzhi bcas te// ba da na dmar po bzhi mtshan la// me tog snod bzhis kha rab brgyan// phreng ba spel legs mdzes pa la// yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags btab nas// g.yas su 'khyil ba la
299b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs dung // snod bzung dal bus dor bar bya// 'jig chen gsum las rnam rgyal mtshan// ri dbang rtse nas spyan drangs te// bdag lus mchod sbyin byas nas su// sems ni sku la bstim par bya// rdo rje'i sku mchog bod bzang mkhregs// thub dbang ring bsrel do
299b5(rgyud 'grel): shal thogs// gzhon nu cha lugs gar mkhan tshul// pi wang lhan cig dgyes pa'o// ye shes can las oM shes sku// gzhan sprul bum bzang dpag tu med kyi/ thogs nas dri mchog khrus gsol cing // me tog snying pos mchod char dbab// phyogs bzhi nas ni
299b6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig can// sngags pa lhab lhub gos gyon nas// rol mo dbyangs dang lhan cig pas/ me tog sna tshogs char dba'o// oM AHhrIHbadz+ra dz+nyA na bi shud d+hA ma hA bi na bi dul+la d+ha ra/ sarba tAn+t+ra ma ma sarba kA ya wak+tsit+ta pA paM a ba ra Na sho d+ha ya/ sho d+hA ya/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra
300a1(rgyud 'grel): saM b+ha ra/ saM ha ra/ A kaR+Sha ya/ a kaR+Sha ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta tri da ya gan+d+he dz+wa la hUM phaT swA hA// de nas gang bdog pa 'byor pa rnams kyi bsti stang bya ba dang / gus pas me tog blangs nas spyod yul kun la khyab par gtor/ snying po mchog nyid shing lo'i ga 'udu
300a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhug cing dri bzang byug/ de yi khrus chab bdag gdong bkru sgo thams cad bsgrub// me tog la brtan pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogaso// // thugs rje chen po re khrod pa la phyag 'tshalo// rab tu yid dga' nags kyi dbus// me tog 'bras bu dud pa yi// shing drung rtsa yi spyil
300a3(rgyud 'grel): bu nyid// chags bral rnyog pa med bzhugs 'dud// de nas sgrub po spros pas 'jigs pa dang // rnam par g.yeng bas dal ba ma thob pa yang rung ste/ gcig pu dag dben pa dang yid byung ba'i blo can gyis/ dus bzang po'i tshe nagasu song la gang na ljon shing bzang ba la yal ga
300a4(rgyud 'grel): dang lo 'bras kyi nom pa dang ldan pa/ grib ma bsil bas lus skyob cing drung na 'dug tu snyed ltar snang ba yod pa zhing la tsal te/ de'i 'gram du gtor ma sbyin pa sngon du btang nas rtswa spyil bu mdzes pa bcos par bya'o// de'i nang gi steng gi gzhir rje btsun spyan ras gzis
300a5(rgyud 'grel): spyil bu can gyi rten byin gyis brlabs pa dang ldan pa zhig bzhugs la/ mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod na/ me tog gis snyim pa bkang ste/ cog pur 'dug la sngags 'di brjod do// oM AHhrIHba na lo ka nA tha/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sarba bud+d+ha dz+nyA na gar+b+ha ma ma
300a6(rgyud 'grel): hrI n+na hUM hUM swAt+ma/ de nas spyil bung dang rter/ pa thang mchog dang sgra nyid du// byin gyis brlabs la me dag skang ra gang le bsam gtan bye// snyoms med mi g.yengs brtan pa yis// zla bdag gam gsum mam gcig nges par byas na
300b1(rgyud 'grel): nags kyi nang // mgon po gang rung gzugs su ston// de yi smin mtshams pad+mo 'dra'i// ri mo 'am thig le gsal bar 'gyur// brtson pas ma 'khrugs dkyil 'khor bya// mgo btud zhabs la gtugs te gsol// oM AHhrIHpU ra be pra tits+tsha surma
300b2(rgyud 'grel): ra ho/ thal sbyar mig mi 'dzums pa yig/ me tog bstabs la sngags 'di brjod// de tshe bdag ni ci 'dra yang // skyob pas rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur// spyil bu can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / thugs rje chen po rnga bo che sgra dbyangs rnam par rol
300b3(rgyud 'grel): pab la phyag 'tshol lo// rnga chen gang zhig tsan dan sogs shing gla rtsi ga bur gur ka ma byugs// phyogs gnyis drang srong ri dgas mo ljags 'brug sgro grag dang lhan cig g.yogs// pad+mo dmar dang 'khor lo dkar dbus nga ro che bcibs rnga chen brdung //
300b4(rgyud 'grel): grags chen dbang phyug sgra dbyangs rol pas sa steng ma lus rgyal gyur cig/ dang po re zhig rig po goms pas mthu thob pa 'am// gang yang bstan la dgra bo rnam par gnon pa nyid// de bzhin sngags myur grags pas grong khyer 'khrugs 'dod pa// de dag
300b5(rgyud 'grel): kun yid snying rje ldan sbyar cho ga portsam// 'dab chags nga ro chen po'i lo// skar ma rgyal la bab pa 'am// yang na dbyar gyi sgra sgrogs dus// mkhas pas rnga chen bcos par bya// tsan dan sdong bu dkar dam ri ram// sgra sgrogs shing dang snyan pa'i 'dab// sang
300b6(rgyud 'grel): ldeng glang sna bu 'bod dang // ti ti ra sogs rgyu yin rtag/ nyi ma shar dang zla ba shar// srod kyi dus la bab pa na// glo rtsig bur gur kum byug/ rdo rje khros pas bgegs tshar bcad// byams pa'i nyi ma gang la bab// khri gnyen mo yi pags pa sbyangs// namakha'i
301a1(rgyud 'grel): sgra gsang sgrogs pa na// lho ru kha bltas g.yog par bya// de nas dri mchog dam tshig can// bdud rtsi 'dzag pas legs thugs la// dbang thob lnga bzo skad mthon pos// sgra dbyangs mgon po bri bar bya// dbus su pad+mo dmar bzhi'i snang //
301a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nu'i mdangs rgod nga ro bcings// phyag gnyis rin chen rnga chen brdung // zla ba'i mdog can brjid pa'o/ shar sogs 'dab bzhir grags tsher dang // 'brug sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs can dang // nga ro mI bzang gnod sbyin bzhi// phyogs kyi kha dog bzhin
301a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas// brtson pa'i cha byad rgyan gyis spyang // phyag bzhi dung dkar kA la hA/ dril bu dang ni gaN+Di thogs// mig dmar dga' ba khros pa'i tshul// de mthar 'khor lo brgyad rtsibs rim// bkra shis brgyad 'dzin lha mo brgyad// shin tu sgeg mdzad dul ba'i tshul/
301a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzum pa'i mdangs dkar sna tshogs mdog/ mu khyud rdo rje'i sprin 'khregs pa// bur 'ur skad 'byin 'jigs pa dang // glog rgyan phreng bas mdzes pa ni// mkhas pas ting 'dzin ldan pas bris// de'i 'og tu ji skad bsngags pa'i gnas nas ye shes kyi
301a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo can gyi rnga bkug nas rol mo la sogs po'i mchod pas mnyes par bya ste rjes su bzhugs par bya'o// de nas lte ba mu khyud kyi nang gi khyud 'khor du yi ge chen po lnga dang nye ba'i yi ge lnga bcu byang chub kyi sems gnyis 'dres pas bri zhing // sngags
301a6(rgyud 'grel): de dag nyid sgra chen po lan bdun klags la rol mo gsil ba dang bro brdung bar bya'o// de rjes mkhas pas brgya byin gyi// lag pa 'dra ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyis// rtsol ba spangs nas rnga brdung zhing sa bdag nyid rnal 'byor brtson pas bya// sgrub pa po yid dag
301b1(rgyud 'grel): med kyang // ji tsam bsnyen pa'i mtshan bshad sngags// de yi phyed kyis 'grub par ni// nges par the tshom mi bya'o// de yi 'og g.yul bzlog pa 'am// grags pa mtho 'dod de bzhin gzhan// thams cad snying rje ma bral bar// rnga 'di brdungs pa tsam gyis 'grub//
301b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum grags mtha' yas pa// thug rje chen pos nyid sprul pa// rnga chen rgyal po brtag pa'i las// don kun sgrub par byed pa yin// thugs rje chen po rnga sgra'i sgrub thabs rdzog so// // rgyal ba nyi ma dang zla ba'i phyag mtshan can la
301b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// dbang po rtul po nyid de gang // de bzhin 'jig rten don bsgrub 'dod// gzhan dgra bsod nams nor 'dod pa// de ni nyi zla'i mtshan can bsgrub// sprin tshegs rdul dang khug rna du ba dang // blang bral dri med be DUr btsag 'dra yi// mkha'
301b4(rgyud 'grel): lo dpal bzang nyi zla 'char bar byed// de tshe dang ldan smra ba bcad nags 'jug/ drang srong bu dang lhan cig nags bzung du// srid pa'i sdug bsngal skyon naM drin byas la// bdud 'dul thub pa'i dam tshig phyag rgya che// mngon sum bcas te pad+ma'i
301b5(rgyud 'grel): mig gnyis bskyod// de'i 'og tu mchod pa thams cad sta gon byas nas/ bdug pa dri zhim po thams cad kyis bdug cing / rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig/ stobs bcu'i 'od zer chen pos 'gro ba gsum gyi na pa sel ba dus tshad med par
301b6(rgyud 'grel): brtson pa'i chos kyi rgyal po nyi ma dang zla ba'i mtshan ma can de ring rgyal gyur cig/ bdag cag la sogs pa'i dbang po brtul po dang / don bsgrub pa dang / bsod nams gnyer bar rnams kyi phrin las thog pa mi mnga' bar mdzad cig/ ces
302a1(rgyud 'grel): lan gnyis lan gsum che du yang ma du rjod pa/ nyi ma zla ba las kun la sngags bdun 'don rnam pas brjod pa gang yin dang // thugs rje'i lhas bstan drang srong a b+his shar du kha bltas chags bral rnyed tshe mngon bstod gang //
302a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gang gzhan glang po skyong dang gter bdag gser srung 'od ma'i tshal du sngon byung dbyangs// de dag ma lus mgrin bzangs rnams bsdebs mgrin gcig mchod bcas ngang pa drag pos dngos grub gsol// de rjes rta bdun chu yi snying po 'od kyi dra
302a3(rgyud 'grel): ba can// snying brtses thugs brtul glo bur lhag gi byon pas gdong bsal gyur// de tshe ring bar ma 'khrugs mchod bya gsang sngags bzlas// dkyil 'khor gnyis dbus pad phyag nyi zla'i rgyun can 'bar ba'o// 'khor lo dang rjes mthun pa'i kha dog
302a4(rgyud 'grel): can// brtson pa'i cha byad gti mug dang / sdig pa gsum sel ba dang / spyod pa'i phyir bsregs pa dang / bsil ba'i mtshan nyid can no// rgyun gyi mthar dran pa'i rgyas btab pa ces bya ba dang / sbyor ba'i rgyas btab pa ces pa gnyis ci rigasu dran par
302a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// oM AHhrIHbadz+ra sUr+yA tsan+d+ra kA dza sid+d+ha ma ma la sa smA ra sma ra a nu s+thi ti kA ra hUM/ nyi zla sgron ma'i cho ga rdzogaso// // bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po grags pa'i rgyal mtshan can la phyog 'tshalo// 'dir 'jig rten pa mang po chos dang ldan pa'i
302a6(rgyud 'grel): don bya ba la sbyar ba'i phyir/ re zhig de ma chog can yon tan tshul ni gnas pa'i che ba bsgrags po sa gnas gang du skye bo 'dul ba 'am/ mang pos mthong ba dang thos pa'i spyad yul du gyur pa zhig bcos la/ rdo rje thab sbyor la sogs pas bgegs bsal
302b1(rgyud 'grel): zhing der khang bu brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rim pa gnyis pa grong khyer pa dang pho brang ba man ngag dang ldan pas brtsig cing bri bar bya'o// de'i 'khor yug la sogs par mchod pa thams cad kyis brgyan cing / bkra shis tshigasu bcad pa klog pas phyogs
302b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhir sgra sgrogs par byas la/ rnal 'byor can bdag dang skal ba lhag pa dang / mnyam pa thams cad la rnam pa thams cad gus pa'i ched du brjod pa dang / skal ba sman pa rnams la snying rje'i lcags kyus zin pas ji tsam don bya bar bzod pa de srid 'bad par
302b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// gang phyir grags pa ma yin rgyu/ mi snyan brjod sogs don min phyir// mkhas pa grags pa bzang skyong 'dod// des ni sdig pa bsal phyir 'bad// bdug pa'i ngag gis mtshon rnon pos// gzhan gyi grags pas gcod byed cing // tshe rabs kun tu bdag gi yang //
302b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ma yin kun bskyed pa'o// mi gang bdag nyid skyon brjod kyi// gzhan gyi yon tan mi 'chab la// nam yang nyes par smra mi byed// de ni grags pa bzang ldan 'gyur// ston pa la sogs gud ston byed// pha rol grags pa ngal sel brtson// bdag nyid sdig pa spang
