302b5(rgyud 'grel): la mkhas// grags pa'i rgyal mtshan cho ga bzhi// sdig pa nyung ngu dang bsod nams mang po can ni 'phags pa dgyes pa'i gang zag ste grags pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi tsheg snyan pa mang po rnyed par rung ngo // des nam du yang khong khro bas gzhan spro bar mi bya'o// slob
302b6(rgyud 'grel): ma log par zhugs pa la sogs pa 'khrug pas mi snyan par brjod pas slar zlog pa ni ma yin no// dkyil 'khor bris nas rtsod pa can gyi skyes bu bstan par mi bya'o// rtag tu byams pas non pa'i yid// 'jam zhing yid 'bab snyan smra dang // kha na mtho
303a1(rgyud 'grel): yang kun sbyong // rnam gum ni la grags pa 'grub ste de la 'dir rtsa ba'i rig pa sngon du bstan pas dbang gyur ba thob par byas nas grong khyer pa'i dkyil lakhor ni rang nyid ci tsam du grags pa bsgrags par 'dod pa de tsam nye bar dgod do// pho brang ba'i
303a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ni 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad pad+mo 'ong ba ma brgyad dang ldan pa sprin gyi phung po'i rum phrag na gnas brgyun ma chad par 'brug gi sgra zab mo sgrogs pas mdzes pa'o// grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dbus bzhug la// sgra ldan brgyad kyis dung 'bud bskor// phyogs gzugs mtshams ni
303a3(rgyud 'grel): phyed gzugs mdog/ 'dab brgyad la gnas las sgrub brtson// de bzhin rtsibs rim dga' ba dang // mi pham dbyangs bzang nga ro che// snyan pa'i tog dang kun khyab byed// yid bzhung don bsgrub ces bya brgyad// dkar dang dmar ser ljang dang dmar// dkar dang ljang dang ser bas
303a4(rgyud 'grel): te// lha yi rnga chen brdung ba dang // bsgrub pa zo mo sdigs pa brjod// g.yeg ba la sogs snyan pa'i sgras// grong khyer la ni sems byed cing // pho brang lhan cig 'brug sgra yis// ma lus grags pa sgrog par byed// de ltar dkyil 'khor sa bskyed nas// bdag gi sprin
303a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshams kyi hrIHlas 'od phyung bas tshong nas grags pa'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te/ de nyid bzhugs pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas phrin las la sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir sngags bzla bar byaM s+t+waM/ oM AHhrIHsarba lo ka ma ma kiN+Da s+phar sA ra/ gzugs/ thA kI sa r+b+ba
303a6(rgyud 'grel): kA sa sa ma ya hU~M/ ji srid ngal bar mi 'gyur bar// dkyil 'khor rjes mthun don grub byed// rnal 'byor ldan pas 'bad byas mthar// mchod pa mnyes byas gshegs su gsol// grags pa bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogaso// / thugs rje chen po gzi brjid
303b1(rgyud 'grel): sa thug 'a sa la// gas pa gang shigasung du sa ru dang // na rgyam ma sa spyo dang u nga // sno d+hA sa rgyu nga ngas// de das byu na ga da skyes paT+Te// na me pa rab pa pa phru/ rapa'i ma la sogs mdun pa
303b2(rgyud 'grel): la// brgya rtsa brgyad mtshan bstod pa yis// gung bstod me tog phreng ba gdags// gzhon nu ma brtul me long ngam// rin chen sogs 'ang brdar ba yis// sku bkram me tog spos sogs dbul// me yi las kyis dngos grub blang // sprin bral nyi ma zla ba dang // mar me 'bar
303b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'od reg pas// sku gzugs gsal bar byas nas su// hrIHyig gzi brjid snying po bskyed// de la sku mchog bstims la sku// rang 'dra dpag tu med 'phros pas// rdzogs sangs rgyas sogs gzi brjid bsdus// 'gro ba gzi brjid bskyed bdag don bsgrubs pas//
303b4(rgyud 'grel): phyi nang lus dang snying gi dbus// 'khor lo pad+mo pad+mo can// gzi brjid rgyal po 'od 'bar ba// sdig 'joms rtag tu bsgom par bya// gzugs sgra dri ro reg dang chos dang // sangs rgyas sras po gzi bskyed la// gzi chen 'bar ba'i gsang sngags kyis// stobs
303b5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed bya phyir rtag tu dbul// sems can gzi byin chung ngu gang // de dag la yang cho ga bzhin// bzang dang 'gran bla ma rabs rim// dga' dang 'dun pa snying rjes spyod// lhag pa'i sems dang lhan cig tu// rlung dang 'od 'ong 'byung zhing // spro bas skye bo thams cad
303b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi/ yid 'ong rlom pa zhu bar byed// mi gang 'jig rten mgon la dang // 'bar ba'i mtshan mas rtag lus mtshan// da ni dud 'gro 'dra na yang // 'gro ba'i mig sngar lha ltar sdug/ oM AHhrIHma hA dz+nyA na swA hA/ oM AHhrIHma hA ka ru Ni ka swA hA/ oM AHd+hI
304a1(rgyud 'grel): ma hA dz+wa la ga to swA hA/ lus las me 'bar 'od 'byung dang // nyi ma la sogs snang bar reg/ rin chen sgron ma lag na thogs// 'di dag gzi brjid grub pa'i ltas// de nas blo ldan grong khyer sogs 'jug rang gi khyim du de rten la// 'od
304a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar mdog bzang mar me dri zhim bdug pa can skor snyan pa'i sgras// legs mchod su yang ji srid bdag song de srid mthong ba 'bad bkag la// slar log don bsgrub gtor mas mnyes bya slob ma bzang la rgyun mchod bsgom// gzi brjid bskyed pa'i cho ga
304a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / 'phags pa thugs rje chen po yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs can la phyag 'tshal lo// gzi brjid phung po mthong tsam gyis// skye bo kun gyi yid 'phrog cing // rgyal po'i ngag bzhin thams cad la// bsgos pa don yod byed rig bshad//
304a4(rgyud 'grel): thog mar brtan g.yon mkha'i sbyor ba yis// ngag bcas de las pad+ma zla ba bskyed// de steng a dang ka phreng ze'u 'bru can// 'dres gyur mgon po yid 'ong gzugs can bsgom// shel ltar rab dngas rdo rje lta bur 'khrigs pa'i sku// dkar la dmar dngas shin tu 'od
304a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal rnam par dag/ bltas pas mi ngoms dpe byad mtshan rab kun rdzogs pa// skyabs sbyin chu skyes g.yas g.yon phyag rgyas btab pa'o// brgya phrag 'od 'bar rgyan rnams las byung phan tshun 'od zer rnams 'khrugs pas// nyid kyi sku bkab dra ba dang ni dra ba byed
304a6(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo rje gsung drung 'khyil// zer phog pa dang gzugs brnyan rab 'dres tig tig gong bu 'khyil 'gyur te// sku sgo kun la rin chen 'od 'dzag mkhas la nyi ltar mdzes bdag gyur// de'i snying por yi ge gsum pa 'dus pa la nu ma gnyis kyis brgyan pa bltas la/ dad pa
304b1(rgyud 'grel): dang lhan cig pa'i bod kyang zhags pas bo ta la nas gzhon nu 'bar ba nyid bkug la/ bcu drug dang brgyad dang / nyi shu dang bcu dang / bdun dang lnga la sogs pa'i lha mo lte ba'i sgolas mngon par 'gro ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod nas// phyogs kyi gzhon nu ma bzhin
304b2(rgyud 'grel): yid 'ong mtshungs med la sogs pas bstod nas lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu'i rang bzhin gyis bkug cing bcug ste bcing la dgyes par bya'o// de nas thugs ka dang ljags la yi ge bzhi dang bcu drug gi pad+mo dang 'khor lo nye bar bkod de/ byams pa
304b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i yid kyis bzlas la/ nam gyi tshe skye bo bdag gi ming thos pa dang / gzugs mthong bas dbang po mngon par g.yo ba'i tshe// de dag gi snying la hrIHdmar po bsams nas/ sna bug g.yas nas spros pa'i sa bon las 'od kyi mda' bkye ba bsnun te/ de las bdud rtsi rgyun
304b4(rgyud 'grel): zags pas lus thams cad la khyab par bya'o// byams pa'i lta bas rnam blta zhing // rtag tu kun la snying rje 'jug/ chags bral sdang ba yang med pa// sgrub po 'gro ba kun yid 'phrog/ dbang po rab tu dul ba dang // dregs med bka' blo rab tu bde// 'jig rten mgon la
304b5(rgyud 'grel): lhag par dang // yid bzhung gang yin skal ldan mtshon// ci ste 'di brtsams kyis ma spobs// de nas sbrang rtsi rma bya'i mdongs// me tog bzang po kun 'dab rtse// spos chus sbyar ba smin mtshams byug/ byang chub sems dkar dmar thig le// rgya mtsho'i sbu ba seng
304b6(rgyud 'grel): ldeng bags// tsan dan dmar po ga bur bcas// dpral bar byugs la gsang sngags brjod// spyan ras gzigs dpal yid 'ong mthus// dam bcas dam tshig rjes dron phyir// rtag pa'i rgyal po las byed 'dis// skye bo kun yid mngon sum 'phrog/ sems
305a1(rgyud 'grel): can mgu bar byed pa rdzogs so// / 'phags pa thugs rje chen pa rab tu snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ba nges par mi shes pas ci byas de la mang bar gyur te ldongs pa rnams kyis 'dir bcom ldan
305a2(rgyud 'grel): 'das 'phags pa thugs rje chen po rab tu snang mdzad la re ba bskyed la/ zhag gsum 'am gnyis sam gcig gi bar du yid la byed pa gcig dang mi 'bral bas rig pa bzla zhing smyung bar gnas par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ na maHshrI Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sa to
305a3(rgyud 'grel): mahA ka ru Ni kA/ ya mtha pha Tha raH/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha dz+nyA na gar+b+he tiSh+Tha taMSh+Tha ma ma sa ba Na dASh+Ta pra daR+sha hUM hUM swA hA// 'jig rten mgon po'i mchod rten la// me tog dkar po sogs bdug bcas// mchod pa mang pos nyer mchod cing / phyag 'tshal kun tu bskor bar bya/
305a4(rgyud 'grel): lus kyi 'dab skyes 'dab bzhi la// ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos po bzhi// man ngag bzhin du ri mor dgod// ge sar rang sems me long ngo // de nas lhag pa'i lha dran pas// sdig la sogs pa bsal nas ni// 'phags pa'i zhabs la mgo btugs la// snang ba
305a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal pos snyoms par 'jug/ sangs rgyas sras po thugs rje che// kun mkhyen lus can kun don bsgrub// 'dod ldan yul la rtags skugs ltar// dus drug gzigs des mkhyen pa 'jug/ tho rangs dge slong dkar po dang // pad+mo'i rtags can bud med kyi// 'dod
305a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don gang yod pa de// me long nang gi gzugs ltar ston// rmi lam ston pa rdzogs so// / mgon pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// brje chen ring nos gdungs pa spangs pa'i rgyus// rnam kun skye ba mya ngan sel mdzad pa// dpal
305b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan mgon po mya ngan med pa'i dpal// ji bzhin sgrub thabs bdag gis 'dir bsdu bya// rkang gnyis skyil krung lag pa mnyam par bsnol// mig pab rdo rje skyil krung brtsegs nas ni// rta mchog rgyal po dal dbus rjes 'gro dang // 'ong bas rgyud rab rtse gcig gyur pa na//
305b2(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dran par byas la mchod pa rgya chen po sngon du 'gro bas bcom ldan 'das spyan drang bar bya'o// rim pa gang dang ldan pas gsol ba btab la// de'i snying po ri bong can las 'od dang bdud rtsi dang yi ge
305b3(rgyud 'grel): hrIHyi rgyan gyis gtar ba'i phreng ba phyung ste/ bsgrub bya'i snying gi ze'u 'bru'i rtse mo nas brlan par bya'o// bde gshegs zla ba dkar mdog mun sel ba// rnam par mi rtog 'od mdzad mya ngan med// cig car ting 'dzin chos sgo brgya phrag la// mnyam gzhag chos ston
305b4(rgyud 'grel): trail gyi glang bu bzhin// rdul bral dgra bcom dbang po rab zhi dang // kun spyod brtul zhugs thogs med rnal 'byor can// mkha' rgyu stobs chen sa'i lha mo sogs// skad cig gis lhags me tog gtor ma sbyin snying dbus dkar 'tsher a dang drag po'i
305b5(rgyud 'grel): mig gnyis la// yi ge bdud rtsi 'od gsal phreng ba mas rims bzhin// myo ngan med cing mya ngan de bde dang // mya ngan rnam dag bu mo'i gdams ngag bzhin// kun mthong ri bo'i rtser gnas rtswa zil la// brag ngos me tog snying po bzhag nas ni// rjes mthun skye bo
305b6(rgyud 'grel): yid rab zhi pa yis// dbyangs brjod mya ngan med mgon dran pas sbyin// gnas gang na 'babo chu dang ne'u gsing dang me tog sngon po 'am/ dkar po sa brgyan nas/ dus dang nye bar sbyar ba'i gtam grags pas sems tshim par byed cing / snying rje chen pos brten
306a1(rgyud 'grel): ba' bzhir lhar rnal 'byor la snying bar byed pa'i grogs dang lhan cig pas nya ma bdun nam// dgu 'am bcugacag la sogs pa'i bar du gnas par bya'o// rtag tu lnga yis dbugs 'byin dang // pha rol sems dang yon tan dran// 'jig/
306a2(rgyud 'grel): rten mgon la yid ston pas// skye bo'i mya ngan mya ngan sel// oM AHhrIHka ra ka ra a tsa ra tsa ra i/ Ta ra Ta ra u/ ta ra ta ra e/ pa ra pa ra o/ sa ra ya ra oM/ \u0f7fhUM hU~M hUM/ sho kau shan+d+ha pa ha ra ha ra/ a sho ka pra ha ra prA ha ra a sho ka ni/ swA b+hA ba shA n+yA tA a
306a3(rgyud 'grel): phaT swA hA// yid 'gyod pa bsal ba rdzogs so// / 'phags pa thugs rje chen po longs spyod mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// re shig sgrub pa po 'byor pa dman pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa rgud pas zil non te bag zhum pa dang // yod kyang
306a4(rgyud 'grel): myur du mdzad pas ma rungs par byed pa de dag thams cad/ chags pa dang brnab sems kyis rang dang gzhon gyi yongs su bzung ba la mngon par gdungs pa spongs te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs rgya mtsho'i gter gyi bdag po la skyabs su dong bar
306a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// shel dang bai DU ra rA ga dang // nI la rin chen las grub pa'i// gzhal med khang mchog dbus su ni// mgon po longs spyod mi zad bsgom// gser gyi bum pa bzang bkang ba// nor bu tshem tshom skyug pa'i kha// dpag bsam shing tshen rgyas pa'i
306a6(rgyud 'grel): gseb// sprin grib la ni yongasu rtsen// g.yas dmar g.yon sngo dbus dkar zhal// snang mtha' rdo rje thig les brgyan// nor sbyin byin rlob skyabs mdzad dang // gter dang lcags kyu pad+mo'i phyag/ skyi la krung phyed brtan kun nga'i mdog/ 'dom gang
306b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od gsal 'khor lo sogs// rin chen bdun 'dzag mu tig 'bru'i// char 'babs g.yo ba mi mnga' ba'o// de yi phyag rgya nor sbyin par mdzad pa'i bdud rtsi can gyi mthong thos lngas/ nor bu dang 'bru dang sman gyi char dong tshe brtsegs pa lnga bu rgyun ma chang
306b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'ongs pas bdag gis longs spyod thams cad kyi sbubs su 'jug par bya'o// oM AHhrIHshrI ar+ya lo ki te shwa ro ma ma sarba sau b+ho ka ra rat+na rat+ne/ ma hA tsin+ta ma Ni b+ha ra d+ha ra a kA ya ak+saM pa tis+thi ti hUM// bdag nyid btsun mo pad+mo can gyi ting nge 'dzin
306b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis me tog dmar po dang dkar po sol ma thogs la/ pog phor bdug cing thal mo sbyar ba 'am/ 'dud pa sngon du song bas mchod par bya'o// de nas ji tsa maM longs spyod pas zad pa de tsa mi 'phags pa'i phyag nas blang ngo // bla ma dang lha mchod pa dang
306b4(rgyud 'grel): phaphun pa'i gnas dang / mgon med pa la sbyin pa'i rim pa lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ma grol ba ni dam tshig go/ grub pa'i 'bras bus can la// bsngo dang nga rgyal med nyid dang // byin pas dbul dang 'phongs 'gyur zhes// dogs bral de yi spyad mi bya/
306b5(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod mi bzang ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / thugs rje chen po dpag bsam gyi shing can la phyag 'tshal lo// dpag med bsod nams ye shes tshogs rab smin pa'i rgyus// gang sku mi gtong dpag bsam shing tshon bsil
306b6(rgyud 'grel): grib can// 'gro ba'i don du shin tu rmad byung sku ston pa// spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che mnga' 'dir mnyes brjod// thog mar rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o// phyi dang nang la sogs pa'i rnam par
307a1(rgyud 'grel): dag pasgyur ba'i rim pas rgyas btab la/ bdag ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i ngang la gnas pas/ rin po che'i sa bzhi las mngon par byung ba'i dpag bsam gyi shing yal ga dang / me tog dang 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgyas pa/ spos kyi
307a2(rgyud 'grel): ngang zhim pos bsrung zhing de las grub pa'i sil snyan gyi sgras chos kyi sgo thams cad yang dag par ston pa/ lha'i bu dang bu mo la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis bstod cing phu dud byas pa'i sdong bu chen po la bzhugs pa ni/ 'phags pa spyan ras
307a3(rgyud 'grel): gzigs kun nas 'od zer bkod pa'i rgyal po/ kun tu zhal kha dog bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad kyis rab tu mdzes pa rdo rje skyil me dkrung gis mi g.yo bar bzhugs shing / 'od dpag tshad gcig pas btsun mo dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khoraro lham me
307a4(rgyud 'grel): lhang de gsal bar mdzad pa'o// chags bral chags pa'i kha dog can// nor bu 'bar bas brgyan pa'i sku// blta bas mi ngoms btsun mo dang // lhan cig 'jigs skyob la sogs 'khyud// gzhan dag sdong bu las phye ba// dgu brgyad dgu bcu dgu yal ga/
307a5(rgyud 'grel): ba nyi ma sogs steng du// skal bzang sangs rgyas 'dzum pa mdzad// shAkya'i rgyal po thugs ka dang // 'od dpag med dpal cod pan dang // smin 'tshams na ni mi bskyod pa// phyag mthil rdo rje mgrin sngon nyid// gang dag 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan// bkra shis
307a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzas dang nor dang 'bru// me tog rgyan dang mchod rdzas sman// gang yod ma lus 'dir sprul bya// bai DUr rang bzhin sdong bu rab tu kun nas brjid chags 'khrungs pa yi// yal ga bzang gyes phyogs bcur 'dud rnams rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khur khyer zhing //
307b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu g.yur za me tog kha phye phan tshun 'gran pa bzhin ston pa// mkha' khyab dri ldang 'jig rten gsum skyabs dga' ba skyed par byed pa yin// ye shes spyan drangs nas gus pas rdzas dang bcas pas rim gro rdzogs par byas la/ sdig pa bsal ba dang / 'gro ba'i
307b2(rgyud 'grel): don du gsol ba btab ste/ rang gi spyod yul du gnas par bsam mo// de'i 'og tu dpag bsam gyi mchod pa 'bul ba dang / lhan cig tu rig sngags bzla zhing gar mkhan dang rol mo mkhan dang / glu mkhan la sogs pas dgyes pa bskyed par bya'o// oM AHhrI
307b3(rgyud 'grel): kalpa br-ik+Sha hUM/ nam zhig skyo bar gyur no yang // se shes rten la bsdus nas su// dam tshig dran pa'i rgyas btab ste// tshogs brdar ba ni mkhas pa'i lugs// dpag bsam gyi shing can gyi bsgrub thabs rdzogs sa// / thugs rje chen po bum pa bzang po
307b4(rgyud 'grel): can la phyag 'tshal lo// gter chen bu ma pa gser gyi mchog/ dpag bsam shing ltar 'gro ba yi// re bzhin yal ga bzang byed pa// de yi dbus bzhugs nyid dpal 'dud// gang yang sgrub po blo gros che// dad dang ldan yang dbul gyur pa// de dag gi ni 'byor pa
307b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / dngos grub lhan cig 'phags pa sgrub// re zhig phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas sam bum pa bzang po lta bu'i dbyibs kyi gzhir de dang 'dra ba'i bsam gtan gyi khang bu bcos la/ gang du 'dug pa'i mal du mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa'i bum pa bris te/
307b6(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gnas pa'i bkra shis gsol bar bya'o// de nas zla ba nya la bab na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snyan gsan phab la// zla ba gcig gi bar tshangs par spyod pas btsun pa dka' thub chen po can mnyes par bya'o// slad kyis yang zla ba rgyas pa'i
308a1(rgyud 'grel): nyon mor gyur pa na/ gos dang brtson/ ba baspyan bcas rgyan rnams na brtan/ rim mon+ta nan k+ku ha~M/ 'phags pa na la byug dang bskur bas sngags pa du/ spyod ga sa sbya bang sa nA/
308a2(rgyud 'grel): baspyan ras gzigs bum pa la bstim mo// gzhal med khang mchog rin chen bum pa bzang 'khyil la// lha rdzas mgul cing yid bzhin yal ga 'bras byas brgyan// de dbus sdong bu me tog u du mo bA ri'i rtser// 'jig rten gsum skyob dmar mdzes nor gyi
308a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyun can bsgom// dpag med lo 'dab me tog tshogs 'khrungs bkram pa'i yang // ge sar rtse la rgyas spras chos mang ston pa dang // rtse dga' mchod pa'i lha tshogs rnam par 'phro ba yis// sa 'dir ma lus cig car cho 'phrul rnam par 'phral// maMg gi rdzi bskyod
308a4(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa ya gcig bteg pa dang // lag pa dkur brten 'dzum pa'i mdangs legs 'gying pa sogs// mi yi bu mo bzhin bzangs rnams kyang bka' bsgo la// bum bzangs mdun byas 'phags pa mchod la brtson par bya// oM AHhrIHsarba bud+d+ha ni mo rid+d+hi
308a5(rgyud 'grel): rat+na rat+na/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+hi ri d+hi ri d+hu ru d+hu ru badz+ra dz+nyA na ka ru Na ye/ rat+na g+ha Ta b+ha tra saM purba/ su saM pUr+Na ku ru ye swA hA/ gzungs skud dri ldan lag tu thogs// me tog phreng bas mgo btsangs la// rnal 'byor ldan pas sngags bzla zhing // bum bzang las ni dngos
308a6(rgyud 'grel): grub blang // dkar nag phyed phyed phyogs kun la// dbul po tshim par bya ba dang // rnyed pa'i dang pos bla ma mchod// kun la chags med mchod sbyin spyod// bum pa bzang po can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / thugs rje chen po lam gyi bzhi
308b1(rgyud 'grel): mdo can la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten la// thugs brdas dben pa spangs nas ni// lam gyi bzhi mdor kun don spyad// spro ba mang skyob sgrub thabs bri// byang chub sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po can gyi bdag nyid grags pa la sogs/
308b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir ma yin par lam gyi bzhi mdo dang tshong 'dus chen po la so/ par 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bsgrub par bya'o// de ni thugs rje shes rab kyis// dben pa spangs phyir chags med phyir// lam chen zhugs dang bltos meng phyir//
308b3(rgyud 'grel): dzir 'du 'dzi med pas grub// re zhig skye bo mang po'i spyod yul du byed pa'i gnas ni 'phags pa dgyes pa'i gnas yin pas der skyil bu'am khang bu la sogs pa gnas mal kha dog dkar po pad+mo'i tog can legs par bcos la/ ji snyed 'byor pa'i
308b4(rgyud 'grel): yo byad thams cad kyis 'phags pa nyid mchod pa'i phyir bortson par bya'o// skyob pa skyob med gcig pu// ljon shing bzang la sku brten to// pad+mo dang ni 'bras bu ster// bcu drug na chod mdzes pa'o// cho ga bzang shes bdag dang lha// tha dad rim gro bya byed du/
308b5(rgyud 'grel): bltas te dus gsum mchod pas mchod // de mnyes bya phyir rig pa bzlas// oM AHhrIHsarba lo kAr+b+ha sarba rid+d+ha sad+d+hi hUM hUM hUM/ sarba satwan+na pa ri pU ra pUr+tha sa ma ya sma ra hUM hUM hUM sarba tsit+ta saM duSh+Ta b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ pra trAt+ta panA saM b+ha ba ka ra hUM hUM hUM zhes bya ba
308b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dum phrag gcig bzlas la/ de'i phrin las yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ lam gyi bzhi mdo la sogs par mchod rten bzhengs par bya'o// de'i nang du pad+mo'i sdong bu dbus mal bzhugs pa'i spyan ras gzigs skyo ba rnam par spangs po dang / shar
309a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i sdong bu bzhi la lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrogs dang dril bu can gyi thugs rje dkar po/ dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gug pa dog can rnams bcos la/ rab tu gnas pa cho ga ji lta ba bzhin byin
309a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab par bya'o// skye bo mang po don gnyer la// skye med dkyil 'khor sbyin gyi tshul// mkha' la lding bas steng brgyan pa// mgon po rnams kyi yid bzhin nor// srogs chags gang gang dang yod dang // dang med shes dang mi shes pa'ang // kun tu lam chen 'dir
309a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyun// de dag ngan 'gror 'gro mi sring // rang gi mthong dang thos dang dran// grib mas reg dang so sor rtog/ de dag rnams kyang ma thogs par// 'jig rten mgon gyi zhing du skye// lam chen po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / wa ti'i rgyud can gyi thugs rje chen
309a4(rgyud 'grel): bo la phyag 'tshal lo// dkar bsil ro brgya bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab nyid kyi phyag/ glang chen sna phub lha brgya'i cong pan gyis gtugs pa// ma lus sa steng bgyi ba bsgrub mdzad mchog gi bu/ dpal ldan dpal chen spyan ras gzigs dbade nyid rtag 'dud// dga'
309a5(rgyud 'grel): dang mya ngan ha cang sdig mang dge ba sogs// 'gyur ba'i las kyi dbang po gang yin de gzhan 'gyur// de che lha mchog wa ti'i rgyun 'bebs dus gsum du// nyin dang mtshan mo rnam pa kun tu mi g.yeng bsgom// de la rgyun 'bab pa ni gnyis te/ yid kyi las
309a6(rgyud 'grel): can dang / dngos po'i las can no// yid kyi las can ni mtshan mo la'o// dngos po'i las ni nyin par ro// gang na 'jug dogs bde zhing dri dad ldang ba me tog ljon shing g.yur zabs mdzes par// nyid kyi phyag dpung pa tshun cad yongs rdzogs pa 'am
309b1(rgyud 'grel): mkhrig ma'i bar du yang rung ste/ de lta bu'i gzugs gdub bu dang sor gdub la sogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bcos te/ mdog bzang pos bsgyur la/ zla ba nya ba dang nyi ma shar ba'i dus gang rung la rab tu gnas par bya'o// me tog char dang
309b2(rgyud 'grel): bdug pa'i sprin gtibs rol mo 'brug sgra cher sgrags shing // ba dan rnga yab glog gi rgyun 'khrigs ro bzangs zhal zas kyis mchod do// bar snang kun pa gro 'phrin las rjes bstod tshangs dbyangs nga ros dril bsgrags la// rdo rje dril bsgrogs dgyes
309b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gar bskyod rdo rje dga' bas bro gar dbul// de nas yi ge gsum sngags kyis// byin gyis brlab pa'i rgyun phab pa'i// pad+mo'i phyag gis ming med kyi// rtse nas legs gtar snying pos btung // rdo rje sems dpa'i dang po dbang // dag byed dri med bde ba che//
309b4(rgyud 'grel): de 'dir pad+mo sems dpa' che// rnam dag 'ongad gsal rmad yin no// ji lta ji ltar spyi gtsug nas// rgyun 'bab de lta de ltar ni// skal ba bzang po'i lus ngag yid// dri bral mi nyam mnyam par 'gyur// gzhan dag phongs pa sna tshogs dang // phun sum
309b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs min gang gyur pa// de dag kyang ni skad gcig gis// spong gyur 'thungs pa tsom gyis kyang // dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug wa ti can gyi sgrub thabs rdzogaso// / thugs rje chen po gtsug gtor nas byung ba'i rgyal po la phyag
309b6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i skye bo ldongs pa yang // gang gis shes rab thugs rje 'bar ba yis// mi gtong rtag tu spyi gtsug rtsa mchog rtser// brtan bzhugs bdag gir mdzad pa dgongs grub shog/ mi ni ring nas ded dang mngon 'dod yod//
310a1(rgyud 'grel): de la drang srong nam yang mi ring ste// bag ring mtsho nang pad+ma skyes pa yang // bum pa nags na gnas pa nyin rer brtul// 'di na tshangs sogs grags chen mthu can yang // ma rgas skye 'chi srid pa'i dgra tshegs las// rgyal bar ma gyur yang
310a2(rgyud 'grel): nga ma spangs na// nus pa bdag la ci zhig bde ba yis// sa gsum dbang phyug 'jig rten skyob nyid 'dir// mchog dman bar ma'i yid can skal rim bzhin// snying dbus spyi gtsug ring nas skyob dam bcas// de bzhin skyabs 'dod gtsug tor cho ga bsam/
310a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bstan bcas mig phab ste// smyug ma lta bu'i tshigs rgyun gyis// sgo gnyis nas ni dbugs bzlog la// rtsa mchog rtser ni thugs dbang lha// rta mchog lam ni sdong bus te// dkyil 'khor gang yin rgya mtsho'o// spyi gtsug 'dab ma bye bas lte// de steng
310a4(rgyud 'grel): mtho gang 'phags pa lha// lnga ldan yal ga dbus 'dab la// mi g.yo'i phyag rgya pad+mo 'dzin// rtsa skyob rlung skyob theg le skyob// ting 'dzin skyobs rnams phyogs bzhi'o// hrIHyig snying ga las 'ongs sa bon dang // ri dbang nas bskyod ye shes lha// 'dus gyur
310a5(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs bzhir bcas yum// sgrub pa pos ni rnam par bsgom// 'od dang thig le mnyam par bzhigo// rang gnas snyoms par 'jug pa dang // 'du bral 'ang mi byed dang de// zhi ba nyid dang 'od gsal rtag/ thog ma bar dang mthar ram bzhin// smin 'tsham
310a6(rgyud 'grel): tshangs sgro namakha' yi// lam nas 'jug cing 'bab dang gnas// nyid kyi sngon du dam bcu pa'o// gang dag rnam par mi g.yeng bas// phun gsum du ni rtag tu dran// snying rje chen pos kun spyod pa// kha na ma thog me 'grub rgyu// pad+mo'i sdong bu can gyi sgrub thabs
310b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / a/ dpal thugs rje chen po dri ma 'jig pa la phyag 'tsha'o// yang 'dir bshad par bya ba'i dus// snga dro 'dab chags sgra sgrog che// dpal ldan po ta la rgyal ba// dang pa drag pas dmigs nas ni// me tog dmar ba dri dang bzang ba/
310b2(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba ji snyed tshegs pa btus la// gser gyi snod dam kham sa'i snod yol mor spungs te// zangs sam mtshal gyis byugs pa'i bum pa rgyan dang bcas pa lnga tshan lngas gang ba dkar po'i chu dang sbyar bas yog pa lhag ma'i rgyun mchu bteg nas 'bab pa steng du
310b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhag par bya'o// ldong ros dang gla rtsi dang ga bur la sogs pa dri dam pas byugs pa'i sku gtsug tor du bzhugaso// shar dang lho dang nub byang rim// me long dbyug pa rnga yab rgyan// btags la thun mtshams phrin las dbul// thal sbyar mi g.yeng gus bstod
310b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod// de nas gtor ma dang mchod pa'i khyad par rnam pa thams cad kyis rgya cher phu dud du byas te// snyan pa'i dbyangs dang lhan cig pa'i ro la mo phul la bstod nas/ lag pa rdo rje'i khu tshur bcangs pas rdo rje byin gyis brlab cing / rdo rje dang pad+ma mtshon pa'i pi
310b5(rgyud 'grel): wang bsgreng zhing snyan pa'i nga ro gsang bstod pas sngags ni bzla'o// oM a i u ai oM oM triH badz+ra a mr-i tA dzo ra dz+wa ra pheM pheM pheM phaT swA hA// 'od zer dmar pos brgyus pa yi// sngags phreng dmar po'i 'khor lo can// cig car rtag tu bar ma chad// rgya
310b6(rgyud 'grel): mtsho la ni char rgyun bzhin// bdag nyid dri ma 'jig pa yi// spyan ras gzigs kyi nga rgyal gyis// ye shes bstims pa'i rjes la bum pa steng gi lha bdag nyid ji bzhin du skyed de/ bdag dang de'i srin lag nas 'bab par rig par bya'o// dngos sam nyams
311a1(rgyud 'grel): sa ma rmi lam na// lha mthong ba dang lus bkrus dang // bum nang pi wang sgra sgrog pa// grub pa'i ltas yin de nas spyad// spyan ras gzigs dri ma 'jig pa'i bum pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// / 'phags pa thugs rje chen po kun nas
311a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i mtshan ma can la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM AHhrIHbadz+ra badz+rod b+ha ba sarba d+har+m+ma ni/ swa b+ha ba rA pa ta gar pa Di D+D+h+ya dz+wa la dza l-i/ pra ti dz+wa la pra ti dz+wa la ha na ha na pra ha na pra ha na/ sarba ta thA ga to tsit+ta s+thi ra hUM phaT/ lte dbus rta bdun pabar ba nyid// hriHyig
311a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pas mtshams bsgoms la// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// tshogs rdzogs rdo rje sgeg par balnga// hUM brjod rim gyis 'phel 'gyur te// a brjod bdag lus bzhu ba ni// rdo rje la bcugs ho brjod pas// kun tu bskor zhing spang bar bya// lte bar hUM mtshan
311a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba a dang de bzhin ho// a sogs ka sogs bde che ni bdun pa'i yi ge'ang de mthar phreng ba'i tshul// sngags brjod rab zhi gdug pa'i sems skrag ye shes me lce 'bar// mi bzang sgra skrag na mkha'i ngos la ser sprin 'brug gi da ro bzhin// rnal 'byor rgyal
311a5(rgyud 'grel): po gzi brjid che// thugs rje khros pas drag pa'i thugs// dpal ldan rnam par rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra don sdig pa kun sel ba'o// dpal rdo rje 'bar ba'i srung ba chen po'i man ngag rdzogs so// / thugs rje chen po spyan 'khor lo rab tu
311a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje chen po gdul bya yi// don du lhor bltas 'khor lo bri// nyi shar zla rgyas skar mnga' 'phro// 'brug sgra drag dang char drag 'bab// sprin med pa dang rnyed pa thob// de tshe sngags gsum rim bzhin no// ga bur tsan ngan dkor
311b1(rgyud 'grel): thig le// sku gdung khrus chab sbyor ba yis// mu khyud a phreng dkar ldan pa'i// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rab dkar bri// oM AHhrIHhUM ho phaT swA hA// gla rtsi tsan dan dmar zla mtshan// snying rje chen po'i me tog chus// ze'u 'bru dkar phreng dmar ldan pa'i// pad+mo 'dab
311b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad ra wa~M// hrIHshrIHd+hi g+ha~M dzaHhUM baM hoHgu gul sbrang dang myos byed chu// snying rjes zags pa'i mchi mas sbyar// thabs shes thig le gnyis ldan pa'i// lte bar bde gshegs snying po bri// sngags gsum rdzas gsum go rims bzhin// ming dang rus
311b3(rgyud 'grel): dang sa bon dgod// rak+Sha gnyis kyis mtha' rten la// mi 'gyur thig les mtshan par bya// de nas dkar phyogs gza' skar shis// ye shes bkug nas rab gnas bya// me tog dkar dmar sngo gtor la// mchod pa kun gyis mngon mchod gdags// srung
311b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs so// / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// gnyis med rnam par mi rtog dag/ zhi ba'i dbyings su bsrung rdzogs nas// thugs rje'i stobs kyis gzhan skyob dpal/ 'jig rten mgon po la btud
311b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod// yang mya ngan phongs pa yis// gnas su bdag nyid de nyid tshe// pad+mo can gyi lcags kyu yis// rdo rje chen po'i bsrung ba brtsam// bde gshegs mdzad pa'i lhag ma can// lte bar rtse pad+ma lhas// mtshan pa lhog par gan sa legs byas// sor bzhi
311b6(rgyud 'grel): sor gcig tshon gang tshang // rim tshan maN+Dal bkod dbus su// sgron chen bzhis bskor pad+mo'i steng // grags chen phyag rtse nas 'bab pa'i// 'o mas khrus gsol mchod pas mchod// pad+mo rdo rje dam tshig che// gsang sngags rgyal po rjes dran pas//
312a1(rgyud 'grel): bdun phrag gcig tu bzlas bsnyen te// ye shes rgyal po mngon bzhugs bstod// oM a a a hri hri hri hUM hUM hUM phag tha mal lus dbul rdo rje btul// rdo rje'i yi ges rnam rgyun pa// rang ming bzlas pas spel ba dang // lus bzhu rdo rje'i gzugs
312a2(rgyud 'grel): su 'gyur// rtse gnyis ra dgu go rim bzhin// oM phaT 'bru dgus dbus brgyan pa// de nyid sngags pas me dpung 'khrug/ thugs rje khros pas rngam par byed// lta stengs bsreg dang bskrad pa dang // gzhig dang bsnun dang bsad pa'i las// brtan pa rnams kyi kun spyod
312a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ nam yang 'jigs par mi bya'o// gnyid dang myos dang rnam par g.yeng // nad dang mya ngan gro bur dgra/ drug po las ni rdo rje yaM// thod par lus bcug rdo rjes bcing // zhu lu ba spu glang chen gos// mgal dum ge'u gzhal med khang // rnal 'byor chen po bdag dang
312a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas// bcing bas bcing bar shes par bya// rang bsrung ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// / 'phags pa thugs rje chen po thugs rje khrod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ma lus yon tan rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pas// 'gro ba'i don du rmang byung shin tu grags// stongs
312a5(rgyud 'grel): bcu lha dang mi lus rnam rgyal ba// gtso bo nyid gcig thugs rjes khrod la 'dud// snying rje chen po snying rje zab// shes rab 'od gsal shes rab dag/ gnyis med gnyis su rab ston pa// de ming thugs rje chen po'o// gdul bya'i don mthong rang bzhin dang // cig
312a6(rgyud 'grel): shes zhe dang zhi bral dang // gdul bya rnams kyi don phyir ni// dpal ldan mchin bzang khros par snang // nyin mtshan zla ba dkar dang nag/ dul ba dang ni gdug pa dang // gnyis la gnyis mdzad mgon po mchog/ cha lugs gnyis kyis gnyis bya'o// ngas
312b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid rdo rje chen po yi// bsrung bas gzi byin bskyed pa'i rjes// de yi gnas dang lus bskyab pa'ang // ji bzhin cig car thog thag brtag/ oM AHhrIHhU~M oM AHhrIHhoHoM AHhrIHhaM/ oM AHhrIHphaT/ rgya gram gzugs kyis bzhad pa'i zhal// gnam lcags
312b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyun sgra sngags kyi lces// bsrung ba bya dang brlag pa bya// mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor las gzhan min// gzhan bskyab pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs rdo rje'i rgyas btab pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
312b3(rgyud 'grel): la dad pa thob pas/ tsher bas gzir ba dang / gdon gyis glags btsal ba dang / rkun po dang dgras 'jigs pa'i nus pa'i dbang ba bsrung ba la sogs pa'i don du snying rje chen pos bsrung skud bcing bar bya'o// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+mo sna tshogs
312b4(rgyud 'grel): kha dog can// ras dang dar dang bal dang rtsa// pad+ma'i skud pa shin tu bsngags// gzhon nu gos dmar gos dkar gyon// rgyan dmar rgyan dkar de bzhin du// cod pan thabs dang shes rab 'dzin// rdo rje dril 'dzin g.yas g.yon 'dzin// mchod pa kun sngon 'gro ba
312b5(rgyud 'grel): yis// 'dab rgyas pad+mo bris dbus su// gnyis kyis srang bu gzhag nas ni// bgegs bsal gtor ma sngon song sbyang // de rjes lhag pa'i lhar bskyed nas// 'jig rten dbang phyug pad+mo dang // srad bu bsnams pas dgyes bzhugs la// 'od 'phros mdung pa
312b6(rgyud 'grel): dor bar bya// lus ngag sems gsum bcings pa yi// rgya gsum phyag rgya bsam pa ste// ting nge 'dzin gsum sngags gsum rim// slob dpon mi g.yeng la gnas pas// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings deng // sdig mdzub rdo rje rtse gcig nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi
313a1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyis// bang phyung chu rgya btab pa la// oM Ud+d+hiHkA sa byAH gar+b+had+hA/ oM ad+d+hiHkhyAm n+ta thA gaHd+h+waM/ oM AHd+b+hits+tshid+d+ha dz+dza tsid+b+ha gar+d+had+h+waM/ dmatshi ga srung du dung dang byu dgas 'ong n+d+ha ma mdog gas pag/
313a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gsum 'bar ba'i do sgra gsung thugs dag skal ldan lus ngas ying btab pa/ slobang po ni medu chen po tal lo thugs pa skyes mchog ste rjes shin tu non pa'i yid// ting dzin phyogs kyis de nyid btsugs bris pa bza rtani mgul dang dung pa
313a3(rgyud 'grel): srung snong kyi tsha rdzogs so// dpel 'phags pa spyan pas gzigs pa dbyugs phyag 'tshal lo// mgon phyi gnon nu sgrag khros tshul// gnon nu gdon las rnam N+Dal ga// sh-i nan nu sgrubs phyal 'tshal nas// bzhin nu bsung pyi 'di bshang
313a4(rgyud 'grel): bye 'i zhig nam langs mthag tu ba shar du gas te la spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan par byas la/ de'i dkyil 'khor gzhon nu khros pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di 'azlas par bya'o// oM aHhrIHku ma kro d+hAsar+b+ba dASh+TAn hU ra d+hA ra kAm
313a5(rgyud 'grel): baShA hU~M Ta/ waM snyan nag pa'i stan 'dug la// gzhon nu khros pa'i nga rgyal gyis// shar sogs phyogs gzhir gtum mo bzhi// rang bzhin ma yengs bsdu bar bya// de la lus bsrung dpa' bo gnag/ skal gsu mi phyag drug dkar de mar po// rdo rje la
313a6(rgyud 'grel): dgra sta zhags// ral gri At+pal bsnams pa'o// srog bsrung dpa' bo dmar pos te// zhal gsum phyag drug sngos ri ngamar// gr-i gug thod pa 'khor lo dbyig rgyal mtshan mgo bo 'dzin pa nyid// stobs bsrung dpo' bri sngo ldang ser// zhal gsum phyag/
313b1(rgyud 'grel): drug ser dmar ljang // be con sdig mdzub mdung tho ba// rdo rje mnga' gzhu thogs pa'o// dpal bsrung dpa' bo dkar pos ste// zhal gsum phyag drug sngo dmar dkar// gan ma lcags kha T+wAM skyabs sbyin sgrom// mnyam par gzhag pas zhi zhing khro// gzhon nu'i ston mo sngon
313b2(rgyud 'grel): song bas// lag tu rdo rje dril thogs shing // rkang pa rdo rje 'gros bskor bas// gzhan na dran pa'i rgyas bsgrub bya// gzhon nu rab tu srung bar bya// lha la skyabs su 'gro ba dang // gzhan la bltos pa maud nyid kyis// 'od zer rdo rje'i gur phub cing // ka pA la'i sbyor ba brtsam/
313b3(rgyud 'grel): rang nyid rdo rje spar ba yis// rnal 'byor gzhon nu khros pa yis// ting nge 'dzin la brtan pa dang // gzhon nu dran pa'i rgyas bskyab bya// gzhon nu bsrung ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// / jo bo thugs rje chen po nad thams cad las rnam par rgyal po gzi brjid
313b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten gsum dbang rnam par rgyal// 'gro ba'i nad ni sna tshogs dang // de rgyu nya dang ring ba rtsol// ma lus pha rol phyin phyag 'tshal// blo ldan bdag gam gzhan gyi don// rtsom pa che la zhugs pa na// dgra dang gdon nyid dang
313b5(rgyud 'grel): las dang // de bzhin rkyen gzhan nad skyed byed// de la dpal ldan spyan ras gzigs// sdug bsngal can la thugs brtse bas// bsrung dang skyob dang sdong rim bzhin// snying dbus spyi bo phyag 'tshal bshad// rlung mkhris bdade kan 'dus pa nyid// 'og ma'i rims
313b6(rgyud 'grel): drag sna tshogs rigs// mdze can dang ni kra mo smra chu// thibs non la sogs kun nges skyob// sgrub po dang ldan byams yid brlan// pho brang mchog tu kha bltas te// khrus byas gos dkar bzang gyon la// tshangs pa'i gnas pa legs gnas bya// sna tshogs
314a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod mdzes dpag med dang // 'byung po rnams kyis don grub rdzas// stobs can dkar dmar mang dang ldan// bdug pa mchog gis bdag gus mchod// oM AHhrIHsarba bya d+hi pa ti pra ha na hUM phaT swA hA// bdag nyid 'dam skyes stong dbu su//
314a2(rgyud 'grel): ji skad 'byung ba'i rgyal po nyid// 'od dpal med kyi snying por bcas// dkar gsal rnam par mi g.yeng ba'o// de nas dad pa drag gdung bcas// 'gro la brtse dang gzhan bltos med// gcig tu rnam par nges yid kyis// skyabs gsol mgon po spyan drang bya//
314a3(rgyud 'grel): dpag med sprin tshogs mchod pa'i lhas// lha mchog mdun du bdar nas ni// ring bar thub chen 'khor mang bcas// brtse phyir steng gi mkhar bzhugs blta// me tog spos dang mar me dri bzang ro brgya'i bza' dang lhab lhub gos mang rgyan mchog dang // pi wang
314a4(rgyud 'grel): dung dang rnga chen gling bu glu dbyangs snyan 'tsher sna tshogs mchod pa'i lha mor bcas// ji ltar sangs rgyas kun tu bzang sogs ji snyed mchod mdzad bdag gi'ang zab cing rgya che sprul// de rjes gzhan yang bstod dbyangs kun brjod mi bzang yid kyi nongs pa ma
314a5(rgyud 'grel): lus yang dag bshags// de nas dad pa mang ldan dang // skye dgu rnams la snying brtsebs// yid bzhin nor la nyer lo bzhin// sna tshogs nang las bsrung gsol bya// bdag gi lus dang lhag bsam nyid// drang srong gi ni thugs rje drang // smon lam stobs pa
314a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa yi// byin brlabs bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab gyur// rnga yab dkar rgya ser bu'i ngang skyong bstan par mi nus g.yo bar byed// mi tsho chen gting zab drag po rjes 'o khrug lha dbang thugs kyang btsun mos bzhu// cha bsil zar can nyi zla 'bar ba'ang rta bdun
314b1(rgyud 'grel): rlung g.yos gnas cig min// de bzhin nyid thugs rnyog med zhi ba'ang gdul bya'i don mthong rnam pa kun tu mi bzad 'gyur// de tshe dbang phyug thugs dkyil du// bdag gi lha mos bde bsnun pas// thugs rje'i thugs bskyod byin brlabs rgyun// bdud rtsi'i rgyun
314b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar dkar phreng dbab// g.yas phyag ming mad rtse nas su// zla ba kha ba kun de dung // pad+ma dkar mdog las lhag pa// yul dus rnam kun bar mchad// rgyun bzang spyi gtsug rtsa mchog nas rgyud nas// snying dkyil lha mchog nyid sku gang byas la// chas lhagazor kun
314b3(rgyud 'grel): lus kun rgyas gyur dang // de las 'od phyung 'dom gang dkyil 'khor bskor// gang tshe ga nyid log 'du byed g.yengs gyur na// g.yon phyag nyid kyi pad+mo bdag 'byin la// dadabus pas sasu 'dra stogrub stong ldan// slar zum spyi bo'i phrag nas bdud rtsi blang // dpal spyan ras
314b4(rgyud 'grel): gzigs kyi nang bsrung ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// / 'phags pa thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// ma lus nad rnams kun gyi gzhi// chags sdang gti mug phrag dog dang // ser sna'i dug 'joms spyan ras gzibs// bdud rtsi'i bum 'dzin la phyag
314b5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// nad med nad kyis 'jigs pa dang // nang bcas sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba// de dag 'phags pa nad 'joms kyis// sbyor bas 'jigs pa bskyab par bya// rin chen sbyangs pa'i snod dag par/ na mkha'i chu yis gang byas pa// bde gshegs ring
314b6(rgyud 'grel): bsrel snying po can// mdun bzhag yid kyi dkyil 'khor bsam// de la dkyil 'khor rnam gsum ste// ma ngag dag par byed pa ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// nad 'joms mgon po dkar mdzeso// de ni mtshan mo zla shar dus// shel mdog hriH
315a1(rgyud 'grel): yig las skyes pa// bdud rtsi bum pa dkar bsnams shing // phyag stong bcu gcig zhal mnga' ba'o// dag pa dri med 'khor lo la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// nang sa la mgon po dmar mdzes te// nyin mo rta bdun 'char tshe
315a2(rgyud 'grel): yin// dri med phyir mi ldog pa yi// 'khor lo de ni phyed gsum dus// sna tshogs pad+mo la gnas pa// nad bral mgon po in+d+ra'i mdog/ bud med byis pa bde ster te// zla tshes zla rgyas nad pa'ig dus// nyi shar nyi zer nad med pa// de bzhin phyed gsum nang spang so//
315a3(rgyud 'grel): de phyir mkhas pa nad med lus// don gnyer 'dod pas 'di dag dus// ston mo nye ba'i ston mo dang // dga' ston chen po sbyin par bya// gang yang rnal 'byor lus sbyin gyi// gtor ma rgya chen bya ba dang // mi 'jigs sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i// mchod pa rim bzhin
315a4(rgyud 'grel): brtsom par bya// spyan ras gzigs kyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun// snying rje ldan pa rnams kyis bsgrub// de la mi gang zhig sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa 'am/ glo bur gyi rkyen gang gi stobs kyis lus sam sems la nye bar gnod pa'i mtshan ma 'ga' zhig mthong na
315a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i sgrib pa bsal bar bya ba'i don du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi cho ga 'di la rab tu brtson par bya'o// ba dmar ser gyi 'o ma dang / klu shing gi lo 'bras/ dar skud dmar po dang / mkhal ma dang / snying dang / 'char pa dang / sha
315a6(rgyud 'grel): sha la sogs pa dang / rtsi sman sna tshogs dang / klu sman thams cad dang / rin po che dmar po dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i rdzas dang / spos dang me tog la sogs pa dang / 'bras yos dang snam khur la sogs pa ji snyed
315b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa'i yo byad bsham par bya'o// mdor na klu gso ba'i cho ga rnams las ji snyed bshad pa thams cad do// klu skyob mgon po dkar bzang zhib zhal mnga' ba// spyan gsum brtse ba'i mche bas rab skyong smin ma g.yo// ltos 'gro rgyal po phu yis 'gram gang mgo rgyu can//
315b2(rgyud 'grel): spu re re'ang bdud rtsi'i bum pa'i khur khyer ba'o// g.yas phyag mchog sbyin thal mo pad+mo mdzes bcug kha phye glang chen sna 'dra'i sor mo bkram// ming med rtse naso klu rnams rab dga' sman mchog ro brgya phan mdzad nyid kyi sa bon can// rab tu dang zhing g.yo ba'i bong 'dzag dri
315b3(rgyud 'grel): nga phyogs bcur ldang ba'i thigs pa bdun rtsegs 'bab// phyag mthil a las ye shes 'ong ba phros dbyings dang gsal byed bdud rtsi yig 'bru rnam bcus brgyan// oM AHhrIHmaM nA ga po ShA hUM swA hA// zla ba la ni skar ma bzhin// klu sbyong 'khor lo dkar po 'di// me
315b4(rgyud 'grel): long nang gi gzugs brnyan ltar// snang ba dri med bsgom par bya// byams pa'i gzhu bkang snying rje yi// mnga' bzung gsang sngags bde bsnun pas// rdzas rnams dri ma gzhom pa dang // byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchog tu bya// bdud rtsi thigs pa bdun pa las// pad+ma'i rtsa
315b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i skud pa ltar// phra zhing grims pa'i rgyan phab la// mchod rdzas rnam dag rgya mtshor bskyed// phyag thil a las zer spros pas// gdug pa de dag spyan drang ngo // oM nA gA sa pa ri sa ma ya hUM dza dza/ rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni// mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul gyiso//
315b6(rgyud 'grel): mtsho chen rab dang dpag med rin chen chal par bkram pa'i nang // khang bzangs mang brtsegs klu tsho A tsho zhi bas gnas pa dang // gtum pa'i tshu lo can longs spyod rgya cher 'byor pa la sogs dang // de bzhin sa dang ring gnas rtse shing rten sogs ma lus bsta//
316a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad lce la thub pa yi// 'khor lo'i sngags las 'od 'phros pas// bod kyi sdu gu dam pa dag/ re re las kyang skar mnga' bzhin// de nas sbyin pa'i sngags 'di dag/ brjod pas bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'dzag pa// bcas te klu rnams tshim par bya
316a2(rgyud 'grel): snying rje chen po dam tshig yin// oM AHhrIHma hA kA ru Na shI lo ka nA tha sarba nA ga staM yi pat+te ma hA sat+te a d+hiSh+Tha naM sarba lo kA sarba na gA d+ho Sha pra ha na ha na ha na hUM phaT/ po ShA pra tut+ta po Sha a t+yan+ta pra t+yAt+ta po swA hA// tshad med bdud rtsi'i le gzhis// nyer btsas 'phags pa nyid
316a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'i// khu ba'i chu rgyun dag pas kyang // klu rnams lan mang bkru bar bya// byed ma dog gis rig sngags bzhin// de dag gnod pas sos gyur na// bdag gi gang gang gnod yod pa// de yang snying po mo thogs mdzod// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi klu gso ba'i
316a4(rgyud 'grel): cho ga rdzogs so// / dpal 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon nam tshe 'di 'am glo bur gyi// las dbang gis khebs klu yi nad// rigs bzhi gang gis thabs gyur pa// de dag gso bo 'dir bshad bya// brag ri nags
316a5(rgyud 'grel): tshal phug gam ljongs// me tog dkar pos rab brgyan par// thub pa 'od dpag med kyi sra so// nad bral 'jig rten mgon po bsgrub// gang na klu gnyan sa bdag dang // lha dang lha min gyis bstod pa'i// rten la mchod pa byas nas ni// mdze can rnams la bkur bsti
316a6(rgyud 'grel): byad// de nas lhor ni mngon bltas la// bdag lus 'khor lo 'bar ba yis// spri bo snying gar mgon po hUM// dkar dmar ges la bar bsgoms nas ni// 'bar dang 'jig dang dbang du bya// lus can gdug pa 'dul bya'i phyir// de'i rten dpal ldan thugs
316b1(rgyud 'grel): gco/ klu mgon brgyad kyi gdengs ka can// dug sel bdud rtsi'i ril 'dzin pa// spyan mang 'od dpag med pa'i mtshan// de yi thugs rje mi bzang thugs// snang mtha' ye shes snying po'i bdag/ lus can gdug pa 'dul bya'i phyir// dpag med dug 'joms ting 'dzin
316b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes/ bya bas hrIHyig mnyam gzhag pa'o// lha 'di klu 'dul cod pan zhes// mdo las rab grags de bzhin sems// stobs mthu dpal dang bcas pa yi// ngo bo yi ge rgyal po snying // oM AHhrIHsarba bud+d+ha gan+d+ha shI lo ka nA tha ma ma sa ka la byA d+ha pra ti pra ha na
316b3(rgyud 'grel): ka ra ka ra hUM/ ha re ha ra hUM/ bA rats+tsha bA rats+tsha/ bI bA rats+tsha bI bA ran+ti/ hUM hUM phaT phaka/ sngags 'di rtag tu bzlas nas ni// bdag gi dang dang mgon po'i mthus// nyid kyi thugs bskul 'od dpag med// dug 'joms rgyal po dug sel dang // dug sod dus khyen pa d+ma// dug mthA mdza dang dug med/
316b4(rgyud 'grel): dang // dug bral slar mi ldog pa ya~M// 'od zer phyung sa sgyid dbu si spro// oM AHhrIHhUM oM AHhrIHra~M hUM oM AHhrIHkhaM hUM/ oM AHhrIHshA baM hUM/ oM AHhrIHbaM hU~M/ oM AHhrI baM hUM/ oM AHhU~M baM hUM/ oM AHhrIHtaM hUM/ oM AHtrAMHmaM hUM// mthar byed
316b5(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi 'dzag pa yi// rgyun gyis so dang byams pa yi// 'od kyi byug pas sbyang bar bya// rdo rjes 'gro babo dgu skyeng ngo // yi ngan mtho ris sa steng gi// sbyor ba gnyis kyis bsang dang gso// sbyang po'i tshe go rnam pa gsum// dpal ldan du ga sa la rgyud las
316b6(rgyud 'grel): bshad // mdze nang gso bo rdzogs so// / 'phags po spyan ras gzigs gzhan gyis mi thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma rA ga byir me sbyar kun nas rab 'bar 'od 'phro'i sgra/ khad+mo nyi zla bgegs rnams mgo mnan mi bzang rngam pa'i sku
317a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po// zhal gsum phyag drug spyan stong mnga' ba'i rgyal ba dpa' bo 'jigs shing rab 'jigs bzhad pa po// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal ldan de bzhin ral gri mchog dang dgra sta dang // sdigs mdzub
317a2(rgyud 'grel): dang ni dril bu zhags bcas tshangs pa'i mgo bsnams stag gi pags pas smad g.yogs pa// bskal pa'i me ltar ye shes 'bar ba'i rlabs 'khrug rab tu 'jigs pa'i 'ur sgra can// khrag gis zhal bkang nga ro mi bzad sgra sgrogs sbrul gdug khros pas sku
317a3(rgyud 'grel): rab brgyan// dbang bdag brgyad cu'i mgo bo rlon pas do shal phreng thogs brdabs pa'i gang rgyangs 'byin pa'o// lha 'di dpa' bo dpa' chen po// bdud kyi dgra las rnam rgyal zhing // gzhan gyis mi thub mthu bo che// pha rol dpungs rnams 'joms pa yin// sngags
317a4(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig nang dang dgra// sngon bsags bsod nams ma yin dang // sna tshogs mya ngan 'jigs rnams las// sgrol ba mi pham sbyor ba 'di// rnal 'byor bcom par byed pa des// zla ba drug ni lon pa dang // stag dang seng ge glang chen dang // mkha' lding nor bu
317a5(rgyud 'grel): sgron mthong 'gyur// de tshe snying dkyil pad+mar gyi// 'dab drug yi ge drug dgod bya// oM AHhrIHhUM phaT swA hA// de'i dbus su snying po yi// snying po sa bon hrIHkhros pa'os sngags 'di 'khor lo bskor ba yi// tshul gyis zhag bdun bzlas nas ni// gang gang bzlog dang
317a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa yi// las de la ni sbyar bar bya// las gang yang dag grub 'gyur ro// de nyid skye bo gzhan la yang // sngags dang ting 'dzin phyag rgya dang // khrus kyi cho ga sbyin pa yi// glo bur ring por mi thogs par// ma lus dbang du 'gyur bar bshad// gzhan las
317b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rgyal ba'i gdams ngag rdzog so// / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pha rol rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo// re shig sgrub pa po brtson 'grus can the tshom mi za bas// dag dang gdon dang nad la sogs pa pha rol gyi
317b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir/ dang po kho nar byang chub tu sems brtan par bya'o// de nas sems can thams cad la// snying rje chen po mdun gzhag ste// bsgrub pa'i bar chad bsal ba'i phyir// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rang lus pad+mo
317b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin khros sku// rdo rje sdig mdzub 'khor lo 'dzin// 'bar ba'i lte ba rnam par gnon// rgyu phyed ral gri'i rtsibs 'phro ba'o// mi pi snying po hrIHyin te// gcod byed brgya phyed a kas mtshan// ye shes me dpung 'bar ba'i dbus// dpa' bo rdza mkhan 'khor lo bzhin//
317b4(rgyud 'grel): pha rol byed ma la sogs bgegs// rnam par gnon mdzad thugs rje che// nyid kyi thugs skyod khros pa yis// ye shes spyan drangs gsang sngags gsungs// oM AHhrIHpra re a dzi ta ma hA ka ru Ni ka kro d+ha sa ma ya sma ra hUM/ kha Da ge saM sho d+ha ya ma na sarba ShA paM b+hi ka na
317b5(rgyud 'grel): satwa byA d+hi a d+hI s+phu Ta s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ mA ra mA ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ ha ra ha ra/ pra ha ra pr-i ha ra/ sarba pa rau pa tA rak+Sha rak+ShaM hUM phaT phaT/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs la 'jug pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol rnam par gnon pa'i de kho na
317b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid ting nge 'dzin byed pa dang / ma bral bas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po chen po bar ma chad par rjes su bzla zhing gnod pa thams cad bsreg par bya'o// rig pa 'di bzlas pa tsam gyis sngon gyi dam tshig rjes su dran pas 'phags pa nyid snying la 'jug cing yid
318a1(rgyud 'grel): b+h+ya la snang ba'i rnam pas gshegs la sogs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog par byed do// sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad kyang yongs su gtor bar byed do// yang ba dang 'jigs pa gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du
318a2(rgyud 'grel): byung ngo // de la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang rtag tu dgangs pa mthang bar 'gyur ro// ting 'dzin ldan pas sngags bzlas brtson 'grus can// 'bar bab ral gri me skyes bzung ba'i sbyin// dmar 'khrug rdo rje tshacha 'a
318a3(rgyud 'grel): ra byed// skad cig de la dgra rnams thal b.ro 'gyur// skyo bas thun gyi mtha' la bab pa na// snying rjes yid brtul nga rgyal spangs pa yis// brtan pa'i dran pas g.yo ba rgyun bcang la// rgya chen phyi nang mchod pas 'khor lo mchod// pha rol gyi gnod pa bsrung ba
318a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / bcom ldan 'das pha rol gyi dpung las rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo// brtan pa rnams kyis chos kyi srid // pha rol 'jigs las bsrung ba'i phyir// rdo rje 'jigs byed thugs rje khros// gzhan gyis mi thub cho ga brjod//
318a5(rgyud 'grel): de la pha rol gyi dpung bzlog pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/ nges par rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jigs par byed pa'i sbyor ba'o// 'dir 'jigs par byed pa'i sbyor ba ni// thog mar mtshan ma grub pa sngon du 'gro bas// ring bsrel can gyi snying po can gyi mchod
318a6(rgyud 'grel): rten nam/ thun mong ma yin pa'i rab tu gnas pas gnas par byas pa'i rten gyi mdun du song ste/ rang bzhin ma lus kyis gsol ba btab la/ 'dod pa drog pos thal mo sbyar te shin tu rab tu gus pas re bar bya'o// rten gang thugs dkyil thugs rje
318b1(rgyud 'grel): khros/ rdo rje 'jigs byed bcu drug sor// maM bzad rngam zhing rnam 'gyur ba// bsgoms la ye shes bstims par bya// rang snying nyi dbus hUM nga ma hIH// 'bar ba yongs 'gyur rdo rje blta// de nyid brjod pas 'jigs byed nyid// kun tu me 'od 'khrigs pa'o// g.yas
318b2(rgyud 'grel): dkar g.yon dmar ma he zhal// de g.yas 'bar ba rda phyag rgya// gnam lcags me phung rlung dmar dang // nyi ma dang ni mkha' lding ngo // g.yon du sdig mdzub rdo rje zhags// nyi shu gcig dang brgya rtsa brgyad// yang na stong phrag gcig bar du// rdo rje 'bar ba yi ge gcig/ dpa'
318b3(rgyud 'grel): bos rngam par rnam par bzla// de nas lha la lus bstims la// sku tshan rab rib mnyam pa yis// yi ge gcig brjod 'od byung la// pha rol rjes skyob zil mnan bya// rkang pa g.yas ni bteg nas su// zhags pas drangs te mgo bos rmi g.yon brkyang nga ro 'bar ba yis// gsus
318b4(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dral nas rgyu ma mnan// pha rol dmag dang g.yul 'khor bcas// phyag rgya lnga yis las rim gyis// thal ba tsam du'ang ma lus dang // yang na rdo rje zhags pas bcings// oM AHhrIHdzaH phaHphoHoM AHhrIHbai raM Da raM oM AHhrIHdzaHdzaHdzaHoM AHhrIHhI hI hAM/
318b5(rgyud 'grel): oM AHhrI dzaHdzaHdzaH// phyag rgya 'phang ba'i sngags so// oM AHhrIHbadz+ra ban+d+ha ban+d+ha mA ra ya rbang // rdo rje zhags pa bcing ba'i sngagaso// rdo rje rtse dang thab chen shing // ri gzar rtsa dang gtsubs shing ma// bya rgod kyi ni dang ru g.yas// yungs kar phye ma thal chen
318b6(rgyud 'grel): bsres// gsang sngags rgyal po 'bum bzlas la// dmag tshogs myos pa 'ongs pa yi// gdong du khros pas gtor byas te// phaT ces drag pos skrag par bya'o// wa rnams la ni seng ge bzhin// mthong ba tsam gyis dngangs 'bros pa 'am// ro longs
319a1(rgyud 'grel): la ni gsang sngags bzhin// rengs 'gyur g.yo ba'ang mi thob bo// ji ste spobs pa'i cho ga ni// myos byed rdzas bdun sbyar ba dang // 'jigs byed chen po'i sku phyar la// gdug pa lnga bsregs rnga chen brdung // dpal ldan rdo rje 'jigs dpa
319a2(rgyud 'grel): ches rab tu gsang ba'i rtog pa las// legs phung pha rol dpung bzlog pa// snyigs dus bstan pa bsrung ba yin pha rol gyi sde gzhom pa rdzogs so// / 'phags po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// shin tu snying rje non pa'i
319a3(rgyud 'grel): yid// lus can mya ngan 'das pa las// bsam pa thag pas mgron gnyer ba// de yis pha rol bsdu bar bshad// nam langs mun pas sleb pa dang // gnyid du nye bas sad pa'i dus// dga' dang gdung ba skyes pa ni// de ni cho ga spyan ras gzigs// bdag
319a4(rgyud 'grel): gi lus gang lnga yin te// ngag ni yi ge bzhi nyid do// rnam par rtog dang mi rtog sems// snying rje che dang stong pa nyid// mig gnyis nyi ma 'bar ba dang // lce steng a ka'i phreng bas brgyan// lte ba ma phab 'khyil pa'i dbus// dpal ldan 'dod pa'i lha mo'o// mi gang
319a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang du bya ba de'i// smin phrag gnyis dang lte ba'i dbus// dga' dang dang dang gdung ba nyid// thig la pad+mo a yi gzugs// byams pa yi ni a yi rgyun// bdag gi sprul pa la skyes reg/ rab tu mau bzad snying rje can// dga' ba'i lta bas rnam par bzhu//
319a6(rgyud 'grel): btang snyoms tshad meng blo gros che// yi ge lnga brjod pad+mo 'byed// oM AHhrIHdzaHhUM 'bum phrag lnga rab ma yengs dang // lha go bsams bar chad spangs bsnyen pa'i sgrub// bod gshegs ring bsrel sku khrus sogs// brtse ldan rnams kyis sngags
319b1(rgyud 'grel): chur bcas// me tog dmar khus gdong bkrus la// lce dkyil sbrang rtsi ldan sngags brjod// oM AHhrIHshI lo ka nA tha ma hA kA ru Ni ka ho// sa ma ya haM/ che ge mo tsit+ta ma hA bAr+d+ha tsa la tsa la pra tsa la pra tsa la dzaHmdzan blo gros bzang po snying rjes myos gyur pa// skye bo 'di dag thabs
319b2(rgyud 'grel): gang phrin las kyis// bde bar rung na bdag cing 'gyur bla'o zhes// nyin mtshan rtag tu yi byed mi 'bral ni// rnal 'byor rgyal po rtag pa 'dis// zhag gsum drug gam dgu nyid na// lcags kyus bzhus pa'i yal ga ltar// gdon mi za bar de dbang 'gyur// pha rol
319b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang du bya ba rdzogs so// / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs pha rol rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshol lo// glang chen pags bsnams bcu drug phyed phyed gdong pa can// rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo mda' thogs de bzhin g.yon// dril bu sdigs mdzub
319b4(rgyud 'grel): kha T+wAM gzhu 'dzin rngam pa'i sku// gtum chen zhabs brgyang bgegs brgyad mgo mnan rgyal gyur cig/ 'jig rten thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir// pha rol rnam gnon mthing kha drag/ gdug pa kun gyi sku brgyan pa// me dpung rab 'bar dpa' bo bsgoms// snying rje
319b5(rgyud 'grel): khros pas sku bsgyur la// dus gsum sangs rgyas cod pan 'chang // rus pa'i gdugs phub 'brug sgra sgrogs// 'khor gnyis kyis ni los byed pa'o// oM AHhrI Ta ma hA kA ru Ni ka tsaN+Da ma hA r-i Sha ni b+ha ya hA ra Ne rak+Sha ba ra NaM gub taM pa re bi dze swA hA/ gcan zan
319b6(rgyud 'grel): drag po rnams kyi mche ba dang sder mo'i rtse mo la ni nong dang rgyal po'i khrag gam sen mo'i chus byugs oM rig pa brgya bzlas la dpung par batshang ngo // 'jigs skyo'i khro ba drag shul tshe/ mdun nas 'gro zhing chom kun gas // dga' byed drag po pag khring ga
320a1(rgyud 'grel): phyi bzhin rjes 'brang mi 'jigs sbyin// ji srid ya nga'i lam skyabs nas// spyod yul phyin par gyur pa na// gnyis 'dus mgon po rgyan med zhi// sku gzugs rnam pas mchod pas mnyes// sna tshogs 'jigs pas yang nyam thag
320a2(rgyud 'grel): dang // gang yang pha rol dregs pas btul byas nas// go 'phang mchog 'dir dngos grub sbyin 'dod pa// rgyal sras bzang la grogs mchog 'dir 'gyur ro// khro dang nga rgyal mang ba dang // sred pas zang zing don gnyer ba// de ni gus par gyur na
320a3(rgyud 'grel): yang / cho ga 'di las ring bar byed// chom rkun bcing ba rdzogs so// / bde bar gshegs pa pad+mo can la phyag 'tshal lo// de la rdo rje 'dzin pa gar+b+ha zhig slob ma la phan gdags 'dod pas blo dang ldan pa'i gang zag don du gnyer ba dang
320a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa gang glo bur du lhags pa'am gnyug mar gnas pa yin kyang rung ste/ dul bas mdun du bdar bar gyur pa de dag la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs pad+mo dam pa can gyis byin gyis brlabs kyis snying gi pad+mo kha phye bas shes rab gsal
320a5(rgyud 'grel): po bskyed pa'i cho ga 'di dran par bya ba yin no// skal ldan skye bo lhags pa na// dar ni dwer ma thag tu ngaM// baM brjod pas ni pad+mar bskyed// de yi snying yang de bzhin no// de la snying gi pad+mo ni// 'dab brgyad dkar po zlum pos te// dbus su hrIHyig gis
320a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa// spyi bor thig le gsum brtsegs pa'o// dkor dmar bdud rtsin mkha'i mdog/ rim bzhin rab tu dang bar bos ma// smin mtshams nas zug snying gi dkyil// rtsa mchog sbu gu dkar phangs so// mkhas pa rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bdag
320b1(rgyud 'grel): byams sogs tshad med las skyes pa'i// thub dbang shes rab 'od zer 'chad// spyan ras gzigasu myur bar bskyed// spyan gsum 'dzum pa'i mdangs dkar ldan// rnam dag 'ong bzangs dkyil 'khor can// btsun mo gnyis kyis sku brten cing // rnga yab dka
320b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yob dgyes bzhugs pa'o// de rjes gzhan la phan brtson pa'i// yid kyis de yi don bsgrub phyir// rnam gus po yi sbyor ba yis// bdag gi dgos pa lha mchig reg/ de bas nga la gsol btab pas// spyan drangs bdag nyid la bsdom bya// de nas phyag
320b3(rgyud 'grel): galas chos 'chad kyi// mthil skyes ma las yongs gyur pa// nyi ma rdo rje snying po can// dbyings dang gsale byed kyi sa brgyan bsam// hrIHbcas sngags phreng gnyis brjod pas// nyi 'od tsha zhing rab rno yau// zer 'phros pas ni pad+mo dbye// hrIHlas de bzhin
320b4(rgyud 'grel): thig le'o// de las thog mar dkar thig le// pha yi sa bon zhu bar bshad // dmar pe ma yau sa bon te// de bzhin mkha' 'dra kun bzhir bzhed// de mthar zhu ba'i thig le'i rgyun// dbyer med phan tshun rnam 'dren pa// bad chen 'od gsalo rnam mi rtog/ blo gros
320b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+mo rab rgyas gsungs// cho ga'i rgyal po dam pa 'di// gang gang skal bar ldan pa'i mthus// brtse ldan gus pas sngon sing po// de yi thos sogs rnam dge 'phel// slob ma la shes rab bskyed pa rdzogs so// / bcom ldan 'das
320b6(rgyud 'grel): spyan ras gzigs mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan 'od zer gzi brjid 'bar ba'i rgyal po ser spron rab mthug bsreg par mdzad// yi gi gnyis kyis gdugs pa'i stobs 'joms nga ro mi bzad na mkha' ngos la gang brgyangs sgrogs//
321a1(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum phyag drug dkar dmar mthing ga in+d+ra'i 'dog ldan rdo rje mda' gzhu thal mo brdebs// me dpung sdigs mdzub ral gri'i gshog bsnams dbang po'i rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang la phyag 'tshal// de nas
321a2(rgyud 'grel): ser ba bzlog pa bshad par bya ste/ lha dang klu la sogs pa khros pa dang / 'byung ba nyid kyi dbang ngam/ grong khyer ba rnams kyi don ma yin pa'i las kyi stobs las kyang rung ste/ dus dang dus ma yin pa'i gnod pa ni 'di lta ste/ du ba'i mdog dang / rgya
321a3(rgyud 'grel): mtsho rlung gis bskyod pa'i rlabos lta bu'i sprin gyi phung po 'khrig cing / 'brag gi sgra kun tu mi bzang pas klod pa 'gems pa lta bu dang / gnam lcags dang ser ba drag po 'bab pa'i ltas ngan mngon du gyur pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' grong
321a4(rgyud 'grel): khyer ba rnams dang / skye bo mang po la snying brtse bas gdung ba'i yid can/ bdag gi don btang nas gzhan gyi nye bar mkho ba la lhag par chags pas zil gyis mnan pa dag/ 'byung po dpag tu med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ 'phags pa
321a5(rgyud 'grel): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug drag po chen po 'od zer 'bar ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po ltas ngan pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yang dag par dran par bya'o// de zhal g.yas dkar lha bsrung ba// g.yon pa
321a6(rgyud 'grel): domar po mi yaM rje// dbus gnas mthing ga klu 'dul grags// spyan gsum mtsho gtsigs khros pa'o// g.yas g.yon dang po mnga' bzhu'i phyag/ gnyis pa gnyis ni thal mo brdabs// gsum po'i phyag na me dpung ste// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub
321b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgreng ba nyid// sgron shing dung mdog sku chen 'gying // ral gri'i gdog rgyangs spu mthul ba// shin tu za byed rngam pa che// 'jigs pa'i zhabs bgrang bzhad pa'o// thugs ka lte bar pad nyi ni// hUM phaT sngo dang dmar ba yi// yi ge gnyis bsam sngags kyis
321b2(rgyud 'grel): bskor// de gsade sngags kyi rgyal po 'diHoM hrIHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya a ti kro d+ha ma hA dz+wa la sarba tu sa ra ha ra ha ra/ da ha da ha/ shrI gr-i lu d+hi ma ra ya phaT/ thal mo g.yas la pha dkar dang // g.yon la Ta na ga bkod nas ni// brdabs pas me lce 'bar ba yis/
321b3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bos ser ba rnam par bzlog/ mig gnyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang // smin ma khro gnyer glog rgyun dang // shangs las me sta ge zhal las kyang // lce 'a bar phu yis btab pas kyang // de las rang nyid 'dod thag gru// mkhas pas yid kyis mtshams
321b4(rgyud 'grel): bcang de// sprin tshogs 'o ma can gyi khri// bsnol bas chu gzhag gis byug bya// gang tshe dus la bab gyur pa// de tshe rngam pa'i stang stabs kyis// rngam par byas la me dpung 'bar// bskal pa'i me lngar mkha' g.yog 'gyur// sngags phreng gsum mam bdud nam
321b5(rgyud 'grel): dgu/ yang ni nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod// skad cig de la rdo rje yi// pha 'ong nyid kyang zhu bar 'gyur// dpal spyan ras gzigs khros pas ser ba bzlog pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// / 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gsu
321b6(rgyud 'grel): pa skyibs song sems bskyed ldan// 'gro la phan 'dod bdag 'dul ba'i// skyes bu dam pa bsam gtan gyi// khang bur zhugs la rmi lam bsgom// btsun pa spyan ras gzigs kyi sku// btsem gser gyi mdog ldan pa// zhal gcig phyag bzhi g.yas dang
322a1(rgyud 'grel): po// 'jigs skyob de bzhin g.yon du ni// pad+ma dmar po gnyis pa gnyis// ting 'dzin mchog gya rgya'o// thugs kyi pad+ma kha zlum pa'i// dbus su sems dngos hrIH ma bya/ de 'dra'i 'phags pa nyid du bdag/ skad cig tsam gyis/
322a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms nas ni// dge dang brtse dang dad pa yis// rnal 'byor rgyal po gnyid log pa// gang tshe gnyid du nye ba na// hrI yang thig le gnyis la bsdu// rim gyis thig la 'og ma yang // de bzhin thog la gong ma la'o// de nas sna tshogs snang ba kun// rang gi
322a3(rgyud 'grel): lus la bsdus nas de// pad dbus thig le nyag gcig la// chu la chu gzhag de bzhin gzhag/ sems ni dri med zung 'jug bdag/ dngos med dngos bral rnam par dag/ 'od gsal chen po nyid la nyid// mngon sum mi g.yo brtan par bzung // tshul 'di
322a4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin mkha' 'dra ste// rnam pa thig le bde ba che// ngo bo kun tu ma 'gags pa'o// sbyangs sdom can gyi chos gcig bzhed// de ltar rgyu 'dra chos kun rang bzhin rang bzhin med// gzhan la mi rag bdag nyid snying dkyil brtan par gnas// rgyal ba
322a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi gshegs pa shul gcig yin ma nor ba// bsgoms na de rjes rmi lam nyid du'ang de mthong 'gyur// gal te sgrib tshogs bud shing tshang tshing gis bsgribs pas// yang dag ji bzhin de tshe mngon du ma gyur na'ang // rnal 'byor rgyal pos re ba chang
322a6(rgyud 'grel): par mi bya ste// goms pa ma zad gcig tu brtson 'grus g.yel mi bya// mdun gyi mkha' la sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // nyan thos rang rgyal lha yi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba'i// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor sprin gyi phung po ltar mthong
322b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// de tshe de nas ring po mi thogs 'od gsal 'thod// rnam dag 'khor lo pad+mo 'dam nas skyes pa bzhin// gnyid kyis myos 'gyur ma rig gis bslang blo gros 'di// rang gi rang dben mkha' la nyi ltar spros bral du// rtsol bral med nyid rang dbang mngon sum 'cha
322b2(rgyud 'grel): bar byed// rmi lam skyes bus rmi lam gyi// grong du dga' dang mya ngan la// bzung ba rlom sems tsam yin pa// de tshe de yis shes par 'gyur// me long gzugs brnyan gsal ba yi// yod dang med dang gnyis ka dang // gnyis ka ma yin brjod min pa// de tshe yid
322b3(rgyud 'grel): ches mthong bar 'gyur// nam mkha'i ngos la dbang po'i gzhu// de bzhin ser sprin 'brug sgra can// thog mthar skyes dang gags mi dmigs// 'od gsal la gnas skyes bus shes// ji ltar smig rgyu'i chu 'bab pa// shar sogs phyogs ni gang zhig nas// ma
322b4(rgyud 'grel): 'ongs gar yang mi 'gro ba// rmi lam mthob pa de yis shes// dril bu dang ni pi wang sgra// breg cha la sogs 'do byed ni// rnam par thar pa gsum gyi bsgos// zab mo rnam par dben pa yang // snang ba mun pa thibs po dang // 'od gsal bye brag mang 'gyur gA// shin
322b5(rgyud 'grel): tu sbyangs pa'i gser bzhin du// dri bral rnam par dag pa rmad // ji srid 'dzin pa mang po la// zad dang mi skye bsre ba yis// ro gcig nyid du sbyor shes pa// rmi lam las gzhan rnal 'byor min// de ni sad pa nyid na yang // yid kyi dbang po tshim pa dang // 'dod pa'i sred
322b6(rgyud 'grel): pa las blo zlog/ chos 'di brjod pa tsam rtogs so// de ltar gzung dang 'dzin pa yi// dri ma dri ma bral ba dang // bral ba rang bzhin med pa yang // yod kyi mngon par 'du mi byed// 'phags pa'i mig ces bshad pa ste// spyan ras gzigs kyi mthu yis so// rmi lam dri
323a1(rgyud 'grel): ma med pa bsgom pa rdzogs so// / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug slob ma la phan par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// mkhas gang dpa' bo rdo rje 'dzin// 'dzin pa'i ri bo brtan 'jig byed// bla ma mchog gi drin thob pas
323a2(rgyud 'grel): slob ma la phan byin brlabs gyur// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi// mchod rdzas ma lus kun bshams la// zhi ba'i yid kyis skyil krung bya// bde chen dkyil 'khor blos blta'o// bdag gi gtsur tor nas brgyud pa'i// skyob pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phreng // ye shes sa bon
323a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM yig gis// mtshan ma rdo rje sbu gu'i rgyun// smin mtshams nas 'phros slob ma yi// d+hU ti'i rin tshan pho brang du// zhugs gyur de snying pad+mo'i bar// bar chad med 'brel brtan pas bsgom// de nas bla ma'i man ngag gis// ye shes dbab pa'i sbyor ba bya// byang chub
323a4(rgyud 'grel): sems khengs ye shes kyi// me lce dil bus sbar bar bya// babs par gyur na lus gcig des// sngon chad me myong ro myang med// spu g.yo ba yis 'dren par gsungs// bdug pa mchog gis bdug bya zhing // sgra chen glu dbyangs rol mo yiso// dpo' bo'i gar bya
323a5(rgyud 'grel): brtul shugs can// rtse gcig mnyam par gzhag pas mchod// de rjes rgya mtsho dang ba la// ri rab ston ka'i mkha' 'dra dang // nyi shar zla tshes skar mda' yi// rims can nyams myong skye bar byed // ting 'dzin mchog gis btul byas pas// glang chen lcags
323a6(rgyud 'grel): kyus dul ba ltar// zhi gyur sems rab dang ba la// sems kyi gzugs brnyan mthong bar 'gyur// de la snying po'i chos rnam bzhi// stong pa'i mtshan nyid sems gnas lugs// de yi snang po glo bur ba// dbyer med mtshan med rnal 'byor ro// sor gzhag de yi
323b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid gsum// rab tu gsal zhing rnam mi rtog/ bde chen blo sgra dpe bral ba// bsam gtan phyag rgya la rten bsgom// ngos bzung ba ni blta ba dang // bsre dang mnyam par bzhag pa'o// sgo gsum rim dang rim min pas// drag rtogs glo bur nyid rtog 'gyur// ji ltar
323b2(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig gang du gang // dran rnams dga' gdung der shar ba// de nyid de ltar de der med// 'di ni gonyis med mtshan nyid do// 'gro 'ong gnas dang mi gnas dang // skye dang 'gag dang rten bral sogs// rjes su 'grogs dang gzhig pa yi// gdams ngag gis ni
323b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan med 'gyur// oM AHbadz+ra gu ru sarba dz+nyA naM DA ki nI ma ma kA ya wA kIt+ta ma hA su kha dz+nyA na dz+wa la dz+wa la s+pha ra s+pha ra po pheM/ ye shes dbab pa'i sngags so// rdo rje dril bu mo long thong // sbyin pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro yi// brtul shugs sngon du song ba yi// tshil tshan mar me sbar
323b4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// oM A~MHbadz+ra badz+ra ma hA badz+ra badz+ra dz+wa la hU~M hU~M hUM oM A gar+b+ha gaN+Da ma hA gaN+Da dza la e a a oM a dar+than ma hA darba na dz+wa la/ hrIHhrIHhUMHoM a ka pA la ka pA la ma hA ka pA lo dz+wa la ho ho ho// byin gyis brlabs nas sbyin pa'i sngags so// mthar ni spyan ras
323b5(rgyud 'grel): gzigs dbang gi/ bsrung bas bsrung ba bya ba ni// thugs rje khros pas mar rkang gi/ bde chen 'khor lo zhwap+pa bshad// slob ma byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag rdzogs so// / 'phags pa thugs rje chen po ye shes 'bebs pa phyag 'tshalo//
323b6(rgyud 'grel): e ma'o// mgon po mi rtog bde chen ster mdzod sku// dus gsum rgyal ba'i rdo rje 'dzin bcas brgyad dang bltas// spyi bo nas brtsegs ye shes yi ge 'phre nga ba dang // gzhu nyid pad zlas ye shes 'khor lo 'bar bar 'gyur// shin tu gus bcas gtong ba che//
324a1(rgyud 'grel): bzod ldan the tsom med rtog bral// g.yeng ba spang shing dbang po dul// slob ma de ni rjes su bzung // sna tshogs pad+mo ga sar ldan// ze 'bru rdo rje ma phreng gis// legs spras byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbus// skal ldan gzhag la bgegs
324a2(rgyud 'grel): bskrang bya// oM a bi g+han+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ bdug pa mchog gis rab bdug cing // me tog dmar po bcal bkram la// mar me 'bar ba du ma yis// kun nas khor yug bskor bar bya// bdag nyid lhag pa'i lha'i nga rgyal du byas la// rdo rje la ni yaM rlung gi shugs
324a3(rgyud 'grel): can no// da ni rgyal ba rnams kyi rang bzhin no// gtsug tor du haM thig le'i snying po can no// de ni 'jig rten mgon po'i rang bzhin no// steng nas 'dzag pas ni mi 'grib bo// smin mtshams nas gri 'phros pas ni slob ma la 'bab par 'gyur ro// slob ma'i 'og tu ni rlung
324a4(rgyud 'grel): gi dkyil 'khor ro// de ni sbyor ba 'og mas bskyod par byed do// sprul par ni yang lha mo nyid do// de ni sbyor ba bar mas spor bar byed do// snying kar ni yang bde gshegs snying po nyid do// de ni sbyor ba gongs mas 'bebs par byed do// spyi bor ni yang mgon po'i//
324a5(rgyud 'grel): de ni sbyor ba thog mas 'beb par byed do// ma phobs na spobs pa'i cho ga ni// rdo rje sna bug gi sbyor bas so// shin tu spogs pa ni rdo rje spyi gtsug gi sbyor bas so// babs par gyur na spu 'greng zhing // gar sgrar 'od gsal ba nyid dang // brjod par mi nus yang na
324a6(rgyud 'grel): gtsoto mi rtog bde bas myos par 'gyur// ye shes gzhug pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las lhun gyis grub pa'i la phyag 'tshal lo// dang por re shig byang chub sems
324b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i blo gros sbyangs pa dag/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang // bdag gir 'dzin pas chags pa sdug bsngal ba dang / phongs pa rnams kyis 'gyur ba mthong bas mi bzang ba skyes nas/ thog mar gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor 'jug pa na bdag gi bltos
324b2(rgyud 'grel): pa ring du spangs nas snying rje chen pos gzhan gyis ma bskul bar bdag 'jug par ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyis brlab par bya'o// brtan pa'i gnas dang g.yo ba lus dang ngag ngag dang yid// rnam kun nyer spyod gzhal med khang bzangs rdo rje'i sku// gsang sngags dam tshig
324b3(rgyud 'grel): nga ro bcu drug mthar gnas dang // pha rol phyin bcu lha yi sbyor ba rnam dag bsgom// 'di na gang dag don min spyod// smad pa'i gnas la blo rab chags// ldongs pas sdig pa mang ldan pa// de dag rang bzhin zhi ba'o// chos gang la ni rnam par shes// de shas nyid ni pha rol 'gro// /
324b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar gang la don gsal 'thob// sim 'gyur 'od gsal bde chen gsungs// e ma'o 'gro ba yang dge spyod// gang spyod de yin gzhan ma 'gyur// gnas min gnas sogs gang brtags pa// nam yang skye sogs mi dmigs pa'o// 'on kyang log pas cig shos
324b5(rgyud 'grel): su/ bsgribs nas dri mar khrid pa yang // bdag gi las gsum yan lag lngas// ngag bcas lhag mar mi bya'o// spyan ros gzigs mgon nyid dam bcas// spyad pa spyod pa'i rim ji bzhin// sangs rgyas sros po brtse chen yang // pha rol ltos pa mi 'cha'o// 'di na ji
324b6(rgyud 'grel): ltar bdag nyid dang // sdug bsngal mngon 'dod mi 'dod pa// de bzhin lugs can thams cad kyang // mtshungs na bdog cig bde ba brtson// yon tan phrin las thams cad la// rgyas btab rgyal sras 'bad par bya'o// gang zhig phan btags drin shes pa// de yang
325a1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis bsngags 'os na// ma bcol rang dga' byin rlob pa'i// bdag nyid chen po cis mi sngags// ting nge 'dzin gyi byin brlabs rdzogs so// / dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor los bsgyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo//
325a2(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig dpal ldan bdud bzhi'i dgra bcom byang chub mchog dbang nyes gnyis na// thugs rjes mi bsnyel lus can gzhan yang zhi ba bla med lam bzang du// smin mdzad dbang stsol sa gsum bdag po spyan ras gzigs dbang la btud de// skal ldan ting
325a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin ye shes sems spyod rnam dag dbang bskur cho ga bshad// yid 'ong gnas su bde ba yi// rkyen sogs dam tshig kun ldan pas// snying rje chen po mdun bzhag la// gus pas sngon du gsol gdab bo// 'dom gang srid 'phags na mkhar ni// thub pa chen po
325a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor los sgyur// bde tshon yum dang lhan cig skyes// dpag med sras bcas bsgom par bya// sna tshogs dngos kun mchod pa'i sprin// kun tu bzang sprod ji bzhin du// mchod byas sdig pa bsal nas su// rnam dag dbang bskur de rjes nod// lha dang bdag
325a5(rgyud 'grel): lus gnas gsum du// rdo rje 'bru gsum mngon bsam la// dad dang thugs rje dam tshig gis// kha dog rim gsum 'od zer dbyung // sku mchog snying po oM las 'od zer dkar po dang // gsung rgyun dri med AHlas de bzhin dmar po'i 'od// rnam dag thugs
325a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag hUM las rnam 'phros rab sde zer// bdag lus ngag yid gnas gsum la rig dri gsum sel// de rjes bdud rtsi dkar dmar sngo// dag byed rnam gsum man ngag bzhin// de 'og ye shes rnam gsum gzhug/ mthar ni gnyis meng bzhi pa'o// thig
325b1(rgyud 'grel): le gsum rgyun sbyor ba ni// de rjes blo gros chen pos bsgom// dbang bskur nas ni gshegasu gsol// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang bskur rdzog so// / 'phags pa pad+ma'i phyag la phyag 'tshal lo// gang gi snying la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs rje'i gzhus bskyod byin
325b2(rgyud 'grel): brlabs kyi// mda' rtse rnos bsnun yud tsam gang la nag po'i phyogs kyi rtsa lag dang // bdud kyi bu mo g.yo ba'i mig gis rnam kun blta bar mi nus pa'i// dpal gang bde chen rab tu 'bar byed 'khrul 'khor rgyal po la phyag 'tshal// de nas 'phags pa thugaso
325b3(rgyud 'grel): rje che// ye shes 'khrul 'khor 'bar bzhes// bya ba rang lus rtsa mchog gi/ bu ga thog mar bsam par bya// rab dmar rdo rje rnon po'i 'od// khro zhing ha ha ra bzhad pa'i nyams// thugs ka los brgyud ye shes mes// zhal bkang bdag don brtson pa po// lcags
325b4(rgyud 'grel): kyu pad+mo g.yas dang g.yon// brtul shugs drog po rtsal 'gyed pa// gzhan gyis mi thub stobs po che// tshon gang bar ni bsgom par bya// lte bar ye shes sbar ba'i rlung // rtsibs brgyad gshig pa rno ldan dang // de dbus raM yig gis mtshan bcas// d+hU ti
325b5(rgyud 'grel): yangs pa'i rkang zug pa'o// de dbus nas zhugs ye shes rlung // rab tu rdo rje'i rkang srog can// snying dkyil pad+mo 'dab brgyad rtsa// bsdus shing grims par bzung ba yin// de lte bde gshegs snying po yi// sa bon yi ge hUM dkar 'khrigs// bltas te dgud
325b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rnal 'byor brtsam// sprul pa'i gnas kyi 'khor lo ni// rtsol ba'i rlung shugs 'dis bskyod pas// mgal me bskor ba ji bzhin du// sgra drag 'od zer 'khrug pa yi// mi bzang rab tu 'khor bar 'gyur// de phyir yi shes shugs las kyang // me lce
326a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba de bzhin du// de 'bar srog shing rlung gis kyang // thogs med srog g.yo snying gar 'gyur// de che po sgra dang bcas pas// steng nas lha yi bdud rtsi dpag// bde chen rab tu gsal ba'i dngos// 'bar ba rab 'bar cher 'a
326a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// gang tshe ye shes btung ba yi// chang gis myos par mi 'gyur ba// de tshe rang dbang med par ni// lus sems spro bas non par 'gyur// dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i 'khrul 'khor rdzogs so// / thugs rje chen po che rabs dbang du gyur pa
326a3(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo// dal ba 'dis lam dbang du ma gyur pa'i sgrub pa po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs dbang du gyur pa'i brtag pa bsgom par bya ste/ ji ltar spyod pa'i gnas nyid du// 'jig rten pha rol dran byas nas// ji skad bshad pa'i man ngag gis//
326a4(rgyud 'grel): dbang gyur 'phags pa mnyes par bya// dal ba ring du mi gnas dang // rgyu dang 'bras bus rjes 'brel la// som nyi spangs nas srid pa las// yid byung zhi la dga' ba bskyed// bdag gis yongs su gzung ba gang // ji tsam chags pas rjes bsrungs pa// de dag
326a5(rgyud 'grel): de tsam skyo ba yis// mchod sbyin byas te gcig pur gnas// zhing 'di ni gdung ba drag po dang // mi g.yo la sogs bdun pa che// ltos bral lhag par mos bcas pa// rnal 'byor rgyal po nges par bya// de'i 'og tu bdag nyid kyi lus kyi snying po gsum lha'i
326a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mo gsum du bsgyur to// tho mal lus las 'das nas ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pas bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs dbang du gyur pa'i gzugs kyi 'du byas pa la zhugs te bla ma dang lha rjes su dran pa dang ma bral ba bzhin du
326b1(rgyud 'grel): rig pa mchog gi sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// oM AHhrIHma ma ma ba rA dzar+m+ma rak+ShA ba ra Ne gu pa ti bir+ya pya ma he swA hA/ oM AHhrIHsarba duSh+yo ma ma krita te dzi b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ oM AHhrIHma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ ma ma ba ra dzAr+m+ma dzAr+m+ma ta ra
326b2(rgyud 'grel): sarba pras+t+ra pe rak+Sha ba ra NaM gup+ti ti bits+tsha wa shi sma ra sma ra/ pra ti dz+nyA ma hA sa ma ya su sma re swA hA// brtson pa'i cha lugs gnas zhabs gnyis// gang du 'dod pa'i zhing der bskyod// chu skyes la sogs sdong bu 'am// rin chen pho brang mchog bdag 'jug/ rmi lam rmis pas bar chod
326b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ do meng mtshan mo'i bar skabs 'dras// mkhas pas dogs pa med byas te// lce bsnyen ji ltar 'dod bzhin skye// skye bo kun gyi mngal sgo de ni// snying rje chen po spangs pa'i rten// sa bon sdig pa bsams nas ni// rtag tu 'jigs pa goms par bya// dpal ldan shar
326b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs yongs dag zhing // mngon dga' drag pos rtag goms pa// smon lam lhan cig drang srong mthus// skar mda' lta bur thogs pa med// skye ba bsdams pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal
326b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub po gang zhig 'chi ba dang 'chi ba ma yin lhas gang dag/ gang tshe sngon du gyur pa na// mgon po'i blu ba 'dir bshad do// 'jig rten g.yeng ba ma lus las// rnam dben ngal ba bsgrubs nas ni// mchog gsum skyabs 'gro nas brtsams te// ci rigs chos
326b6(rgyud 'grel): skye brtsam par bya// longs spyod pashes dang lus nyid dang // byang chub phyogs kyi mngon par zhen// rnam bcu rnam gsum spangs nas ni// bltos pa thams cad rnam par dor// mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag mang ngo // stong pa nyid kyi rnam thar gyi// 'khor ba'i gnas
327a1(rgyud 'grel): la yid phyung zhing // mya ngan 'das la mngon par dga'// de nas bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya ste/ kha lho phyogasu bltas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la byed pa dang / ma bral bas mig
327a2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'dzum par mdun gyi na mkha' khe rgyal ba lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsam par bya'o// gal te spro bar nus na ni sku gsung thugs so shes 'phrin las mdzad pa dam tshig rnam pa bdun gyi dkyil 'khor bdag nyid kyi snying ka rlung sems
327a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi ngo bo hrIHgsal po bsil ba'i 'od zer can la shes pa gtad nas ji bzhin dgug pa'i sbyor bas gzhug par bya'o// de'i 'og tu rang gi nyer bsdogs kyi dngos po gang yin pa 'di dag nyid lha'i rnam par dag par dmigs la/ mngon par chags/
327a4(rgyud 'grel): dang yongasu sdang // rab tu mi shes gzhi gsum gyi// dbang gi las gang mngon gyur gang // de 'odir mgon po gsum du mos// dbus su mthing ga rdo rje can// g.yas su dmar mdzes ral gri 'dzin// g.yon du dkar gsal zhags bsnams pa// thams
