327a5(rgyud 'grel): cad g.yon du pad+mo mtshan// rgya chen pho brang lhar bcas pa// skad cig gis ni lha gsum 'dir// bsdus la rim pa ji bzhin du// 'gro ba'i 'chi bdag sngar bru bya// gang phyir 'chi bar byed pa'i rgyu// nyon mongs gsum yin de yi rkyen// las phyi ri de yi mi mthun
327a6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs// sto'i sa tshin spyan raso gzigs dbang brtan// de bas 'chi ba bzlog 'dod byas// sku dang di yi nyer bstan dang / bsam pa'i thugs rje che zhes pa// rnam gsum rim gyis bsgom par bya// cho ga 'di yis 'gro rnams kyi// snying gi bum pa chags sdang
327b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas// bsal zhing de yi sbyor ba dang // yan lag rnam par gzhig pa'ang 'bad// 'di yi 'grub pa rnam pa bzhi// ma lus 'chi ba bdag len dang // de dag 'chi ba bzlog nyid dang // sman mchog sbyor ba nyid dang ni// 'chi ba med dang brtse chen gyi// ltos 'dor khyams
327b2(rgyud 'grel): par nges pa'o// gal te 'byor ldan skye bo 'ga'// nus na dkyil 'khor chen po yi// cho ga cho gau ji bzhin du// mkhas pas 'bad de bsgrub par bya// ji srid 'chi bdag sgra ga can la// rnal 'byor tshe yi zla ba nya// grol 'gyur de tshe rmi lam du// gsung gi
327b3(rgyud 'grel): dbugs 'byin thob par 'gyur// de nas dga' ston tshogs bsags phyir// dpag med mchod pa'i rgya mtsho yis// phyi nang gsang dang yang dag gI/ spyan ras gzigs dbang mchod par bya// 'tsho ba slu ba'i gdams pa rdzogs so// // dpal spyan
327b4(rgyud 'grel): ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// sngags pa bde chen grong 'jug pas// bco brgyad e dbyings phyag rgya bca'// g.yo ba mi g.yo bzung nas ni// lhag pa'i lha yi rnal 'byor bya// sprul pa'i gnas su ri bong 'dzin// ma lus byang chub sems bsdus
327b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs// zla ba bzang po bde bo che// 'od mdzad drod rlung srog bdug bsam// hrIHlha dbang lhan cig skyes pa'o sgra// zhal sbyor spyi gtsug gzi brjid bzang // sIr bzhi pas ni bar tshod bcas// bsams nas 'od kyi snyoms 'jug bskul// sbyor mtshams
327b6(rgyud 'grel): dkar dmar rgyan ltung bas// bdag lus dri med byas nas su// thog mar gang skyed phyis de bzhin// kha do mchog zla ba bzang stobs bskyed// de nas kun sdud rdo rje yi// rlung bzung nas ni 'dus pa'i 'od// shing rta lam chen sbyangs byas nas// lcags kyu lta bus drang
328a1(rgyud 'grel): byas la// gtumatshom shes sgru mas// tshang rnam mtha sa smras ni// mau nung ni lan cha nan// mi bzad sgyur banas can du'abar// da gar+b+hag rdo rje 'ardzun// shes rab ny-i la bsdus byas pa// dam pad+ma batra/
328a2(rgyud 'grel): bar// rnam shes bung ba gzhug par bya/ skal ldan ngo bo nyid dbang du// bde ba mchog gis rgyud tshim zhing // chos kun rmi lam 'drar shes dang // gang bsgyur sems ston grub pa'i rdza mo// de nas 'og gi phreM brang m+b+ha// khod zer dkrugs po'i sbyor ba yis//
328a3(rgyud 'grel): byas de ni gong mar bAstim// thim gyur rang gnas brtan par 'dod// dpal lha'i grong khyer du 'jug pa rdzogs so// // bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan 'jig rten mgon zhabs kyi// tshi ga ting 'dzin rgyal
328a4(rgyud 'grel): po yi// yongs dang zhing du rnam par shes// 'pho ba rdo rje'i skar mnga' brtsam// shin tu yid dga' grub pas byin brlabs sam// lha mchog legs nas ting 'dzin grub pa'i gzhi// yang nA dur khrod chu bo shing gcig 'gram// skal ldan chags bral ze
328a5(rgyud 'grel): tshom med pa zhugs// rgya chen mchod sbyin re ba med yid dga' ba dang // bcas la rgyal ba lha yi pho brang dga' ldan du// rtse gcig yid byed gang la chags pa'i gnas// me 'obs dong ltar mi dga' skyo ba drag bskyed pa// skyil krung rgyal po rdo rje'i mdud pa
328a6(rgyud 'grel): brtan pa la gnas la// spyi bo snying ka lci dbus haM dang hUM dang aM rim bzhin// dkar dang sngo dang dmar po 'od 'phro rtse chen sbubs nang bzhug/ pha ma sems dbyings lus rlung srog bsdus yi ge gsum la bsdu// skye med las skyes me yis rab bzhus
328b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal sras zad 'dzag sprul pa spyod// lcags kyu zhags pa rdo rje rlung gis ha oM hUM gsum gcig gyur cing // oM shos bong phyung d+ha ti'i lam byung shin tu dmar gsal dag byas la// rje btsun phyag mthil ba dbus a las 'od sbubs dmar po yang drang
328b2(rgyud 'grel): bya// de la rje btsun spyan res gzigs nyid gdul bya'i don la gcig tu thugs rnam par brtse bas bdag gi ltos pa thams cad nye bar dor ba thugs bskyod pa ni/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe tshe'i dus byed pas nying mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jigs pas rab tu
328b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs par gyur po de'i tshe/ kho bo'i thugs rje dang byin gyis brlabs kyis ci nas kyang // khyod ji ltar 'jigs pa med pa de ltar yang dag par skyob par 'gyur gyis thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam pa thams cad 'khor ba 'am ngan song du yang ba dang 'jigs/
328b4(rgyud 'grel): par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhes bya ba khyod rjes su 'dzin pa'i lha ni nga yin no zhes gsung bas dbugs phyung ste/ ji skad brjod pa dang / skyo ba drag po gnyis kyi gnas gnyis la mngon par dga' ba dang / gdung ba nyid dang lhag pa'i lha la gus pa
328b5(rgyud 'grel): mi zang pos skyabs su gsol ba ni thabs yin no// de nas stobs ldan sprul pa'i dbus// legs bcug d+hU tis dbus nas su// sbubs dag nas ni sran 'brum bzhin// mkhas pas rnam shes 'phro bar bya// tshangs dbang za dang 'gul dang 'phrog/ dmigs
328b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rang dbang gyur nyid dang // gsol btab ngal bsos gdon mi za// brten pa'i 'pho ba grub pa'i ltas// rdo rje skar mda'i man ngag rdzogs so// / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs ngan song sbyong ba la phyag 'tshal lo// snying rje chen po yid gzhung ste/
329a1(rgyud 'grel): pas// spyan ras gzigs dpal bsnyen byas te// lus can mi 'dod bzhin du dong // de dag ngan 'gro bzlog par bya// sngon nas sbyangs pa nyid dang ni// gzhan dag blo bur bya ba nyid// de bzhin phyi nas gzhan gyis te// mchog dang bar
329a2(rgyud 'grel): mtha' grangs bzhin 'dod// bdag nyid gang la lhag bar dang // me tog lhung ba nyid dam snga// goms par bsnyen par byas pa'i lha// 'jig rten dbang phyug thogs kar dgod// de nyid lhag pa'i lha yin na// sa bon nam ni bla ma'i tshul// yang yang goms par
329a3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sems// de yi thugs bcug ting 'dzin bya// mi g.yo ba dang rtse gcig dang // kun tu sdud pa zhes bya ba'i// ming can 'od zer 'du sngon 'gros// g.yeng ba spangs la brtan par gnas// spyi bo snying ga lte ba ni// haM dang hUM dang aM bsams nas// bla ma'i man ngag
329a4(rgyud 'grel): gis gcig tu// bsdus nas 'phen pa thabs yin no// de nas rten la yid 'phrog cing // dmigs pa brtan par gyur pa na// 'od kyi sbu gu'i sbyor ba yis// rten de nyid dang de yi zhing // mkhas pas bdag dang bdag gir bya// cho ga'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// rnal 'byor
329a5(rgyud 'grel): bar dor 'jug pa na// dran pa tsam gyis goms pa yis// rten la blos 'jug 'jigs med 'gyur// de ltar ring nas lam goms pa'o// blo ldan dus las 'das gyur tshe// 'phags pa ngan song sbyong dpal gyi// cho ga bdun phrag bdun du sbyangs// ro 'am rus pa
329a6(rgyud 'grel): 'chags sam ming // rten de'i mdun du gzhag nas su// ma dag pa dang dag pa yi// dkyil 'khor gnyis la rten gnyis gzhag/ brdeg dang bsreg dang bkru ba yis// dri ma gzhig gzhom dang pa dag/ dkyil 'khor nag po bya bas te// brtan dang dbang bskur
329b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la'o// yungs kar bye ma thal chen la// rig pa bzlas nas bsnun bya zhing // sbyin sreg cho ga'i phye ba yis// rten bcas bag chags 'bad de bsreg/ ngan song sbyong ba'i sku gsung thugs// bzhu pa'i chus bkang bum pa blugs// rdo rje'i glu blang rig pa bzla// ma
329b2(rgyud 'grel): lus dri ma bkru bar bya// oM AHhrIHsarba durba ti pa ri sho d+ha ye rA dI ya/ a mu ko ka ya wA k+Shid+d+ha sarbo pA paM to Sha wa ra Na b+haM ga b+haM/ Da ha Da hA/ bA ra tsha bA ra tsha/ sho d+ha yai sho d+ha yai/ phaT phaT swA hA/ de rjes dr-i ma dag pa'i sems// lhag pa'i lha la bcug nas ni//
329b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin dbang bskur byas te mchod// dga' ston chen po sbyin par bya// tshe 'das pa la bya ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// / bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po gzi brjid kun nas 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo// ngal ba don yod dus las 'das
329b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // sdig me ngan 'gro'i sgor zhugs de bzhin du// ya ngo bar ma nying mtsha mos sbyar ba'i tshe// de rten cho ga rgyal pos rnam par sbyang // slob dpon shin tu snying brtse can// rig pa rgya mtsho pha rol son// brtan zhing mi 'phrogs mkhas pa yis// dbugs/
329b5(rgyud 'grel): bral slob ma mdun du gzhag/ chus bkrus dris byugs rgyan btags te// brdeg dang bkru sogs cho ga bzhin// de nas sngags bcos bdug pa yis// bgegs bskrad 'khor lo bcings nas ni// spyi gtsug bla ma yab dang yum// snyoms zhugs
329b6(rgyud 'grel): thig le ma lhung ba// goms pa'i lha rten mdun gnas kyi// shangs bug nas ni myur bsdus zhes// de yi thugs dkyil pad+mo bsgom// rdo rje'i rgyas btab zum pa'i nang // mi 'gyur yongs gyur lha gzugs bskyod// slar byung zhing mchog de sras gyur//
330a1(rgyud 'grel): dogs su mthar phyin gru 'dra yis// phung po ma dag dag pa dang // dag pa dri med sreg rdzas su// byin gyis brlabs la rtog bral mchod// sngags chu dri ldan yungs kar dang // ral gri la sogs mtshon brdar phye// mar dang til sbyar
330a2(rgyud 'grel): drug cing bsreg/ me lce 'bar ba'i ltas rnam brtag/ gson tshe goms par byas pa yis// 'bras bu de ring dus yin gyi// bu khyod 'khrug par ma byed par// brtan par rnal 'byor dran par gyis// khyod kyi lus kyi grong khyer ni// rten 'di yin te de yi thugs// bu
330a3(rgyud 'grel): khyod sems dang gnyis med nyid// khyod kyi rtag gnas 'di yin te// yongs dag zhing ni rtag pa'i yul// rjes 'dzin bshes gnyen 'di yin te// 'di dag gnas skabs 'brel pa'o// gang yang gnas dang lus 'di dang // spyod yul 'di la nyes dmigs
330a4(rgyud 'grel): dang // yongs dag zhi ba dang rten dang ni// spyod yul mchog brjod nges par bya// gzhan yang 'khor dang mya ngan 'das// sdig dang dge legs skyon yon mang // sngags mtshams dal bus rnyed nas su// skyo dang spro bas dbugs 'byung ngo // de rjes gto
330a5(rgyud 'grel): ma bzang byin la// bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gdag/ dam tshig 'dzin pa'i sngags bzla zhing // rus pa bsdus la mchod rten bsgrub// ro bsreg gi cho ga rdzogs so// / spyan ras gzigs mo'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas me'i/
330a6(rgyud 'grel): lha gtso bo sbyin bsreg mnyes// zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o// 'bar ba'i dbus na brjid pa'i sku// me thab dngon pad+mo 'dzin// dmar ba'i 'od kyis gdug pa bsreg// bskyob po'i don mdzad rgyal gyur cog/ sdig pa gzhig dang rapal
330b1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed phyir// las kun sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu// me yi las ni phyogs gnyis las// mkhas pas 'bad de rnam par brtag/ pad+mo lta bu'i thab dkar mdzes// khru bzhi khru gAsum khru gang tshad// zlum po brgya phyed slar brus pa// sor bzhi phyir bskyod byi dor byug/
330b2(rgyud 'grel): kha khyer stegs ngos pad+ma dang // rin chen dra ba dra ba phyed// phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'dab brgyad pa// sgo bzhir bcas dang pho brang nyid// 'o ma 'dzag dang dri 'byin dang // bkra shis byed pa'i yams shing tshad// ci rigs dri zhim sngags byugs lo// bsangs nas
330b3(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma sngon 'gro bas// rol mo mkhan dang me tog brgyud// bram ze'i khyim nas blangs pa'am// yang na rdo rje yams shing la brtsal me// bsil yab kyis ni g.yabs te sbar// mar dang til dang 'bras dang gnas// me tog sman dang 'bras bu sbrang // zho zan yungs kar
330b4(rgyud 'grel): dur ba shing // mthar byed sngags kyis bsad par bya// ar+g+ha la sogs byin brlab sa la// lha yi sbyor bas me lha bskyed// me dang yo byad yams shing sbyangs// ye shes bkug pa dbul bar bya// oM badz+ra a ga na ye swA hA// mar dbul ba'o// oM badz+ra sarba pa
330b5(rgyud 'grel): ba da ha na badz+ra swA hA/ til dbul ba'o// oM badz+ra puSh+Ta yo swA hA// 'bras dbul ba'o// oM badz+ra san tuSh+TA na ye swA hA/ me tog dbul ba'i// oM badz+ra nir byA di swA hA// sman dbul ba'o// oM badz+ra sarba pha la ye swA hA// 'bras bu dbul ba'o// oM badz+ra a nu mr-i te swA hA// sbrang dbus/
330b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// oM badz+ra saM pa da ye swA hA// zho zan dbul ba'o// oM badz+ra a big+h+nA na swA hA/ bgegs bsal ba'o// oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA// dur ba dbul ba'o// oM badz+ra bo d+hi brik+Sha ye swA hA// yams shing dbul ba'o// oM AHhrIHna maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA naM aM ag+na yai a mu ka s+ya sarba kaH/
331a1(rgyud 'grel): sid+d+ha ku ru ye swA hA// bsreg rdzas thams cad kyi mgo 'am mjug du dgang blugs dbul ba'o// gzhan yang mchod pa thams cad kyang // ci rigs mkhas pas shes byas te// dgang dang blug pa'i phyag rgya yis// mnyes byas khrus dang bcas
331a2(rgyud 'grel): pas mchod// mthar bzod par gsol ba dngos grub blangs la gshegs su gsol nas bde ba la reg par gnas par bya'o// sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzog so// / thugs rje chen po bkra shis kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas kun tu snang ba
331a3(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis byed zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o// slob dpon gang zhig gdul bya'i don mthong bas blo rab tu phyogs te/ bsil khang gi rnga yab lta bur gzhan gyi dbang gis g.yo zhing mi brtan pa thob pa ni/ des bdag la dad cing ltos pa por
331a4(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams kyi don du 'phags pa zla ba'i kha dog can yid lo byas la// dkar po'i tshes brgyad dang bcu dang bco lnga la ji snyed 'byor pa'i yo byad dang ldan pas yid dang mthun pa'i gnas byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// bkra shis bzang dang bkra shIs nor 'bru sman//
331a5(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis mchod rdzas dang ni bkra shis rgyan// dpal ldan bkra shis dkyil 'khor cher bris la// bkra shis rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang dgug/ gang dag gang gis phyir dang gang du ji ltar bya ba'i rang bzhin thams cad la bkra shis ces sbyar ro//
331a6(rgyud 'grel): shrIs pa brjod pa'i dbyangs dang sems dang rjes mthun pa'i rol mo dang glus mchod do// me tog dkar dmad tsan dan dkar dmar dang ni rgyan dang dri'i khyad par nges pa'o// yo byad glo bur ba dang gser du skyes pa mtha' dag la rgyal bar gyur pa'i chog sngon
331b1(rgyud 'grel): song bas so// sbyin bdag gam slob ma'i lus bkrus la bkra shis kun tu snang ba'i rgyas gdab bo// dge ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar// kun tu 'od mdzad thugs rje che// bkra shis brgyad ldan pad+mo 'dzin// sa gnon ting 'dzin mchog gis brjid// de nas
331b2(rgyud 'grel): khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad la gdugs la sogs pa brgyad do// mu khyud li grub pa nyi shu'o// steng nas bkra shis kyis rdzas sna tshogs po'i char 'bebs pa'i lha'i sku brgya stong phrag mang po'o// mchod pa'i sprin rum las 'brug sgra dal bus sgrogs pa dang
331b3(rgyud 'grel): glog 'byin pa yang dgod par bya'o// 'og nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pas bum pa nor bus gang ba 'bul ba'i tshul lo// rdo rje slob dpon kun tu snang // bkra shis rnam par snang mdzad kyi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// sngags brjod bum pa dgu gang
331b4(rgyud 'grel): bya// bum pa gang ba dgu la sngags kyi phreng ba dgu dgu bzhu bas byin gyis brlab pa/ rdzas snod dang bcud ma lus pa la ni lha rdzas kyi nor bu rdo rje mtshan bya re res brgyan par ro// phyag dang bskor ba byas nas bgegs bsol te// bkra shis sbyin par bya'o// rdo rje
331b5(rgyud 'grel): dril bu dpa' thogs la// snying rjes kun tu bskor zhing brgyug/ gnas dang gang zag rnal 'byor rnams// ma lus bsrung bas bkra shis gsol// oM AHhrIHa i u au o oM ashrI oMr+yal lo ki ti shwa ra ma ga la sid+d+hi a d+hiSh+ThA na ni dA na pa ti tshi ga mi
331b6(rgyud 'grel): sarba pa ri gra hA sA sI ra migs su maM ga la phra mag satsad+d+hi sid+d+hi hU~M hU~M swAhA/ bkra shis kyi cho ga rdzogs// / dpal spyan ras gzigs sku gdung rnam par snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mchod rten gyi ni cho ga brjod//
332a1(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin brtags shing sbyang ba'i sa// dri zhim chus bran gsang sngags brjod// mgon po snying rje che rnal 'byor// sangs rgyas bstan la rab gus pas// yongs dag dkyil 'khor mdun byas te// mchod sogs cho ga ji
332a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin brtag/ de'i rjes la bsrung ba'i dkyil 'khor sngon du song bas mtshams bcad de/ oM AHba~Mg+h+nA Ta shriM rgya sad/ ma y-i sa na oM hrIHbadz+ra A yuSh+Ta hUM sa blang ba'o// oM hrIHbadz+ra a mr-i ta hUM phaT chu sbyang ba'o// oM hrIHa badz+ra d+ha mi d+ha li pa ny+dza rat+na
332a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM sa dag par bya ba'o// oM hrIHbadz+ra b+ha ba ni swA b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha a d+ho ye hUM bsres nas rdzi ba'o// oM hrIHbadz+ra mung+ga ra a ko Ta ya hUM phaT brdung zhing mnal ba'o// oM hUM hriHbadz+ro d+hU pA ya swA hU~M/ 'bi 'bi bya ba'o// oM hrIHbadz+ra a ra dze swA hA/ ti la byug po'o// oM hrI
332a4(rgyud 'grel): d+hIrmad+hA tru gan+d+he song+tha// 'dzi 'buM gadrug pa'o// oM hU~M d+hAm d+hU tI gar+b+he badz+ra rI pa~M ni mAn s+yA d+d+he/ phyag rgya 'di bsdu pa'o// oM d+hI bad+hA si d+b+ha pa a ko Ta gar+Na sid+d+hi d+ho swAhA/ tho bas bskyed par// a d+hi la~M ka nA pA nIm n+te b+haka m+b+ha s+ya/ b+h+ri bar/ nga
332a5(rgyud 'grel): tiSh+Tha badz+ra swA hA/ bzhugasu gsol ba'o// oM hrIHbadz+ra tsakra pra brta na swA hA/ 'khor lo gzugs pa'o// oM hrIHma hA tsha tro la hUM swA hA/ gdugs dbub pa'o// oM hrIHpany+tsa li ka bAs+t+ra hUM swA hA/ na bza' gsol ba'o// oM hrIHsarba da~M sha a a bi ngi kA ma ka
332a6(rgyud 'grel): ra hUM swA hA/ bzod par gsol ba'o// oM hrIHa ka sA d+harma swa b+ha ba bo shud+d+ha hUM swA hA// lha mchog nga rgyal brtan las ded pa yi// g.yo ba 'od kyi phreng ba dkar bskyed de// ye shes spyan drangs sku gsum rang bzhin la// de nyid rdo rje brtan pa'i sngags
332b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod gzhug/ oM AHhrIHbadz+ra tri kA ya pra tiSh+Tha ti trAM swA hA/ rab tu gnas pa'o// oM na mo b+ha ga wa t+yaM rat+na ke tu ra dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te saM myakAM b+hud+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM rat+ne rat+ne rat+na bi dza ye swA hA/ oM AHhUMHhUM phaT swA hA/ rten yongs su dag par bya ba dang
332b2(rgyud 'grel): cho ga phun sum tshogs par bya'o// cha tsha 'debs pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs gser mdog can la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan ma lus rgya mtsho yi// mthar phyin gser 'od kha dog can// mdzad pa gcig
332b3(rgyud 'grel): gis gdul bya yi// dpag maud don grub nyid zhabs 'dud// sngon du goms pa thob pa yis// tshogs pa tshang bar byas nas ni// snying rje can gyi gas pa la// mi g.yo rdo rje'i phyag rgyas 'dug/ me yi las sam gtor mar bcas// gus pa drag pos mchod//
332b4(rgyud 'grel): sngon 'gro// rim dang cig char bskyod pa'i rim// mkhas pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom// ji srid sku gsung thugs rten yod// de snyed ston pa nyid yin te// rab tu gnas pa myi 'thad mos// lhag par gnas phyir rab gnas brjod// de la sku khrus
332b5(rgyud 'grel): byug pa sogs// phu dung byas la mdzes zhugs te// slob dpon lha yi nga rgyal gyis// ye shes bsdus la gnyis pa gzhug/ oM AHhrIHdzaHoM AHhrIHhUM oM AHhrIHbaM oM AHhrIHhoHrdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la// mthe'u chung lu gu
332b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyud du sprul// mdzub mo gnyis ni lcags kyu'i tshul// rgya 'di ye shes dgug pa'o// de las mi dzub mo gnyis bkug dang // rdo rje bsdams dang gar bsgyur ba// dgug pa bcing dang dgyes bya ba// rim pa bzhin du shes par bya/
333a1(rgyud 'grel): ltar bdag nyid la bcings pa// de bzhin rten la yang yin te// bcings nas dbang bskur rgyas gdab dang // mchod pa la sogs bdag 'jug bzhin// oM a hrIHbadz+ra kA ya wa k+Shit+ta pra tis+thi ra rmA hUM hUM badz+ra dAn a d+hiH/
333a2(rgyud 'grel): ni sarba lak+Sha Na pa ri pA ra hUM hUM hUM sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha bi ma la dA ma hUM hUM hUM rdo rje'i lus kyi pad+ma'i lag/ rin chen me tog snyim par bzung // 'khor lo'i gar bsgyur rgya raM gyi// phyag rgya ldan pas gtor bar bya// de nas me tog tso tog bcu de//
333a3(rgyud 'grel): bzang mang dang ldan pa yi// gser gyi thur me rdo rjes mtshan// thogs la mkhas pas spyan dbye'o// oM AHhrIHtsak+Shu tsak+Shu badz+ra tsak+Shu sa man ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha yau tsik+Shu ye swA hA/ ci 'byor pa'i yon phul te bzod par gsol nas 'khor ba
333a4(rgyud 'grel): srid par bzhugasu gsol ba dang / 'phrin las la thogs pa med par gsol ba btab la/ dgo' ston dang mchod sbyin chen pos thams cad yongasu tshim par bya'o// oM AHhrIHhoHrab tu gnas pa'i cho ga grub pa bsnyes pa'i paN+Di ta chen po
333a5(rgyud 'grel): a dzi ta mi tra gup+tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI dza ga ta mi tA nan+ta'i zhal snga nas dang / kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+he shrI dz+nyA nas gtan la phab nas/ bod kyi lo che ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal bzang
333a6(rgyud 'grel): po zhes bya bas bsgyur ba'o//
334a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa phyag stong spyan stong gi sgrub thabs bzhugs so// /
334b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sa ha sra b+hA dzana~M tra A d+ha naM/ bod swa / phyag stong spyan stong gi sgrub thabs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon po mchog/ dkar po thugs rje rtag 'chang ba'i// byams pa'i stobs kyis 'gro 'dul ba// dam
334b2(rgyud 'grel): pa de la phyag 'tshal nas// bdag nyid dran phyir sgrub thangs gang // nges pa'i shes pa bri bar bya// 'gro ba rnams kyis dben pa yi// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// sa gzhi legs par byugs byas la// me tog dri zhim bkram byas te// gcig dang sbyar bas
334b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dug pa'i stan// bde ba la 'dug byas nas ni// 'gro ba'i don du sems bskyed la// snying gar raM las gyur pa yi// 'od 'byung dmar po bsam byas nas// de steng thugs yid las gyur pa'i// gnod mdzes rgyal por bdag bsams te// chu shing re shing sbyar ba'i
334b4(rgyud 'grel): sgras// phyogs bcu dag tu sdigs mdzub dang // sngags kyis yang dag bskrad par bya// oM sarba big+h+nAM ha na ha na hUM phaT rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA// de nas bdag nyid snying ga la// a las ri bo can bsams nas// de ni thugs mchog bsgom par bya// de las 'od zer nag po dag/
334b5(rgyud 'grel): sa gzhi dag la spros byas pas// sa bzhi la sogs rdo rjer gyur// de las 'od 'phros ra ba dang / gur dang d+hi bre dra ba dag/ shin tu mngon par bsgom par bya// de nas na mkhar bla ma dang // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dag/ sngon du mngon sum dmigs
334b6(rgyud 'grel): ba la// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa dang // sdig pa bshags dang yid rang dang // bsod nams sngo dang skyabs 'gro dang // sems bskyed pa dang gnas bzhi dang // mthar ni stong nyid bsgom pa'o// don gyi dngos por bsams nas ni// sngags 'di myur du bklag
335a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harma swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ oM shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na ba dz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de dag nang du bsams bya ba// ya ba ra la rnam bzhi pa// stang du sna ldan gzhag pa las// dbang chen chu bdag 'bar ba dang // skyod par
335a2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa rnam bzhi yi// dkyil 'khor kha dog rnam bzhi rnams// rim pa bzhin du rnam por bsgom// de steng sum las ri rab ni// rin chen sna bo zhis yang dag gnas// de dag yongs su gyur pa las// khang pa brtsegs pa bsam bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo
335a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa// ka pa brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan// ye shes sna lnga'i rtsig pa dag/ phyogs bzhi dag tu brgyan nas kyang // dra ba dra phyed dag dang naM// rin chen pha gu dag dang ni// gu bzhi par ni brgyan pa yin// to ra na ni bzhis brgyan shing // mdzes pa'i pad+ma'i phreng ba dang //
335a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje thig skud 'od 'bar ba'o// gru bzhi dag tu dpag bsam shing // chen po bzhi dang klu rgyal dang // sprin dang phyogs skyong zhing srung rnams// yang dag par ni dgod par bya// de dkyil thig ni bzhi btab pas// dkyil 'khor dgu ru gyur pa la// dkyil du bcom
335a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan phyag stong pa// kha dog dkar po ldem bag can// zhal gdong bcu gcig phyag bco brgyad// dbu ma'i zhal gsum dkar la mdzes// lhag ma khro zhal 'jigs pa'i gzugs// kun gyi steng na 'od dpag med// pad+ma'i rigs kyi phyag rgyas btab//
335a6(rgyud 'grel): dang po phyag gnyis snying ga na// thal mo nges par sbyar ba yin// de 'og g.yas na dgra sta dang // de 'og gri gug rnon po yin// pad+ma ral gri zhags pa dang // ljon shing me long bsil yab dag/ rim pa bzhin du gnas pa yin// gson pa'i phyog ni de 'og dag/
335b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu mda' gzhu dang // lcags kyi bum pa 'khor lo dang // gdugs dang rin chen 'bar ba rnams// rim pa bzhin du bsnams par mdzad// rdo rje bsnams pa'i phyag gis ni// lha mo pad+ma'i sgrol ma la// gnyisu med pas 'khyud par mdzad// lha ma
335b2(rgyud 'grel): de ni zhal gcig ste// phyag ni dug tu nges pa ste// dang po'i g.yas pasaM At+pal gyi// steng na pad+ma brgyad bsnams pas// thugs rje che ba 'khyud par mdzad// de 'og gri gug pad+ma bsnams// g.yon pa'i dang pos me long dang // bsili yab bum pa bsnams/
335b3(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad// hUM dang pa las gyur pa yi// phyag stong yum bcas de ltar bsgom// de yi shar gyi dkyil 'khor la// yi ge baM las gyur pa yi// rdo rje pad+ma zhes bya ba'i// zhal gcig kha dog dkar po can// phyag g.yas dang po ut+pal gyi// stong na
335b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad// de steng rdo rje rtse dgu pa// sngon po nyid kyis bsnams par mdzad// de 'og 'khor lo zhags pa dang // g.yon gyi dang pos dril bu 'dzin// de 'og lcags kyi dgra sta dag/ phyar bo nyid kyis bsnams par mdzad// lho phyogs dkyil
335b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sngon po la// yi ge raM las gyur pa yi// rin chen pad+ma bsam bya ba// g.yas kyi dang po ut+pal gyi// steng na pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad// de steng rin chen zur brgyad pa// 'bar ba nyid kyis yang dag 'dzin// lhag ma shar gyi bcom ldan ltor// phyag mtshan
335b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni bsnams par mdzad// nub kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po la// muM yig 'bar ba las gyur pa'i// thub pa'i pad+ma bsgom bya ba// g.yas kyi dang po rang nyid kyi// mtshan ma rnams ni bsnams par mdza nga// lhag ma shar gyi bcom ldan lta8//
336a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag mtshan rnams ni bsnams par mdzad// byang gi dkyil 'khor ljang gu la// bcom ldan las kyi pad+ma ni// yi ge kaM las gyur pa ste// g.yas kyi dang po rang nyid rtags// phyag gzhan gong ma rnams bzhin no// shar lnga'i rdo rje sgrol ma
336a2(rgyud 'grel): ni// lha mo sku mdog sngo skya lo// zhal gcig phyag ni drug pa'i dbyibs// g.yas kyi dang po ut+pal te// chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad pa la// rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams par mdzad// phyag gzhan gri gug pad+ma dang // me long bsil yab bum pa bsnams// baM yig las
336a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur de ltar bsam// lho nub rin chen sgrol ma ni// raM yig las gyor dmar dmar ser mdog/ phyag g.yos dang po rang nyid rtags// lcug ma rdo rje sgril ma bzhin// nub byang thub pa'i sgrol ma ni// mu yig las gyur ljang dmar mdog/ ring po rang gi rtags
336a4(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba'o// byang shar las kyi sgrol ma ni// gaM yig las gyur ljang skya'i mdog/ phyag g.yas rang gi rtags 'chang zhing // phyag gzhan gong ma rnams dang mtshungs// gru bzhir rin chen bum pa bzhi// kha dog rnams bzhis rnam par gnas// de yi phyi rol snam
336a5(rgyud 'grel): bu la// ling tsho bcu drug bri bya ste// phyag na rdo rje 'jam dbyangs dang // kun gzigs sgrib pa rnam sel dag/ zhal gcig phyog ni gnyis pa la// kha dog rnam bzhis rnam par gnas// g.yas na rdo rje At+pa la// pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams// 'gying bag tshul
336a6(rgyud 'grel): du gnas par mdzad// g.yon pa dang po'i phyag rgya'o// de dag kun gyi g.yon rol du// sgeg mo rin chen phreng ba dang // dbyangs dang gar gyis mnyes mdzad rnams// rang rang phyag rgyas yang dag gnas// byams pa na mkha'i snying po dag/ ku ni bzang sa yi snying po dang
336b1(rgyud 'grel): rang rang kha dog phyag rgya yis// de yi cha la rnam par gnas// de g.yon me tog bdug spos dang // mar me dri chab lha mo rnams// rang nyid kha dog phyag mtshan gyis// yang dag par ni gnas pa'o// lha rnams de dag thams cad ni// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan//
336b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i steng na nyi zla yi// steng na rab tu gnas pa'o// shar dang lho dang nub dang byang // sgo rnam na ni sgo skyong dag/ shes rab mthar byed gshin mthar byed// pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthar rnams// dbu gsum phyag ni drag pa la// 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyi cha
336b3(rgyud 'grel): lugs can// phyag g.yas dang po ral gri dang // thod dbyug pad+ma rgya gram 'dzin// lhag ma lcags kyu zhags pa dang // rtse gsum lcags sgrog dam pa'i bdag/ rdo rje brag gi steng gnas pa'o// de nas dom tshig sems dpa' yi// thugs las 'od zer
336b4(rgyud 'grel): spros nas kyang // ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs nas// mdun du yang dag mchod par bya// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyor shes pas// dam tshig 'khor lo myur du gzhug/ de nas rang gi sa bon las// 'od zer na mkha'i phyogs spros nas// pad+ma'i sgo
336b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs lha mo lngas// ye shes lha yi bum pa yis// chu yis bdag la dbang bskur ba'o// oM a b+hI shots+tsha tu maM lo ka na thA ya hUM/ de nas bdag nyid snying gi la// ri bong can dang shing rta ban+d+ha// kha sbyor phur mar gnas pa yi// nang du chu skyes 'ashA ma
336b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad// de steng dug gsum yi ge ni// kha dog dkar po rnam par gnas// de la stod nas dkar po ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// 'phrog dang nang dang kun gyi steng // dug gsum yi ges rnam par brgyan// de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor
337a1(rgyud 'grel): lo ni// phyogs bcu dag tu spros pa las// 'gro ba'i sems can thams cad ni// nyon mongs thams cad sbyang byas nas// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ngo bos gnas// de dag rim par bsdus pa las// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can//
337a2(rgyud 'grel): lha yi sku ni ba sgom par bya// de ni rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o// bsgom pas skyo ni sngags bzlas pa// mu tig phreng ba'i tshul gyis su// steng nas steng du 'bar ba ni// rang bzhin 'khor bar rnam par bsam// dang po dag dang bar gnas pa'i// tha ma dag
337a3(rgyud 'grel): gis bsdus pa yi// sngags kyis yang dag bzlas par bya// oM pad+ma hAstA yas ha s+sa badz+ra b+hu dz+nyA naM traM/ nI la kAN+Da lo krI shwa rA ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma tA re hUM/ oM badz+ra pad+me hUM/ oM rat+na pad+ma hUM/ oM mu ni pad+me hUM/ oM kArma pad+me hUM/ oM badz+ra tA
337a4(rgyud 'grel): re hUM/ oM mu ni tA r+ye hUM/ oM rat+na tA rA hUM/ oM karma tA re hUM/ oM badz+ra pA trA~M hU~M/ oM many+dzu shrI hUM/ oM sa man+ta kI ki hU~M/ oM A bA re Na ba~M skaM b+hi hUM/ oM badz+ra lA s+ya hUM/ oM rat+na mI ye hUM/ oM pad+ma gI Da~M hUM/ oM karma nirti hUM/ oM me tri ye hU~M/ oM AM
337a5(rgyud 'grel): gaM so gurbe hU~M/ oM sa man+ta b+ha dr-i hUM/ oM kA twe gar+b+ha hrI/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM/ oM rat+na puSh+pe hUM/ oM pad+ma A lo kaM hUM/ oM karmaM gan+d+he hUM/ oM pradz+nyA nA ka hUM/ oM ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ oM pad+mar+b+batatrA/ oM hU~M la dz+ra mchong pa dag ni nyi shu yi// sngags dang phyag rgyas yang dag
337a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod// yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags ni// rtag tu 'don pa nyid du bya// lam du zhugs dang 'chag pa'i tshe// spyod l-i mi la ni spros pa ni// rdo rje rtse gcig phyag rgyas ni// 'od byung steng la snying po yi// sdigs de yongasu gyur pa dang // cho ga
337b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum las rdzogs pa yi// rim pa bzhin du lha bsams nas// yan lag bzhi la rab tu bstim// cho ga'i phyag rgya dpa' bo lnga// phyag rgya 'di yis lus mdzes pa'o// de nas sbyin sreg cho ga ni// bdag nyid 'phrin las rnam bzhi yi// rnal 'byor yang dag pas
337b2(rgyud 'grel): byas la// las kyi dang po zhi ba mchod// dkyil 'khor khru gang zlum po la// pad+ma'i phreng bas nang bskor zhing // rdo rje 'bur ba'i phreng ba dag/ de yi phyi rol bri byas la// dri zhim dkar po zhor ldan pa'i'o// bsreg cing ku shas bcings te gzugs// gu gul me tog
337b3(rgyud 'grel): ku sha dang // mar dang 'bras thug til dang ni// 'o thug lung thang sngon po dag/ las kyi sngags ni mthar sbyar la// me lha de yi snying ga yi// mkha' la 'khor lo rau bsaM bya de/ bdag nyid dam tshig sems dpa' yis// rim pa bzhin du mchod pa'o// bya ba rnams ni
337b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la// de yi ngo bos mnyam par gzhag/ de nas bstod pa bya ba ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs kyi sku// chos kyi sku ste gzhan gyi mchog/ sngags kyi mgon po mchog gi lce// snying rje'i bdag nyid phyag 'tshal bstod// ye shes rdo rje stobs po che/
337b5(rgyud 'grel): tu nges pas zhi ba'i tshul// theg pa chen po'i go 'phang thob// rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal bstod// shin tu dag pa'i dpa' bo che// mdog gi dbang phyug kun gyi mgon// dam chos mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i// ji bzhin 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod// ci yang mi
337b6(rgyud 'grel): dmigs stong pa'i nga // lhan cig skyes pa'i ral gri bsnams// mi rtog ye shes go cha can// rgyu dang 'bras bu phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas zas kyi rnal 'byor ni// chu yi dkyil 'khor de la yang / raM las me yi dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum 'bar ba
338a1(rgyud 'grel): bsam byas nas// de dkyil tshogs kyi 'khor lo yang // gsal bar rab tu bsam byas nas// snod ni rab las rin chen nit+ta rang bzhin 'bar bar bsgom byas nas// der ni kha zas sna tshogs rnams// bsams nas de dkyil rdo rje
338a2(rgyud 'grel): niHrtse lnga rab tu 'bar ba las// bdud rtsir gyur pa rab tu bsam// de nas rang gi sa bon las// 'od zer khwa dog sna lnga dag/ na mkha'i phyogs su 'phros pa las// phyogs dus kun no bzhugs pa yi// de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyi// mdzod spur
338a3(rgyud 'grel): zhugs nas thugs kyi ni// bdud brtsi blangs nas de nyid du// 'dres par bsnams nas sngags 'di yi// byin gyis brlabs nas bza' bar bya// oM AHhrIHbdag gi 'jig rten mgon po yi// sgrub pa'i thabs 'di byas pa yis// sems can 'gro ba
338a4(rgyud 'grel): mtha' dag la// nyon mongs sgrib pa kun bsal nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// lha yi sku ni thob par shog/ slob dpon chen po dngos grub bsnyes pa// ta thA ga ta badz+ra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyag stong spyan stong gi sgrub thabs
338a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// // mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas shar phyogs b+haM ga la'i nyi ma 'byung gnas zla ba zhes bya ba// mkhas pa chen
338a6(rgyud 'grel): po de yi zhal snga nas// bod kyi lo tsa dge tshul khyung grags kyis// 'dul ba'i bstan pa snying po gan migangs ldan rgyan gong gtsug lag khang de ru// bder gshegs bstan la phan phyir bsgyur lags kyi// rnal 'byor spyod rnams nges par brtson par mdzod//
339a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug yid bzhin nor bu 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sgrub thabs bzhug so//
339b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo kaM te shwa ra tsan+ta ma ni tsakra b+ha d+hi sa d+ha na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'khor los sgyur ba'i sgrub thabs// thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshalo// 'gro ba skyob mdzad thugs rje
339b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i gtso// zla ba'i nor lha'i sku mnga'i thugs rjes mchog sprin de la gsum gyis phyag 'tshal nas// nyi ma'i zer gyis mun gsal chu skyes kha 'byed ltar// thugs rje'i 'od kyis ma rig mun sel snying gi pad+ma 'byed mdzad pa'i// sgrub thabs dka' drin dran phyir
339b3(rgyud 'grel): bri bar bya// me tog ra ba la sogs gtsang ma yid dga'i gnasu ni// rnam lnga hrIHyis bsngags pa'i maN+Dal legs par bya// kha dog dkar po'i mi tog la sogs mchod pa ldan byas la// yi ge gsum ldan khrus kyi dri ma gnyis bkrus te// nyon mongs mtha'
339b4(rgyud 'grel): dag gzhig phyir bde ba'i stan la 'dug/ yig gi sum ldan hrIHyis gnas bdag rnal 'byor bsrung // snying gAr zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du hrIHyig dkar po bsam// 'od kyis 'gro ba'i doH'jig rten dbang phyug spyan drangs te// yi ge gsum ldan hrIH
339b5(rgyud 'grel): yis me tog la sogs mchod pa 'bul// de la sdig pa bshags shing mi 'gyod sdom pa blang // rjes su yi rang skyabasu 'gro ba dang // byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed dge ba'i rtsa bar bsngo// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho sgrol mdzad thugs rje 'od kyis blta//
339b6(rgyud 'grel): byams pa'i 'od kyis sems can 'jig rten mgon gyi gzugasu mthong // dga' ba'i 'od kyis sems can bde ljon rgyun mi 'chad par bsam// btang snyon 'od kyis gzung 'dzin cha spa ngas chos nyid mthong bar blta// gzung ba dag phyir sngags
340a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harma sa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&haM/ 'dzin pa dag phyir sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ dri med na mkha' lta bur kun bltas te// dbus su paM
340a2(rgyud 'grel): skyes pad+ma dkar po sngon por bcas// lte bar hrIHlas byung ba chu shil 'od dang ldan// de dbus hrIHyig las byung yid bzhin nor bu 'bar// hri ldan 'od kyis 'gro ba'i don byas te// phyogs bcu rgyal sras bkug ste nor bu byin brlabs pas// de
340a3(rgyud 'grel): yongs gyur te 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhengs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'gying pag 'od zer dkar po 'bar// gu lang dkar po'i mdog bzhini gzhon nu rgyan cha can// phyag g.yas sbyin pa bzhi yi gtor sbyin yid bzhin nor bu 'bar// phyag g.yon
340a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba sgrol phyir 'khor lo rin chen ldan// spyi gtsug thor tshogs steng na gsung gi dbang phyug bzhugs// thugs rje 'od kyis 'gro ba kun khyab byed// rang snying pad steng zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// nor bu dbus na hrIHyig dkar po gsal//
340a5(rgyud 'grel): dri 'od las byung sgrol ma khro gnyer can sogs phyogs bzhi'i lha// pad+ma zla ba'i steng na bgying bag ldan par bzhugs// phyi rol rgyal chen bzhi dang mchod pa'i lha mo sprul// de dag sku mdog so so'i phyag mtshan gtso bor mtshungs par blta// kun
340a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi thugs kar zla ba la gnas nor bu sa bon bas mo// 'od zer lcags kyu dang mtshungs na mkha' khyab spros te// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs me tog la sogs pa sa// yongs su mchod nas legs pas sngags 'di gzhug/ dzaHhUMHbaM ho
340b1(rgyud 'grel): sa bol ma nu wAr tha dad med pa'i 'khor lo la// skyed mched gnas su zla ba hrIHmaMg bsam// sku gsung thugs la saM ge gsum bltas la// thugs ka'i bod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bskul// mchod bstod byas nas gsol ba gdab par bya// oM saH
340b2(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+dza tA maM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// lho yi tshwachu ldan bum pas ni// 'khor lo la ni dbang bskur tAM// spyi bo 'od dpag med pas brgyan// gzugs sogs rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// 'khor lo la ni legs par mchod//
340b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la// de dag gis ni bstod par bya// de nas thugs kyi sa bon las// yi ge sngags kyi phreng ba ni// mar me lta bur rab bltas la// 'od kyis sems can thams cad ni// 'jig rten mgon por bsgrub byas te// yi ge'i
340b4(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba rnams la baMstim// zhal dang lte ba'i bar du ni// rgyun mi 'tshod pa'i phreng bar bsgom// oM tsan+ta ma NI tsakra brti ma Ni pad+me aHhrI hUM phaT swA hA// snying po'i sngagaso// oM pad+ma b+ha ra ta ke aHhUM hUM phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so// rtsa ba'i sngags
340b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa rnams// sa bon yi ge gsum dang ldan// swA hA phaT ces bzlas par bya// 'od zer la ni yig 'brung gus// rdo rje skud po lta bu yi// 'khor bar bzlas pas lus khyab nas// sgrib pa gnyis spangs ye shes kyi// 'khor lo bsal bar
340b6(rgyud 'grel): ston par byed// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// lha rnams kyis ni bsnyen 'gyur te// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed// bye ba gsum rdzogs sngags pa yis// rab dga' la sogs sa thob nas// sa bcu
341a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur// sngags bzlas dus su cho ga ni// gtsang mar byas pa'i sa phyogs su// gu gu la tsan dan a ga ru// pus ka sa dus tse ri ka/ go ro tsa na shing gi bcud // legs sbyar dung ngam ny+tsa phyis su// gzhag ste
341a2(rgyud 'grel): brtse ba la sogs pa'i// gzungs sngags stong phrag bzlas nas ni// phyag g.yas zla ba dri bcas pas// dkyil 'khor khru do la sogs byug/ pad+ma dkar po la sogs pa'i// me tog lha yi gnas su bkod// der ni paM skyes pad+ma ni// dkar po 'dab
341a3(rgyud 'grel): ma brgyad pa ni// rim pa gsum du gnas par bsam// lha rnams thugs kyi sa bon las// lha yi 'khor lo sprul byas te// pad+ma rim pa gsum dag la// rim pas lha rnams bzhugs par bsam// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drings bstim// dbang
341a4(rgyud 'grel): bskur cho ga rdzogs pa dang // skye mchod gnas gsum byin brlabs te// a ka ru dang shel spang ka/ 'bra ma tsau ri la sogs pa'i// dri zhom spos kyis mchod par bya// pad+ma dkar po tsam pa ka/ dzA ya kun das mchod par bya// ga bur go ro tsa na
341a5(rgyud 'grel): dang tsan dan dkar po ldan pa yi// dri zhim mar gyi mar me dbul// sA lA dkar po zho zan dang // snang bcas 'o ma dbul bar bya// dri zhim dkar po chu yis ni// sku la byugs pa dbul bar bya// na bza' rgyan dang me tog phreng // gdugs dang
341a6(rgyud 'grel): ba dan rgyal mtshan dang // rlung yab la sogs rgyan rnams dbul// dril bu pi wang rdza rnga dang // gling bu rje rings pa Da ha// sgra mchog rnams kyis mchod par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // blo ma 'khor lo bcas pa la// bstod
341b1(rgyud 'grel): nas gsol ba byang babar bya// 'khor lo'i lha rnams thams cad kyi// thugs kar bad steng zla ba la// hrI yig sngags kyis bskor bar bya// 'od zer sngags kyi phreng ba ni// zhal nas byung ste rjes gnang tshul// bdag gi zhal zhugs thugs kar thim// de dag
341b2(rgyud 'grel): khri phrag sngags blangs nas// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag po// sngags phreng kha dog bzhir shes nas// mdun gyi dkyil 'khor lha rnams la// rjes su mthun pa'i gsol ba gdab// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// 'khor lor bcas
341b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha rnams kyis// gang 'dod dngos grub sbyin par bsam// de nas lha rnams thugs kar bsdu// de ltar cho ga byas nas ni// mchod bstod gsol bdab sngon 'gro bas// gzungs sngags bzlas pa brtson par bya// bsnyen pa rdzogs par
341b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur na ni// gang zhig bdag gam nad pa'imo// gdon chen nyen dang tshe nyams dang // 'jigs pa brgyad kyis nyen pa la// bsrung ba'i cho ga brtsam par bya// shis par gyur pa'i nyi ma la// ras sam shing lo gro ga ni// dri spos
341b5(rgyud 'grel): sa kyis bdug pa dang // nye ba'i snying po stong phrag gcig/ hrIHbcas sngags kyis byin brlabs te// gur kum go ro tsa na dang // kor si sha ldan/ pu ba yis// 'khor lo legs par bro bar bya// me tog dkar po yu ba yis// pad+ma dkar
341b6(rgyud 'grel): po 'dab brgyad bri// dbus su hrIHchen bris pa'i nang // sgrub pos legs par bri bar bya// phyi rol pad+ma'i lte ba la// yi ge gsum ldan nya snying po// hrIHyi ga bar du sgrub pa po// rak+Sha ku ru ldan par bri// pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad la ni// snying po spel
342a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags ldan par bri// pad+ma'i mu khyud tha ma la// rtsa ba'i gzungs sngags gong dang mtshungs// gtsang sbra ldan pas bris nas ni// dkyil 'khor dri yis legs byugs la// me tog dkar po dri zhim po// sil ma legs par
342a2(rgyud 'grel): bkram pa yi// steng du 'khor lo legs par gzhag/ lha rnams thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis// 'khor lo 'od kyis sems sbyangs te// paM bskyed pad+ma'i gnas rnams su// gzungs sngags mar me'i phreng ba bzhin// 'od ldan gsal bar bsgom
342a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis// lha yi 'khor lo spyan drangs te// mchod dang bstod pa byas nas ni// 'khor lo la ni bstim por bya// lha rnams thugs ka nas spros pa'i// rtsa ba'i gzungs sngags la sogs pa'i// khri phrag bzlas
342a4(rgyud 'grel): ba 'khor lor bstim// des ni srung ba'i sgrub pa rdzogs// mchog gi dngos grub sgrub 'dod pas// gong gi dkyil 'khor logs byas te// dbusu gtso bo la sogs pa// lha rnams cho ga gsum gyis bskyed// ye shes spyan 'dren la sogs pa//
342a5(rgyud 'grel): cho ga'i yan lag thams cad kya'o// gong gi mchod pa'i rdzas rnams kyis// dus gsum legs par mchod byas la// yi ge grangs kyi 'bum phrag bzla// thun mtshams gsol gdab bskor ba ni// brgya 'am stong phrag ro ra bya// de tshe thugs rje
342a6(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs kyis// 'khor lo zhal ston yang na ni// dngos grub rjes su gnang ba sbyin// lus la 'od zer 'byong ba dang // dri zhim shel gyi mdog dang mtshungs// sems can thams cad dang gyur cing // gcan zan ri dgos 'bros mi 'gyur//
342b1(rgyud 'grel): na mkhar 'phur dang shing rta zhon// rgya mtsho sgrol dang ri rgyal mdzeg/ nor bu 'khor lo rnyed pa dang // pad+ma dkar po zla ba mthong // hrIHbcas yi ge zhal zhugs mthong // rang mdog dkar po khrus byed na// de dag 'grub pa'i rtags su bshad// de nas sman
342b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog ri lu sgrub// bum pa bzang po'i nang du ni// yungs kar ba yi rnam lnga dang // ru rta tsan dan dkar po dang // shi raM khaN+Da ga pur dang // rnam par rgyal ba'i a ru ra// sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lho// dri lnga snying po lnga bcas te// rgyu skar rgyal gyi nyi ma li//
342b3(rgyud 'grel): bum par btsal te dkyil 'khor gyi// dbus su legs par gzhag par bya// de steng gdugs dang ba dan dang // phyogs bzhir rgyal mtshan gdags par bya// der ni lha yi 'khor lo ni// cho ga gsum gyis bskyed par bya// ye shes spyan drangs la
342b4(rgyud 'grel): stsogs pa// cho ga rdzogs par byas nas ni// dus gsum mchod dang bstod par bya// 'jig rten mgon po thugs kar ni// paM bskyed pad+ma zla ba'i steng // a los bum pa bzang por gyur// nang du hrIHmtshan ri lu bsam// gtso bo la sogs lha rnam
342b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi// thugs las rtsa ba'i snying po dang // nye snying spros nas ri lur bstim// thun mtshams bskor ba brgya phrag byas// de tshe ri lu lhor mthong na// 'jig rten mgon po 'grub par 'gyur// ri lo rgyal chen bzhir mthong na// zhi sogs phrin las
342b6(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par 'gyur// ri lu nyi ma zla bar mthong // mkha' la 'gro 'gyur the tshom med// ri lu 'khor lo nor bur mthong // yid bzhin dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// de tshe bum pa'i gzugs mthong na// sa 'og dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/
343a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od mthong lha yi spyan dang 'dra// sgra 'byung lha yi snyan dang ldan// ral gris shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur// du ba byung bas tshe 'phel 'gyur// dri yis nad rnams zhi byed 'gyur// gzhan yang bzlas pa la sogs pa'i// sgrub pa
343a2(rgyud 'grel): gzungs kyi cho gar shes// bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di brtsams pas// de yis bsod nams gang thob pa// 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad kun// 'jig rten mgon po thob par shog/ 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'khor
343a3(rgyud 'grel): lo sgyur ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon dze te ris mdzad pa rdzogs so// / pat+nI ta pur+Na kIrti dang / sna nam rdo rje bla mas bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ lo kaM shwa ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs
343a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgom par 'dod pas/ dang por skyabs 'gro dang sems bskyed byas nas rang gi snying gar yi ge a dkar po yongasu gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / de'i steng du yi ge hrIH
343a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po zhig bsgom/ de las 'od zer 'phros pas ri bo po ta la na rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs pa de mdun gyi na mkhar spyan drangs te de la rang gi lus dpag tu med pa sprul nas yid kyis phyag byas par bsam zhing snying ga'i hUM'i 'od zer
343a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis mchod pa lngas mcho dang / sdig pa thams cad ni so sor bshags so// bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo // sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'dabs so// bdag gis bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig ces
343b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod do// de nas ye shes pa de'i thugs ka'i yi ge hrI las 'od zer byung ste// rang gi snying ga'i yi ge hI la thim de las 'od zer 'phros pas rang gi sgrib pa gnyis dag par byas te rang rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyags
343b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa/ phyag dang po gnyis thugs kar thal mo sbyar ba/ g.yas kyi gnyis pa na nor bu'i bgrang phreng g.yon gyi gnyis pa na pad+ma dkar po 'dzin pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs can sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis dbu brgyan pa/ rin po che'i rgyan kun gyi
343b3(rgyud 'grel): spras shing / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang ldan pa zhig tu gyur par bsam/ de nas ye shes pa de rang dam tshig pa la thim pas dbyer med du gyur par bsgom/ yang rang gi snying ga'i yi ge hrI las 'od zer 'phros pas sems can thams cad la phog
343b4(rgyud 'grel): ste de rnams kyi sgrib pa gnyis dag par byas nas thams cad rje btsun 'jig rten dbang phyug tu gyur par bsgom zhing de rnams kyis ngag tu sgra ci grag pa thams cad kyang yi ge drug pa zlos pa bsam/ rang gis zlos pa'i tshe de thams cad kyis yi ge
343b5(rgyud 'grel): drug pa de re ra zlos par bsgom zhing dag paro bzlaso// mthar yongs su dag pa'i bsngo ba bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug zhal gcig phyag bzhi po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/ chags lo tsa ba chos rje
343b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyis nyung du bsdus te bsgyur ba'o//
344a1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge drug pa'i rgyud kyi rim pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i sgrub thabs bzhug so//
344b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Sha Da ak+Sha ra tAn+ta kra ma maN+Da la tsa kra u pA de shA sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ yi ge drug pa'i rgyud kyi rim pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzhi
344b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// re shig dang por ting nge 'dzin dang rjes su mthun pa'i sa phyogs su zhugs nas/ thal mo sbyar lo spyi bor gzhag nas shar phyogs su/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra ban+d+ha nAM kA ro mi zhes phyag bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs nas/
344b3(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na ban+d+ha naM kA ro mi/ zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du nub phyog/ su/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma ban+da naM kA ro mi/ zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs su/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma ban+da naM kA ro me/ zhes bya bas phyag bzhi byas la/ g.yas pa'i khu tshur
344b4(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor gzhag nas/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta u b+ha ba ya swA hA/ zhes bya bas lus dang ngag dang sems byin gyis brlab par bya'o// khu tshur de nyid kyi swA khaM lo/ oM pad+mod+b+had+hA pA ya swA hA/ zhes bya bas ngag byin gyis brlab par bya'o// g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar
344b5(rgyud 'grel): gor gzhag nas/ oM badz+rod+b+ha bA ya swA hA/ zhes bya bas sems byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de'i rjes la cho ga 'dis bgegs bsol bar bya ste/ oM a mr-i ta ha na ha na sarba ba~Mg+h+na da ha da hUM/ sarba pA paM hUM phaT/ ces bya ba brjod la thalo mo sbyar nas/ mthe bo bar du gzhag
344b6(rgyud 'grel): pa de la badz+ra hUM phaT ces bya ba'i yi ge 'bar ba'i rnam par bkod laM/ thal mo de las phyogs bcur 'gyur ba'i rdo rje 'phro bar bsams nas/ oM a mr-i ta ha na ha na sarba b+hig+h+nAM da ha da ha/ sarba pA paM hUM phaT/ ces bya ba 'di lan bdun brjod la thal mo lan
345a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum brdabs nas se gol yang lan gsum brdab par bya'o// de'i rjes la sngar bshad pa'i 'bar ba'i rdo rje dra bas bgegs thams cad bsal bar bya'o// de'i rjes la rang gi snying gar a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de'i steng du re pha las me
345a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i rnam pa bsams la/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings nas/ rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa brjod par bya ste/ oM pad+ma sa ta sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ pad+ma satwA te no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+hA ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo maM b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma
345a3(rgyud 'grel): su tsa me/ tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoHb+ha ga bAn sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma mA me muny+tsa pad+ma badz+ri b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa AHzhes lan bdun brjod do// spyi bor a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cha bcu drug pa bdud rtsib bdag nyid la yi ge oM gyos brlabs la bsgom
345a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// sngags brjod pa'i rjes nyid la snying ga'i gnas su re pha las me s+pha r-i la lus thams cad bsregs la yang spyi bo'i zla ba'i bdud rtsi 'bab par bsam mo// de'i rjes la rdo rje thal mo bcings la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dze pas+tha nA ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta ya
345a5(rgyud 'grel): mi oM sarba ta thA ga ta a sha ma sa ta sarba sata naM sarba sid+d+ha ya saM par+yan+taM/ sarba ta thA ga par+tha A d+hi tiSh+Tha taM/ zhes bya ba 'di nyid lan gsum brjod la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rnam par yongs gang bar lhag par
345a6(rgyud 'grel): mos la de rnams yid kyis mchod nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs par bya'o// oM dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'chi// sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags// 'gro ba'i bsod nams rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyi bzung / zhes bya
345b1(rgyud 'grel): bas sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rjes su yid rang ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa bya'o nga'i rjes la/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shad+d+ho ha~M/ zhes brjod la/ byang chub kyi sems tsam la lhag par gnas pa sems kyis
345b2(rgyud 'grel): mthong nas/ oM d+harma d+hA tu swab+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes mngon par brjod nas/ byang chub kyi sems de yi ge paM gyi rnam par yongs su gyur par ma thong nas/ de las sna tshogs pad ma chen por bskyed la/ de'i steng du yi ge a las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng
345b3(rgyud 'grel): du yang yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du b+h+rUM dkar po/ de las mchod rten dkar po/ de las yang / rnam pa gsum du spros pa nyid kyis bum pa dang / kha khyer thams cad kyi steng du yang yi ge hU~M bsams la/ bum pa de'i nang du yang a las
345b4(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du yang / a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de la yi ge drug las 'dab ma brgyad pa'i pad+ma dmar po/ mtshams kyi 'dab ma dang bcu gnyis pa/ de'i steng du yi ge hrIHlas 'dab ma drug pa'i pad+ma dka raM po/ de'i
345b5(rgyud 'grel): steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ zhes bya ba yi ge drug pa gong nas gong du nang du zhugs par rnam par bsgom la/ de gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das sku mdog dkar po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang
345b6(rgyud 'grel): phyug zhal gcig pa phyag drug pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbu rgyan can bsgom mo/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag g.yas pa'i dang po ni pa dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya de'i rtse mo la chung zad dbu 'dud pa'o// gnyis pa la phreng ba/ gsum pa'i phag skyabs sbyin
346a1(rgyud 'grel): la rin po che zur drug pa bsnams pa'o// phyag g.yon gyi dang pos pad+ma'i steng du rin po che nur drug pa gnas pa la pad+ma 'dab ma drug pa'o// gnyis pa la dbyug pa/ gsum pa la ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa'o// de'i
346a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das pad+ma sgrol ma oM pad+ma ti ri hUM zhes bya ba 'dis de'i rnam par bsam mo// khyang par ni pad+ma dor la ut+pa la'i stong du rin po che zur dug pa'i steng du pad+ma 'dab ma drug pa bsnams pa'o// shar du oM badz+ra pad+ma hUM/ lhor
346a3(rgyud 'grel): oM rat+na pad+ma hUM/ nub tu oM mu ne pad+ma hUM/ byang du oM karma badz+rI hU~M/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rim pa 'dis/ rdo rje pad+ma dang / rin chen pad+ma dang / thub pa'i pad+ma dang / las kyi pad+ma rnams bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rnam par blta'o// khyad par ni
346a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i steng du rin po che zur drug pa'i steng du rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / 'khor lo dang / sna tshogs rdo rje'o// me'i phyogs su oM badz+ra tA re hUM/ bden bral gyi phyogs su oM rat+na tA ra hU~M/ rlung gi phyogs su oM mu ne tA re hUM/ dbang ldan du oM karma tA ra
346a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis po/ rims bzhin du bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rnam par rdo rje sgrol ma dang / rin chen sgrol la ma shin kyi sgrol mi dag bcom ldan 'das le mngon du bltas pa'o// khyad par ni ut+pa la'i steng bzhin du/ rin po
346a6(rgyud 'grel): tshi bur drug pa'i gnas su rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / 'khor lo dang / sna tshogs rdo rje'o// brgyad po 'di dag sems dpa'i skyil krung gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs par bsam mo// phyogs mtshamos kyi 'dab mo li shari phyogs su oM mi
346b1(rgyud 'grel): mAn+ta ka hUM/ lho ru oM pradz+nyAn+ta kA hUM/ nub tu oM pad+manA ka hUM/ byang du oM big+h+nAn+ta ka hUM/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi ngo bor khro bo bzhi blta bar bya'o// khyad par ni g.yas brkyang ba/ mi'u thung gi rnam pa la zhal rnam par 'gyur ba/
346b2(rgyud 'grel): sna gang nyag pa smin ma ser skya nyi ma'i dkyil 'kho raM la bzhigs pa/ hU~M'oda'i bar ba'i dbus su gnas par bsgom mo// thams cad kyi g.yon pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag dag ni sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o// g.yas pa'i phyag dag la tho ba'o// gnyis
346b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa la ral gri/ gsum pa la zhags pa'o// lhag ma'i phyag gnyis la pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskyed la snying gar pi las pang ma dkar po/ de'i steng du a l-is zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
346b4(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng du oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ zhes snga ma bzhin du yi ge rnams bsams la/ de las 'od zer spros nas sems can thams cad yang dag par sbyangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo bor bsgrubs nas/ yang bsdus te de nyid
346b5(rgyud 'grel): du bzhugs so// nga'i rjes la sngags kha nas byung nas rdo rje'i lam nas rjes su zhugs nas mu tig gi phreng ba ltar bsams nas bzlas pa bya'o// bzlas pa byas nas snying ga'i sngags lasaM cig car dkyil 'khor gyi gakhor
346b6(rgyud 'grel): lo phyi rol tu spros nas mchod par bya'o// 'di dag gi sngags ni/ oM sarba te thA ga ta ar+g+haM pu dza me g+ha sa ma dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ arga'i sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/
347a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi sngags sa// oMsar+b+ba t+kA thA ga rat+na b+hU se smras s+yAd+hA da \u0f7fsa mam+b+ha hUM/ mngasa'i sngags so// oM sarba twa thA ga tu gar+b+ha b+hU me b+hAstA mA drA m+b+ha p+na grA d+b+hadz+dza/ b+h+ya sngags so// smong
347a2(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta rA sa/ e gro bi taM na a ha ri nA san ta ra pa sa me pU dza me b+hi sa mu dr-i s+pho ra Na sa ma yo hU~M/ lbub shosas sngags so//
347a3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar mchod pa byas ni si/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rang gi snying gar sngags kyi mi
347a4(rgyud 'grel): la gzhug byer bya'o// ngo'i rjes la bstod pa da / smon lam yang btab nas/ s+yAngs rang hU~M m+b+ha hU~M rgyal gyi ste gnas par bya'o// oM gi dro ga pa'i rlung kyi rim pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bston pa'i sgrub
347a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po mahA dza na dang / lo tsA ba gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o//

348b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki twe shwa ra kha sarba NA sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kha sarba Na sgrub thabs/ mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo//

348b3(rgyud 'grel): ngad/ bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bdag nyid dbul ba dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mtsho// sdig pa mi dge so sor bshags// 'gro ba'i ngage la rjes yi rang /
348b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung / zhes bya ba'i tshig suM bcad pa 'dis bya'o// de'i 'og tu rang gi snying garo yi ge a las byung po'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer dang bcas pa de'i steng du yi ge hUMH'od zer 'phro ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs de dag gis
348b5(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad drangs nas 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams hrIHde nyid kyi nang du zhugs pa dang / thal mo lan gsum brdabs la tshig 'di lan gsum brjod do// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sar+b+ba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&haM/ de'i 'og tu chos thams cad bdag meng
348b6(rgyud 'grel): par bsgom par bya'o// tshig gi don dang bcas par bsams nas/ zla bai byi ba dang mnyam pa'i 'od zer yongasu gyur pa las ral pa'i cod pan gyi dbus na gnas pa'i rgyal ba'i sku 'dzin pa/ rin po che'i ri'i phug gi nang na pad+ma chen po dang / zla ba'i
349a1(rgyud 'grel): gdan la bzhugs shing zla ba'i 'od dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs g.yon pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung la g.yas pa cung zad brkyang ba/ phyag g.yon pa na pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa/ g.yas kyis mchog
349a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa zhi ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs na bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ut+pa la'i snying po kha 'byed pa bsam mo// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logasu khro gnyer ca ni cod pan 'byung ba/ phyag bzhi
349a3(rgyud 'grel): ba/ g.yon gnyis na dbyug pa dang / spyi blugs bsnams pa g.yas gnyis kyis phyag byed pa dang / mchog sbyin pa'o// spyi gtsug las skyes pa'i mchod rten gyis brgyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon na khro bo chen po rta mgrin phyag g.yas pa
349a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal ba dang / g.yon pas dbyug pa 'dzin pa'i// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas no nor bzangs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs pa de ltar bsom mo// sangs rgyas sprin ni 'phro ba yis// rnal 'byor 'di 'dra bsgoms na ni// 'jig rten mgon po 'od chen po//
349a5(rgyud 'grel): tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// bsgoms pas dub par gyur ni/ rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi stong du sngags mu tig gi phreng ba dang 'dra ba bsam te bzlas par bya'o// bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ brgya'am stong du bzlas
349a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste// bcom ldan 'das la bdag nyid kyis mchod pa legs par bya'o// oM khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzod// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegasu gsol// slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol// tshigs su
349b1(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa 'dis gshegs pa dang slar byon par bskul nas bzod par gsol bar bya ste/ gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas// 'dir ni nyes pa gang byas pas// gang yang lus can skyabs gyur pas/ mgon po khyod ni bzod pa zhes// gtso bo nus pa ma mchis
349b2(rgyud 'grel): pas// ma tshang ba dang ma rnyed pa'i// 'dir ni bya ba gang byas pa// mgon khyod de ni bzod par mdzod// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis// sangs rgyas nyid ni thob nas kyang // srid pa'o rgya mtsho brgal dka' las// 'gro ba ma lus sgrol bar shog/ 'phags
349b3(rgyud 'grel): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kha sarba Na sgrub thabs// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya sha Da kA ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags
349b4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi ge drug pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo// dang por re zhig sngags pas gedong bkrus nas stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa bsams la/ skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o// bdag ni dkon
349b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum la skyabasu song ba yino// zhes mos pa byas nas/ sems can ji snyed sems can du bsdus pas yang dag par bsdus la/ sgro nga las skyes pa 'am/ mngal las skyes pa 'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa 'om/ rdzus te skyes pa 'am/
349b6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can nam/ gzugs can ma yin pa 'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes med pa 'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min te/ ji srid du sems can ni khams gsum du btags pas/ btags po de dag thams cad bdag nyid
350a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su dgod par bya'o zhes bsam/ de nas oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+harmA swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ho haM/ de nas stong pa nyid du bsdu bas bsdus pa tsam gyis bsgoms la/ de'i 'og tu rang gi snying gar zla ba'i
350a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du yi ge hrIHlas 'od zer brgya stong 'byung bar bsgoms te/ yang de nyid kyis thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa ma lus pa mtha' dag rnam par dag par byas nas bdag nyid kyi snying
350a3(rgyud 'grel): gar zhugs pa las/ bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sku mdog dkar po phyag bzhi pa g.yas na bgrang phreng g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa/ gzhan gnyis kyis thugs kar thal mo sbyar ba'o// g.yas su nor bu 'dzin pa
350a4(rgyud 'grel): skrasku mdog dang phyag la sogs pa yang de dang 'dra'o// g.yon du bo bru drug pa'i rig sngags chen mo phyag bzhi pa ston ko'i sprin lta bu'o// de nas oM ma hA pu ka badz+ra satwa/ dzi hUM baM ho su ra ta s+t+waM/ a la la la la ho/ a a oM A zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs
350a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags kyi rgyal po brjod par bya'o// de ltar bsgoms nas de'i 'og tu 'jig rten dbang phyug gi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la phreng ba 'dra ba dkar po zhal ni sa byung zhing lte bar byugs te 'khor lo 'khor ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas thams
350a6(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi yid bzhin nor bu'i rtog pa'i sngags kyi rgyal po 'di mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bzlas par bya'o// de nas lus g.yo ba dang bcas par gyur pa la sogs par gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang ba dang snying rje dang / bla ma la gus pa dang ldan pa ni
350b1(rgyud 'grel): ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro// oM ma Ni pAd+d+he hUM zhes de ltar bzla'o// de nas ldang ba'i dus su sngags 'di brjod pa'o// oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra satwa te no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to ma~M b+ha ba/ su po/
350b2(rgyud 'grel): b+h+yoSh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+taM shriM yaHku ru hUM ha ha ha ha hoHb+ha ge ban/ badz+ra mA me muny+tsa/ badz+ri b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa aHde ltar bzlas nas ci bde bar gnas par bya'o// yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogaso// /
350b3(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon chen po pU dza badz+ras mdzad pa'o// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shr-i dz+nyA na dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra sA d+hi na~M/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
350b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag gi sgrub thabs/ rje btsun spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// stong nyid snying rje las byung ba// rnam lnga byang chub che bdag nyid// sku gsung thugs kyis thugs dag pa// 'jog rten mgon po mkhas pas sgrub// pad+ma zla dbus gzhon
350b5(rgyud 'grel): nu'i sku// spyi la dkrung phyed brkyang 'gying bag brtan// zla ba rgyas pa'i zhal mdzes pas// sa gsum bdag gir gzigs mdzad pa'o// mchog sbyin pad+mo galas dang g.yon// rgyal ba'i cod pan rin chen brgyan// 'od dpag med kyi sa spyi gtsug mdzes//
350b6(rgyud 'grel): de yi thu gos ni pad+ma rgyal// hrIHyig rang sems 'od gsal ba// sa gsum sbyangs mdzad yi ge bzhi// 'khor lo rnam gsum dam tshig bzhi// sgyu ma brag ca mkhas 'dra ba'o// thugs rje chen po kha sarba Na'i sgrub thabs tshig su bcad pa bzhi pa rdzog
351a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ yo ga sA ra/ rnal 'byor snying po/ dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// mi rtag sdug bsngal dran byas nas// snying rje chen po rab bskyed de// spyi bor bla ma snying kAr lha// rang sems ma yengs bsgom par bya//
351a2(rgyud 'grel): gang shar thams cad de yin te// de ni gang du'ang ma shar ba'o// de phyir gang skyes de ma skyes// ma skyes pa nyid skye ba'i tshul// gang skyes gnyug ma nyid yin phyir// de shar dran pasnga ma brjed na// gang snang stong pa nyid bdag tu// rnal 'byor rgyal po gdon mi
351a3(rgyud 'grel): za// ma rtogs 'gro la rang dbang du// rnam kun dmigs pa med yid kyis// snying rje chen po nga gi so 'grub// de yi thabs sbyangs byang chub bzhid// rnal 'byor snying po/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI dza ka ta mi tra'i gdams pa A~M hrI/
351a4(rgyud 'grel): spyan ras gzigs las / sgrub babs btsun pa// rgya gar skad du/ shrI kha sarba Na lo ke shwa ra sA d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ dpol khaM sarba NAM 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thangs/ thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo//
351a5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor dbang phyug byams pa dang // snying rje dga' bo btang snyoms las// byung ba'i byang chub sems kyi bdag/ 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal// de zhabs pad+mo la reg pas// 'jig rten sdug bsngal bsgral ba'i phyir// ji bozhin ji ltar bsgrub pa'i
351a6(rgyud 'grel): thabaso// mdor ba sdus bdag gis bstan par bya// mkha' ltar dri med stong nyid dbyings las dbang po gzhu ltar gsal ba'i dngos// pod+ma zla rgyas thugs gsung 'di 'gro sgyu ma'i rnam thar sprul pa'i sku/ rab mdzes sku ni gzi brjid brtan mdzes la
351b1(rgyud 'grel): bzang bar dkar ba khrugs pa// sbrul krung kyang brgyad dal ba'i phyag galas mtshad sbyin gsal po g.yon gyi phyug/ pad+ma na stang mdzes dri mang 'dab brgyang gzhon nu sdugs pa'i thugs kAr 'dzin// shol sbyar dri meng+ga a t+pal sman ring kun nas yid thun
351b2(rgyud 'grel): bda'abar zhal// brtan po dkar gsal n+do zlos stong lkug rdul po'i tshang byan thub po'i 'du// 'bar ba'i rin rnon dri mangs tshogs shin tu 'od sbyangs legs smras shing // ma ma gyi sh+tha rnam ma ldan na na ma kha'i mami gtugs 'od 'i rmed pa/
351b3(rgyud 'grel): byubyang mchun rtogs gcig pu sgrub pa skyabs grangs pa sku ma ni// shin tu rtogs dka' de nyid gzhir gyur snying gi pang 'dab hU~M yig gis// gang ba'i phyogs rnams de bzhin de gzugs oM dang a dang hrIHdang hU~M// dkar sogs kha dog dag gi phreng ba
351b4(rgyud 'grel): yod ni ye shes yig 'bru'i dngos// ba rtse ba'i rlung bskyong ye shes ma 'bar 'gro ba'i sdug tshogs bud shing bsregs// zhi ba'i ngang ni gnyis med mi g.yo mkha' ltar spros bral ros gcig ro// bde chen 'byung gnas ye shes dri med mnyam gzhag chen po bsgo
351b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de rjes mchod sogs dag pa'i yan lag tsho ga ji bzhin ye shes sems dpa' legs bcug ste// rnam gsum 'khor lo dkar dmar sngo tshul go rim ji bzhin sku gsung thugs// brtan po'i mtshan nyid dam pa'i zhal bzhin mkhas pas rab
351b6(rgyud 'grel): tu shos par bya// thugs rje chen po kha sarbaNa'i sgrub thabs/ grub pa'i brnyes pa'i skyes bu chen po shr-I shan+ya ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs sa// zod kyi lo tsa ba gnibs byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar sad du/ @/
352a1(rgyud 'grel): de wa ta thA ga to lo taM sho ra sA d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug lha lnga'i sgrub thabs/ rgyal ba lnga la phyag 'tshal lo// shin tu rnam dag ngang ba'i mtshor// rab mdzes sdong bu lnga ldan steng // rnam snang rdorje
352a2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dang // rin 'byung 'od dpag med don grub// sa rigs rnam dag sna tshogs gzugs// dngos gcig rgyal ba lnga la 'dud// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa khyad par can la gnas pas// snying rje chen po mdun du byas la// thog ma kho nar chos thams
352a3(rgyud 'grel): cad stong pa nyid du rab tu bsgrim par bya'o// gdod nas ma skyes 'od gsal ba// gang shar nyid na ngo bo med// chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid de// bla ma'i drin gyis rtogs par 'gyur// gang 'di ltar ngo bo nyid med pa'i chos 'di dag ni zab pa'i phyir rtogs
352a4(rgyud 'grel): par dka' bas mi shes pa'i 'gro ba lnga po ni nges par sdug bsngal ba'o zhes brtags nas/ dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor mngon par bskod gyur pas// skye bo nyon mongs sgrib tshogs sprin gyi phung po shin tu mthug po gtums
352a5(rgyud 'grel): gyur la// tsham chom med par drag po'i shugs kyis kun tu dral zhing yongs su gtor// de yi thabs gyur thugs rje'i dbyings skyes sna tshogs mdzad pa dbyer med cig char sgrub pa yi// mgon po dam par rigs kyi lha lnga dri ma lnga spyod las lnga bsgrub cing
352a6(rgyud 'grel): stobs la sogs// de la dbus sogs sdong 'dab bcas// zla ba'i 'khor lo gsal ba la// me long gzugs ltar 'bru lnga bsam// 'phrin las lo sbyar skur bskyed do// rnam par snang mdzad ni kha ba'i mdog can// ji skad po byung ba'i phyag rgya can//
352b1(rgyud 'grel): hrI'i snying po can 'khor los mtshan pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' ni na mkha'i mdog can// ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can// hUMHgi snying po can rdo rjes mtshan pa'o// rin chen 'byung ldan ni gser btsoco ma'i mdog can// ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can// tAM ge/
352b2(rgyud 'grel): snying po can rin po ches mtshan pa'o// 'od dpag med ni me lce 'bar ba'i mdog can// ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can// hrIH'i snying po can pad+mas mtshan pa'o// don yod grub pa ni sA lu ldang ba'i mdog can// ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can// a'i snying po can
352b3(rgyud 'grel): ral gris mtshan pa'o// 'di dag dbus bcas phyogs rnams su// rim bzhin las lnga mdzad pa la// brtson pas ting nge 'dzin bzhugs pa// bdag spang ba dang gzhan sbrang gnyis// oM a sa pa ra dz+nyA na bi shud+d+ha kA sa hUM/ 'khor lo lta bu'i sngagaso// thugs rje chen
352b4(rgyud 'grel): po lha lnga'i sgrub thabs/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug tshon po shrI mi tra a nan ta'i gdams pa rdzogs so// / gnubs lo tsa bas bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ siM ha nA da sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ sing ge sgra'i sgrub thabs/ 'jig rten dbang phyug
352b5(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'a tshal lo// dang por re zhig sngags pas khaM bshal ba la sogs pa byas te/ stan bde ba la 'dug nas/ rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du yi ge hrIHdkar po bltas te/ de'i bod kyis bla ma dang sangs rgyas du byang chub sa de'i rnams spyan drangs te mdun
352b6(rgyud 'grel): du bsams la/ de'i rjes la mchod pa dang sdig pa bshags pa la sogs byas te/ stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes pa 'dis byin gyis brlab po// de nas skad cig gis paM gyur pa las pad+ma dkar po de'i steng du yi ge si
353a1(rgyud 'grel): yongasu gyur pa las seng ge dkar po de'i steng du rna ba la gnas pa'i yi ge hUMHlas yang dag par byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug sad+ma skar bdag nyid bsam par bya// dkar po 'od dpag med pa'i dang ral ba'i thor cog can spyan gsum
353a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dka' thub pa'i cha lugs 'dzin pa/ rgyal po chen po'i 'gying bag gis bzhugs pa/ phyag gnyis pa'i g.yon pa na pad+ma gyen du langs pa'i thog na ral gri 'bar ba/ g.yas na rtse gsum dkar po sbrul gyis bcings pa/ yang g.yon ngos su dri bzangs sna tshogs
353a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis bkang ba'i thod pa dkar po/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'phro ba sprul pa'i sku chen por bsam par bya'o// bzlas pa'i sngags ni/ oM AHhrIHsi ha nA da hUM phaT/ de'i rjes su gzungs 'byung bar 'gyur// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te sha rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa
353a4(rgyud 'grel): yam hA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ dad+ya thA/ oM a ka Te/ bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ ka TaM ka Te/ ka ro TaM/ bair+ya swA hA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi spyan sngar snga dro'i dus su balci sa las ltung rnamaN+Dal h+ya sh+tsa aN+Da la re re la yang lan bcu gsum
353a5(rgyud 'grel): rjo par bya// de nas lci ba lhag ma la sngags lan bdun bzlas la byin gyis brlas te/ nang gang du byung ba'i sar bskas na nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma bdun nam bcu gsum mam nyi shu rtsa gcig bas na mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yin du
353a6(rgyud 'grel): zin kyang grub par ma gyur na ngas mtshams med pa lnga byas par 'gyur ro// rje btsun dge sgra'i sgrub thobs/ slob dpo ni tsan+d+ra go maMs mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ lo ka sha
353b1(rgyud 'grel): ra si ha nad sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten dbang phyug sad+d+hi sgra zhes bya ba'i bstod pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis 'jig rten nyes pa ma lus dbang gyur ji srid legs pa'i lam la tsho bkod pa// de srid yang dag 'don phyir
353b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni byang chub mchog tu bgrod par byed ma gyur// yang gis khams gsum 'di dag seng ge sgra chen mchog gis gsol bar gang gyur pas// sdug bsngal can dag bsgrub phyir thugs rje'i spyan dang seng ge sgra ldan khyod la bstod// ral pa rgya che'i dbyibs
353b3(rgyud 'grel): can dri mong zla 'dra shin tu dkar ba'i zhal mnga' ba// bskal pa du mar tshegs bsags brtul zhugs chen po shin tu da de dang ldan pa// 'gro ba ma lus pan mdzad lha dang lha min grub pa rnams kyis rab btung pa// shin tu rgya che ba yi sku mnga' khyod lo rtag tu
353b4(rgyud 'grel): gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma dmar po rgyas pa zla ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa lnga yi gad na// sang+ge'i gdan gyi steng na rgyal po'i rol pas rnam par mdzes// chos kyi mnga' bdag 'byir bas dri med gsung ni bka' stsal pas// 'jig rten mgon po 'od
353b5(rgyud 'grel): dpag med po'i dpal gyi sku la 'dud// g.yas kyi phyag ni pad+ma gsal ba lta bur 'jam pa yis// khams gsum nyes pa gsum po zhi bar bya phyir rtse gsum pa// 'od zer 'bar 'khrigs sbrul dang ldan pas rtag tu gang 'dzin pa// bdag gi thub pa sir+b+ba
353b6(rgyud 'grel): sgra de la ni rtag tu bgyi'o// khams gsum po la thugs rje chen po gnas kyang skyon gyis ni// khyod la gos pa med kyang de dag spang phyir khyed kyis ni// g.yon pa'i phyag gis ral gri ngam rdzas pang bcas pad+ma bsnams// rgyal ba'i sras po khyod la rtag tu
354a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid skyab su mchi// nga rgyal la sogs tshogs kyis g.yengs pa'i sems can rnams la ni// dmigs nas rgyal ba lnga po yang dag spros nas de rnams la// ji lta ji ltar dag pa'i thabs la mkhas pa bdag gis mdzad
354a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// gang la dgongs pa de mnga' phyag na pad+ma de la phyag 'tshal lo// mkhas pa rnams kyis gang la tshig gi go skabs med pa ni// thod pa la sogs bral bas khyod la mos dang gus pa med// de dag rnams kyis mkhas pa'i mchog nyid dag ni thob/
354a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// mnyam med dpal ldan seng+ge sgra la bdag ni skyabasu 'chi// skye ba gzhan gyi mi dge mdze yi rnam par gyur pa rus pa dang // sna nas rkang lag srin bus skad 'gags ldan pa dag/ khyod bstod pas ni skad cig gis ni gser mdog lta bu'i lus su
354a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur// thub pa seng+ge s+tha khyod la ni de nyid sgrubasu mchi// klu yi dbang du gyur pa chu lha dbang du mdzad nas ni// dus min char dang char med mdzo dang skyon dang ni don dang // 'gro ba'i don dang don med tshogs dag rab tu sel bar mdzad pa yi// brtson 'grus brtan pas
354a5(rgyud 'grel): rab brtsams khyod la kun nas 'dung // ming brjod tsam zhig khyod kyi mtshan dang sku dag dang // gang zhig la la gus pas 'dzin pa dang ni sems dga' dang // skye bo de ni longs spyod rgya che ba dag thob par gyur nas kyang // srid pa'i rgya mtsho brgal dka' brgal
354a6(rgyud 'grel): nas mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur// ngag gi dbang phyug la sogs gang gis kyang ni rje btsun gyi// yon tan phyogs gcig cha tsam bskal pa du ma ru// 'bad pas kyang ni brjod par nus pa ma yin na// ji ltar bdag 'dras 'khrul kyang gus byas 'di
354b1(rgyud 'grel): dag bzod par gsol// 'jig rten gsum po'i sdug bsngal srog byed mchog gi dwags byed can// dpal ldan seng ge sgra yi bstod pa las thob bsod nams gang // dpag med kun tu do la shal rgod pa dkar po dang 'dra ba// de yis skye bo byang chub 'gyur med/
354b2(rgyud 'grel): go 'phangs myur thob shog/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra'i bstong pa// rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po ti la kas mdzad pa rdzogaso// / paN+Di ta de nyid dang lo tsa ba mal gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
354b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ siM ha nA pa rak+Sha tsa gra nA me/ bod skad du/ sing+ge sgra'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa sid+d+he sgra la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje mchog dang ldan pa yi// sing+ge s+tha la phyag 'tshal te// sems can kun gyi nang dang gdon// bsrung ba'i tshe
354b4(rgyud 'grel): ga bshad par bya// dus dang tshes grangs bzang po la// mchod rten maN+Dal bshams nas ni// lha yi nga rgyal ldan pa yi// ras sam shing lo gro gra la// khrag ga ma rgya skyegs gur gum gyis// rim pa lnga ru bskor bar bya// dang po pad+ma'i lta ba yin// gnyis
354b5(rgyud 'grel): pa mu khyud phra bar bskor// gsum pa cung che pad 'dab brgyad// bzhi pa lnga pa'i rim pa ni// pad+ma'i phyir lo phra ba bya// yig gi dgod pa'i sbyor ba ni// dbus su oM gyi sbyor yig dang // de mthar ming dang bsrung tshig bri// de yi phyir ri ma mu khyud la// dbyangs
354b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi yi ge bcu drug bri// gsum pa pad 'dab brgyad pa la// oM spangs yi ge brgyad po bri// rim pa bzhi pa'i mu khyod la// gzungs sngags bsrung tshig bcas pa bri// rim pa lnga pa'i mu khyud la// gsal byed sum cu bzhi pa la// bsrung bya las sngags
355a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa dgod// de ltar bri brdzogs nas ni// rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga ni// maN+Dal steng du 'khor lo gzhag/ mchod dang gtor ma gcig btang ste// 'khor lo'i oM lig las spros te// rje btsun 'khor lo'i steng du drang // rang gi thug
355a2(rgyud 'grel): ka'i sa byon las// lha mo lnga lnga mchod pa dang // rdzas kyi mchod pa rnam lngas mchod// bstod cing bsrung bar gsol ba gdab// de su yig 'bru'i rnam par gyur// de la byin brlabs bya phyir sngags bzlas pa// oM AHhrIHsaM ha nA da hUM phaT/ che ge mo sarba ka te rak+Sha
355a3(rgyud 'grel): ku ru shAn+ti puSh+paM ku ru swA hA/ oM a AHi I/ u U/ ri rI/ li lI/ e aM/ o au/ aM aHche ge mo la rak+Sha ku ru shAn+tiM ka ru puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ zhes pa'i gzungs dang / ka kha ga g+ha nga/ zhes pa'i gsol byed la yang mi nga las
355a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags sbyar te/ sngags de rnams brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam thebs bdun bzlas pa la gtor ma btang bsrung bar gsol ba gangab// de nas dril te gdags par bya'o// de yi rjes la bya ba ni// rang gi ye shes bcug gyur na// mchod
355a5(rgyud 'grel): de gsol gsol gshe bar bya// rang la byed dam gzhan la'ang // bsrung btags pa'i phan yon ni// tshe ring bsod nams che ba dang // sdig pa thams cad byung ba dang // bgegs dang log 'dren 'tshe skyob dang // rje btsun bsrung 'khor byas pa yi//
355a6(rgyud 'grel): dge des sems can bar chad zhi// rje btsun seng ge sgra'i bsrung 'khor bla ma'i zhal nas 'ongs pa rdzogs so// /
356a1(rgyud 'grel): zha'aphags pa don yong zhugs pa bzhugs so//
356b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ saM kI ta a mo g+ha pA sha sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ don yod zhags pa'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po hrIHyig las byung zhing // thugs ni thugs rje yis
356b2(rgyud 'grel): brlan pa// don yod zhags pa zhes bya ba'i// 'jig rten mgon la bdag phyag 'tshal// sdig pa bshags sogs byas nas ni// stong pa nyid sogs mthar thug pas// skad cig rnam pas rje btsun ni// ji lta'i gzugasu rnam par bsgom// sna tshogs
356b3(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes steng bzhengs nas// zhal gcig pa la phyag brgyad pa// mi 'jigs pa dang mchog sbyin dang // zhags pa bgrang phreng rab mdzes g.yas// dbyug pa rtse gsum glags bam dang // pad+ma'i spyi blugs 'dzin pa g.yon// dka' thub chas 'dzin mdzad pa yi
356b4(rgyud 'grel): stag gi lpags pas smad dkris pa// g.yas g.yon nor bzangs rta mgrin dang // sgrol ma khro gnyer can yang ngo // mgon po yan lag kun dkar po// rab dkar na bzas rnam par spras// 'od zer dkar pos mnyam par 'khrigs// de bzhin gshegs
356b5(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga 'phro ba// 'od dpag med de mar cod pan can// sems can don mdzad pa la brtson// de ltar bsgom par byas nas ni// gsang sngags bzlas pas 'dud 'byor ro// oM a mo g+ha pA sha hrIHswA hA/ don yod zhugs pa'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa/
356b6(rgyud 'grel): kha che'i patwA da chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so// / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong rab mchog dpal bzang pos/ drang srong srin po ri ri bskor ro// / gtor ma ni rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas// snod gtsa
357a1(rgyud 'grel): mar sha khrag dang bral ba'i gtor ma legs par bshams la/ stong pa'i ngang las yi ge paM las byung ba'i rin po che pad+ma'i snod du/ gtor ma'i rdzas rnams yi ge AHdkar po las lha rdzas kyi bdud rtsir gyur
