357a2(rgyud 'grel): par bsams la/ oM AHhUM zhes brjod cing ji ltar 'dod par byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i lha rnams mdun gyi na mkha' la spyan drangs la// phyag btsal zhing mchod
357a3(rgyud 'grel): pab sngon du 'gro bas/ lha rnams kyi stong pa'i rang bzhin las ni yi ge hUM las de nyid kyis mtshan pa'i rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'od zer gyi sbu gu dang ldan pas bdud rtsi'i gtor ma 'dren par bsams zhing / oM a mo g+ha pA shwa hrIHi maM ba liM gr-ih+Na grIh+Na
357a4(rgyud 'grel): ma ma sarba pA paM shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes lan lnga'i bar du brjod de/ se gol gyi sgra bya zhing gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// de nas yang dag par mchod cing dril bu sgra dang ldan pas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod de/ mngon par 'dod pa'i
357a5(rgyud 'grel): don du gsol ba gdab la/ yi ge brgya pa'i sngags brjod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ste/ oM khyed kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// don yod zhags pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga/
357a6(rgyud 'grel): kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so// // lo tsa ba dge slong rab mchog dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba// / rgya gar skad du/ po sha ka ra NI ya/ bod skad du/ gso sbyong blang ba/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa la phyag
357b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la// byang chub bar du bdag sgrubs mchi// bdag dang gzhan don rab bsgrub phyir// byang chub sems 'di bskyed par bgyi// sdig pa thams cad bshugs bgyid cing // bsod nams la sang rjes pa
357b2(rgyud 'grel): rang / 'phags pa'i gso sbyong yan lag brgyad// bsnyen pa la ni spyad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'o// dus 'di nas bzung ji srid nas// nyi ma'i 'od ni ma shar bar// srog chags gsod dang gzhan
357b3(rgyud 'grel): nor 'phrog/ mi tshangs spyod dang bden minA smra// myos pa bskyed dang gzhon pa dang // dus ni ma yin pa yi zas// phreng ga ba dog glu dang gar// khri stan mthon po la sogs pa// thams cad bdag gis spang bgyid cing // 'phags pa'i yon tan brgyad spyang
357b4(rgyud 'grel): dang // gso sbyong khrims sdom yi dam 'di// sems kyi brgyan sems kyi yo byad rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchog tu don dam pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// thob pa la ni 'od 'dis reg gyur cig/ byang chub mchog gi sems 'di bskyed bgyis la// sems can
357b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bdag gis mgron du gnyer// byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyod nas ni// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya klI b+ha dres mdzad pa rdzogs so// / lo tsa ba dge slong rab
357b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha po Sha ta bi d+hi aM nA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i gso sbyong gi tshe ga'i man ngag/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa la phyag 'tshal/
358a1(rgyud 'grel): nA maHsAr+yA ba lo kit+te shwa ra ya/ b+ho d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA yA/ ma hA kA ra NaM kA sa/ tad+ya Sh+TA/ au a mo g+ha shI la sAM b+hA ra saM b+hU rA/ b+hA ra b+ha ra/ ma hA shud+d+ho satwa/ pad+ma bi b+hA Shi ta b+hu dza d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta a ba lo ka tA sha ra oM AH
358a2(rgyud 'grel): hUMHphaT swA hA// gzungs 'di 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i gso sbyong gi dus su nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya'o// de'i cho ga ni dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la brtul zhugs kyi gdams par gyur pas khyad par du bklag par bya ste/ bcom
358a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das don yod zhags pa la yang dag par mchod cing gsol ba gdab par bya'o// chu tshong la sogs kyi khongs su 'o ma dang / ka ra dang / dkar gsum gyi zas bza' bar bya'o// nyal ba'i dus su ku shrI bting ba laM seng ge'i nyol thabs kyis
358a4(rgyud 'grel): mgo la bcom ldan 'das lhag par mos par bya ste/ phyag byas mchod par bya'o// chos brgyad kyi tho rangs shin tu gtsang mar bkrus shing sngags kyis dag par gyur pa dang / rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i hrIHyi ge dkar
358a5(rgyud 'grel): po'i zer gyi dra ba rang gi lus la sogs pa sna tshogs gsol por byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs par bya'o// oM A gats+tsha A g+hats+tsha b+ha ga bAn a mo g+ha pA sha ra asngags 'di yis phyi rol du ba lci la sogs pas
358a6(rgyud 'grel): byugs pa'i dkyil 'khor bdun po rnams su lhag par mos pas bzhugs par bya ste/ re re la gzungs lan raM bklag cing mchod por bya'o// mdun du chu'i bum pa bdun dang / 'bras zas kyi kham por bdun gzhag par bya'o// de'i rjes la
358b1(rgyud 'grel): ngag kun bsdams par gyur cing / dad pa brtan pa'i sems kyis ldan dang po bklag par bya'o// de'i rjes la gzungs tsam po lan lnga'o// bdun pa la sngar rang bzhin du yongs su rdzogs pa nyid do// chu tshod bdun gyi khongs su dkar gsum gyis zlas
358b2(rgyud 'grel): bza' bar bya'o// de ltar gnyis pa gung gi thun la yang ngo // de nas bzhin du thun gsum pa la'o// de'i rjes la mchod pa bdun po rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la/ bskor bar bya zhing yan lag smad lnga'i phyag byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
358b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byang chub tu bsod nams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// tshes dgu la yang chos bdun pa bzhin du thams cad byas la// gso sbyong gi brtul zhugs la rjes su yi rang ba dang / bsod nams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// tshig 'di yin te/ 'di bdag gis don
358b4(rgyud 'grel): yod zhags pa'i gso sbyong gi brtul zhugs tshulo khrims kyi sdom pa'i yid dam gyis sems kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na mang po'i sangs rgyas nyid thob par gyur cig ces
358b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba mchod pa gshegasu gsol te/ chu tshod bdun gyi nang khongasu dkar gsum gyi zas bza' bar bya'o// khyad par ni tshe sa bdun pa bzhin no// 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i gso sbyong gi cho ga'i man ngag/ kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shri b+ha dras mdzad
358b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogaso// // bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong rab mchog dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// /
359a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag dardo rje'i thub thab 'a khrob dpo dngangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa bzhugs so//
359b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra pA Ni s+yA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje ye shes kyi sku can la
359b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje mnyes par 'dod pas/ dang por gsang sngags dang / rig sngags thams cad 'grub pa'i rgyu dam tshig gi gnas rnams srog gi phyir yang mi gtang bar bsrung bar bya ste/ de la dam
359b3(rgyud 'grel): tshig ni 'di dag gro/ dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems// sngags dang phyag rgya slob dpon dag/ srog gi phyir yang mi gtang ste// de dag mchod cing ri mi gror bya// sangs rgyas bstan la zhugs pa yis// dge slong rnams la gus pa zhing // lha dang /
359b4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma la mi khro// 'jig rten lha tshogs mi smad do// sems can rnams la byams pa dang // snying rje chen po bskyed nas kyang // de yi gnod pa bsal bya zhing // bdag lo gnod byas bzod par bya// ser sna rnying du bsal nas ni// sbyin paso sems can
359b5(rgyud 'grel): phan gang gas so// dam tshig med par gyur pa la// sngags dang phyag rgya byin mi bya// chang ni btung bar mi bya zhing // mdor na bdag dang gzhan rnams la// phan pa 'ba' zhig lhur bya zhing // khri la nyal bar mi bya'o// de ltar dam tshig bsrung ba la 'bad
359b6(rgyud 'grel): pas dang por mal nas tsog por 'dug la chos nyid rnam par dog pa'i sngags lan gsum mam/ bdon bzlas so// oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma tA badz+ra satwa hUM/ de nas mdun gyi ni mkha' la rigs gsum 'khor dang bcas pa dang / dpal phyag na rje
360a1(rgyud 'grel): mdun du dmigs la phyag bya ste/ 'di skad gsol ba gdab bo// 'phags pa thams cad kyis thugs rjes gzigs te/ mgon ma mchis padag myur du sangs rgyas grub par mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas
360a2(rgyud 'grel): khro bo bsnol ba med pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas snying ga dang / lkog ma dang smin 'tshams dang spyi bo dang / gnas bzhir gzhag ste bsrung bar bya'o// de nas phyi rol sa la sogs par 'gro bar bya'o// lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bca so la mtha
360a3(rgyud 'grel): bong bsgreng ba ni khro bo bsnol ba med pa'i phyag rgya ste sngags oM badz+ra kro d+ha na hUM dzaHphyi rol sa la sogs paro 'gro ba'i tshe bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags 'di bar chad med par lan bdun bzlas nas de'i tshe bag med par sprad kyang bgegs rnams kyis mi brdzi'o/
360a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes lung nA sa 'byung ngo // de'i sngags la/ na mo rat+na tra ya yA/ na maSh+yAr+N+Na badz+rI pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ daMSh+Tot+ka Ta b+hai ra ba ya/ a si mu sa la pa ra yA/ pA ra shu pA sha sa twA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ kha kha/ khA hi
360a5(rgyud 'grel): khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ hA na ha na/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ gardzi gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+na bi nA ya ka naM ma hA ga na pa ti dzi bi dAM ta ka rAM ya hUM swA hA/ phyi rol nas sA ra log pa dang kha lag bkrus te nye reg bya'o// lag pa g.yas pa'i thal mo bkan
360a6(rgyud 'grel): la gu nga mo dang srin lag yid tsam bkug pa bar du chu thugs la sngags 'dis btab la mgo dang lus kun la gtor la lhag ma rnams btung ngo // oM shud+d+he na tu sho d+ha na swA hA/ de nas rgyud dang mthun pa'i gnas yid du 'ong bar khrus byas kyang
360b1(rgyud 'grel): rung ma byas kyang rung ste/ nyes pa med de tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms pas sems kyi rgyud sbyangs la/ 'gro ba mtha' dag gdon pas sku gzugs la sogs pa'i spyan snga 'am/ gzhan yang rung ste/ phyag btsal ba dang mchod pa bshams pa dang
360b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs te rim bzhin byas nas/ theg pa mchog las mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir skyil mo bkrung bcas te/ dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba'i phyir dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs
360b3(rgyud 'grel): cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o// de la dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya thal mo sbyar la mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ba'o// phyag rgya 'di ni rgya chen te// sangs rgyas skyob pa rnams kyi yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni// phyag rgya 'di la rab tu gnos// de'i sngags la/
360b4(rgyud 'grel): na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he nI/ a sa me tI sa me ma hA sa ma yai swA hA/ de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas bdag rnam par dag par bya ba ni lag pa gnyis kyi khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug la mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ngo // phyag rgya
360b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di phyag rgya chen po ste/ chos dbyings rnam par sbyong ba'o// de'i sngags la/ na maHsa~M man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ d+har+m+ma d+ha tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko hUM/ rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa ni lag pa gnyis sor mo rgyab tu bsnol/ mthe bong gnyis lag
360b6(rgyud 'grel): ba g.yas pa'i mthil du gzhug go// rgyal mchog dpal dang ldan pa yi// chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba yi// 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yis// 'khor lo rab tu 'di sbyar ro// de'i sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra na~M badz+ra At+ma ko haM/ yi ge raM da
361a1(rgyud 'grel): yang spyi bor bsam+b+ha mo// de nas rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis gnas ltar gtu gus na go gyon par 'gyur ro// de'i phyag rgya la thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis gudang mo'i rgyab tu sbyar mthe bong gnyis la/ da mo la sbyaro//
361a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni/ na man+ta sa man+ta badz+ran+da/ badz+ra kA ba tsi hUM/ de nas bgegs thoms cir rnam par sel ba ma bzed pa'i rig sngags chen mo rjes su 'brang bar bya bo'i phyag rgya ni zil mo sbyor la mdzub mo gnyis bkug sti nang du gzhug gung mo ga/ nyis
361a3(rgyud 'grel): spraspri srin lag gnyis brkyang mthe'u chung gnyis cung zad dgug pa nI bsrung ba chen mo'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la/ nA maHsarba ta thA gA te b+hA sarba b+ha ya bi gau te b+h+yo bau shA mu kha b+h+yaHsarbo b+hu haM khaM rakA ma hA ba laM/ sarba ta thA ga tA pu nai ner dzA tAM/ hUM hU~M tA TA tra Ta/
361a4(rgyud 'grel): a pra ti ha twe swA hA/ bgegs dang dran khrid thams cad dang // srin po 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rnams// 'di ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang // de ga thams cad 'byer bar byed// de nas yon chab kyi snod chu gtsang ma dang dri chu dang me tog bzang pos bkang
361a5(rgyud 'grel): la chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge dang / rigs kyi snying po dang 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sngags kyis btab ste/ gson phyogasu gzhag go/ bsang gtor dang mchod pa'i yo byad gzhag go// de dag kun+da ying bsang ba dang sbyang po'i phyir mi g.yo mgon nam
361a6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags kyis gdab bo// de nas bskrad pa dang mtshams bcad pa dag byas te bsgom par bya'o// bskrad pa dang mtshams bcad pa yang de dag nyid kyis bya'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge raM// rigs kyi snying po badz+ra d+h+r-i ka/ mi
361b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba'i phyag rgya ni lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis brkyang lnga/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mo mthe bos mnan la lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du byas te mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis g.yon pa'i
361b2(rgyud 'grel): mthil du gzhag go// mi g.yo mgon po'i ralaM gri shubs su bcug pa ste/ bskrad pa'i tshe ral gri shubs nas phyung nas g.yon nas bskor// mtshams bcad pa'i tshe g.yas nas bskor sngags la/ nA maHsa ma nA badz+ra nAM a tsA la ka Na tsaN+Da ma hA
361b3(rgyud 'grel): ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tA Da haM maM lan gsum bya'o// bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags dang phyag rgya thal mo sbyar nas gung mo gnyis rtsa sprad de brkyang mthe'u chung bsnol te nang du srin lag gnyis gzhag pa'i rtse mo mthe bong gnyis kyis mnan la mdzub
361b4(rgyud 'grel): mo gnyis gung mo'i phyi ri li nas rkur por byas to nas gang tsA ma rAg por bya'o// bdud rtsi thob sbyor phyag rgya rtse gsum pa las thams cad pa staM las kun la 'dis sbyar ro// sngags ni oM a mr-i tA hU~M phaT/ yang na sngar gyi sngags mang pos sbyar ro// de
361b5(rgyud 'grel): nas rdo rje sems dpa'o skyil mo krung du 'dug la snying kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khorayi go ba bas moso te/ de las chos thams cad tshig gi lam dang bral lo zhes sgra byung nas dngos po thams cad stong par bsgom// de las 'od zer spro ba dang bsdu
361b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rim gyis bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i sku re ba thams cad yongasu skong bar byed pa/ mdog me tog pri yang ku ltar ljang ser ram/ yang na rin po che marka ta ltar ljang sngon phyag gnyis pa dbu rgyan can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
362a1(rgyud 'grel): bstod gsogs dar la smad g.yogs dar ba ti 'am/ ngar tshigs gru bsnams pa 'od zer gyis bskor ba bzi brjid dang ldan pa phyug na ye shes kyi rdo rje rje lnga pa bsnams par bsgom mo// chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge raM dkar/
362a2(rgyud 'grel): bo yang spyi bor bsam mo// mig gnyis su traM dmar po gzhag ste/ byams pa'i lta bas blta bar bya'o// de nas brtan par bya ba'i phyir nyid kyi phyag rgya bcings te gnas lnga ru gtug go// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la glang mo gnyis
362a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhi bas taM bsgreng / mdzub mo gnyis bkug la ngos gnyis su bzhago la rdo rje ltar bya'o// mthe khong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis gzhobs te bsgongs la gzhag srin lag gnyis lag pa'i nang du gzhug go// phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i rgyu// mi shes
362a4(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer 'jigs pa ste// sangs rgyas mas kyi ye shes 'di// nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs te bstan// phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya ste/ rdo rje la'o// sngags la na maHsa man+ta badz+rA nAM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM/ de nas yan lag rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gtsug
362a5(rgyud 'grel): kyigyi phyag bcings la spyi gtsug tu bzhag go// lag pa gnyis khu tshur btsongs la gung mo bzhi bas to bsgreng mdzub mo gnyis ngos nas bkug ste sbyar ro// gtsug gtor phyeg rgya rgya che ste// gtsug tor zhes ni grags pa yin// 'di ni bcings
362a6(rgyud 'grel): pa tsom gyis kyang // rgyal ba'i mchog tu bar pa yin// de'i sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra nA hUM hUM/ de nas ye shes kyi spyan bsgrub bo// lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcings la gung mo srin lag brkyang ste mthe bong gi drung du bzhag go/ 'di ni
362b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas mgon rnams kyi// ye shes las byung spyan yin te// mig gi steng du mkhas pas bzhag/ de las ye shes spyan du gyur// de'i sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ ga ga na s+pha ra Na kA Na/ ka ru ma hA ta thA ga ta tsak+Shu swA hA/ de nas yum gyi phyag rgya
362b2(rgyud 'grel): bcings la gnas sngar gtugo/ lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gnyis gzhibs te bsgreng mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i phyi rol nas bkug la bar nas gong tsam gyis ma rig par bya// mthe bong gnyis srin lag gnyis dang mthe chu bo gnyis
362b3(rgyud 'grel): nang du gzhug go/ 'di ni yum mA ma kI'i phyag rgya ste rdo rje rtse gsum pa'o// dA'i sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra nA dAM D+ha dr-i D+ha tiSh+Thi tiSh+Tha dza yan+te swA hA/ de'i 'og tu rdo rje go tshwa'i phyag rgya bcings la go bgo ste phyag rgya dang sngags gong du bstan no// de nas mdun
362b4(rgyud 'grel): du gzhal med khang bsams te/ de'i ri mau pa yang dang por chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge ra raM gyis gnas ka nA stong pa'i rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par bsams la de'i 'og tu na mkha'i dkyil 'khor du yi ge a gser gyi mdog can las gser gyi
362b5(rgyud 'grel): sa gzhi gru bzhi pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin can rdo rjes mtshan pa rgya dang khyon dpag tu med par bsam mo// de'i steng du pad+ma dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du yi ge ba mdog dkar po gangs dang shIl lta bu dngas cing gsal ba las chu'i rgyun 'o ma dang mu
362b6(rgyud 'grel): tig gi 'bru lta bu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'byung ba/ gser gyi sa gzhi bkang ste dpag tu med pa'i rgya mtsho chen por gyur par bsam mo// de'i nang nas yi ge laM las ri rab chen po sna bzhi las grub pa gru bzhi pa rgya dang khyon dpag tu
363a1(rgyud 'grel): med par 'byung ba'i steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang rtsegs ma'i nang na pad+ma dang seng ge'i gdan chen po pad+ma'i gdan mang pos bskor bar bsams te/ de dag ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du gyur par sngags
363a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dis byin gyis brlab bo// na maHsaM man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ oM a na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi sha mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tatAM ung+ga twe s+pha ra Na hi maM ga/ ga na khaM swA hA/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad de bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// yang na na mkha' mdzod kyis
363a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang de bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje spyan dring bar bya ste/ nyid kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ba cings nas mthe ba gnyis nang du g.yab cing sngags 'dis rang gi pho brang nas spyan drangs par bya'o// na maHsa
363a4(rgyud 'grel): man+ta badz+ra d+h+waM/ oM h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn mahA kA ru tI ka badz+ra pA Ni sa pa rI bA ra~M sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ de nas gshegs te mdun gyi na mkha' la dmigs la sngar bstan pa'i dam tshig gsum gyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang / rang gi phyog rgya dang yum gyi phyag rnams
363a5(rgyud 'grel): bstan te so so'i sngags brjod do// de nas dam tshig can du gzigs pas mnyes par bya ste/ gzhan la phan 'dogs par bzhed pas sngags pa ji srid 'dod pa de srid du byin gyis brlab po// de nas 'phags pa mi g.yo mgon nam bdud rtsi
363a6(rgyud 'grel): tha'i sbyor gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas snga na gnas pa dang / byi nas 'brangs pa'i bgegs rnams bskrad par bya'o// de nas gzhal med khang gi nang du gshegs par bya ba'i phyir mchod yon sngags kyis btab pa blangs la tshig su bcad pa
363b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dis mchod yon sbreng zhing nang du byon par bsam mo// bdag gi dang dang dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'das// bdag gi mchod yon bzhes nas kyang // 'di nyid du ni bzhugasu gsol lo// de nas byon de dbus kyis bad+ma
363b2(rgyud 'grel): dang seng ge'i gdan la dpal phyag na rdo rje dang 'khor gyi pad+ma'i gdan rnams la gsang sngags dang khro bo la sogs pa dpal phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs 'bring gi 'phags pa rnams bzhugasu gsol lo// de nas mchod yon gyi snod du spos chu gtsang ma
363b3(rgyud 'grel): blugs la zhal dang zhab bsil dbul bar bya'o// de'i sngags la oM pra ba ra sat+kA raM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ bdag kyang 'phags pa'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug par bya'o// 'phags pa'i phro brang gi phyi rol du 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i bam/ bdud rtsi thob sbyor gyi
363b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags phyag rgyas mtshams bcang ngo // de nas 'phags pa'i tshogs la phyag bya ste/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di brjod do// mchod rnams rim pa bzhin du dbul// bcom ldan thugs rjes byon pa legs// bdag ni bsod nams skal bar ldano// bdag
363b5(rgyud 'grel): gi mchod yon bzhes nas kyang // thugs rjes thugs dpag la na dugasaso// zhes dang por mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// de'i sngags naM oM sarba daM bAM ta thA a tsit+ta a mr-i ti da rA ya swA hU~M/ de nas dri dbul te/ gtsang zhing gtsang mar sbyar ba yi/
363b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzas dam pani dri mchog dag/ bdag gi dad pas dbul lags kyi// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// A ha ra A ha ra b+ha ga bAn sarba bid+yA d+ha ra pu dze ti swA hA/ zhes sngags 'dis tshigs bcang kun gyi mjug la brjod// de nas me
364a1(rgyud 'grel): tog dbul te/ gtsang zhing gtsang mar skyes pa yi// lha rdzas dam pa'i me tog 'di// bdag gi dad pas ba bul lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dges par mdzod// de nas bdug spos dbul te/ nags tshal bcung ldan
364a2(rgyud 'grel): yi kar 'ong // dri zhim rgyas pa'i bdug pa'i mchog/ bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ lha bshos dbul te/ sman rnams bcud gtsang yid gar 'ong // sngags kyi zhal zas bshos 'di dag
364a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// mar me dbul te/ gdon rnams 'joms shing bkra shis pa// dge zhing mun pa rnams sel ba// bdag gi dad pas 'bul legs kyis// bAzhes nas bdag la
364a4(rgyud 'grel): dgyes par mdzod// a lo kaM sarba bi d+h+ya b+ha ra pU dzi te hUM swA hA/ dri la sogs pa dngosu ma 'byor na yang // de dag gi phyag rgya bcings la yid kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab pa'i mchod pa bya'o// de la mchod yon gyi phyag rgya ni thal mo
364a5(rgyud 'grel): bkan la mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i tshigs gsum par sbyar la srin lag gnyis dbus su bkug la mthe bong gnyis glo sbyar la 'di ni bdud rtsi rgyan gyi phyag rgya ste mchod yon gyis sbyar ro// dri'i phyag rgya ni lag pa g.yas po mi 'jigs pa'i
364a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bya ste/ lag pa g.yon pas g.yas pa'i 'khrigs mo nas gzung ba'o// me tog gi phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis sor mo phan tshun bsnol la lag pa'i nang du bcu ga la mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo gnyis gcig tu sbyar la gdu bu'i tshul du byas
364b1(rgyud 'grel): la mthe bong glor bzhag ste thal mo lngar bya'o// bdug smos kyi phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis kyis mthe chung dang srin lag dang gung mo'i sor mo rnams phan tshun du rgyab tu sbyar te so so'i sor mo'i drung du bkug nas mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs te bsgreng /
364b2(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong gnyis glor bzhag go// lha bshos kyi phyag rgya ni bzed pa'i thal mo las mdzub mo cung zad ba kug pa'o// mar me'i phyag rngu ni mthe bong dang gung mo'i sor mo gnyis gcig tu sbyar te gau ting la lhag ma rnams khu tshur du bya'o// mchod yon
364b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM ga gA na sa mo ye swA hA/ dri'i sngags ni na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ bi shud+d+ha gan+d+hod+b+ha bA ya swA hA/ me tog gi sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ ma hA mu dra mung+ga ti swA hA/ bdug pa'i sngags ni/ na maHs+ya man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ d+harmA
364b4(rgyud 'grel): d+ha tu mad+hA tA swAt+mA/ smra bshos kyi sdigs ni/ nam+b+haHsa men+te ta thAg t+ye b+hU dza pU dza na sa ma oM d+d+hi/ mar me b+his+thAnI/ sa ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ jug to oM tsaM skAr thA oM ba dz+nyA swAg gi me dA ra ye swAhA/ 'di dag kyang mchod pa ma du //
364b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi nus pa dang 'jig rten na bsngags pa'i mchod pa rgya chen po gzhan dag kyang ci 'byor pa dbul lo// de nas mchod pa spyi'i phyag rgya bcings te/ sems rab tu dang ba'i sgo nas srid kyis mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ de'i thabs kyang sangs
364b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mthu dang / chos kyi dbyings byin gyis mthu dang / bdag gi bsod nams dang ye shes dang smon lam gyi mthu dang / dam po'i chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab pa'i mo chong pa chen po'i sprin chen po dang /
365a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyan dam pa dang / bstod pa sna tshogs pa rnams 'phags pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'byung zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par gyur cig ces bsam zhing tshig tu yang
365a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod la/ mchod pa'i sprin chen po 'byung bar byed pa'i rig sngags 'di lan gsum brjod do// mchod pa spyi'i phyag rgya ni lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar la spyi bor bzhag go// 'di'i sngogs la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a b+hi sa mA ye s+pha ra Na hi maM
365a3(rgyud 'grel): ga g+hA khaM/ d+har+m+ma d+hA tu A kAM sha sa man+t+ri ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta pa ri shud+d+ha maN+Da la/ ma mo pra ta pun+da dz+nyA na ba lan+ta/ sarbo tA thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Ta NA ba lany+tsa swA hA/ de ltar mchod pa'i sbyin chen po 'phags pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin du gnas par
365a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bar yid ches par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// de nas rdo rje dril bu lag tu blangs la dril bu dkrol zhing bstod pa 'dis bstod do// dpa' bo chen po thabs brnyes pa// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis// rdo rje mchog gi lam
365a5(rgyud 'grel): ston pa// rdo rje rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod// ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang zhing // theg mchog rtogs par thugasu chud// gsang sngags rgyal po gseng 'dzin pa// gsang ba'i bdag po phyag 'tshal bstod// stobs po che la drag shul che//
365a6(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags rgyal po dag pa po// gdul dka' ba dag 'dul mdzad pa// rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / sdom pa gzung ba la sogs pa byi ste/ 'di skad du 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab
365b1(rgyud 'grel): po// bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la skyabasu mchis kyis bdag la thugs brtse bar gzigs te/ 'gro ba lus pa bsgrub pa'i mthu bdag la stsol cig ces brjod do// de nas 'jig rten gyi
365b2(rgyud 'grel): khams ma lus par sems can gyi don du 'gyur bar bya ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs bcu'i zhing rab 'byams thams cad du sems can gyi don mdzad pa kha dog dang tshul dang / spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogasu ldan pa kun tu bzang po'i
365b3(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa mang po rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig/ des kyang sems can thams cad kyi phyi nang gi don thams cad rab tu zhi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu bsdigs la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum
365b4(rgyud 'grel): tshetshogs pa thams cad kyang de dag gis thob par gyur cig par bsams nas byin gyis brlab pa gsum gyis byin gyis brlab po// sems can gyi don gyis rlob pa'i rig sngags na mkha' mdzod du byung bar mdzad pa 'di lan gsum brjod// /
365b5(rgyud 'grel): namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ bi shwa mu khaM b+h+yaHsarba tat+k+r-i ung+ga taM s+pha ra Na hi maM gA ga nA~M khaM swA hA/ 'dis lan gsum bzlas pas ji ltar bsams pa'i don rnams sems can gyi khams rnams de bzhin du 'gyur bas sangs rgyas dang byang
365b6(rgyud 'grel): nuchub sems dpa' rnams kyis mkhyen gyi gzhan shes rab chung ba rnams kyis mi shes so shes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyis yid ches par bya'o// de ltar de bzhin
366a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa rnams mnyes par bya zhing 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byas pa des bdag gi lha'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyi yi ge bkod pa la sogs pas bdag nyid lha'i skur bsgyur la yi ge khaM dkar po de'i spyi bor gzhag ste mdun
366a2(rgyud 'grel): du lha bzhugs pa'i thugs kar bzlas pa bya ba'i yi ge phreng ba bkod la dbugs dang dran pa rab tu bsdams nas slar sdud pa'i tshig gis non par yid la 'am shub bur mi drag mi ngal bar mi skyo bar ci tsam 'dod pa'i bar du bzlas par bya'o//
366a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas kar nyid kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te bdag dang lha'i thugs kar gzung la de nas nor bu lag pa g.yas pas blangs nas snyim par bcug la bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags bzlas te de'i 'og tu yang yum bzlas snying ga'i thad dkar
366a4(rgyud 'grel): bzung la bzlas pa re la nor bu re r-i bgrang zhing mgo mjug tu phyag bya'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+ra nAM tsan+da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin ma nus yid sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar dmigs te
366a5(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi don phun sum tshogs par 'gyur bar dmigs shing bzlas so// de nas nga la lami gtong bar 'dod na bzlas pa btang ste bzlas pa rnams yid kyis dpal phyig na rdo rje la gtams pa'i tshulo gyis phul lA las kyi rdo rje
366a6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpar bsgyur te/ 'phags pa rnams la mchod pa ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bya zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba yang rgya cher bsngo'o// 'phags pa rnams la mchod pa'i phyir bdag los kyi rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa ni/ na maHsa
366b1(rgyud 'grel): man+ta badz+ra nAM zhes bya'o// de nas mchod yon dbul te/ 'di skad brjod pas dpal phya gu na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa slar gshegasu gsol lo// gdon mi za bar bdag la yang // rjesu brtse bar dgongs nas ni// rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams/
366b2(rgyud 'grel): bar yang gshegasu gsol// de nas dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya spyi bor gyen du bkrol/ sbur dam tshig gi phag rgyas bzhugs pa rnams gshegs par ba'o// mtshams bcad pa yang yid kyis dgrol lo// de nas chos kyi dbyangs kyi phyag rgyas
366b3(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyingasu byin gyis brlabs la/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas las kyi rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab bo// spyi bor chos kyi dbyings kyi yiSha yig bsam mo// rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgyas kyang go bgos la sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
366b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas dge ba'i las bya bar rab tu bsam zhing ldang ngo // langs nas kyang mdo sde zab mo klag pa la sogs po dge ba'i las ci nus pa bya'o// de nas zas za ba'i tshe na bdag nyid rigs kyi snying pos bo srungs
366b5(rgyud 'grel): la sngags 'di bzlas la lan gsum btab ste chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ges sbyangs la zas kyis ro la ma chags par rigs pa dang ldan par ran par bza'o// na mar+tha sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM a mri tod+b+ha bA ya swA hA/ nyal ba'i tshe na yang rigs kyi yum gyi
366b6(rgyud 'grel): snying pos bsrungs nas// glo g.yas pas nyal lo ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mo nus pas mnyes par bya mi nuso snyam pa'i bsam pa mi bskyed do// dpal dang ldan pa'i skal ldan pas// zhabs la gtugs nas bsdus pa yin// rnam dag lam
367a1(rgyud 'grel): ma nga banabs zhas ldan dra ba rgyagags su dpas rgya gan sug pa sa pam thobang 'a sangs rgyas gas bas mang bsngagasas brgyacan pa bad dang / macab 'am dpalan
367a2(rgyud 'grel): chas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
368a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag zugs sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs das grub pa bdun na/
368b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gur skad du/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ro ba sid+d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ gos sngon po can gyi dngos grub nye ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal lo// bla ma dang ni rdo rje 'dzin// thugs rje chu rgyun bdag po la// rtag tu brjed
368b2(rgyud 'grel): med yid kyis mos// mchod rten sngon po'i gdams ngag bshad// rnal 'byor brtson 'gras drag po yi// dbang dang gdoms ngag thob nas kyang // myur du nus pa 'byung ba dang // dngo grub rnam gnyis nye ba'i phyir// nye bye sku gdung mchod rten bsgrub//
368b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor dam tshig la gnas pa// bla ma'i man drug byin brlabs kyis// 'gro ba ste the tshom mi bya'o// rgyu dang byin gyis brlabs pa dang // dbang bskur ba dngo mchod pa dang // bskor bya dang yon tan no// gser dngu lo zangs lcogs dung yang rung // ra shing
368b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dag po la sogs pa// hU~M gi bskyed rim ldan pa yis// drag po'i gtor tshegs mdun du ni// dbong bskur ches bsgyur bzo bo yis// bai DUr+ya 'dra ga par byug/ bum pa'i nang du r+g+ha shog la// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// snying po thams cad
368b5(rgyud 'grel): bris te gzhug/ bla ma grubi thob brgyud pa dang // rtsa ba'i lha yI mtshan dag dang // mi dang gsang mtshun gzhug pa ni// sku gdung byin brla ba snying po gzhug/ sre grwa shing la sog s+yA ma tog phreng // mdzes pA'i rgyan gyis spras par bya// dbang bskur du ma
368b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhung bzhin bya// mchod pa phyi nang rtag tu dbul// gsol zhing ma 'dres thig le ste// de las saM b+h+yo ka ya l-I// de nyid mi cho rten ngag tu bistim/ brgyad pa'i bla ma'ang de bzhin no// gtso bo 'khor gyis bskor ba'i ste// shin tu gas la ba ro
369a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bsgom// brgya stong nus chung bzlas shing bskor// lha tshogs bla ma'i thugs ka nas// 'od zer byung ba kun tu 'phros// mtha' yas sgrib bsregs dag par sprul// slar 'dus rang gi lus la thim// rtog smra
369a2(rgyud 'grel): rags pa ji snyed pa// skad cig gis bsregs sbyangs nas ni// rang lus shel gyi nor bu bzhin// gsang ba nyi shar rdo rje bgo// phyag dang gsol bstod me tog mchod// thog med sgrib bsregs dngos grub nye// khyad par du ni yid dam myur// sgrib pa
369a3(rgyud 'grel): srungs pas mi 'dod yal// rtag tu bzlas pa bskor ldan pas// bskor bas lus kyi sdig pa 'dag/ bzlas pas ngag gi sdig pa 'dag/ dag pas 'dod pa phyogs med 'phel// medor bsdus phrin las rnam bzhi 'grub// rang sems chos skra
369a4(rgyud 'grel): lhor ldan na// mchog dang thun mong 'di la sbyor// snod kyi bye brag ldan par sbyin// legs nyes rin chen dug dang mtshungs// de nas gsang sngags legs par sba// snod ldan rnams kyis 'grub par shog/ slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i de ngos
369a5(rgyud 'grel): grub nye bar byed pa'i mchod rten gyi man ngag rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta dI pAM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi lo tsa brgya brtson 'grus seng ges bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / mthu stobs kyi bdag
369a6(rgyud 'grel): po dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// gang gi stobs kyis gdug pa 'joms byed pa// mthu stobs dbang phyug rdo rje can la 'dud// 'gro ba 'di kun phal che re gnod mang ba// de sel bdud rtsi 'di ni brjod par bya// rig pa 'dzin pa nyams
369b1(rgyud 'grel): dga' phyogs 'dug nas// rnam par sbyangs pa'i sa bzhi dag pa la// rab sngo mchod pa'i rten sogs mdun byas nas// thub dbang rdo rje'i bdag blo'o go 'chung ba// bsod nams tshogs bdun rab tu rdzogs byas nas ni de rjes// sngar nyid pad+mo'i rang bzhin
369b2(rgyud 'grel): snying nyid paM las dir bsam bya// de dkyil raM las byung ba'i tsha zer can ni dmar po bltas byas nas// de ro ni srog gi rang bzhin ye shes lnga yi dngos nyid yi ge blta// 'og tu dbugs nyid yaM yig los skyes rab sngo gzhu 'dra ba// g.yo ba'i ba
369b3(rgyud 'grel): dan gyis mtshan nyid de g.yos pa yis ni rab dkrugs nas// me yi rang bzhin nyi ma yang ni sbyor byas hUM yig gis ni 'bar gyur pas// mthong dang reg pa'i dug sogs rgyu can nad kyi dngos bsregs nas// rab tu tsha ba'i me lce'i sgra las rig pa'i sgra
369b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgog la// ma yengs sems kyis skyon spangs sngags ni rab tu bzlas byas nas// dbugs ni 'byung de nga rngub pa'i rlung gis lus kyi steng 'og cha ni rim bzhin bsreg/ zla drug goms pas lus la drod thob la sogs mtshan ma bzang po rnyeng // gso bar
369b5(rgyud 'grel): dka' ba'i nang rnams 'joms 'gyur sa mchog rnams kyang rim gyis 'thob// langs nas bza' tsha kha zas tshags ni gang gnod shar bsam bsreg par bya// 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshalo//
369b6(rgyud 'grel): lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs pa'i// rdo rje bya ba'i las tshogs ni// rdo rje 'dzin par bsgom nas kyang // bsam rgyud rang gi lag mthil la// a dang ma los dkyil 'khor bskyed// maM las sna tshogs rdo rjer bsam// mu khyud rdo rje'i bum dkyil la//
370a1(rgyud 'grel): thun mong khyang par gsang sngags bsam// sor mo hUM las bde gshegs sku// mtshan rnams ngag dang yang dag ldan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras// me yi mkha' la rnam par bzhugs// me dpung chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis//
370a2(rgyud 'grel): nang dang gdon dang dug sogs la// lcags kyu'i ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// dbyung ba'i tshul du phyung nas kyang // zhi ba'i gzugs brnyan dag la bstim// dkar gsum klu sman ngag dang bcas// gang gnod phyogasu bskul bar bya// mngon spyod drag po'i 'phrin
370a3(rgyud 'grel): las ni// rdzus skyes tshul du bskyed byas la// gang dmigs gzugs dang rten du bcas// phyung ste khyang par gsang sngags bzlas// bsreg dang sbyang ba'i brdung byas la// log pa brdabs pas sgras 'jigs 'gyur// rdo rje grub pa'i las tshogs/ rje btsun
370a4(rgyud 'grel): klu sgrub kyis mdzod pa rdzogs// / bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// de yongasu basbyin par 'dong ba'i rig po 'dzin pa sa// bsam gtan gyi khang par maN+Dal sngon po bya ste/ mchod rten sngon po dang / rta gtor dang /
370a5(rgyud 'grel): mchid rdzas dang / rten khyad par can bzhag la/ dang po khrus byas la/ de nas skyabasu 'gro// rgyu byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed/ rkyen byams pa dang snying rje bsgom// thabs pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas pa de ni thabs kyi bsrung ba'o// shes rab kyis
370a6(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba ni stong pa rang gsal bar bsgom pa'o// de gnyisu med pa'i bsrung ba ni rgyang rgyang lom du khyer la nyam su blangs po'i man ngag ni/ yang shes lnga ldan log 'bru las// kha dog lnga yi 'od zer 'phro// nyon mongs lnga dang klu dug lnga// rnam smin
370b1(rgyud 'grel): lus kyi nad lnga bsregs/ de yi de dgra bsregs nas kyang // lhag ma lus par gyur pa rnams// spobs pa yi sbyor bas bsreg/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi// gsang sngags skyon spangs bzlas par bya// de la man ngag rnam gsum ste// bsam
370b2(rgyud 'grel): gtan ti nge 'dzin rtse gcig la// gnyid kyi bar chad rab tu spang // gzhan gyi gtam gyis bar mi gtsang // bdud dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lam// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// rgyun du 'amo thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor bya// de nas spyod lam dus dag tu// bskyed
370b3(rgyud 'grel): bsdu mi dmigs rgyas btab la// brgya pas bshags shing dag par bsngo// rtags rnams sgyu ma lta bur gzung // dang ldan brtson byas yid ches na// gdon mi za bar 'grub 'gyur te// de bas the tshom med pa ro ni// shin tu dad pas 'bad dri bsgrub// zla
370b4(rgyud 'grel): drug bsnyen pa de ldan na// thun mongs mchog gi dngos grub 'grub// des na bsgrub bya 'dren pa'i lha// dge slong dpal dang ldan pa yi// klu zhes bya bas de skad gsungs// skyabs 'gro sems bskyed byams snying rje// bsgoms te pha rol phyin du ga lam//
370b5(rgyud 'grel): de dag thabs kyi bsrung ba'o// shes rab zung 'jug lam bsgoms te// skyon spang sa sngags bzlas dge pa bsngo// yan lag bdun ldan sgrub thabs 'di// 'bad pas tshogs gnyis bsags nA so nI// dngos grub rnam gnyis thob nas kyang // gdug
370b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i nang las grol ba ra shog/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ ma hA yak+Sha sa nI pa ta ye badz+ra pA Ni sA d+ha nAM nA ma/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i
371a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gang gA'i bye steng rjes gnang ba'i// mche gtsigs spyan dmar dbugs rgyu ma ltar 'bar// 'jigs pa'i nga ros klu rnams rgyan du brgyan// gshin rje'i gzugs can
371a2(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum 'jigs par ma dzad// klu rnams 'ching mdzad de la phyag 'tshal nas// de yi gzungs la brten nas sgrub thabs 'di// ji lta bo ni bdag nyid dran phyir bri// dang por sa phyogs bzang ba'o// dur khrod dam ni shing gcig gam// dben pa'i
371a3(rgyud 'grel): gnasu 'dug nas ni// ba yi rnam lnga dri lnga yos// maN+Dal sngon por legs par byug/ dri yi thig le dgu bkod la// da bus su mchod rten sngon po bzhag/ bum po rta gtor mchod rdzas bsham// phyi nang dag pa'i khrus byas te// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa
371a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid// bde ba'i stan la rab 'dug ste// dang por byang chub sems bskyed la// snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de yi steng du hUM bsams te// de lngas 'od 'phros snod bcud spyangs// sngar gyi gnas su thim pa las// phyi nang thams cad dag
371a5(rgyud 'grel): papar bsgom// swa b+hA bA bi shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA nI badz+ra sid+d+ho hUM/ snying ga'i yo ge mtshan ma las// de las 'od zer rnam lnga 'phros// bla mo la sogs lhag pa'i lha// sngangs rgyas byang chub sems depa' dang // dkon mchog gsum po spyan drangs te/
371a6(rgyud 'grel): brag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa dang // yo r-i'i bskul zhing gsol ba gang ba// skyabs 'gro lus dbul dag rtse bsde'o// de nas bgegs dgra'i ting 'dzin gyis// loso rnams thams cad payi sngags// bzlas shing khro ba'i sprul pa sngo/
371b1(rgyud 'grel): btul zhing spangs te na mkhar gyur// de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom// oM ma hA shA na tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ chos rnams thams cad stong par bsgom// e yaM raM gaM baM laM saM/ e las chos kyi 'byung gnas te// de bzhin 'byung ba rim bzhin
371b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// l-i las ri rab lha na po'i steng // saM las sna tshogs rdo rje bsgreng // de las 'od zer swa lnga 'phros// rdo rje gur dang ra ba dang // mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rdzogs par bskyed// dbus bruM las gzhal yas khang // be Tar ltar thams cad
371b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// tsa las 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i steng // chu skyes nyi zla'i gad na steng du// kha dog mthing gi'i yi ge hUM// de nyid las ni 'od 'phros pas// snod bcud dag ni sbyangs byas nas// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar gyur te// tshur 'di sa khro bo'i rdo rjer gyur//
371b4(rgyud 'grel): de sde bum dkyil hUM sngon las// 'od 'phros khro bo'i ri gos bkug nas// de dag yongasu gyur pA las// thams cad 'joms pa'i stobs ldan pa// gnid sbyin sde dpon tshon po ni// mdo nas ji ltar gsungs bzhin bsgoms// zhal gcig phyag
371b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis sku mdog mthing // g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon sdigs mdzub// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// gos sngon na ra'i rgyun+da gyis brgyan// stag gis smyung bkris snying bstod g.yogs// klu tshan rnams ni rgyan du brgyan// dbu skra sma ra ser lnga 'jigs/
371b6(rgyud 'grel): smin 'tshams dpral bsdus ha ha ba 'di// brkyang bskum klu ba rgyang zhabs kyis mnan// rdo rje mchu yis klu brgyad gzir// nyi blo dang ni pad+ma becha sa// dbus kyi cha la rnam par bzhugs// de nas rang gi snying gar ni// ring dang 'dra ba'i gos sngon
372a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// dbang po drug la'ang de bzhin bsgom// de nas thugs ka'i sa bon las// hUM 'phros 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi'i steng // 'phros 'dus phyag mtshan yig 'brus mtshan// de dag yongs gyur sde dpon bzhi// shar du rdo rje gnod sbyin te//
372a2(rgyud 'grel): lho ru srin po za ba po// nub tu rdo rje gdon chen bdag/ byang du rdo rje ro langs te// sde dpon chen po bzhi rnams kyang // zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag la// g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin// g.yon rnams sdig mdzube tri shU la// ral gri dbyug to 'jo khor
372a3(rgyud 'grel): klu chen brgyad ni rgyan du bris// smad dkris na bza' sngo bkra dang // ra gzu hor can dmar rgyan// pa ti khra bo'i sham thabs kyis// stong g.yogs sngon po'i chos gos 'chang // dbu skra smar gyen seR+Sha 'greng // a la lo yi gang rgyangs sgro ga/ brkyang bskum
372a4(rgyud 'grel): rigs bzhi'i klu rnams mnan// brgya byin mdzes dang ma ra bcas// me 'bar dbus su bskyed par bya// spro ba dag kyang yig 'bru las// ji bzhin du ni bskyed byas te// rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya yis// gnas sngar gtugs cing lus bsrung bya// na ma
372a5(rgyud 'grel): sa man+ta badz+ra naM badz+ri ka bA tsa hUM/ rdo rje nr-i lnga'i phyag rgya yis// brtan par byas te lhas byin brlob// thugs ka'i hU~M las 'od 'phros nas// ye shes sems dpe'i spyan drangs la// phyag 'tshal mchod pastod sdig pashugs te// sku gsung thugs su
372a6(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs nas// mchod rten sngon po dgo la bstim// 'od zer 'do 'phro'i byin gyis brlag thugs las 'od 'phros bde bshegs bskul// mi bskyod sangs rgyas bye snyed rnams// spyan drangs mchod cing sdig bshags te// gzungs
372b1(rgyud 'grel): ltar rjes su gnang mdzad nas// dbang bskur byin brlabs de nyid thim// dbul mi bskyod rdo rje mtshan// thugs mtshan la sogs bsgoms nas ni// sngags kyi phreng ba 'khor ba las// spros bsdu'i rim pa gsal bar bsgom// sangs rgyas gang gzhi
372b2(rgyud 'grel): bye snyed kyi// sangs rgyas gsung ba'i gsang sngags skyon spang bzlas// phyar 'phros pa ni mchod pa'i tshul// de las 'od byung gdon sdig sbyangs// dngos grub rnam gnyis thob par bsam// ji ltar nye bar ma gyur par// gshegasu gsol dang thun
372b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshams med// mchod rten sngon po dag la'o// yang ni rig pa 'dzin pa yis// thun mtshams mchod bstong gtor ma gtang // tha ma'i thun lo gshegasu gsol// dkyil 'khor lha rnams thugs kar bsdu// de nyid mi dmigs stong par bsgom// sgyu ma
372b4(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i spyod lam bya// bsnyen dus rig pa 'dzin pa yis// rtsa sngags yig 'bru bcu bdun bzlas// oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni rA dz+nyA ba ya ti swA hA// 'di yis las rnams thams cad 'grug/ grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma yi// bsnyen pa rab 'bring
372b5(rgyud 'grel): ngag dang sbyar// bsnyen pa rtags dang ldan gyur na// dngos grub blang phyir bsgrub pa bya// snod du bsnyen po cho ga'o// de nas bsgrub pa bya ba ni// lho phyogs rgya mtsho'i gnas dag tu// gtsang ba'i sa blangs stegs bu brtsigs// ba lci gnam nas blangs bya
372b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / 'o ma'i dri chu tsan dan dang // gur kum ga bur la sogs byug/ gru bzhi rab tu gnas pa dang // thig la sogs pa'i rim pa yang // gzhan nas 'byung ba bzhin du gang ba// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bri// lha rnams la sogs tsha
373a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang // mtshan nyid rgyas par gzhan gzhin no// mchod rdzas la sogs gong bzhin bshams// khyad par ngag gi rdzas rnams ni// bum pa sgrub pa'i rdzas kyis dgod// dngos grub rdzas kyis khwa bcad la// mgul chings
373a2(rgyud 'grel): sngon po 'dar gyis bcing // dkyil 'khor dbusu bzhag par bya// rag sha rus pa'i rgyan cha dang // seng ldeng phur pa rdo rje rnams// bla re rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs// gzhan yang sgrub rdzas thams cad gsogs// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa nyid//
373a3(rgyud 'grel): rtse ba'i sdom pa la sogs bsrung // gtsang ba'i zas gos smyung bar gnas// shar bltas chos gos sngon po gyon// bde ba'i stan la rab 'dug ste// snga dro dang po snying rje'i bdag/ bskyed rim bsnyen pa'i dus bzhin bya// khyad par bum pa'i lha
373a4(rgyud 'grel): sa bskyed // tshogs bsags sngon 'gro rdzas 'jug rnam ces// bsnyen pa'i dus dang mthun par gsungs// khyad par ya shes sems dpa' bstim// sku gsung thugasu byin gyis brlab// rigs kyi bdag po sman drangs te// bin brlabs dbang
373a5(rgyud 'grel): bskur bu mo nang thim// thun mong sngags sam khyad par sngags// bzlas shing spro bsdu'i rim pa ni// snod bcud ye shes bcud bsdus nas// bum nang lha deng rdzas la thi mo// sngags la btang de bzlas pa ni// lce nI hU~M gi rdo rjer gyur// snying ga'i
373a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma la sogs las// sngags kyi phreng po brgyud mar 'khor// nga las khro chung grangs med spros// bsregs gzir btso ma bta gas tshar bcang bskrad // tshur 'dud nang dang gdon rnams phyung // dngos grub rnam gnyis thob nas
373b1(rgyud 'grel): kyang // rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin bsgom// thun mtshams mchod bstod gtor ma gtab// sgrub pa thon nas bum pa yis// bdag gam gzhan la dbang bskur te// dngos grub rdzas phud lnga la dbul// lhag ma bdud d+hir bsams te bza'// de nas yi ga brgya
373b2(rgyud 'grel): bas bshegs// ye shes 'khor lo gshegasu gsol// dam tshig dkyil 'khor rang la bsdu// sgyu ma lta bu'i nga rgyal las// ji ltar zhi ba'i las rnams bya// pi las chu skus 'dab brkyang bskyed// gtso bo klu chen brgyad bsams te// rin chen
373b3(rgyud 'grel): snod du gtor ma bshams// dkar gsum mngar gsum klu sman blugs// sbyangs shing byin gyi sa brlab byas to// klu la byin pas gdug rtsub zhi// sngagros bzlas 'od zer 'phro 'du yis// byab pa'i rdzas kyis dug phyung ste// chos bshad khro
373b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshe brjod pas// sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dran te// des na zhi bar 'gyur ba yi no// yang na mtshon ma bzang po 'byung // ngan nA spogs pa'i cho ga bya// de rjes zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya// gdon dang sdig pa zhi bar 'gyur// zhi bar ma gyur gdon bgegs la//
373b5(rgyud 'grel): smag shal bal po si'u les// sngags bzlas lcug mas byabs sam bri bas// 'jigs pa brgyad kyi rdzas kyis gzir// gla rtsi gu gul mu zi dang // dri tshan mi sha spyang ki'i brun// bsregs pa'i dud pas skrag cing 'bros// da ni khyad par klu la shis// de
373b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gzungs kyi las tshogs rnams// ji ltar bor ni 'grub par 'gyur// de yis ma zlog bgegs rnams la// mngon spyod dag gi las byas te// gnas ni gdug cing rtsub pa yi// ga nod sbyin pho mo 'du ba'i sar// sde dpon chen po'i 'khru
374a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bca'// rig pa 'dzin pas lhor bltas te// gnag cing rtsub pa'i stan+da la 'dug/ gcer bu khros pa'i sems ldan pas// dur khrod ro ras chen po la// khrag dang dug gis zhal zhal bya// smyo byed tshwa ba gsum gyi
374a2(rgyud 'grel): byug/ nIm pA ga pur snag tsha lnga// rus chen dag gi smyu gu yis// 'khrul 'khor rim gyis bca' ba ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brkyang mu khyud bcas// raM mig phyir bstan rtse mo nang // sde dpon lto bar 'khrul 'khor bri// khros pa sa mche gtsigs
374a3(rgyud 'grel): gi nod sbyin 'jigs// sbrul gnyis za zhing 'khor lo 'dzin// de bzhin steng 'og 'khor lo bri// mu khyud dag la mtha' rten sngags// rtsibs la ya tshogs bcu drug bri// dbusu lhas byin gzugs bris te// mgo dang dbang po yan lag rnams//
374a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs mtshan ngag la rgyang zhing dgod// snying gar ni dang lte bar dza// ming rnams go rims bzhin du bri// 'khrul 'khor ljags kyi bum par gzhug/ bskyed pa'i rim pa tshul bzhin bsgom// bzlas pa'i sngags kyi rim pa yis// bkug ste glu
374a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum kha bcad gzir// sngags bzlas 'khrul 'khor dgongs pa yang // stong gcong ma yi 'khor lo ste// me rlung drag po g.yen du 'khor// 'og go cong rlung gi 'khor lo ste// drang zhing myur bar g.yas su 'khor// 'khor lo spu gri chen mo
374a6(rgyud 'grel): lhas byin lus sems so so dpral// phung pi mtshon cha'i 'khor los gtug// 'khor lo cha grang 'thab pa'i sgra// 'ur 'ur 'brug ltar sngags bzlas shing // khros pas rgyun du bskor na ni// klu tshan brgyad po 'chi bar 'gyur// nges par
374b1(rgyud 'grel): bsod na mnan dang bsreg/ yang na drag po'i tshes brgyad nas// brtsams te mthing nag 'brub khung du// ling+ga 'khrul 'khor nang bcug la// rdzus skyes tshul du bskyed bya ste// sngags bzlas bkug ste rtags ldan nA// sde dpon bzhi yi 'khrul 'khor du//
374b2(rgyud 'grel): bcug ste rdo rje 'am phur bu yis// dus drug 'khrul 'khor nang du brdung // mngon spyod las rnams gang byed kyang // mchod rten nag por byug bya ste// gdug po'i mchid yon+da la sogs bsham// nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mchod cing // mtshan dang ldan
374b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ka pA la// bdud rtsa sha lnga sna tshogs bkang // gtor ma sde dpon rnams la s+thi ni// thong chen rnga brdang phrin las bcol// ling+ga drag po'i sprin sreg pa// yang na mnan pa'i las pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi// gzungs kyi las
374b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gang byed kyang // mchod rten sku gdung dang ldan par// rtag tu me tog sngon pos mchod// bdun nam bcu bzhi nyi shu gcig/ gzungs snga gos stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na// des ni las rnams thams cad 'grub// grub nas rtag tu mchod
374b5(rgyud 'grel): pabapar bya// gnod sbyin sde dpon chen po yi// gzungs sgrub 'di la nyes pa gang // gong ma rnams la bzod par gsol// bsod nams sems can kun la bsngo// bdag gis sgrubs 'di byas pas// 'bad pas tshogs gnyis bsags nas
374b6(rgyud 'grel): ni// rig sngags 'chang 'drar gyur nas kyang // gdug pa'i nad las grol bar shog/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje'i gzungs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon chen po su bA gi shwa ra kIrIs mdzad pa rdzogs so//
375a1(rgyud 'grel): gtad de sngags kyi phreng bas bskor// bdag dang las kyi sems dpa' la// spro dang bsdu ba'i rim pa rnams// ji lta bar ni gsal bar bsgom// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi// gsang sngags skyon
375a2(rgyud 'grel): spangs bzlas par bya// bsnyen dus lha la gtang de bzlas// sgrub pa'i dus su sngags la gtang // bzlas dus gzas pa po rnams la// gtad de sngags kyi 'phro 'dra bya// de nas bdag dang rgyan cha yis// sbrul gyi kha nas sngags bzlas sngags pas
375a3(rgyud 'grel): ma yi tshub ma dmar nag dang // khro bo grangs med 'bros pa las// de yis de dge bsregs nas kyang // lhag ma las par gyur pa rnams// spogs pa yi ni sbyor bas bsreg/ de ltar byas nas bsgomi zhing bzlas// de nas dang po'i thun thon
375a4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ skyo 'am du ban mchod byas te// gtor ma byin gyis brlabs de dbul// bstod dang phrin las bcol bar bya// ji ltar nye bar ma gyur par// ye shes sems dpa' gshegs mi gsol// mchod rten sngon po dag la'o// thun na gnyis
375a5(rgyud 'grel): dang gsum pa la// ye shes sems dpa' mchod pa dang // thun ni tha ma bsgom pa'i tshe// dang po'i thun ni mthun par gsungs// yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya// de nas ldang ba'i dus dag tu// rig sngags las kyi lha la btang // de ltar
375a6(rgyud 'grel): ma nor bsgom byas nas// dngos grub dam pa ci 'dod pa// gang la dmigs de 'grub par 'gyur// bsnyen rdzogs mtshan ma bzang ba dang // ye shes sems dpa' gshegs mi gsol// gshegs na dngos grub yal 'gyur
375b1(rgyud 'grel): bas// lha ni rgyun du 'khor ba yi// man ngag zhal las shes par bya// gtor ma bka' las phab nas ni// gta' yi bdag po mchod byas nas// gta' gtor bskul tshig bcas la gtang // bsgrub pa'i phyogasu dmar lam brtan/
375b2(rgyud 'grel): gta' yi bdag po gshegs su gsol// las kyi sems dpa' bdog la bsdu// hUM hUM zhes bsnga mi dmigs bsgom// skad gcig ma yi nga rgyal gyis// spod lam ci bdar gnas par bya// bsnyen rdzogs mtshan ma bzang gyur nas// drag
375b3(rgyud 'grel): po las la sbyar byas te// mchod rten sngon po sku gdung ldan// me tog sngon po dri ra bsnyigs kyis// nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mchod cing // bdag nyid go sgo cha so gon la// rak+Sha rus pa'i phreng ba bgrang // sngags ni brgya dang brgya lnga bcus//
375b4(rgyud 'grel): thun 'dun gyi ni rnal 'byor bya// rdo rje beme sing ldeng phur ba la// gzung sa sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te// bsam gtan rdo rje thogs pa yi// drag sngags lnga bcu rtsa gcig bzlas// gzas pa po las bsnun gyur na// des ni
375b5(rgyud 'grel): las rnam sa thams cad 'grub// bdag gis 'di byas dge ba yis// blo chung rnams kyis don rtogs te// 'bad pas tshogs gnyis bsags nas ni// phyag ni rdo rje thob par shog/ phyag na rdo rje mdo lugs kyi ma ni ngag slob dpon su
375b6(rgyud 'grel): byA gI shwa ra kIr+t+tis gzungs kyi'i grel pa ltar mdzad po 'grel pa las gzungs sgrub thabs mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi pit+l-i ta dI ba~M ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsa brgya brtson 'grus seng gis bsgyur ba'o//
376a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi baN+Di ta dI baM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA brgya brtson 'grus seng ges bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // rgya grwar skad du/ badz+ra pA Ni no bI ka sA d+ha nAM na ma/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje bsgrub pa'i
376a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i sku// gdug po 'dul mdzad sprul sogs brgyan// rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal te// de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yi
376a3(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa yi na go rim rnams// bla mas ji ltar gi sungs pa ltar// man ngag brjid byang du bkol baM// khro bo'i rgyal po bsnyen 'dod pas// gnas ni dur khrod shing gcig g+hama?// yang nA rdo rje 'dzin pa'i khyim// bkra shis nyams dga'i gnas dag
376a4(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal sngon po legs byas la// me tog la sogs mchod rdzas dgram// bango bo'i stan la rab 'dug ste// gdong la sogs pa khrus byas la// skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis// hUM yig las ni mdog nag pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po rab bsgoms
376a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ba'o nyams kyi so yungs kur la// skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis// sngags bzlas khro bo'i sprul pa ste// gdug pa tshur btsod tshur 'dung bas// rdo dza gur dbar bar gyur// de nas rang gi snying gar ni// a dkar zhu bas zla ba yi//
376a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor nya gang lta bur bsam// de steng du sbyin zhu ba las// rdo rje sngon po rtsa lnga bsam// de la bum pa hU~M sngon po// de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // lhag pa lnga dang tha ma rnams/
376b1(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs mdun gyi mkha' la 'azhugs// bsod nams tshogs ni bsag pa'i phyir// phyag 'tshal mchod rnying sdig bshags rnams// bdun po yongasu drug pa yis// tshig tu brjod de tshogs bsngags bya// spyan drangs rnams ni gshegs gsol/
376b2(rgyud 'grel): do nas ye shes tshog sna bsags phyir// phyi nang snong bcung 'ong zhu nus// bdag nyid kyi ni thugs kar thim// de nyid 'ong zhu hUM la 'duste// hUM zhu zla tshes thig le raM thim// chos rnams rang bzhin rnam dag pa'i// ngo bo nyid las byung ba yi// sngags 'di yang
376b3(rgyud 'grel): dag brjod par bya// oM ma hA shA n+ya two dz+nyA nA badz+ra swa b+hi ba At+ma ko haM/ tshig gis don dang bcas par bsgom// chu lasna chu bu ri rdol po'i tshu le// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te// raM las ma yi kha dog lnga// dbus su paM lis pad+ma bsam// a las
376b4(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de yi snying hUM hUM sngon las// de zhu rdo rje sngon po ni// bod zer sngon po 'phro bar bsam// de yi bum par hUM sngon bsam// de las 'od zer hUM phra mo// 'phros nas phyi nang skyong bcung sbyangs// tshur 'dus rdo rje phra mor gyur// sngar gyi
376b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas su thim pa las// de zhu rdo rje sngon po ni// na mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par bsam// de yi bum+bi dkyil hUM sngon las// de las 'di byung bcud sbyangs te// tshur 'du phyag na rdo rje yi// sku ni phra mo'i tshul du 'dus// de las phyag na rdo rje'i sku// mdo nas ji
376b6(rgyud 'grel): ltar gsungs bzhin bsgom// de nas dam tshig sems dpa'i sku// bsnyen pa'i dusu bsgom pa ni// sku mdo ga na mkha'i 'od can la// zhal gcig phrag kyang gnyis pa ste// spen da mer mche ba gtsigs pa la// phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon sdig mdzub
377a1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu gdug cing khros pa ste// klu chen brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// stod g.yogs sngon po legs bsnabs shing // nA bza' chos gos sngon po 'chang // smad g.yogs pa ti khra bo 'chang // stag
377a2(rgyud 'grel): gi smad g.yogs seng bstod g.yogs// nyi zla'i steng na gar byed 'gyis// bdag nyid ded ni la rgyan gyi// kha nas ha ha'i sgra sgrogs pas// log 'dren tshogs rnams 'joms par byed// de ltar khro bo'i rgyal por ni// bdag nyid
377a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsam par bya// bdag nyid dam tshig sems dpa' yi// thugs kar zla ba rdo rje trAM / 'phro 'dus ye shes sems dpa' bsgom// thugs kar nyi ma rdo rje hUM// sran ma nas tshod yungs 'bru la// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskor
377a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo// rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya yis// gnas lngar gtugs cing lus bsrung byA// nA maHsa man+ta badz+re naM ka ba tsa hUM/ rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya yis// sngags 'di brjod dwe brtan+d+ra par bsam// na maHsa mAn+ta badz+ra tsaN+De ma hA ro sha d+hA ya hUM
377a5(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas nas ni// thugs ka'i hU~M las 'od 'phros pas// 'od zer lcags kyu'i dbyibs byung nas// ye shes sems dpa'i spyan drangs te// 'og min gnas mchog dam pa yi// lcang lo can gyi pho bra'i
377a6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes gnang ba'i// gsang bdag 'phags pa gos sngon can// 'khor bcos ma lus spyan 'dren gyis// 'dir gshogs mchod pa dam par bzhes// oM nI lI ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni sa ma ye maN+Dal
377b1(rgyud 'grel): ma d+he A gats+tsha ya/ A gar+b+ha ya khwa ga \u0f89\u0fa4 a ya/ tiSh+Tha ya tISh+Tha ya/ a ba lo kA ya hUM dza/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs par bsam// snying ga'i lha mo'i tshogs kyi mchod// oM nI lA~M ba ra d+ha badz+ra pa Ni/ badz+ra puSh+Ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra smA ra/
377b2(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ye hUM/ badz+ra d+hU pe hUM/ badz+ra A lo ke hUM/ badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/ badz+ra nai be d+ye hUM/ bi dz+ra gI ti/ gA ta gA tA hUM swAhA/ sngags dang tshigs bcad rab brjod pas// dngos sam yid kyis mchod pa dbul// de nas bstod dang phrin lngas bcol/
377b3(rgyud 'grel): mdun du rta yi gter ma la// a las ban+d+ha gzhal yas khang // thun maung gdan dang ma yin te// hUM yig las ni mdog gnag pa// las kyi sems dpar bskyed par bya// ri ra ba chen po'i lho shar nas// lhung lo can gyi skal tshig
377b4(rgyud 'grel): dang // sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drangs byistim// mchod dang sdig bshags la sogs bya// dzaHhrI baM hoHzhes pa yis// ye shes sems dpa' bstim por bya// spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga ru// oM AHhUM gsum rab bkod de//
377b5(rgyud 'grel): yi ge bcu gsum 'khor lo bo sgom// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bak+Shit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kau haM/ sku gsung thugs byin brlab nas// mi bskyod sangs rgyas bye snyed rnams// spyan drangs mchod dang sdig bA sha ga sne taM// rjes su gnang ba
377b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum ldan gyis// dbang bskur byin brlabs gnyis med thim// oM shrI ba dz+ra pA NaM hUM ma hA tsiN+Da sarba duSh+TAn sarba bud+d+ha sa pa ri wA ra badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ro// thugs ka'i ting 'dzin sems dpa' la/
378a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni sA d+ha nAM nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khro bo gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo// gdug pa
378a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dul mdzad klu rnams rgyan du mdzad// gtum zhing rngam pas gshin rje'i cha lugs 'dzin// khro rgyal gos sngon can la phyag 'tshal te// de yi sgrub thabs bdag nyid dran phyir bri// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nye bar sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal
378a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pas/ gnas dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i sar maN+Dal bya ba ni bu mo lo bcu drug ljon pa lus sngo bA/ sne nyeg po khro gnyer dang ldan pa/ shin tu khros pa'i ngang tshu lo dang ldan pas lon du bcug ste/ lho nub mtshams nas sngon
378a4(rgyud 'grel): po 'o ma nag po len du bcug la/ dri zhim pa'i tshu la srung ba'i sdigaso bzlas te/ oM badz+rI pA Ni satwa ar+tha sid d+hi ku ru rak+Sha zhes btab la/ maN+Dal sngon po rgyar khru gang ba la/ dbangs su mtho gang brtsigs te/ tsa naM du na dang / a ka ru
378a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / dza ti dang / i la dang / rams dang / so ba shong gi lo ma dri chus byugs la/ me tog sngon po 'am dri'i thig le bdun byas la/ mchod rdzas dgram par bya'o// de nas sgrub thabs ltar lha dgu'i rang bzhin bsgom mo// de'ang
378a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs las rta bcas la mchod do zhes pa ni gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs 'di'o// dpal rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rta gtor 'di la brten la rtag tu sgrub pa ni go tor ma'i snod rin po che'i rgyu las byas te/ de'i nang du 'bras chan dang
378b1(rgyud 'grel): nas dang / gro la sogs pa las gtor ma byas te/ spyan gzigs dang / sha dang / mar dang / mungar la sogs pas brgyan par bya'o// de'i nang du thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i gdan bshams pa 'am bskyed par bya'o// laM las ri
378b2(rgyud 'grel): rab bsams te/ de'i steng du ma las nyi ma/ paM las pad+ma bsam/ bdag nyid kyi thugs ka'i hUM las 'od 'phros te/ bsgrub bya ba kug te thun mong ma yin pa'i gdan la bstim/ yang 'od zer lcags kyu lta bya'i tsha tsha 'phros pas lha dang phra
378b3(rgyud 'grel): la gcer bu skyed thang la bor ba ltar bsam/ steng du hUM las gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bskyed// skra mdog mthong nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas rdo rje/ g.yon rtse gsum 'phan can 'phyar ba/ bzhin khros pa/ sman ma glog steng /
378b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od du 'gyu khe zos na bu skra dmar ser gyen du bcings pa ste/ rin po tshwa dong sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ mig 'bras hUM las me'i phung po 'dra ba/ zhal nas ha ha dang hUM hUM gi sgra sgrogs pas khams gsum pa brgyal bar byed pa/ klu chen po
378b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyis sku la rnam par brgyan pa sku tshal yan+da lag rags pa/ ri rab la rnam par bzhugs pa ste/ zhabs gnyis rgya mtsho'i gting du brkyang la/ dbu bar snang gi khams na 'pho ba/ 'khor rdo rje gnod sbyin dang srin po'i tshogs
378b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis bskor ba cig bskyed do// de ci 'dra bar cig ri rab rtse la spyan drangs la phyag btsa la/ mchod pa dbul/ bdun rnam dag bya ste/ bstod pa dang 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba bta bo ste/ dzaHhUM baM hoHsa gnyi su med par bstims la/
379a1(rgyud 'grel): gta' bdag las kyis gnod sbyin phyag na rdo rje drag po'i sgo nas thugs rjes bzhugs pas gzas pa po'i nyon mongs pa dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / phrin las rnam pa
379a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i sgo nas bzhugs te/ drag po drag pos sgrol bar bsgom mo// dri nas sngags bzlas par bya ste/ oM badz+ra pA Ni hri da ya NA hUM phaT swA hA/ dpal ldan gnod sbyin gyi yang snying yin pas bsnyen pa'i dus su bdun 'bumu nyi khri gdon mo/ mtshan
379a3(rgyud 'grel): ma bzang ba dang sgrub pa la 'jug ste/ bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje'i nga rgyal gyis thugs ka'i hUM las 'od zer 'phros pas las kyi gnod sbyin gyi thugs de ma bskul te 'od zer dmar po me'i 'od lta bu byung ste/ gzas pa po bsreg pa dang
379a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa sbyangs te/ slar bdag nyid kyi snying gar thim par bsam/ oM yak+Sha nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni hUM/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ya a mu ka s+ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ zhes sngags bzlas pas zhal nas sngags kyi phreng ba me'i 'od dang bca sa te las
379a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi lha'i zhal du thim/ thugs ka nas 'thon te/ slar bdag nyid kyi snying gar thim ste/ sngags kyis phreng bas bskor bas gzas pa po sngags kyi phreng bas bsregs shing 'dul bar bya'o// sgrub pa rtags bzang ba dang las la sbyar te/ rgyud las
379a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'og tu ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ me 'bar klong chen dkyil du gzir// bsam gtan rdo rje thogs pa yis// gdul bya'i steng du dbab par bya zhes gsungs pas bsreg so bskrad bcom btags par bsam/ dmor lam bstan pa/
379b1(rgyud 'grel): ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi dgongs pa bya zhing drag sngags bzlas te// tad+ya thA bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bi bad+d+ha mA hA prab+hA/ ha ra ha ra nA ga nAM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ nA ga nAM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshim+ba nA ga hri da ya nI b+hin+da b+hin+na/ na ga d+ha mA ni/ bi saM man+ta nA ga sha ri rA ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ nA ga ya nA na tad+ya thA hUM phaT/
379b2(rgyud 'grel): nA ga bi d+ha ra na ya hUM phaT nA ga Ar+g+haMD+ha nA ya hUM phaT/ nA ga mA ra na song song / nA gaM mA ra byid bying / nA ga mA ra na mugs mugs/ nA ga mA ra na ha la hi la/ nA ga mA ra na shig shI gi/ ne ga mA ra na du na du na/ nA ga mA ra na myos myos/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mai
379b3(rgyud 'grel): yeyongs mi myur ba re smra ba bcad do// ting nge 'dzin gyi dgongs pa gsal la/ drag par bya'o// kha zas kyi dus la bab pa 'am ldang bar 'dod na ye shes sems dpa' phye la mchod pa 'bul/ gtor bsngo/ bstod pa bya/ las kyi lha la gtor ma dbul ba ni phyag na
379b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i thug sa ka'i hUM las a las bAn d+ha'i 'og tu yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du raM las me gru gsum/ de'i steng du ban d+ha'i gzhal yas khang / de'i nang du sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga/ yaM las rlung byung / mo 'bar/ mes thod pa bskol/ sha lnga bdud rtsir
379b5(rgyud 'grel): gyur pas mchod/ rtse sngags la ba li ta kha hi zhes btags laM dbul/ las kyi dusu gtor me sha khrag tu dmigs la dbul/ rtswa sngags la ma ma sarba sha hUM btags la dbul/ skabasu gtor mas bskul/ bdag nyid gnyid log gam/ kha zas dus la
379b6(rgyud 'grel): bab na las kyi lha la thugs dam gtang / rig sngags dbul/ gta'i gtor ma gtong na bka' las phab lo no paM ka ltar bskul tshig dang bcas la gtango // gta' bdag gshegasu gsol/ bskyed pa bdag la bsdu/ gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje'i sgrub pa
380a1(rgyud 'grel): gta'i gtor ma'i gdams dag slob dpon su bA gI shwa ra kartis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
381a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ngan rdo rje 'khor ma'i man ngag bzhugs so//
381b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tsakra A pa dwe sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'khor lo'i man ngag ces bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor sngon du bsnyen byas pas// drag po'i las la sbyar bya ste// las sbyor cis kyang
381b2(rgyud 'grel): ma thul na// 'khor lo'i las la 'jug par bya// sbyor ba 'di la zhugs gyur na// brlag par 'gyur te the tshom med// drag po las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di// ting 'dzin gyi mtshon yin te// rtswa gcig bsgoms pas 'grub pa las// kun gyis
381b3(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par mi nus so// 'di ni zhe sdang 'khor lo ste// drag po 'khrugs po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis// dmigs na lha 'ang brlag par 'gyur// 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs brtol nas// gzung sngags drag po'i 'khrul
381b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'dis// myur du bsgrims te bsgral bA na// nam mkha' nyid kyang 'jig 'gyur ni// bsgrub bya'i rnam shes smos ci dgos// 'di ni dgug pa'i 'khor lo ste/ sga tsha thal tshan grog mo'i zhing // bong bu'i spangs dang sa gnyen la// klu rigs
381b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi gzugs bya ste// snying po tr-i dang mying bcug la// dgug pa'i dgos pa 'di ltar byo// tha ma'i pha TaM las dzaH'bros te// dzaHlas lcags kyu'i dbyibs byung nas// bsgrub bya'i rnam shes bkug par bsam// khugs nas sgrub
381b6(rgyud 'grel): bi'i las la 'jug/ de nas gsang ba'i 'khor lo brtsam// sto bo nyid ngang las e las ni// mthing ga gu gsum chos 'byung dbus// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te// raM las mo ro lnga yi dbus// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo bskyed par bya/ pra
382a1(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra tsakra rAk+Sha rak+Sha hUM/ bruM las srid pa'i 'khor lo ni// spu gri gcod pa'i 'khor lo bskyed// badz+ra rdo rje'i 'khor lo ni// me 'bar dpal dang bcas par bsam// tsakra phyogs mtshams 'khor lo ni// rdo rje ra ba'i 'khor lo
382a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// rak+Sha zhes pas steng bsrung ba'i// byin gyis brlab pa'i 'khor lo bskyed// hU~M rnams las ni bde gshegros sku// cho ga yan lag gsum gyis bskyed// thugs kar ye shes 'khor lo bsgom// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka ru// nyi steng dpa
382a3(rgyud 'grel): bopo 'bru lnga dgod// mu khyud rta bA'i sngags kyis bskor// bde gshegs bka' dong dam tshig las// mi 'dab pa yi 'khor lo la// zil gyis mnan pa'i sngags rnams dgod// phyogs mtshams mtshon cha'i 'khor lo la// gnang la dbab pa'i
382a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags rnams dgod// rdo rje srid pa'i 'khor lo la// tshar bcad pa yi sngags rnams bsam// byin brlabs srung ba'i 'khor lo'i dbus// mi bskyod zhe sdang rdo rje ste// mthing nag sdigs mdzub rdo rje bcas// sems dpa'i skyil dkrung nyi zla'i
382a5(rgyud 'grel): gdan// 'khor lo yi ni rtsibs dag la// bcom ldan gtum po khros pa'i sku// rdo rje dang ni sdigs mdzub bcas// zhal nas sngags kyi sgra skyugs pas// log 'dren tshogs rnams 'joms par byed// de ltar 'khor lo chen po bsgom// ye shes
382a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo spyan drangs te// mchod bstod sdig bshags la sogs bya// phya ga rgya bzhi yis de la bstim// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab// rje su gnang ba sum ldan gyi// chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur te// de nas 'khor lo bskor
382b1(rgyud 'grel): da na// thugs ka'i hUM las 'od 'phros pas// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs dam bskal// de las 'od 'phros sngags la phog/ sngags las 'od 'phros 'khor lo bskal// 'khor lo 'od zer 'bar ba yis// steng 'og phyogs mtshams 'kho
382b2(rgyud 'grel): lo bskor// thub cing rab tu bsreg par bsam// bdag nyid kyis ni sngags bzlas pas// sngags kyis 'khor lo rim par bskor// gzas pa po yi snying ga ru// yi yis bskyod de hUM gis bsdu// phaT kyis rnam par 'thor zhing bsreg/ srid pa
382b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i 'khor los gtubs// phyogs mtshams mtshon cha'i 'khor lo yis// phog na thams cad brlag par 'gyur// tsit+ta thugs kyi sgrub pa ste// shin tu gnod na rten la bskor// skabs su gnod na dgug cing bskor// bskor nas brlag par
382b4(rgyud 'grel): gdon mi za// 'khrul 'khor 'do yi sbyor ba yis// gzhan gyis byas pa'i rig sngags dang // byang dang bka' nyin po nya dang // 'khor lo'i ting 'dzin la sogs rnams// gnod sbyor thams cad 'jig byed cing // gzhan gyis byas pa'i rig sngags
382b5(rgyud 'grel): gcod// rig sngags drag po'i gzungs sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba/ slob dpon su b+ho gI shwa ra kirtis mdzad pa rdzogaso// / rgya bong gnyis la grags par gyur pa yis// mdo sngags don la mkhas pa'i di paM ka ra la/
382b6(rgyud 'grel): sgra sbyar bod na mkhas pa'i rgyal po brtson seng gis bka' bas nyam su blangs nas rin chen gser gyis zhus// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra pA Ni nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra ka lAM ba liM ta ba~M d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po
383a1(rgyud 'grel): can gyi gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// slob dpon dang ni sgrub pa po// bsnyen pa dang nI sgrub pa dang // dkyil 'khor dang ni sbyin sreg dang // gzhan yang lha rnams mnyes pa dang // bge
383a2(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba dang nyams pa bskang // 'khrul 'khor tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang // phan gdogs pa dang tshor bcad dang // dgar dang gsad dang dgug pa dang // gzi ra dang bcing dang mnan pa dang // rgyas dang bsdus dang shin tu bsdus// zhi dang longs spyod
383a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phel ba dang // rgyas dang dbang dang mngon spyod kyis// las rnams nye bar 'grub pa dang // thun mong mchog dang dngos grub dang // bsod nams chen po thob bya'i phyir// yar ngo mar ngo'i tshes bcu dang // brgyad dang bcu bya zhi nya stong ngam// ya na
383a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyan nam dus drug tu// rtag tu gtor ma'i las rnams bya// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag lnga// 'bru dang shing tog sman rnams dang // chan thu khur ba dkar gsum mngar// sha khrag rus pa snying sna rnams// dgra 'am 'byung po bgegs kyi gzugs//
383a5(rgyud 'grel): sbrul dang spel ldeng nya sha rnams// de sogs drag po'i thun rdzas so// cho ga gsum 'am skad cig mas// 'dod pa'i lha rnams bskyed byas la// tshogs bsags sngon 'gro rjes 'jug rnams// bsnyen sgrub dus dang mthun par bya// bdag
383a6(rgyud 'grel): michod lha rnams mnyes bya'i phyir// mtshan ldan rdo rje ka bo li// rdzas rnams kun gyis bkang byas te// yaM las rlung stong ro ma sba ro// de steng a las ka pA lar// de 'og ye shes sngo ldan gsum// go ku de ti na las ni// lcags kyu lngapo
383b1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed par bya// bri mu ma ra shu las ni// bdud rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin bskyed// dpa' bo lnga yis rab spangs te// zla steng oM las rdo rje hUM// de gyur rtswa lnga de nyid can// sngo bskyed ma sngar rdzas rnams bskol// 'od kyis ri bong rtse lnga zhu// thim pas bdud rtsi'i ngo bor gan+d+ha//
383b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes l-I yi yig 'bru las// 'od kyis gang gA'i klung sogs kyi// bdud rtsi drangs te gnyis mod bstim// 'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs// lhag po'i lce dang bla ma dang // dkon mchog gsum dang chos skong rnams// lce yi rdo rjes bdud rtsi
383b3(rgyud 'grel): len// oM nI lAM ba rA b+ha ra badz+ra ni pA Ni ba li ta i draM gr-ih+Na gr-Ih+na khA hi khA hi b+h+yAM dzi ho ba lI ta khA hi/ oM a kA ro ma khaM sarba d+harmA NAM A d+ya nat+pan+na to ta oMHAHhUM zhes bsnyen pa'i dus su dbul lo// de rjes sgrub po'i dus dag tu// gtor ma byin gyis brlabs bA
383b4(rgyud 'grel): ni// a las ban d+ha'i nang dag tu// maM las sha yi phung po bskyed// kaM las rus pa'i pho brang las// ra les rak+Sha'i rgya mtsho bskyil// shrI khrig rus par byin brlabs la// dug gsum dmar gyi mchod rdi pa 'di// drug po'i sngags 'dis dbul bar bya// oM
383b5(rgyud 'grel): nAM lAM bA ra d+hA ra badz+ra pA nI/ ma ma sar+b+ba sha traM A mu kA'i many+dzusapA sa maM sa dzI ba~M byA gaM rA b+hai ra prI ya ku ru d+ha kA ni a~M da~M bA liM gr-ih+Na gr-ig+h+ra bA hi khA hi b+h+r-i dza ho/ r-ik+Sha pI bA ta a taM kro ma sa ma ye swA hA zhes sgrub pa'i dus su'o// las sbyor drag po'i dus dag to// !
383b6(rgyud 'grel): yaMyi gtor ma dbul ba ni// sbal lcong nya sha'i gtor ma bsham// gzas pa po yaM ling ga la// sngags dang phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin gyis// rdzus skyes tshul du bskyed bya ste// bkug ste gru gsum kha bcad gzir// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i//
384a1(rgyud 'grel): las kyi gnod sbyin tshogs la dbul// yak+Sha nAM lAM ba ra d+hA ra badz+ra prA N+Di d+d+haM/ mahA yAk+Sha se na pa ta ye che ge mo'i srog sa shag shag+na ma ma sarba shatrUM a ma ka zhes dbul lo// de nas bstod cing smon lam g+ha ba// thong chen rnga brdung
384a2(rgyud 'grel): phrin las bcol// rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po yis// rang rang gnas su gshegs su gsol// go bgo lus bsrung brtan par bya// rang nyid nga rgyal ci bder gnas// phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi gautwor+ya ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ slob
384a3(rgyud 'grel): dpon su bA gi sha ra kIrtis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra pA NaM no pi ka sA d+ha nAM na ma/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs mdor bsdus po zhes bye ba/ khro bo gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo// gzhug pa ma lus 'joms
384a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa// rdo rje 'dzin laM phyag 'tshal te// de yi gsang sngags dbye ba bshad// oM nas swA hA bcu bdun par// gtso la bsnyen po dbul ba'o// de nas sgrub pa'i thabs dag la// 'bum du bsnyen pa rdzogs byos nas// myur du bsad pa'i las la 'jug
384a5(rgyud 'grel): klu dang gnyen dang sa bdag/ sogs// gzhan yang gnod sbyor mtho' dadrug rnams// bzlog cing mi tshu gas bya ba'i phyir// las kyi gnod sbyin sgrub thabs brtsam// sngags bdag nag po'i sgrub pa la// sngags kyang du ma rnam pa bzhi// bod pa spang ba
384a6(rgyud 'grel): bi sid dang mchod// gdams ngag can gyis nan tan byi// oM badz+ra pA Ni yik+Sha kro d+ha/ badz+ra d+ha ra badz+ra khin d+ho ro/ badz+re kha la rU pa sha d+hi ra/ badz+ra tsakra d+ha ra/ nA ga mA rA ya hUM/ oM badz+ra pA Ni yi k+Sha kro d+ha/ badz+ra d+ha ra nA ga rA ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pA Ni yak+Sha
384b1(rgyud 'grel): kro d+ha khaD+ga d+ha ra nA ga mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pA Ni yak+Sha kro d+ha kha la ru pA sha d+ha ra nA ga mA rA ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pA Ni yak+Sha kro d+ha tsakra d+ha ra nA ga mA rA ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pA Ni yak+Sha kro d+ha hUM ta pa Sha na na wag bta pa yaM/ che ge mo mA rA ya song song / nA ga mA ra ya bying bying
384b2(rgyud 'grel): nA ga mA ra ya mu gas mugs/ na ga mA rA ya shig shrig/ nA ga mA rA ya myogs myogs/ nA ga mA rA ya dun du na/ nA ga mA rA ya thum ri la dze/ oM badz+ra pI Ni yak+Sha kro d+ha badz+ra b+ha raH r+dz+dza[]ai) sha d+ha ra tsakra d+ha ra/ yak+Sha kro d+ha che ge mo'i srog la sheg shag/ mr-i mi
384b3(rgyud 'grel): sarba sha trAM/ a mA ki ya madz+dza ma d+ha/ b+ha sa mAM sa dzA bi bu ga ru d+hi ra/ prI ya~M b+ha k+Sha nai ba li i ngaM gr-ih+Na grih+Na khA hi khA hi b+hany+dza ho/ rak+ta pi ba ho/ mA ti kra ma sa ma ye swA hA/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bzhi'i sgrub thabs thun mong ma yin pa gu ru su bA gI sha ra kirtis
384b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// // paN+Di ta dA pAM ka rA shri dz+nyA na dang / lo tsa brgya brtson 'grus seng gres bsgyur ba'o// / dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum bye snyed kyis// rjes gnang las kyi khro bor
384b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba'i// mthu stobs bdag po gdug pa'i ge nyin po la// dang bas phyag 'tshal sgrub pa'i go ri ma bri// dang por gnas dang dkyil 'khor ba shom// mchod rten sngon po bumo pa bcas// gto bcas mchod rdzas khrus byas la//
384b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten sngon po bum pa dang // gta' gtor mchod yon byin gyis brlab// sems bskyed snod bcud sngags kyis sbyang // tshogs bsags mgron gyi lha rnams gshegs// bgegs bskrad mtshams bcad ched med bsgom// stong
385a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid bsgoms la 'byung rnams bskyed// ri rab steng du srung 'khor bsgom// de dkyil gzhal yas khang dang gA dan// yig 'bru rnams las lha rnams bskyed// thugs kar ye shes 'khor lo bsgom// byin
385a2(rgyud 'grel): brlabs lus bsrung brtan par bya// ye shrIs 'khor lo dgug gradan dbul// phyag 'tshal mchod bstod sdig bshags bstim// byin brlabs 'od zer gsum 'phro 'du// dbong bskur lha rnams spyan drangs mchod// sdig bash+logs
385a3(rgyud 'grel): gzungs ltar rjes gan du bya// dbang bskur byin brlabs de nyid bstim// lce ni byin brlabs skyon spangs bzlas// bsnyen dus lhar gtong spro bsdu bya// mthun mtshams phye la mchod gtor btang // gshigis gsol bskyed bsdu mi
385a4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs bsam// bsnyen pa rtags ldan dngos grub blang // rta gtor nam gung tho rangs dus// dbang bskur rgyas gdab bum lha gshegs// lus bsrung spyod la mau rnal 'byor bya// rtags rnams sgyu ma lta bu gzung // dri don
385a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la smra mi bya// sgrub thabs gsal bar byed pa'i man ngag 'di// tshig rkang sum cus de nyid don bsdus nas// shes par byed pa'i don 'grel sgron ma 'od// byas pa'i dge bo sems can kun la bsngo// nongs pa mchis na
385a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pas bzod par gsol// slob por gsung gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa rdzog so// / bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshol lo// dus gsum bde gshegs sku gsum sras bcas kyis
385b1(rgyud 'grel): rjes gnang las kyi khro bor dbang bskur ba'i// khro bo'i rgyal po dug dgra dregs 'joms la// dang bas phyag 'tshal sgrub thabs go rim bri// grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma yi// bsnyen rdzogs dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// gnas dang phyogs dang sngon 'gro bya
385b2(rgyud 'grel): thig dang tshon dgye phyag 'tshal dgod// khyang bar rdzas sogs bum pa bca'// dngos grub rten dngo mchod rdzas bsham// sdom bsrung smyung gnas chos gos brgyan// tshogs pas gasngon 'gro rjes 'jug dang // bskyed rim mo chod pa bsnyen dus
385b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// bum nang lho bskyed spyan drangs mchod// dbang bskur byin brlabs bum nang thim// gzungs thag btags te rig sngags bzlas// steng dang 'og gi lam gnyis las// thun mong khyad par spro bsdu bya// khri phrag bdun du dngos grub blang //
