436b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ba'i phyir dang ni// baglegs rnams bzlog par bya ba'i phyir// zhi dang drag po'i sbyin sreg bya// de nas pus nub 'dom gang bA rA// brus te rdo dang rus sogs bsal// slar yang sa yis de nyid dgang // gal te lhag par gyur na ni//
436b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub yod par ston pa yin// de ltar sbyang ba byas po dang // dri zhim chu dang sbyar bri'o sas// gro bzhi shin tu 'thas byas te// dri zhim chu dang ba yi lngas// shar nas brtsams te legs byugs la// grwa bzhi sgo bzhi khang brtsegs
436b3(rgyud 'grel): ma/ rta babs skar khung dra ba tsan// me tog chun 'phyang sogs ldan pa'i// bad pa'i nang chung rgyan sogs dgram// de nas hUM khaM hUM zhes pas// rnam par dag pa'i na mkha' bsam// hU~M suM hUM las byung ba yi// rin chen sna bzhi'i
436b4(rgyud 'grel): ri rab bskyang // de steng hUM laM hUM byung ba'i// gausera~M gyi sa gzhi gru bzhi pa// bskyed de thal cing kha sbub la// sngags kyis byin gyis brlabyas par bya// oM me di nI badz+ri b+ha ba ban+d+ha hUM/ de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal ni// bsrung ba'i
436b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis bsrung bya ba// saM yi cho gar gsungs pa yin// de nas bdag nyid khrus byas shing // shin tu sngo ba'i gos bgos te// ji snyed rgyan gdags dri zhim bya// dkyil 'khor dbus nas shar du bltas// ji ltar
436b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs las bo shad pa'i// ting 'dzin gsum ni bsgom pa dang // bzlas pa ngag lo brtson pa la// grogs mchog rnams kyis bstod gsol gang ba// gsang po'i bdag po btson chen po// sangs rgyas thugs dang 'dra
437a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lus// gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin can// rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang ba'i bdag po brtson chen po// sangs rgyas gsung dang 'dra ba'i ngag/ 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin bdag/ rdo rje
437a2(rgyud 'grel): gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang ba'i bdag po brtson chen po// sangs rgyas thugs dang 'dra ba'i yid// zhe sdang rdo rje'i rang bzhin bdag/ rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// mgron po khyod la gsol ba ni// sems can kun
437a3(rgyud 'grel): la sman slad du// gdug pa thams cad 'dul byed pa'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// de ltar gsol gdab bdag po yi// nga rgyal brtan pas longs nas ni// bdag nyid rang bzhin rdo rje can// phyag na rdo rje bdag rang
437a4(rgyud 'grel): yin// bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che// stobs chen rnal 'byor can bdag yin// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po'i bdag rgyan na de lta nag / brlab pa mi 'dor ro// zhes brjod badz+rod tI Sha yis// dkyil 'khor mkhar bteg
437a5(rgyud 'grel): ma Ta yis// nyi ma zla ba hUM mtshan nyid// rkang 'og hUM las byung ba yi// sna tshogs rdo rje bsam byos nas// bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs bskor bas// bgegs bskrad ra ba sa gzhi kun// rdo rje'i rang bzhin can du bsam//
437a6(rgyud 'grel): denas dbus su gnas na sa ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje chen// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson// bdagi ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// bka' yi 'khor lor rab sbyor gyis// lha dang lha min gsang ba pa//
437b1(rgyud 'grel): brjed byed la sogs bgegs kyi tshogs// sa 'dir ma gnas gzhan du dengs// gal te dam tshig las 'das na// rdo rje khro bo bzhin 'bar ba'i// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba yis// mgo ni tshal pa brgyar 'gas shing // zhig par 'gyur
437b2(rgyud 'grel): bar gdon mi za/ zhes brjod byang shar nas brtsams te// khro bo'i gar gyi 'dor stangs kyis// drag tu lan+da gsum bskor byas la// dbus 'dug bden pa'i byin brlabs brjod// bdag slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas/
437b3(rgyud 'grel): slob ma che ge mo zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis kyang bla na med pa'i ye shes thob bor bya ba'i phyir/ sa phyogs 'dir bcom ldan 'das gos sngon po can zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
437b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po 'dri bas lha dang lha ma yi nau dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / 'byung po dong / maukha' 'gro ma dang / mi 'am ci dang / rig sngags grub pa rgan po dang / rgan mo 'khor
437b5(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yog tu bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa rnams dengs shig/ da ltar rdo rje 'chang ba'i bka' thos nas myur du dengs shig/ gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag ni// phyag na rdo rje hUM zhes bye ba rab tu 'bar ba khro bzhin 'bar ba'i ye
437b6(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi rdo rje chen po 'dis mgo tshal ba brgyar 'gas par byed do// de ltar brjod nas dbus su ni// mthun pa'i stang thabs shar la sogs// phyogs bzhi stang stabs bzho yis ni// bgegs rnams tshar gcad bsrung
438a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bya// de nas phur bu lnga la ni// dri byug me tog srang bud dmar// btags te zhal gsum phyag drug pa// smad ni mdung ltar byin brlabs te// phur pa'i gsang sngags legs brjod la// g+ha g+hA la sogs kyis
438a2(rgyud 'grel): gdab bya// de nas dbus su d+his b+h+yog sA la// baM las sa yi lha mo bskyed// bkug ste mchod la gsol ba gdab// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par dang // sna dad pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du
438a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis// ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa// de bzhin bdag gi bdud kyi sde// pham par byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ zhes ni lan gsum brjod de bstim// de nas dri yis legs byugs la// dri yi thig le dgu byas
438a4(rgyud 'grel): teme tog tshom bu lhor bskyed la// nam khyi'i dkyil 'khor phab mchod bstod // rdo rje'iching po bcom ldan 'das// rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs kyi bdag nyid can rnams kyis// dkyil 'khor bdag ni 'dri bar
438a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// slob ma rnams la brtsa ba dang // khyodad+hA rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la// da ni gnang ba mdzad pa'i rog sa// sangs rgyas 'gro 'khor bya don stsol// byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang //
438a6(rgyud 'grel): gang gzhan gsang sngags lha rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dong // gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang // gang yang rdo rje spyan mnga' ba'i// sems can bsten la dga' ba rnams// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis//
438b1(rgyud 'grel): byuphyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni// yo byang ci 'byor pas 'drin// deng bdag slob mar bcas pa la// thugs brtse bas ni dgongs nas su// tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du// byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol// zhes ni lan
438b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum gsol btab la// mchod dang bstod pa rgyas par bya// de nas bum pa dgu 'am bcu// mtshan nyid dang ldan bkra byas te// rigs kyi mtshan mas mtshan byas la// sman 'bru rin chen lnga dri chu// btsal te mgul bcings kha
438b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan la// rnam rgyal bum pa gtso bo'i mdun// lhag ma phyi rol dag la dgod// las byed bum pa sgo 'gram dgod// bau las bum bskyed du'i nang du// lha rnams skad cig gis ba skyed la// ye shes sems dpa' dgug sogs
438b4(rgyud 'grel): bya tamachod bstod byas twa gtso bo la// rtsa ba'i sngags ni baurgya rtsa brgyad// sa bon de nyid gsum ldan ni// lhag ma rnams ni bzla bar bya// de nas mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i// slob ma nang du bos byas la// sngags kyi dngos grub dor gnyer
438b5(rgyud 'grel): gong // dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug par bye// bsod nams 'dod pas de las g+ha zhan// gzhan dag 'jig rten pha rol gnye ro// 'jig rten pha rol don ga nyer ba'i// dang pa mang du myed pa yis// blo ldan dkyil 'khor 'jug
438b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya// tshe 'di'i 'bras bu gnyer mi bya// gal te 'di 'bras don gnyer na// 'jig rten pha rol 'grub mi 'gyur// 'jig rten pha rol la dmigs na// 'bad pa med par 'di 'bras 'grub// ces brjod slob mas gsol
439a1(rgyud 'grel): pa gdab// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen por bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshigs de nyid sbrul du gsol// sangs
439a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas tshes dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// de ltar lan gsum brjod nas ni// khyod ni tshul tshan snod yin te// bu tshur theg pa
439a3(rgyud 'grel): chechen po yi// gsang sngags smod tshul cho ga ni// byong la yang dag bstan par bya// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang // de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang // da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams// 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dag/
439a4(rgyud 'grel): de dag kun gyis gseng sngags kyi// cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas// dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du// thams cad mkhan pa mtshan med bsnyes// gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ shAkya seng+ge skyob pa yis// bdud ste
439a5(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mi bzad pa// dpung chen dgra yang de yis bcom// dI bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir// bu yis blo gros 'di gyi sa shig/ ces brjod slob mos bshags sogs bya// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs sa mchi// sdig
439a6(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'gro ba'i ngag la rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas byang chub tu sems bskyed// de nas slob ma'i gnas gsum du// khu tshur spos chur ldan po yis// thig le byas te zla ba dang // pad+ma nyi steng
439b1(rgyud 'grel): yig gsum dgod// sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs nas// dus 'di nas ni gzung nas nI// 'khor ba'i nyes pas ma gos par// mchod pa kun dang ldan par ni// dus kun tu ni bde bar gnod// zhes brjod me tog sogs kyis mchod//
439b2(rgyud 'grel): a shwat+tha sogs so shi nga ni// sor bcu gnyis drang srog chags myed // n+ya mo me tog gis btags sbyin// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// shar ram byang du bltas te dor// byang shar lho nub steng 'og tu// zhi rgyas mngon
439b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod dbang rigs 'dzin// sa 'og dngos grub phyir lhung med// oM hrIHsogs sngags skyor chu blung // khams gsum rnam rgyal bzlas pa yis// ku sha stan dong sdes su sbyin// sngags de bzlas pa'i srung skud ni// mdud pa sum
439b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan dpung g.yas bcing // de nas gzengs bstod phyir 'chos pa// 'jig rten du ni ku no mkhyen rnams// u duM bA ra'i me tog bzhin// brgya lam na nI res 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yad na mi 'byung ngo // gsuM nga sngags spyod pa'i
439b5(rgyud 'grel): tshul 'byung ba// de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ gang gis mnyam med sems can do ni// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// bskal pa bye ba du ma ru// sdig pa bgyi bar 'gyur ba gang // de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra ba// mthong
439b6(rgyud 'grel): babos 'byung bar 'gyur lag na// grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i// tshul la gnas pa smos ci dgos// skyob pa gsang sngags bzlas nas ni// go 'phang bla med thob par 'gyur// gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la//
440a1(rgyud 'grel): blo gros rtag tu mi g.yo ba// de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyu// sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcang // bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis// rnyes pa mnyam med de ring rnyed// gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas la// bdag
440a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid chen po kun gyis ni// bsten pa 'di la khyed rnams kun// yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa// de phyir khyed rnams theg tshan la// sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur// theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i// lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan// /
440a3(rgyud 'grel): khyed rnams 'dir ni dong bas na// rang byung skal ba chen po pa// 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi// de bzhon gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur// de ltar chos bshad spro bskyed la// bzhin bzangs longs la song zhig dang // sang ni thar
440a4(rgyud 'grel): po chen po yi// grong khyer mchog ni mthong 'gyur zhes// brjod la nyal du gtang bar bya// slob dpon bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi// mtha' logs dag tu nyal bar bya// de ltar lhag gnas rdzogs byas nas// nang par skya reng shar ba
440a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / lha yi rnal 'byor ldan byas te// slob ma'i rmi lam brtag byas la// ngan na sbyin sreg gis bzlog bya// nyi ma 'char kar gyur pa dang // dkyil 'khor na mkhar btags byas la// thig gdab po ni brtsams par bya// sar pa legs
440a6(rgyud 'grel): par bkal nas kyang // ched dang mthun pa'i mdzes pa ni// kha do gau so sor bsgyur byos la// oM traM hrIHoMHhUM bkod de// 'bar ba'i lha rnams bkug nas ni// gcig tu bsgril bar bya ba yin// oM n+yo na oM nu ga ta sarba d+harmA ba ras pa ra
440b1(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA/ a t+yan ta a nu ga ta sarba d+harmA/ oM badz+ra sa mA ya sU tra ma ti kra ma hUM/ grogs mchog khams gsum rnam rgyal du// dmigs te dza gsum gyis thig drang // shar dang byang ltar tshangs thig gdab// mer gnas bang du bltas
440b2(rgyud 'grel): papa dang // rlung gnas lho ru bltas pa dang // de nyid nas ni shar bltas dang // me gnas nub tu bltas pa yis// phyi yi thig ni bzhi gang ba bya// me dang bden bral du gnas te// mtshams kyi thig gnyis gdab par bya// de bzhin chad dI thi ga nas mi
440b3(rgyud 'grel): phyi yi thig gi bar du ni// ngos rer bdun bdun gdab par bya// de bzhin sgo khyud logs dang ngos// 'gram dang ya phu bas kyang gdab bya// sgro ni 'khor lo brgyad kyi cha// sgo khyud lha rnams sgo yi tshad// kha khyer dra phyed de yi byed// tshon sna
440b4(rgyud 'grel): lnga ni kha khyer phyed// rta babs sgo yi gsum 'gyur ro// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi dang yang dgra ldan// mchod rnam bzhi yis yongs su bskor// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes// rdo rje thig gis yongasu bskor// dra ba
440b5(rgyud 'grel): dra ba phyed po sngo brgyan// bla re rnga yab me lcong dang // gos dang me tog phreng gis brgyan// lha rdzas bsnams pa'i lha mo'i tshogs// ba dan rtse mo rlung bskyed ldan// de ltar legs par thig btab nas// tshen dgye ba ni brtsam par bya//
440b6(rgyud 'grel): rin tshon lnga ya phye ma 'am// yang na sa yi phye ma ni// kha dog lnga dang ldan pa la// sa bon lnga dang ldan byas te// 'bar ba'i lta bas sangs rgyas lnga// spyan drangs tshon la bstim par bya// oM badz+ra tsitra sa ma ye hUM/ phur bu'i bu ga bkang
441a1(rgyud 'grel): nas// dbang ldan nas brtsams bri ba ste// ma chung ya yo med par bri// dkar po ser po dmar dang ljang // sngon po nang du bri bar bya// shar phyogs su ni dkar ba ste// lho dang nub dang byang dang dbus// ser po dmar po
441a2(rgyud 'grel): ljang dang gnag/ legs par bas nas mtshan ma dgod// dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma ste// sbrul brgyad mjug ma bsnol ba la// nyi ma'i steng du rdo rje che// sngon po rtse lnga bod zer can// shar sogs long che bo zhi la ni// sna tshogs pad steng
441a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed dang / stag dang srin+da mi rnams la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ldan par bya// chu srin steng du zla ba bri// de rnams steng du rdo rje che// rtse mo dgu pa nyid dang ni// tsan ngan phung shing pad+ma dang // rin po che rnams bri bAr bya// shar la
441a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su pad+ma nyi ma'i gang na rnams la// gri gug sbrul gyi pags pa dang // sbal pa'i khrag ldan thod pa dang // gr-i ste mtshan ma bzhi br-i bya// de ltar legs par bri byas la// me tog chal pa bkram nas ni// gzhan yang
441a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyan rnams legs par 'go// de nas rgongs ka'i dus su ni// khrus byas nAng du zhugs byas la// gzhal yas khang bslang shugs 'jug bya// oM badz+ra u tiSh+Tha/ oM badz+ra be gA kr-i ma hUM/ lhag chad bkang ste me tog ni// bcom ldan
441a6(rgyud 'grel): rangs la dpas par bya// de na sgo pa phyir byung ba// dang po sbyor ba'i ti 'dzin laM// gnas nas lha rnams spro bar bya// so sor gnas su gdon bskyed la// bdag gi thugs ka'i sa bon las// zla nyi sa bon ldan spros pas// de las so//
441b1(rgyud 'grel): so'i mtshan mar gyur// de las lha rnams kun rdzogs bsgom// na mkha'i dkyil 'khor bkug nas ni// dkyil 'khor gcig tu bsgom par bya// bdag gi thugs kA'i sa bon la// na mkhar rgyal ba spyan drangs la// mchod bstod gsol
441b2(rgyud 'grel): btab dang nga bskur ba// kun gyi dbu la mi bskyod pa// lha rnams kun gyi gnas gsum du// de nyid gsum gyis byin brlabs bya// de nas me tog la sogs pa'i// mchod pa rnams kyis mchod po stong bya// phyogs skyong la sogs
441b3(rgyud 'grel): gdon tshog sa lA// gtor ma rgya chen sbyin paro bya// de nas zhi ba'i thab khung du// lha rnams sbyin sreg gis tshim // de nas bumau pa so so la// sngar bzhin bzlas pas mnyes par bya// de nas slob dpe na bdog nyid ni// 'jug dang
441b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba yi rim// slob ma'i bzhin du 'dor spyad bya// de nas slob ma gzhug don du// boden pa'i byin brlabs brjod par bya// nA mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma mod pa'i mchog/ sems dpa'i rdo rje che rang bzhin//
441b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sem sa dpa'i bdag 'grub mdzod// kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal// mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag 'grub mdzod// nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod // 'dod chags
441b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi rjes chags pa// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che// bcom ldan de nyid kyis 'grub mdzod// shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdong nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid // byang chub sems
442a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bdag 'grub mdzod// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog/ grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa// rdo rje snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig/ sems nA na kun gyi yid khyab cing // sems/
442a2(rgyud 'grel): can kun gyi snying la zhugs// sems can kun gyi ya gyur cing // 'dod chags dam tshig gyur pa'o// bden pa gang gis ye shes mchog/ shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor yin// bden pa de yis mi gon bdag la// khyod kyis
442a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa rab rdzogs mdzad// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med// gzung du med cing brjod du med// rgyu dang las las kun tu 'byung // de bzhin nyid las nges par skyes// bden pa 'di yis dkyil
442a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du// gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni// kun gyis dri ma med mthong sh+lo ga/ de ltar slob dpon bdag zhugs la// slob ma 'jug pa brtsam par bya// las byed bum pas khrus bya la// ros sngon gdong g.yogs phyi rol dgus
442a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa dag pa gang yin smos// bdag ni skal bzang zhes brjod de// de nas slob dpon phyag byas la// dga' chen khye de bdag ston pa byas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa// mgon
442a6(rgyud 'grel): bo chen po bdag la gsol// dam tshig de nyid bdag la gsol// de ltar lan gsum gsol btab la// me tog thogs pa'i slob ma yis// sdig pa bshags la sogs po bya// slar yang gsol ba gdab bya ste// gca
442b1(rgyud 'grel): bo bdag la sdom pa gsol// thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa// sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bA yis// slob dpon dpang du gnas pa la// sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba'i// mi ldog pa la 'khor lo sbyor//
442b2(rgyud 'grel): thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog// gabang chen po 'dun pa gyisa.asdus pas ni// slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod// mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba// skal po chen po bdag la gsol// mtshan rnam sa kun gyis rgyas btab cing // de pe
442b3(rgyud 'grel): byad rnams dang yang dog ldan// sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba'i// slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol// dbang bskur chen po rmad byung ba'i// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyi// slob dpon chen po
442b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag la gsol// da nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi// che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni// byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa'o// dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba yi// 'khor lo 'dir ni 'jug par 'tshal// de ltar gsol btab 'dod dam dri//
442b5(rgyud 'grel): gsang chen po yi rigs dgra pa'i// gsang ba chen po yongs 'dzin par// bdag nyid chen po 'dod dam ci// des kyang tshal zhes brjod par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song // 'di
442b6(rgyud 'grel): ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig brtan par 'gyur ba'o// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag/ blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar bya// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do// slob dpon dag kyang gzung
443a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i// sngo pa dam tshig yin par gsungs// rin chen rigs mchog chen po la// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// zang zing mi 'jigs
443a2(rgyud 'grel): chos dang byams// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu byin// phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya// 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la//
443a3(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa thams cad ljon par ni// yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya// gzhan yang bcu pozhi 'di dag ni// phas pham par ni rab tu bshad// spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste// rtsa ba'i ltung bar shes par
443a4(rgyud 'grel): bye/ nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// nyin re zhing ni bzla bar bya// gang tshe nyams gyur rnal 'byor pa// kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur// khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya// ma byin par yong mi blang ngo // 'dod pa log par
443a5(rgyud 'grel): mi spyod cing // brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o// phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba ste// chang ni rnam par spang bar bya// sems can 'dul phyir ma gtogs pa// bya ba ma yin thams cad spang // dam po nye bar bstan bya zhing // rnal 'byor pa la
443a6(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen bkar bya// lus kyis las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang // yid kyis rnam pa sum dag ni// ci nus par ni rjes su spong // theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya// sems can rnams la rgyab phyogs min//
443b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba dag kyang yong mi spang // rtag tu mya ngan 'da' mi chags// lha dang lha min gsang ba pa// khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing // phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang // mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya zhing // 'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad//
443b2(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya// des kyang 'di skad brjod bya ste// slob dpon 'di ni bdag la gson// gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa// de ltar bdag ni bgyid 'tshal zhes// ji ltar gzung bzhin khas blang bya// de nas slob ma sems
443b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed de// oM sarba yo ga tsit+ta uta pA dA yA mi/ de nas snying gar rdo rje ni// sngags 'dis rab tu gzhag par bya// su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM ho badz+ra sid+d+hi ya thA su khaM/ de nas slob ma lhar bskyed la// dri la sogs pa lngas mchod bya// me tog
443b4(rgyud 'grel): thogs pa'i slob ma yis// bla ma yon gyis mnyes byas la// las byed bum pas dbang bskur te// gung mo sa me tog gzung byas la// sgo bzhi nas bcug shar du gnas// deng khyed de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su
443b5(rgyud 'grel): zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs po thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang 'thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis/ khyod ni dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong
443b6(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams la smra ba ra ma byed cig/ dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas sngags 'dis chu 'thung gzhug rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi// snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzad// gal te tshul 'di sman ni// de ma thag tu dral te
444a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs// oM badz+ro da ka tha/ de nas brtsams te khyod kyis phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ de nas
444a2(rgyud 'grel): gdam ngag ji lta ba// slob ma'i rgyud la dbab par bya// legs par babs par shes pa dang // 'di ltar bdag gi slob ma ni// dkyil 'khor du ni legs bcug nas// 'di yi bsod noms ci 'dra las// lho yi rim bzhin 'bab par
444a3(rgyud 'grel): shog/ 'di ni dngos grub gang gyur dang // rigs ni gang gi snod gyur dang // bsod nams mthun ci yod dang // dkyil 'khor 'dir ni de ba zhin 'gyur// de nas me tog bcom ldan gyi// dbu la brtan pas dor bar bya// pra tIts+tsha
444a4(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra ho// dor te me tog slar bcings nas// pra ti gr-ih+Na la sogs brjod// dngos grub gang 'grub mtshan ma ni// ci zhig mthong zhes dri bar bya// sngags 'dis gdong g.yogs grol byas te// oM rdo rje sems dpa' khyod la dang // mig
444a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byed pa lA brtson par mdzad// mig ni thams cad 'byed 'tshal te// rdo rje mig ni bla na med// he badz+ra pA shwa/ de nas lha rnams legaso bstan la// dbyung bskur ba ni brtsam par bya// slob ma bzhag ste lhag byos la// gnas
444a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum de nyid gsum 'god de// dri la sogs pa lngas mchod bya// bkra shis brjod cing bum pa yis// chu yis dbang bskur sbyin par bya// oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ sa bon lnga las smyos pa yi// cod pan mgo bor bcings byas la//
444b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang // de ring khyod la bskur bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi rab gu ba phyir// rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis longs// oM badz+ra a d+hi pa tis+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M// rdo rje dang ni dril bu gnyis// 'khyud pa'i
444b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul du 'dzin du gzhug/ de nas rdo rje dril bu gnyis// slob ngo pan spyi bor gzung ba la// badz+ra satwa s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha badz+ra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ kyai dpal phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa zhes/ ming 'dis dpe nga bskur/
444b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// dbang bskur phyir ni gsol ba gdab// bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir// rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur ba// thugs rje can khyod bka' drin gyis// bdag lnga di ring sAl du gsol// de
444b4(rgyud 'grel): ltar gsol bta bA hUM las ni// rdo rje rab tu bskyed byos la// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba tsha// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snying po bdag po'i gtso// bco ma ldan 'das
444b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o// a las dril bu bskyed byas te// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad// byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed// slob ma'i
444b6(rgyud 'grel): lag tu sbyin pa la// srid pa'i rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir// rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems ldan pas// sred pas dag pa'i mchog tu byed// de ltar brjed la dkrol bar bya// yid kyi lus ni
445a1(rgyud 'grel): brtan pa'i phyir// dam tshig phyag rgya zhes byar brjod// gang gis lus kun rten byed pa// de nas phyag rgyur rab tu grags// de rjes dkyil 'khor dag pa dang // lha yi rnam dag slob dpon gyi// bya ba'i rim
445a2(rgyud 'grel): ba legs par brlab// de nas gser gyi thor thogs te// de nas mig mkhan rgyal po yI// 'jig rten ling tog gsal ba ltar// bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i// rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsngal// oM badz+ra nai ta a pa ha ra ba Ta laM hI// de
445a3(rgyud 'grel): nas me long rab bstan la// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med// gzung du med cing brjod du med// rgyu dang las las kun tu 'byung // rang bzhin dag phyir bdag med pa// de ltar chos rnams
445a4(rgyud 'grel): shes byas nas// sems can don ni mnyam med byos// 'on kyang sangs rgyas smras su skyes// a yis dri li bur rab byin la// thams cad na mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med// nam mkha' dad mnyam
445a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba yis// kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal// ho yis mda' drug ga zhu byin la// de bzhin gshegs rnams mnyes gyis zhes// brjod la mda' drug 'phen du gzhug/ badz+ra satwa sa me long bstan// rdo rje sems dpa'
445a6(rgyud 'grel): me long bzhin// gsal zhing dag la rnyog po med// bu khyod kyi ni snying la gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid gtso// rkang pa'i bar du 'khor lo ni// badz+ra he tu sa bcug byas laM// oM b+ha She raM gyis ni// lag pa g.yas par dung
445b1(rgyud 'grel): byin la// g.yon par po ti legs sbyin la// de nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa// tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// khyod kyis the tshom dogs med par// yid gnyis med pa'i sems kyis su// chos kyi dung ni bla med pa// dri med kun
445b2(rgyud 'grel): tu gang bar gyis// sngags mchog tshul gyis gdug pa rnams// skye bo rnams kyis don du chos// de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la// phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang // khyod lha rtag du bsrung bar byed// som
445b3(rgyud 'grel): can kun la phan pa'i phyir// sems can ma lus thams cad la// ji ltar 'dul gyur sna tshogs pa// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskur// de bzhin rdo rje rin chen pad// las kyi 'khor lo'i rjes gnang sbyin// de nas lung bstan dbugs
445b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung sogs// ji skad gsungs bzhin sbyin par bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug/ rtag tu khyod kyis gzung bar bya// phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi/ badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha ta/ d+ha
445b5(rgyud 'grel): ra ya mi hi hi hi hi hUM/ zhes pas brtul zhu gas sbyin par bya// de nas 'byor pa'i yon bdag gis// bla ma rjes su mnyes par bya// zhi ba yi ni thab khung du// sbyin sreg gis ni tshim par bya// de nas rdul chen la sogs ni// 'dod pa'i mi
445b6(rgyud 'grel): la sbyin pa 'am// chu bo chen por dor bar bya// klu rigs kun gyi dgrar gyur pa'o// gos sngon dkyil 'khor cho ga byas// 'di la 'khrul pa mthong na yang // mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par mdzod// 'di byas dge ba gang thob pa// des ni 'gro ba
446a1(rgyud 'grel): ma lus pa// rdo rje can gyi zhal mthong nas// sdug bsngal mtsho las sgrol bar shog/ phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ slob dpon chen po stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin snying rje'i zhal snga nas
446a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta don yod pa'i rdo rje dang / bod rtsi lo tsA ga khams po ba ri dge slong rin rkyen grags pas bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra kro d+ha d+ha ra sA d+ha nA ma khong
446a3(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ khro bo rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ bla ma rje btsun pa'i zhabasA la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor pa la gnod pa yi// 'byung po'i tshe rigs rnams bsrung ba'i phyir// rdo rje 'dzin mchog sgrub pa'i thabs// 'bad pa'i blo
446a4(rgyud 'grel): yis bsgrub par bya// dang por ste na bde la 'dug ste// skad cig gcig gis rdo rje 'dzin// khro bo'i rgyal por bskyed pa yi// snying ka'i sa bon 'phros pa las// 'gro ba sbyang ba rnam gosum bya// mchod pa'i lha rnams spyan drangs te// mnyes
446a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don du lus sprul bya// snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i// mchod pa rnam pa lnga dag kyang // spro bsdu'i tshul gyis brgyan par bya// oM badz+ra sa man+ta a ga ba badz+ra puSh+paM hUM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM badz+ra daM be hU~M/ badz+ra gan d+he hUM/ badz+ri ne be d+ye hUM/ shab+ta hUM/ de nas
446a6(rgyud 'grel): pus mo sar bcugs to// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas kyang // rab tu gus pas 'di brjod bya// bsags sdig ji snyed bshags par bgyi// tshogs rnams kun la rjes yi rang // zab mo'i 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// mya ngan mi 'da' gzhugs
446b1(rgyud 'grel): su gsol// dge ba thams cad mchog tu bsngo// lus nyid kyang ni rnam par dbul// byang chub sems ni rab bskyed bya// bdag gis rdzogs sangs rgyas thob shog/ de nas byams dang snying rje dang // dga' dang btang snyoms bsgom par bya// de
446b2(rgyud 'grel): nas snod bcud rnam par sbyang // oM a kA ro mu kham sArba d+har+m+ma NAM A d+ya nu ta pan na tata/ zhes brjod pas choso thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom mo// hUM las rgya gram dra pa'i mchog/ pad+ma zla ba'i steng dag tu// hUM las rdo rje'i skur bskyed bya/
446b3(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra hrI ka ra zhes pas// rab tu 'jigs pa'i khro bo ni// in+d+ra nI li'i kha daM gau tsan// zhal gcig spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i bzhin// sma ra mgo skyes ser la mdzes// sbrul sngon za zhing mche ba gtsigs// g.yas na rdo rje gdeng se pa'o chu yaM//
446b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste// sbrul nag se ral kha ru bzung // A la la yi gad mo sgrogs// klu brgyad dag gis brgyan po'i sku// pad+ma'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// stag gis pags pas smad dkris pa// brgyan la ye
446b5(rgyud 'grel): shes sems bsgom bya// sa bon bod kyi sa mchog bkug nas// grong gi mchod pas mnyes byas te// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dri yat+na brjod// oM na ma swA hA rI shuk+Sho pAM yaM na ma shrud kri badz+ra pA NI nA maHsa ron pi sarba wa shAn+thi Sha ka ri hi he he/
446b6(rgyud 'grel): dzaHhUM baM hoHsa gnyis med nas/ lha mo bzhi las dbang blangs pa'i// rtags ni mi bskyod co do pan rtsar// yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs/ yid bzhin 'khor lo'i bzlas pa ni// tad+ya thA b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes bya bi nis// rata na pa
447a1(rgyud 'grel): ya ti swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// sgra che ma yin chung ma yin// rang bzhin gsal ba'i bzlas pa ni// mi skyo bar du ci bded bya// de nas spro bsdu ji snyed pa'i// mtha' la bsdu ba byas nas kyang // stong pa nyid du bsgom
447a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// slar la bskyed la phyag rgya dgrol// oM AHhUM muHde nas spyod pa ci bder spyad// dam tshig nga rgyal gtang mi bya/ de thun bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// brtson par byas na nges par 'gro ba// dad ldan bla ma ldan pa dang // dbang
447a3(rgyud 'grel): dang dom tshig ldan po la// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin mchog gi/ mchog gi dngos grub nyer rnyed 'gyur// blo rgyal rdo rje 'dzin mchog gi/ sgrub thabs ngom pa 'di nyid ni// bdag gis brtsam par mi rigs kyang // rgyud 'brel dgongs
447a4(rgyud 'grel): pa las btus byas// 'di las byung ba'i dge ba yis// 'gro rnams rdo rje 'dzin par shog/ khro bo rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / slob dpon pa su d+ha badz+ras mdzad pa'i// de nas yang dag
447a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad bya ba// so gzhi shin tu legs pa la// thab khung rgyur ni khru gang zhing // zabs su khru phyed brkos pa dag/ kha khyer sor gzhi gnyis dor bya// ba yi rnam pa lnga yis byugs// kha dog dkar po byas nas kyang // dr-i dkar 'o ma
447a6(rgyud 'grel): me tog dor// dkyil du rdo rje sor brgyad pa// nang du rdo rje bskor nas kyang // tha ma me yi 'od zer can// bya ba thab khung rim pa'o// tsan dan pa lon dag dang // byang chub shing dang n+ya gro d+ha// dri bzang so dri zhim pa yi shing // srog chags
447b1(rgyud 'grel): med cing ma rul ba// gsar pa khru gang tshad la nI// 'o ma sbrang rtsi bran nas kyang // dri zhim pa yi chu yis gtor// thab kyi kho ra khor yug tu// ku sha rtse mo phyir bstan pa// bkram la bud shing rtsig par bya// thab pas mtho na nyes par 'gyur// de
447b2(rgyud 'grel): ni bud shing rim pa'o// rtse mo'i cha las byung ba yi// yam shing sor ni bcu gnyis la// gsar zhing 'dab ma bcas pa dang // drang zhing bla skams medo pa ste// skyon dang bral ba'i yam shing la// mngar gsum dkar gsum dag gis
447b3(rgyud 'grel): bran// dri yi tshogs kyis bsangs nas kyang // mchod pa'i don du g.yas su gzhag/ da ni yam shing rim pa'o// dkar gsum mngar gsum 'bras chan dang // 'bras thug lag pan la du dang // sman sna tshogs dang gza' ba'i rdzas//
447b4(rgyud 'grel): til la sogs pa ji snyed kun+ta// bsreg pa'i don du g.yas su gri zhag/ mar khu rdo rje dril bu dang // dgang gzur blugs gzar mdun du'o// me tog spos dang mar mo dri// bshos gats+tsha ro la mo ji snyed b+ha// mchod pa'i don du g.yon
447b5(rgyud 'grel): du gzhag/ mchod yon las kyi bum pa ni// mnyes dang bas phyir g.yas su gzhag/ mchod rdzas sreg rdzas rim pa'o// de nas skad cig lhar bskrad la// dus nas brtsams te mngon rtogs kyis// cho ga'i rim pa ji snyed pa// sgrub
447b6(rgyud 'grel): thabs bzhin du bsgom par bya// de ni rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyi// mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa'o// de nas tha ba ni bsang byas la// a las pad+ma'i gzhal yas khang // dkar zhing zlum pa mdzes pa bskyed// baM las chu yi dkyil 'khor
448a1(rgyud 'grel): te// de steng paM las pad+ma'o// a dang ma las nyi ma'i gdan// hUM las rdo rje dkar po ste// der bskyed pa ni rdo rje 'dzin// zhu bar raM las gru gsum me// de nas me lha'i rgyal po ni// dkar zhing zhi la sgeg pa ste// zhal gcig phyag bzhi
448a2(rgyud 'grel): skyil krung phyed// chu yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing // tshangs pa'i skud pa ser la bzang // g.yas ni dbyug pa spyi blugs te// g.yon na phreng ba ku ma ta// dbu rgyan la sogs rgyan rab mdzes// bskyed la ye shes me lha dgug/ gong ltar mchod pas
448a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyes byas la// dze hUM baM hos dgug gzhug bya// dbang bskur ba deng byin brlab pa// mchod pas rab tu mnyes byas nas// bstod pas rgyal po 'di dag kyang // rdo rje dril bu ldan pas kyang // glu dang ljon pas bstod pa bya// hUM me lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa mchog
448a4(rgyud 'grel): gi sras// me lha'i rgyal po dag gis dbang bskur ba// shes rab mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad bsreg/ 'dzin byed ma lha nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod// dA nas dgang gzar blugs gzar ni// lag pa g.yas gi yon thogs nas kyang // me lha
448a5(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i zhal nyid du// sngags 'di dag gis bsreg par bya// oM badz+ra ag+na ye ma hA b+hU ta dz+wA la ya sarba b+hasmiM ku ru sarbo daSh+TAM hUM phaT/ na mche ge mo zhes bya ba 'di/ shAM ting+ga ru ye swA hA/ brgya rtsa brgyad dam lnga bcu ste// nyi shu lnga 'am bdun du dbul// da
448a6(rgyud 'grel): ni ni me lha'i rim pa'o// de nas me lha'i thugs ka'i nang // pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan steng du// hUM las rdo rje sngon po ste// de las rdo rje 'dzin pa ni// mngon par rtogs pa'i cho ga bzhin// gsel ba nyid du bskyed par bya// de nas mchod pas mnyes byas nas//
448b1(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa dag kyang rab tu brjod// de nas bsreg rdzas dbul ba ni// rtsa ba'i sngags kyi 'ba' zhig la// sreg sngags 'di dag btags la dbul// oM sarba pu dza me g+ha rat+na a gar+b+ha/ na ma che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di shAM ti d+hu ru swA hA/ ji snyed spros pa phul nas
448b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang // de nas mchod bstod yang byas te// gshegs dang bzod pa gsol nas kyang // bsngo dang smon lam gdab par bya// oM AHhUM muHye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol// dam tshig ring gi snying gar bsdu// mchod dang bsreg pa'i
448b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzas rnams ni// lhag ma ji snyed yod pa yis// me lha mnyes par yang byas te// mchod pa la sogs gong bzhi no// ye shes me lha ga shegs su gsol// dam tshig 'bar ba'i rnam par bstim// bdag gis sbyin sreg sbyar ba yis// dngos grub
448b4(rgyud 'grel): myur du 'grub gyur cig/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so// / slob dpon chen po ba su d+ha badz+ra sa mdzad pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra d+hA ra ba lo bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtor ma'i
448b5(rgyud 'grel): tshig zhes bya ba/ bla ma rje btsun pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// las rnams kun gyi sngon 'gro ba// bshad phyir tha ma la gtud de// thams cad tshim par byed pa yi// gter ma'i cho ga de bshang bya// de la dang por rdo rje 'dzin// sgrub par
448b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag gis/ rin po che las snod rgya che la bzang la ma nyams pa de dag gi nang // 'bras chan la sogs pa chan gyi tshogs dang / khur ba la sogs pa bza' ba'i tshogs dang / nya sha la sogs pa sha'i tshogs
449a1(rgyud 'grel): dang / 'o ma la sogs pa btung ba'i tshogs dang / bu ram la sogs te myang ba'i tshogs dang / bil ba la sogs te shing tog gi tshogs dang / til la sogs pa 'bru'i tshogs dang / ut+pa la sogs te me tog gi cho ga
449a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / a ka ru la sogs te bdug pa'i tshogs dang / rin po che la sogs te snang ba'i tshogs dang / da ru ka dang dri zhim sbyar ba la sogs te dri'i tshogs dang / ga bur la sogs te sman gyi tshogs dang / rol mo dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
449a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / ba dan dang / ras bzang po la sogs pa ci 'byor pa'i yo byad bshams te/ maN+Dal sngon po dag gi steng du me tog chal pa bkram la de'i steng du bzhag par bya'o// de nas rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid mngon par rtogs pa'i cho ga ltar bskyed la/
449a4(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil du d+hi sbyar ba'i chu blugs lo/ oM sarba big+h+nAn nA sha ya a mri ti kuN+Da li ha na hA na hUM/ zhes lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu brjod do// oM a big+ha nAM ta kr-it+ta hUM phaT/ zhes pas gtor ma lan gsum du bya'o// de nas yo ga traM
449a5(rgyud 'grel): ser po las bskyed pa'i snod kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du/ rdzas dngos po dpag tu med pa bsams te/ de'i steng du zla ba'i hUM gis mtshan pa dag gi 'od kyis bsregs shing sbyangs pa'i bdud rtsi'i dngos por gyur par bsam mo// de nas thugs
449a6(rgyud 'grel): ka'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas/ bdud rtsi 'o ma rgyun lta bu 'bab pas snod gang bar bsams la oM AHhUM/ zhes lan bdun brjod pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas snying
449b1(rgyud 'grel): ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan drangs la badz+ra dzi ha zhes byin gyis brlabs la sngags 'di lan bdun brjod la dbul bar bya'o// oM badz+ra pA Ni d+hA rA yA/ kA ya bAk+tsit+ta d+hU ba/ puSh+pa/ dI pa/ gan+d+he ba li/ ar+g+ha tA ba la~M
449b2(rgyud 'grel): ma da mAM sa i daM gr-ih+Na khA hi khA hi d+huny+tsA ho/ pi ba ho/ a ti kra ma ye swA hA/ de nas thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis khams gsum gyi 'byung po'i cho gas ma lus pa bkug ste/ oM badz+re hUM ka ra ka Ta ka Ta ka Ta phaT/ ces byi bas sbyang ngo // de
449b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rdo rje 'dzin gyi ngo bor 'gyur bar bsams te/ yi ge gsum bkod la lce byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas oM a kA r-i mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM Ad+ya nut+pan+na tuta/ oM AHhU~M phaT swA hA zhes lan gsum brjod do// de nas 'byung
449b4(rgyud 'grel): po'i tshitshogs de dag mnyes par gyur nas/ rgyal bar gyur cig ces brjod par bsam mo// de nas lag tu me tog thogs te/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btabi la/ bzod pa gi sol ba ni/ hUM lhag pa dang ni chad pas kyang // bdag
449b5(rgyud 'grel): gis brjed des gang bgyis pa// mgon po khyed kyis bzod mdzad nas// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub gsol/ zhes brjod la/ oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol// sangs rgyas
449b6(rgyud 'grel): yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol// oM AHhUM muHzhes pas gshegs su gsol// de nas phyag rgya dkrol te/ gtor ma gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su bskyal/ ci bider gnas par bya'o// rdo
450a1(rgyud 'grel): rje 'dzin pa mchod pa'i phyir// mchod sbyin 'di brtsams bsod nams kyis// 'gro ba thams cad rgyas gyur te// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob shog/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogs so//
450a2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon pa su b+ha badz+ra sa mdzad pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ karma sArba rak+Sha bid+d+hi nA ma/ bsrung ba'i tshogs las thams cad pA zhes bya ba/ bla ma rje btsun pa rnams lnga phyag 'tshal lo// nang dang gnod bzhi pa dang // mi
450a3(rgyud 'grel): mthun thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir// bsrung ba'i dam pa'i rim pa 'di// phan phyir bdag gis bshad par bya// de la rdo rje 'dzin pa sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag gis// dben pa'i sau phyogs su maN+Dal logs re la khru ra yod pa/ gru
450a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa 'phangs su sor brgyad po/ ngos shin tu mnyam pa brtsigs la/ de la po'i rnam pa lngas byug pa bya'o// de'i steng du can ngan dang gur ku mA la sogs pa'i dri bzang po rnams kyis snyoms par byug par bya'o// de'i steng du me tog
450a5(rgyud 'grel): dri dang kha dog dang ldan pas legs par spungs te/ de'i steng du bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bzhugs su ga sol ba ni/ ras sem gos bzang li bri ba'i/ gur kum chu yis 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad mu khyud gnyis bcas la// rgya gram
450a6(rgyud 'grel): nang du chud pa bri// oM dang swA hA'i bar dag tu// na mo ming dang spel ba ni// dri sna tshogs kyi thig la byas// lte ba dag tu dgod par bya// tsan dan la sogs rnam pa brgyad// oM hUM phaT mthar bsres pa ni// rtsibs brgyad dag la
450b1(rgyud 'grel): rims bzhin no// mu khyud nang gi ri pa la// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di kA ya bA ga tsit+ta A yu She dzi baM shAM de dza sarba rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ nang du lta ba'i tshul gyis bri// phyi rol mu khyud yang de bzhin// mtshal dang dngul gyi khu
450b2(rgyud 'grel): ba yis// g.yas g.yon dag tu bri bar bya// ka/ ba ga g+he nga/ tsa tshi dza dz+hanya/ Ta rba ra D+ha tau/ ta thad d+he na/ pA pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra laM wa/ sha Sha sa ha kAMH/ da ha TaD+haM/ a A i I u U r-i rA l-i l-I/ e aM o au aM aHdwe nas 'khor lo da?
450b3(rgyud 'grel): ngag nyid// rdo rje 'dzin par bskyed pa ste// dgug gzhug mchod bstod byas nas kyang // 'khor lo'i ngo bor gyur ba bsam// rtsa ba ming dang bsrung ba'i sngags// spel ba'i bzlas pa stong du bya// zhes 'byung ba'i phyir/ cho ga'i rim
450b4(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di dag las nyams par mi bya'o// 'di dag gis ni brgya byin la sogs pa gnod pa ches tsha ba dag kyang ma lus par bsrung bar 'gyur ro// dus ma yin par 'chi ba dag kyang ma lus par bsrung bar 'gyu ro// dus ma yin
450b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'chi ba dag kyang nges par bzlog par 'gyur ro// sngags mkhan 'di dag ni tshangs spyod kyi dka' thub kyis gnas par bya'o// ches brgyad nas brtsams te bco lnga'i bar gyis cho ga'i rim pas ji lta bar bya'o// bcu drug
450b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba mnyes pa'i mchod ston bya'o// sgo gsum gnod pa bsrung ba'i phyir// bdag gi sgo bsrung mchog la legs sbyangaso// 'di la nye bar gzhol ba rnams// mi mthun thams cad zhi bar shog/ laso thams cing ba'i
451a1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / slob dpon pa su d+ha badz+ras mdzad pa'o// rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa prad+d+ha brI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ ni
451a2(rgyud 'grel): ba ra b+hA ra badz+ra pa tI kro b+ha rA dza badz+ra sA d+ha naM/ bong skad du/ khro bo'i rgyal po phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can sgrub pa'i thabs/ phyag na rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo// g.yen brkyang gar gyis ri bo 'dzin pa la// legs bzhugs khro rgyal klu dgra
451a3(rgyud 'grel): de btus nas// de bsnyen cho ga bla ma bzang po las// ji ltar 'ongs pa bdag nyid dran par bri// de la khro bo'i bdag po yang dag par bsnyen par 'dod po'i rnal 'byor pas tho rangs nyid du gdong bkru ba la sogs pa byas nas bsam gtan gyi sa la
451a4(rgyud 'grel): mye tog gcal du bkram pas dga' bar byas pa'i dbus su stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ rang gri snying gaR+Sha yi ge hUM sngon po bsams la/ de'i 'od kyis rje btsu na bla ma dang / sangs rgyas dang rgyal ba'i sras thams cad bskul te/ de dag
451a5(rgyud 'grel): gi mdun du yang dag par mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshogs pa la stsogs bya'o// de'i 'og tu oM shU n+ya tI dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ohaM/ tshig gi don dang bcas par stong pa nyid du rnam par bsam mo// de nas rang gi snying

451b2(rgyud 'grel): su gyur pa las/ kha dog sngon po cher 'bar ba// rab tu khros shing 'dug pa ste// g.yon brkyang ba yis legs brten pa// bcu drug lo lon lta bu la// rab tu khros pa'i lta stangs can// lto 'phye brgyad kyis rnam brgyan cing // zla ba'i
451b3(rgyud 'grel): gdan la legs bzhugs te// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste// g.yas na rdo rje rtse lnga po// bsnun pa'i tshul gyis legs gzung zhing // g.yon pa sdigs mdzub 'dzin mdzad pa// smad g.yogs sngon po legs bsnams shing // spyan
451b4(rgyud 'grel): dmar mche ba rnam gtsigs pa// nyi ma'i 'od can mgo skes ni// dmar ser gyen phyogs cod pan cani// ha ha 'o dong chen po yis// log 'dren sogs pa skrag byed pa// 'jigs byung khro bo'i bdag por ni// bdag nyid rnam par

452a1(rgyud 'grel): spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim par ji srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du bsgom pa bya zhing skyo bar gyur na sngags bzlas par bya ste/ skyen pa dang bul ba dang shin tu gsal ba dang mi gsal ba yang ma yin pa'i rnam par

452a3(rgyud 'grel): po Sh+yo me b+ha bA/ sarba sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me tsit+taM shre yaH/ ku ru hUM \u0f7fhA da ha ha hoHb+ha ga ban/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ badz+ra mA me muny+tsa/ badz+ri b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa A/ zhes bya bas lhag pa dang ma tshang ba dag yongs su rdo rdzogs par

454a3(rgyud 'grel): la zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/ sngagaso rang gzor mi bya/ ngan pa rnams la mi brnyad/ bla ma dang rdo rje spun lo zhe sdang gis mi smad/ mthu rgyas mi bya'o// de ltar sgrub pa'i yan lag bstan nas/ lus kyi kun tu spyod po ni mthun gsum du
