473b3(rgyud 'grel): du mchod pa phyogs skyong ba rnams la phyis mchod pa bya'o// phyogs skyong gi sngags ni dbang ldan lA ru trA ya swA hA/ dbang po la sha kra ya swA hA/ me lha la a ga nA ye swA hA/ gshin rje la be ba sad d+ha ye swA hA/ bden bral la rAk+Sha a d+hi pa ta
473b4(rgyud 'grel): yau swAhA/ tshu lha la bo ru Na yai swA hA/ rlung lta la bA ya~M be swA hU~M/ ku bai ra la yak+Sha si d+ha raM swAt+ma/ sbyin po la kr-i dza~M ki ri swA hA/ sha ba le mo tsa mi ts+yai/ 'byung po la gung gung / gdon rnams kyi ni sar+b+ba drA ba nA gA ya k+Sha rAk+Sha sa a su ri kIn+d+ha ra/ ma
473b5(rgyud 'grel): ge pi shA tsi/ un ma te/ a basma ra/ kata pU ta ne/ ru ru sma ru/ dzA la tiSh+Ta sid+d+ha lo tsa na sar+b+ba ar+b+ba sA d+ha ni swA hA/ zhes pas bsngos la gtang bar bya'o// khyad par gyi 'byung po la gcig sbran par bya'o// gtor ma lhag
473b6(rgyud 'grel): par gnas pa'o// de nas sngar bstan pa'i slob ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa lhag par gnas par 'dod na/ de nas gshegs pa la mchod yon dang / mchod pa phul lo// na bza' re re 'am/ spyir zung gcig phul la/ bde gshegs
474a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i rigs bdag po// rdo rje 'chang ba thugs rje'i gdag/ bdag la mnyes shing dgyes pa dang / byin gyis brlab cing dngos grub gsol zhes gsol ba btab la rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas
474a2(rgyud 'grel): slob ma dgug pa dang / lcags sgrog gis bcing ba dang / rdo rje ser ba'i phyag rgyas bsdigs pa dang / khro bo be con dang stobs po ches dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug pa dang / de nas snga ma bzhin du bdun rnam dag byas la/ slob ma
474a3(rgyud 'grel): khro bo phyag na rdo rje'i bdud rtsi 'khyil par bskyed de/ yi g+he hUM rang rang gi sngags kyis lha'i phyag rgya chen po bsams la/ mA ma kI'i phyag rgyas gnas lngar byin gyis brlab ste/ sor shing dor ba dang / kha lan gsum du bkra ba dang /
474a4(rgyud 'grel): bsrung skud mdud pa gsum pa bcing ba dang / ku sha b+hin+da pas rmi lam brtag pa dang / sems dpa' gtsug tor dang / gzi brjid phung po bskyed pa dang // byams pa'i sngags kyis go cha bskon pa dang / hUM bzhi pa'i sngags dang
474a5(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi bsrung ba dang / spos chus brlan pa'i lag pa mgo la bzhag la rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan bdun bzlas pa dang / de nas slob ma la zab cing rgya che ba'i chos bshad par bya'o// slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o//
474a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas snyan gson dbab par bya ste/ lha rnams kun la gsan par gsol// 'di zhes bgyi ba'i bcom ldan 'das/ rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// bdog ni brtse bar gyur nas su// slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed
474b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// sang ni dkyil 'khor 'dri bar 'tshal// bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa lags// de bas gnang bar mdzad par rigs// sangs rgyas mgon po brtser ldan dang // byang chub sems dpa' brtser
474b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan dang // gang yang gsang sngags lha rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong ba lha rnams dang // / gang yang 'byung po mthu chen dang // gang yang lha yi spyan mnga' ba'i// sangs rgyas bstan la dga' ba
474b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams// bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol// bdag gi mong ni 'di zhes bgyi// sang ni gdugs la dkyil 'khor ni// bzang po ming ni 'di zhes bgyi// yo byad ci 'byor pas 'dri na// bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la//
474b4(rgyud 'grel): thugs ni brtse bar dgongs nas su// tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol/ zhes snyan gsan phab nas/ phyag 'tshol nas bstod do// ste gon gyi lha gshegs su gsol lo//
474b5(rgyud 'grel): sta gon gyi cho ga bsgrub pa rdzogs so// / bsgrub pa chen po dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga byed par 'dod pas/ slob dpon dang slob ma ku sh+ya'i stan dang sngas la nyal/ nang par slob ma lnga snying brtse ba'i phyir/ dkyil
474b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bya ste/ slob ma la rmi lam ci mthong zhes kyang dri bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dang mchod rten dang sku gzugs la sogs pa mthong dge'o// phyag ni rdo dza kune nas btus pa las 'byung ba bzhin du rmi lam brtags nas/
475a1(rgyud 'grel): lam mi shis na gtor ma dang sbyin sreg la sogs pa bya'o// nang par sngar bshad pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gos dkar po gon nas/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags zlos shing / tshon sna lnga'i srad bu sar
475a2(rgyud 'grel): pa gtsang ma mdzes pa/ shin tu ran pa d+ma zhim pa re ga nA bde ba/ legs par bkol ba sbom phra med pa/ 'jur mdud med pa'i thi ga skud la/ dkar po la raM chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin/ dmar po la kaM dmar ser thugs kyi rang
475a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ ser po la aM thub pa byang chub snying po'i rang bzhin ljang khu la paM phyag na rdo rje'i rang bzhin/ sngon po la hUM khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rang bzhin du bskyod la/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya mA tri kra ma hUM zhes bya bas bzlas la/ mchod
475a4(rgyud 'grel): lngas mchod nas thig ga ba por bya'o// thig gi cho ga ni thun mong gi tsho ga las shes par bya'o// srang bu chad na bla ma 'chi// ring thung khyer na na bar 'gyur// phyogs 'khrul slob ma myos par 'gyur// ltos ngan byung ni dngos mi
475a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gru ba/ ces gsungs so// de nas 'byung ba rnam pa lngas sa gzhi kho ra khor yug du chag cha go btab la byug ste/ byung na rin po che'i phye ma 'am/ sA lu'i phye ma 'am/ sa'i phye mas bya'o// de nas tshon rtsi la oM badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM zhes
475a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po phyag na rdo rje'i sngags kyis bsang gtor bya/ mchong ba phul la/ dang po gzugs su bri bar bshad// gnyis pa dag ni phyag rgyar bshod// gsum pa stan dang gnas ngag dang // yig 'bru bri bar
475b1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu bsngags// de la dkyil 'khor dang po lha nyi shu rtsa gcig pa dgod de/ dbus kyi lte ba rtsibs lnga pa la dbus su bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje sngar bshad pa bzhin du bri ba dang / 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/ g.yas su mA ma kI/
475b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste/ mA ma kI'i rtags rdo rje rtsa gsum pa/ byang du rdo rje rtse gsum pa dbyug pa la gtsugs pa/ dbus su rdo rje rtsi gsum pa gnyis chang gzungs drang por 'dug la/ chang gzungs kyi lte ba la dag sta srab mo kha
475b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir bltas pa bri bar bya'o// mdun du skem byed kyi dbyig pa/ rgyab tu gzhin nu'i 'khor lo/ rdo rje rtse gsum pas bskor ba/ de'i phyi rol gyi rtsibs bcu gnyis la/ shar du rgyal ba'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje rtse gsum
475b4(rgyud 'grel): bo me lce 'phro ba/ rdo rje mtshan gyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa shar du dgod do// byang du rdo rje rtags kyis rtsa gsum pa/ bkra shis kyi rdo rje rtsi gcig pa/ shin tu bkra shis kyi rdo rje rtse gsum pa pad+mas mtshan pa'o// lhor pad+ma'i mtshan pad+ma'i
475b5(rgyud 'grel): gdan du kha cung zad bye ba rdo rje rtsa gsum sa dang bcas pa'o// pad+ma phreng gi pad+ma'i sdong bu kha bye ba dbus na rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'o// nub du g.yung drung ris kyis ni gru bzhi bsnol ba'i dbus su g.yung drung 'khyil pa'i rtse mor
475b6(rgyud 'grel): shing tog skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu rin po ches mtshan pa'o// mdung rtse gsum pa/ rdo rje ni kha gnyis pa rdo rje'i ri dbus nas 'bras kyi dbyibs ltar 'dug pa'o// mche ba ni pad+ma'i sdong bu li mche ba gnyis rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'o//
476a1(rgyud 'grel): nang gi sgo bzhir mdung rtse gcig pa dang / sbrul gyi zhags pa me lce dang bcas pa rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa sbrul gyi zhags pa dang bcas pa dang / ral gri bri sa la/ pany+tsa
476a2(rgyud 'grel): ru ga'i rtsig pa dang / 'dod yon gyi snam bu dang / rin po che'i mnga' ya ba dang / dra ba dra ba phyed dang / der yol dang / rta babs dang / rdo rje ri ba me 'od dang bcas pa bri'o// dgod pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni sngar bshad
476a3(rgyud 'grel): zin to// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ni sngar bshad pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya dbus su rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog sngon po khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa/ stog gi pags pa'i
476a4(rgyud 'grel): shamA thabs can/ rig pa mchog las gsungs pa bzhin bsam par bya'o// shar gyi khro bo dkar po rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub/ lho'i khro bo ser po rin po che dang sdigs mdzub/ nub kyi khro bo dmar po pad+ma dang sdigs mdzub/
476a5(rgyud 'grel): byang gi khro bo ljang gu sna tshogs rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o// mtshams bzhi'i sku mdog nag po'o// shar lhor rdo rje'i phur bu bsnams pa'o// lho nub tu rin po che'i phur bu bsnams pa'o// nub byang du pad+ma'i phur bu bsnams
476a6(rgyud 'grel): po'o// byang shar du sna tshogs rdo rje'i phur bu bsnams pa'o// sgor bzhir lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrogs dang / dril bu bsdams pa'o// lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no// lha lnga be ni sku mdog phyag mtshan snga ma
476b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bkod la/ phyogs skyong ba bcu yang sta gon gyi gtor mA'i sngags dang / rdo rje bsnams pa las gung mo myu gu ltar gshibs te/ bsgreng la mthe bo dang / mthe chung so sor bsgrengs la spyi'i phyag rgyas dgod par bya'o// dkyil
476b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bzhi pa gakhru la 'khor yang khro bor bskyed pa'i tshe dbus kyi gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa sku mdog sngon po/ ge yas rdo rje g.yon pa sdigs mdzub/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs bsnams pa/ dbang phyug chen po'i khyo shug mnan
476b3(rgyud 'grel): 'o// thams cad kyang sku mdog nag po'o// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs mnabs pa/ shar du rdo rje be con/ lhor rdo rje 'chol ba rdo rje bsnams pa/ nub tu rdo rje tho ba/ byang du rdo rje lcags kyu/ shar lhor rdo rje lcags sgrog/
476b4(rgyud 'grel): lho nub du rdo rje ser ba/ nu'i byang du rdo rje gnod mdzes byang shar du rdo rje rmongs byed/ shar sgor rdo rje stobs po che/ lho sgor rdo rje bzhad bya/ nub sgor rdo rje seng gA'i gdan/ byung skro rdo rje gtum po// ya so sa ma mchu mnan pa/
476b5(rgyud 'grel): dang rma ra 'bar ba bri bar bya'o// lkog ma ni snga ma bzhin no// yang rdo rje pho nya mo bcus bskor ba'i dkyil lnga bor ni dbus su rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa snga ma bzhin du bris la/ 'khor lo rtsibs ban+d+ha pa'i rtsibs dang po blo gros rdo rje ma
476b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bsnams pa/ gnyis pa rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa/ gsum pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsnams pa/ bzhi pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa be con bsnams pa/ lnga ba rdo rje rol pa rdo rje rtse gcig pa bsnams pa/ drug pa rdo rje ska rags rdo rje
477a1(rgyud 'grel): rtse gsum bsnams pa/ bdun pa rdo rje shugs mda' gzhu bsnams pa/ brgyad pa rdo rje nyi ma rdo rje 'bar ba bsnams pa/ dgu pa rdo rje dbyug pa dbyug to bsnams pa/ ban+d+ha pa rdo rje bden pa sna tshogs rdo rje
477a2(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa bri bar bya ste/ de sgrubs sdigs dang phyag rgya ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya las srin lag nang du bcug la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha badz+ra tAn tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ ces bya bas bri bar bya'o// yang na rdo rje nyid
477a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod de/ bstan pa ni pho nya mo rnams kyi ste/ na mo rat+na tA yA ya/ na mo badz+ra d+ha ra pra ne ma bid+yA ga Na s+ye swA hA/ zhes bya'o// rdo rje pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ shar phyogs suM rdo rje rigs kyi dang po rdo rje 'dzin pa
477a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa mdangs dkar ma/ gsum pa rdo rje rgyal ba/ rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje khu tshur/ rdo rje rtse gcig pa/ rdo rje gdong dmar/ rdo rje 'od zer 'phreng / rdo rje rna cha'i gdong rdo rje dga' byed gdong / rdo rje sde/ rdo rje lag bzang / rdo rje
477a5(rgyud 'grel): khro bo/ rdo rje rtse gcig pa/ rdo rje snying po'i rgyal po/ rdo rje 'jigs byed rnams bzhag par bya'o// lhor rin po che'i rigs rdo rje ska rags rnga dzA klu mgo can/ rdo rje klu 'dzin/ rdo rje yangs pa chen mo/ rdo rje klu chen mo/ rdo rje 'phrog pa/
477a6(rgyud 'grel): rje dga' ba nya dga'/ rdo rje kha 'bar ma/ rdo rje dka' thub bzlog/ rdo rje dbyig pa/ rdo rje 'od zer 'phreng / rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ dpal gyi blo gros/ khro bo ki li ki li ya/ khro bo su ru su ru/ dpal lha mo nub phyogs pad+ma'i rig
477b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ ma tang gi mig/ snu ma'i gdong/ rdo rje rtse mo// skag byed tshan ma/ b+h+r-ing gI ri ti/ rdo rje ser s+ya/ rdu rdza sar sgra/ rdo rje gtsug 'chang / rdo rje lcags sgrogs/ rdo rje sel byed/ rdo rje gdong / na mkha'i gdong / rdo rje gnod 'joms/ rngo
477b2(rgyud 'grel): rje mi bzad pa/ rdo rje 'jigs pa/ rdo rje lu gu rgyudardo rje thog thog rnams bri bar bya'o// byang phyogs su los kyi rigs rdo rje dbyug pa/ 'jigs byeng chen po/ bdud rtsi thabs sbyor/ pad+ma yangs pa/ rdo rje legs pa/ rdo rje dgra
477b3(rgyud 'grel): stardo rje seng ge'i khri/ rdo rje lcags mda'/ rdo rje mtshon cha mchog/ rdo rje mtshon che'i shogs/ mtshon cha'i snying po/ dam tshig chen po/ rdo rje dbyug pa/ rdo rje gtsugra tor/ rdo rje 'dod pa/ rdo rje 'jigs byed rnams bri bar
477b4(rgyud 'grel): byebya'o// rdo rje bo nyid rnams bri bar sngags dang phyag rgya ni sbyar bstan pa'i spyi'i de nyid kyis bya'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor drug byis nas/ gdugs bzhi dang / ba dAn bzhi gur gum dang rgya skyegs las bcos pa shing rings
477b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i rtse mo la gtogs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rdzas dang phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud nas 'byung ba bzhin du bsrung ba'i yan lag/ phyogs bzhir mdo bzhi klog pa dang / mda' bcu dang phur gdab pa dang /
477b6(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dang / mtshon thag btags pa dang / sngar bshad pa bzhin du bsrung ba'i yan lag rnams dang / mchod pa'i rdzas thams cad dang / bum pa dang sbyin sreg dang / gtor ma'i rdzas thams cad bsags la rnal 'byor pa
478a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid sngar bshad pa bzhin du khrus dang gos bgo ba byas nas/ cho ga drag gis lhar bskyed de/ bsrung dang spyan drang sbyang ba dang / phyag rgya bcing dang phyi ra bzlog gnon/ bskang dang tshim par bya/
478a2(rgyud 'grel): nga/ tshar gcad pa dang bskul ba dang / 'khrul 'bor sbyin sreg/ khrus bya ba zhes bshad pa'i cho ge bcu gnyis 'dir yang thams cang rdzogs par byas la bo dag nyid dngos grub bsgrub pa'i slob ma dbang bskur ba'i phyir
478a3(rgyud 'grel): gathams cad spyad par bya'o// de ltar bsnyen pa'i tshe don bcu gnyis ji ltar byos pa bzhin du nye ba'i bsnyen pa la sda bzhin du bya'o// sgrub pa sta gon la yang de bzhin du bya'o// sgrub pa chen po dkyil 'khor gyi zhag don bcu gnyis
478a4(rgyud 'grel): snga cha bzhin du bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor drug gang yang rung ba la/ slob ma dbang bskur ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ de la dang por phyi'i 'jug pa ni sems rab tu dang ba'i slob ma snga ma bzhin du phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang /
478a5(rgyud 'grel): sdigag pa bshags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa bdun rnam dag byas la/ sngar bshad po'i sngags kyis btab pa'i stong g.yo/ 8 / spang g.yo rkang gdong g.yogs bskon la dkyil 'khor gyi
478a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag po'i sngags dang phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag nas sngags lan gsum bzlas nas/ lha'i rigs kyi bsod namos ci 'dra ba de bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur ro// nges dkyil 'khor dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi sngags
478b1(rgyud 'grel): bzlas la me tog 'phangs la gang la phog pa'i lha de ni de'i rigs kyi lhar 'gyur ro// de nas gdong g.yogs dkrol nas dkyil 'khor bstan te/ dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos// da ni ngad pa rab tu bskyed// khyod ni sangs
478b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rigs su bskyed// sngags dang rig pas byin gyis brlabs// 'byor pa thams cad mngon du 'gyur// rten dang dngos grub thams cad kyang // khyod la mngon du phyogs 'gyur gyi// dngos grub thob phyir dam tshig srungs
478b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod par bya'o// de'i tshe me tog dbul lo phog na mchog gi dngos grub 'thob// me tog rked pa la phog na thun mong gis dngos grub 'thob/ me tog rkang pa la phog na 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro// nang
478b4(rgyud 'grel): gi 'jug pa rdzogs nas/ nas dang sbrang rtsi dang 'o ma la sogs zhi ba'am/ yang na rgyas pa/ mngon spyod kyis bgegs bzlog pas dbang ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis btab pa'i
478b5(rgyud 'grel): rten sar pa la bzhag nas/ sgrub pa'i grogs pos bkra shis kyi tshogs su bcad pa 'di skad gdon por bya ste/ gang la ser sna rnam chags bya// rnam bcoms dri ma sel mdzad cing // thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' das//
478b6(rgyud 'grel): khyod la bde legs mdzad par shog/ 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du mdzud mdzad cing // chos rnams thams cad ston pa des// khyod la bde legs mdzad par shog/ ston pa bzhugs pa rnams
479a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gi bde ba mnga' mdzad des// khyod la bde legs mdzad par shog/ skyob pa gang gis byams pa yis// thugs kyi 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin
479a2(rgyud 'grel): durturtag bskyangs des// khyod la bde legs mdzad par shog/ gang zhig pakhor bar 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing // gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa ste// khyod la bde legs mdzad par shog/ gang zhig/
479a3(rgyud 'grel): chos kun mngon sum gyur// gtsang zhing bslu ba mi mnga' la// gsung gtsang gtsang bar mdzad pa ste// khyod la bde legs mdzad par shog/ dpa' bo chen po gar skyes par// phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing // don
479a4(rgyud 'grel): grub tshogs kyang grub bya ste// khyod la bde legs mdzad par shog/ gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni// nogs tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing // sems can thams cad rab dga' byed// khyod la bod logs mdzad
479a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ra shog/ byang chub snying por gong zhig gis// sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cig/ bdud yid mi bder gyur pa ste// khyed la bde legs mdzad par shog/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor po na// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
479a6(rgyud 'grel): gsung ba// thu bo pa'i bstan pa gang 'byung ste// khyed la bde legs mdzad par shog/ sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad// brgya byin bcas pa'i lha rnams dang // 'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni// khyed la rtag tu sbyin
479b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang // lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis// khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa// don de de ring 'grub 'gyur shog/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang pazhi
479b2(rgyud 'grel): khyed cag bde legs shog/ khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs gyur// phyir 'ong dag kyang bde logs gyur// nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs// nyi ma gung lA blade legs shog/ khyed cag kun tu bang legs
479b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// khyed cagra sdig par mi gyur cig/ tsas bkra shis brjod nas/ cho ga drug gi lhar bskyed nas gnas sngar byin gyis brlabs nas dkyil 'khor gyi sngags bzlas pa'i gdugs bteg la khro bo gnod mdzes kyi
479b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas pa'i bdug pas bdug cing rnga yab kyi g.yabs la glu dang sil snyan dang / rnga brdungs nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha kun la gsol ba btab la/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sngags btab pa'i bum pas lan gsum
479b5(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba byed du bcug la/ chu'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas phyag rgya bcing ba dang / sngags bzlas pas spyi bor gtug par bya'o// de nas gos sar pa bskon nas cong ba na dang rgyan btags pa dang / dkyil
479b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi phyag mtshan g.yas pa g.yas par sbyin/ g.yon pa g.yon par byin la/ de nas slob dpon gyis me tog gi phreng ba spyi bor gzhag la ming gdags par bya'o// de nas seng ge'i khri'i kham
480a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhag la/ gdugs dang rgya lnga mtshan bsgrengs nas/ rin po che sna dang bAk+Sha shris rdzas brgyud dang lha rnams kyis phyag mtshan dang bcas pa byin la/ rang gi ming dang lung bstan pa dang / gzeng
480a2(rgyud 'grel): bstong pa dang / dbugs dbyung bar bya'o// de nas sngags kyi gnang ba gi wang dum gur gru mi g+ni lI gaM bris la slob dpon mnya ma du lan bdun gyi bar du bklag par blo'o// des sngags kyis gnang po thob par 'gyur ro//
480a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor mthong nas dbang bskor ba ni rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ slob dpon go 'phang thob pa'i phyir// dang po'i dbang du bsgrags pa yin// rig sngags thams cad grub pa'i phyir// gnyis pa'i dbang du bshad pa yin//
480a4(rgyud 'grel): bgegs ni rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir// gsum pa rab tu bsgrags pa yin// bzhi pa sbyor ba thob pa'i phyir// cho ga bzang po dri bshad ngo // zhes gsungs so// bum pa'i dbang bskur ba dang po'o// rig sngags bzlas bla
480a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'o// bgegs rnams zhi ba gsum pa'o// dpal 'phel ba ni bzhi pa'o zhes gsungs pas// ngan song gsum du mi ltung dang // mi khom pa brgyad spangs pa dang // tshe rebs dran zhing longs spyod che// tshul khrims
480a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan zhing gzugs dang bzang // rtag tu mi dang lha rnams kyi// mtho ris gnas su skye bar shog/ ces smon lam yang gdab par bya'o// gal te sdom pa 'dzin par mi nus pa'am/ nad pa'am bar chad nang du 'byung ba 'am/
480b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po'i log 'dren gyis zin pa 'am/ rig pa mchog las gsungs pa'i gdon rnams kyis gtses pa la khrus kyi cho ga bya ste/ bdud rtsi 'khyil par bskyed la gnas byin gyis brlab ste/ lha rnams kyi sngags bzlos
480b2(rgyud 'grel): shing yungs kar gyis brab pa dang / rma bya'i sgo'i dbus su phyag rgya bcings pa ni du ba la zhes bya bas dkyil gakhor gyi sngags bzlos shing byab pa dang / ru ra go sha gdong gro cig pa'i rin po che rma med pa lus la btags nas
480b3(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la gsol ba gdab par bya'o// mgon po thugs rje'i chang ba'i lha// rig sngags rgyal po dge ba can// gnod pa thams cad zhi ba'i phyir// mgon po khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs
480b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzod ces brjod la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sngo bar bya ste/ bdag gis dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis// 'jig rten du ni sangs rgyas myur bar shog/ 'gro la phan phyir chos rnams ston byed cing // sems can sdug
480b5(rgyud 'grel): la mang po'i gzir las grol zhes dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang / bzod par gsol bar bya ste/ gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas shes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i sngags ridang
480b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor lha bum pa'i lha dang gcig tu bsres la/ rma bya'i sgros dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rnams phyis nas khrus kyi gzhong pa bzhag ste/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thugs rje can gyi thabs tshan
481a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi/ zhi yang sems can don du ni// dri ma med pa'i khro bor gyur zhes bstod la bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags rings kyis kyang mtshams gcang gnas sbyar rdo rjes gtug cing byin gyis brlab/ sems
481a2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' gtsug tor dang / gzi brjid phung po bskyed par bya ste/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzod spyir gso lnga ste/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pu dza zhes bya bas mdzod spu bskyed par bya'o// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug
481a3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i phyag rgya spyi bor bcings te/ oM dza la dzo la/ daM bad od ka da A pri sha dun duM na hUM/ zhes bya bas gtsug tor bskyed par bya'o// rjerje 'chol pa'i sngagos dang phyag rgya dang / gu gul gyi dud pas kyang bdug par
481a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ kha mos gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dang / oM badz+ra a sha ni hUM phaT ces bya bas sran phye dang byog phye de'i lus la bta ba la sgrub pa'i grogs pos sngar bshad pa'i bkra shis tshigs su gcad pa gdon zhing bum pa thams
481a5(rgyud 'grel): cod kyi lha'i bum par bsams la de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo lo// phyog na rdo rje l-i phyag 'tshal lo// bdu da rtsi thab sbyor la phyag 'tshal lo// de thams cad kyi mthu dang / byin gyis brlabs
481a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis che ge mo zhes bya ba'i gnod pa dang / gdon thams cad zhi bar gyur cig ces brjod la/ spyi bo nas rkang pa'i bar du lus thams cad khrus bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sngags lan bdun bzlas pas spyi bor
481b1(rgyud 'grel): blugs pa dang / lan bdun bzlas shing snying khar blugs pa dang / lan bdun bzlas pas lte bar blugs par bya'o// de nas rma bya'i sgros byab cing / rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bsags pa yis// go 'phang 'di ni
481b2(rgyud 'grel): thob bya'i phyir// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho ma rungs pa'i// dgra dang bgegs kyang med par shog/ rkun po la sogs med par shog/ mu ste gis tson las rgyal gyur cig/ byang chub snying po thob bar du// bdud sde bzhi yis
481b3(rgyud 'grel): mi thubo cing // pho nya mngag gzhug pho nya mo// bran la sogs pas bsrung bar shog/ gcong rong g.yang sa la sogs dang // gdon dang rims nang med par shog/ ces byas laM rma bya'i sgros byab par bya'o// de nas rdo rje
481b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'joms kyi gzungs lan gnyis gsum bton la khrus lan gsum bya'o// de nas sngar bshad pa bzhin du/ de nas bsrung ba byas la me tog gi phreng ba dang / khro bo rnams kyi phyag mtshon bri ba 'am/ lugs ma spyi/
481b5(rgyud 'grel): bor gdags par bya'o// de nas bdag nyid kyang sngar bshad pa bzhin du bsrong pa byas la ldang bar bya'o// spyan drang ba'i lha yang khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pas gshegs su gsol bar
481b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// dam tshig sems dpa' yang stong pa nyid du zhu ba dang / rdul tshon gyi lho'i dman ma yang chu bo la sogs par dor bar bya'o// de nas gnas de na gnas pa'i 'byung po dang / gdon rnams dang / phyogs skyong
482a1(rgyud 'grel): la gtor ma byin la/ nus na sbyin bdag dang slob ma bsrung ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rigs 'dzin sngon gyi mkhas pa yis// ci gsungs lhag chad med
482a2(rgyud 'grel): bar ni// rang gzor ma byas bzod gsol med// legs grub rig pa mchog dag dang // rab grubo gsang ba spyi rgyud dang // phyag na rdo rje'i dbang bskur las// yon blangs dag rtsa sngo ba byed// rdo rje rnam par 'joms
482a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga rin po che mig tho zhes bya ba// / slob dpon shU rAM ga warmas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
483a1(rgyud 'grel): ngo rnam par 'joms cad kyi khang ngag rdo rje gsams /
483b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra bi d+ha rA maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
483b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje kun dge 'joms mdzad pa'o// dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par byaM// dang por bdag stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ oM sho d+han+te sho dA nA ye swA hA/ zhesgo dbang po'i sgo dag pa'i khrus byas te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
483b3(rgyud 'grel): nang gi bdeg nyid skad cig mas lhar bskyed nang gi bdag nyid can gyi khrus byas la/ bdag nyid skad cig mas lhar bskyed pa/ oM suM b+ha nI suM b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa yo hUM A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn bid+yA rA dza ya hUM
483b4(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ mi 'gro ba rnams la mtshon cha'i tshwar dbab pa ste/ oM tsakra hUM bruM traM bru~M tr-i pro/ ha bruM/ de nas mtshon cha lnga'i gur dngos gzhir gyur to// mtshams kyi khang pa'i nang du/ tsakra tsi la maN+Da la me ya zhes tshogs bseg pa
483b5(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi dkyil 'khor mdun sprul la/ phyi dang na du gi mchod pas mchid/ rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas mchod pa'i rdzas rnams bsregs la/ badz+ra dzo ti dz+wA la rA hUM zhes pa'o// dam tshig phyag rgyas sprul te/ pAdz+ra satwa hUM/ pra ba ra sat+kA ra prA
483b6(rgyud 'grel): tits+tsha trUM/ d+hU pe/ praSh+pe tra~M A mr-i ke hrIHgor+b+he a no bidri hUM/ dbul ba las kyi phyag rgyas dbul/ hUM yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa yi// khrus kyi dam po yon chab 'ang // bcom ldan rnam 'joms nyid la dbul// 'gro ba'i
484a1(rgyud 'grel): don du bzhes su gsol// oM ga ga na ga grAn+da sa ma ye hUM/ hUM dag cing gtsang myur sbyar ba yi// lha rdzas dam pa'i khrus chab 'di// rnam 'joms 'khor dang bcas la 'bul// 'gro ba'i don du
484a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhes su gsol// oM pra ba ra sat+kA ra pra tIts+tsha ho/ hUM nags tshal bcud nI yi gar 'ong // dri mchog rgyas pa'i spros me 'di// bcom ldan rnam 'joms 'khor bcas la// dang byas dbul lo bzhes su gsol// oM na maHbi
484a3(rgyud 'grel): d+ha ra badz+ra pU dza m+me g+ha sa mudra sa pa ra Na saM ma yaM hU~M/ chu 'am thung las skyes pa yi// kha dog dbyibs legs me tog 'di// bcom ldan dad pas na maHbadz+ra bi dA ra puSh+pa/ gdon rnams 'joms shing bak+ku shis pa'i// dge zhing mun sel
484a4(rgyud 'grel): snang gsal 'di// bcom ldan dad pas dbul/ A lo kaM/ 'tshal ba'i dri ma sel mdzod pa'i// yid bzhin bdud rtsi mtsho ltar bskyil// gan+d+ha/ dag cing gtsang mar sbyar ba yi// lha rdzas dam pa'i zhal zas 'di// ne bit+te/ de las
484a5(rgyud 'grel): gi zhan yang mchod pa'i tshogs// rol mo sgra snyan yid 'ong ba// sems can sdug bsngal tshim mdzad pa'i// dus rnams kun tu rgyas gyur cig/ oM na maHbi dA ra badz+ra g+haN+Do rat+na pu dza me g+ha sA mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ nang gri mchod
484a6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'bul ba yang // bdun ni rnam dag byang chub sems// bsod nams chog sa chen bsags par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la/ bdag nyid lus 'bul gyis thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon
484b1(rgyud 'grel): khyed rnams kyis/ bdag dus thams cad du bzhes su gsol lo// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po yi// dge ba'i rtsa ba ci bsags pa// thams cad ma lus bsdus nas ni// dge rtsa byang chub chen por bsngo// ji ltar dus gsum mgron po yi//
484b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni bla med pa'i// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// dkon mchog bla ma dam pa'i chos// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang // sems bskyed sdom pa lnga rnams ni// rigs lnga'i dam tshig
484b3(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa bzung // ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi// ma rgal ba ni bsgral bar bgyi// dbugs ma byin pa dbugs phyung ste// sems can mya ngani 'das la dgod// dus ni bla na med pa sems kyi mchod pa'o// badz+ra any+dza li sar sdom pa//
484b4(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra ban+d+ha tra Ta zhes sdig pa dral// badz+ra a be sha a a zhes ye shes dbab pa bstan pa badz+ra muSh+Ti bi zhes pa/ sdig sgrib dral zhing ye shes dbab pa ni// ye shes kyi tshogs bsag pa ste/ de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa'o// mchod ba lnga
484b5(rgyud 'grel): yis tsho gas gnyis rdzogs// bsrung 'khor bsdus la na mkhar gnas// sarba bid badz+ra zhes brjod pas// rgyu dang mi rgyu thams cad kun// stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya// sems nyid a yi rang bzhin las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul yaM du
484b6(rgyud 'grel): shar/ ta sngon po gzhu yi dbyibs lta bu// de steng baM las chu chan ni// zlum la dkar po bsil ba ste// suM las sa gzhi ri rab bskyed// bruM las rin chen gzhal yos khang // gdan gsum ldan pa'i steng dgau tu// a ni hUM tu gyur
485a1(rgyud 'grel): pa las// 'od zer spro bsdus lan gnyis byas// rdo rje rtse lnga pad+ma'i dbus// de las spros dang bsdus pa yis// s+pho Ta badz+ra'i sngags brjod pas// rnam 'joms sku ni bai DUr+ya// sngon po bug gi kha dog la//
485a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa rgya gram 'dzin pa ste// g.yon ni sdig mdzub thugs kar bsgreng // khro las byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan// cha lugs brgyad dang ldan pa la// thugs las hUM bzhi phyogs bzhir chad// gri gug nyi zla'i rtsibs steng du//
485a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i khro bo chen po bzhi// ma nor rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskyed// shar du rdo rje gtum po nI// smug nag rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams// lho ru rdo rje phur bu ste// ljang nag rdo rje phur buM bsnams// nub tu rdo rje be tsan ni// dmar nag phyag
485a4(rgyud 'grel): na be con bsnams// byang du rdo rje tho ba ni// ljang nag phyag na tho bo bsnams// g.yon pa kun ni sdigs mdzub ste// khro las byang chub sems dpa'i brgyan+da// 'khor lho go ras bzhi la ni// phyag mtshan rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma sna tshogs
485a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje la// s+pho Ti badz+ra badz+rA l-I s+ye hUM zhes brjod pas// lo s+yai dkar po phyag na me long bsnams// badz+ra mA le tAM/ mU la sngon mo phyagro na phreng ba bsnams// badz+ra gI ti hrIHgI tI dmar mo phyag na bi hr-ing bsnams// badz+ra nr-i t+ye aHn+na t+ya ljang ku
485a6(rgyud 'grel): gar bsgyur thal sbyar spyi// phyi rim rgyas pa'i gru chad lo// phyag rgyagaser dngule zangs lcags gzhong ba bzhi// ma chod pa'i lha mo bzhi pa bskyed// d+hU be dkar mo spos gzhong ser mo bsnams// badz+ra d+hU pe hU~M/ puSh+pe ser mo ma
485b1(rgyud 'grel): tog gzhong pa bsnams// badz+ra puSh+pe traM/ mar med mar sgyu ma gzhong dmar po bsnams// badz+ra A lo ke hriHdri chab ljang gu lcags kyi gzhong pa bsnams// badz+ra gAn+d+he aH/ khyams su phyogs skyong bcu po bskyed// rdo rje me thab
485b2(rgyud 'grel): gru gsum dang // be con ral gri sbrul zhags dang // ba dan dbyug pa kha T+wAM gA/ shar du nyi zla nub tu bum pa las// sngags 'di brjod la sku ru gsal bar bskyed// in+d+ri ye swA hA/ brgya byin dkar po phyag ni rdo rje bsnams// ag+na
485b3(rgyud 'grel): yai swA hA/ ag+ne dmar ser phyag na me thabs bsnams// ya ma yaM swAhA/ gshin rje nag po phyag na bi tson bsnams// nai ri te swA hA/ bden bral dmar ser phyag na ral gri bsnams// bA ru Na ye swA hA/ nu lha dmar po phyag na sbrul
485b4(rgyud 'grel): zhags bsnam sA// ba ya be swo hA/ rlung lha dmar ljang phyag na ba dAn bsnams// ku be ra sno hA/ gnod sbyin ljang gu la ga naM dbyug to thogs// i sho nA yA swA hA/ dbang ldan ljang skya phyag ni khe T+wAM gi/ sUr+ya tsan+d+ra yAM swA hA/ tshangs
485b5(rgyud 'grel): pa sngo skya phyag na nyi zla bsnams// pra tI b+ha yai swA hA/ sa bdag mthing nag phyag na bum pa bsnams// dregs pa sems can kun gyi gdan la bzhugs/ sgo bzhir phyag rgya lcags kyi dang // zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu las//
485b6(rgyud 'grel): shar du at+pa sha dzaHrta gdong dkar mo phyag ni lcags kyu bsnams// lhor bA sha hUM las/ phag gdong nag mo mche zhags thogs pa'o// nub sgor lo ka baM las/ nyi zla dmar mo lcags sgrogs bsgom mo// byang sgor a be sha
486a1(rgyud 'grel): las/ thal byed ljang nag dril bu 'khrol bar bskyed do// yang na khyams su bkra shis kyi lha mo brgyad las// phyag mtshan brgyad las sku mdog ser mo phyag na bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad bsnams pa bskyed
486a2(rgyud 'grel): do// badz+ra sin da ma/ badz+ra tra ma ye/ badz+ra dzaM ba ye/ badz+ra sha lo ye/ badz+ra ku sha hU~M/ yak+Sha hUM/ baM la hUM/ da la hUM/ zhes bskyed la/ 'di dkor gsum/ dang po rdo rje ra ba la phyogs bskyong bskyed// pad+ma la lha sprin sde brgyad bskyed//
486a3(rgyud 'grel): me 'od la bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu bskyed do// don gyi lha dgu/ rtse ba'i lha lnga/ bskyed pa'i lha nyi shu rtsa lnga/ mchod pa'i lha stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa lnga'o// rtsa ba'i stsogs brjod la phyag rgya bstan// snying po ti lnga dbu stangs
486a4(rgyud 'grel): susangs rgyas lnga yi dbang bskur ba// ka taM badz+rodz+ra zhes brjod pas// spyi bor dbang bskur byin gyis brlabs// bskyed pa'i lha rnams kun la ni// rigs kyi bdag po re re bsgom// dbang bskor lha rnams thams cad la// ma ta badz+ra
486a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas/ lus la rdo rje gos gyon no// mad tha mi 'gyur ka nan gting // a tha zhes ni bgegs kyang bskrad// su las rdo rje khang ba ni// rab tu bstan par 'gyur ba dang // gzhi yi rnal 'byor lus rnams ni// badz+ra bdun gyis
486a6(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab// rang bzhin gnas nas bskul ba ni// ha ra ha ra badz+ra bi dA ra/ se gol drag tu brdabs pa yis// dzaHyi sprul pas snyan bsan dbab// pra ha ra pra ha ra badz+ra pra b+hany+dza dzaHhUM baM hoH/ 'od zer lnga yi mdun du byon//
486b1(rgyud 'grel): yati s+thir badz+ra/ de yi lha rnams cha gnyis dbye// su ti s+thi ra badz+ra/ gang na gcig mi gnyis tshul du gcod// pra tis+thi ra badz+ra/ de rnams gnyis med 'dres par bstim// ma hA badz+ra sku bstan/ a pra ti badz+ra gsung bstan// a mo ga
486b2(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra thugs bstan// e h+yaM hi badz+ra dgyes po bskyed/ shI g+h+raM badz+ra dngos grub ma thob bar du bzhugs// dam tshig lha dang ye shes lha// gnyis med bsgrubs la mchod pas mchod// bsgom zhing bzlas pas sgrub pa bya// sngags
486b3(rgyud 'grel): ring nye ba'i snying po gnyis// bsdus rgyas lha yi bsnyen pa bsgyel// mtshan mi dus dang grangs la sogs// dam du bcas pa'i bsnyen pa ni// thun bzhi ri mas kyis nyin dang mtshan// bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i cho ga bya// dkyil 'khor
486b4(rgyud 'grel): zhag gi cho ga la// sa dang sta gen rdul chen rnams// mkhas pas rim par brtsam par bya// dang po sa yi cho ga ni// sa brtag bslang zhing sbyang ba dang // byin gyis brlab cing gzung ba lnga// sa brtag pa la bzhi ru grong // nA mkha'i
486b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs dang sa gzhi dang // bdag po yod med brtag pa bzhi// sa sbyang bya la gnyis yin te// mngon pa mi la nyo bslang dang // mi mngon po glegs la bslang ba'o// badren pa bdar te chos bshad bslang ba dang // mchod cing gsol
486b6(rgyud 'grel): bi gdab ste bslang ba'o// skyob pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rol phyin pa yi// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// ji ltar shAkya seng ge yis// bdud sde dpung bcas bcom pa
487a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni// rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ zhes rdo rje brdabs bas sa'i ser ka nas/ sa'i lha mo byon te sa gnang ngo // swa'i lha mo dang sa bdag gnas kyi bdag
487a2(rgyud 'grel): po la/ mchod pa dang gtor mas mchod nas/ hUM gang yang sa la gnas pa dang // sa la rgyo ba'i lha klu rnams// mchod dang gtor ma 'di long la// sems can kun dag don du yang // byams pa'i sems kyis gnang bar mdzod// pra
487a3(rgyud 'grel): ti bya d+hA paM/ puSh+pe paM/ A lo ka/ gan+d+haM/ naM bi t+ye/ pu dza me g+ha sa mu ta s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ pr-i ti bya naM sarbaM ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi shA mu ge b+h+yaHsarba tad khaM uta khaM ba liM ta khI hi/ sa sbyang ba ni/ los dang bya bas sbyang ba dang / sngags dang phyag
487a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas skyeng ba'o// chos nyid stong pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas stong par sbyang ba'o// las dang bya bas brkos te ro lnga bsal// 'thas shing tshad dang ldan par bya// tshangs thig zur thig bzhi yong gdab// chu tshan bcu drug bgo

493a3(rgyud 'grel): gi dbang bskur te/ kye rdo rje kun tu bzang po zhes ming btags pas/ rnam rtog sgo lnga'i dri ma gnas gyur pas// bya ba grub pa'i ye shos der rtogs nas// ye shes rang gnas kyi dbang thob par gyur cig/ oM
493a4(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra satwA s+t+waM A b+hi Shiny+tsa badz+ra nA maM a b+hi ShaM ka ta/ rdo rje ming gi dbang thob pa kho nar gyur cig/ de nas rdo rje dril bu gnyis ka thogs la/ rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi dbang bskur ba// 'dri ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
493a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag na rje rje'i lag na 'dug/ khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan+da// oM sarba tA thA ga ta sid+d+ha badz+ra sa ma yas+t+wa~M e kha~M d+ha oM badz+ra satwa hi hi hUM/ rigs kyi bu khyod lnga rdo rje brtul zhugs
493a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbang bskur bas// khyad par byang chub sems dang ldan te/ gauti mug gnas gyur te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rtogs pa kho nar gyur cig/ de nas zhal zas la slob ma la bkri shis gsol lo// dkyil
493b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor zhal gsum/ skar ma ra ba rib mar me dang // sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang // rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bu// 'dus byasna chos kyang de dang 'dra// man+t+ra ma d+yu/ sa ma ya traT zhes dbus nas nub tu kha bAltas te zhal gsum
493b2(rgyud 'grel): mo// rim par brtsams pas bdag nyid dga'// shes par byas pas mun la sgron// dga' sgron dkyil 'khor cho ga 'di// bdag gis brtsams par mi rigs kyang // bdag pas dmanal phan phyir brtsams// 'di
493b3(rgyud 'grel): yis bsod nams gang thob pa// rnam 'joms sku yi zhal mthong shog/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dga' ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba// rgya gar gyi slob dpon rdo rje go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
493b4(rgyud 'grel): bod kyi lo tsa ba spu ra ngas bsod nams blo gros kyi sa bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// /
494a1(rgyud 'grel): po rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus chog gi 'grel pa rdorje go chas mdzad pa'o//
494b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra bi dA ra NA nA ma bi d+hi b+hid+d+hi/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i khrus kyi cho ga'i 'grel pa/ dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi
494b2(rgyud 'grel): bopo nas dbang bskur ba dag dang rgyal po'i blon po dang / rje rigs dag deng dmang rigs dag dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze gong dag srid pa'i rgya mchi las ma rgal ba dag la/ nA de dang gnod pa dang / byad la stsogs
494b3(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhan gyis gnod pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag la/ dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho gas grol bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir de dag rnam par dbye ba'i rim pa brtsam par bya'o// mdo sde 'di'i
494b4(rgyud 'grel): don gyi mtshan rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ming gi sgo nas nges par bstan te/ ji lta zhe na/ rdo rje zhes pa nI 'phags pa rnams kyi yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgos te/ ye shes de ni bsod nams dang ye shes
494b5(rgyud 'grel): tshad med pa rnams kyi tshogs can/ rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas/ de'i phyir lag na rdo rje lus thams cad rdo dzar byin gyis brlabs nus zhes bya bas/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi las grub
494b6(rgyud 'grel): pa lta bu ni ma yin gyi ye shes kyi lus can du bstan pa'o// de'i phyir rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa zheya sa ma 'i de kho na nyid shin tu rtogs po'i ngo bo rdo rje ltar thog pa med pas rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag
495a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas skabs la bya bar mngon no// ci'i phyir ye shes 'di la rdo rje zhes bya zhe na/ phyi rol gyi rdo rje rin po che dang chos mthun pa rnam pa bdun yod pa'i phyir dpe'i sgo nas nye bar mtshon pa yin te/ de
495a2(rgyud 'grel): dngadag kyang 'di lta ste/ mi chod pa/ mi shigs pa/ bden pa/ sra ba/ brtan pa/ thams cad du thogs pa med pa/ thams cad du ma pham pa zhes bya ba rnams te/ de ni ye shes de nyid kyis rang gi yon tan phun sum tshogs
495a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yang bstan to// de gzhan gyi don bstan pa ni/ thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sgo sna tshogs nas sems can gyi don mdzad po ste/ khams gsum pa 'jigs tshogs la lta ba/ phyin ci log gi lta ba can//
495a4(rgyud 'grel): phyi dang nang nas bgegs dang log 'dren rnams ldang ba'i rgyu/ las kyi bgo la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba dang bcas pa de dag 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad skrag par byed pa/ sems can thams
495a5(rgyud 'grel): cing 'jil bar byed pa zhes bya ba nas/ sems can thams cad bsrung ba zhes bya ba dang / sems thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rmugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du cho ga'i don rnam pa bco lngas bstan te/ de dag
495a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas gzhan gyi don mdzad pa bstan te/ zhi dang rgyas dang drag spyod dang // dbang sogs las rnams bzhi po dag/ thabs kyis 'dul de'i don mdzad pa// ci rigs par ni sbyar bar bya'o// de ltar de
495b1(rgyud 'grel): dag gi ye shes kyi rdo rje des 'dul bar mdzad/ sel bar mdzad 'joms par mdzad pa'i phyir/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya'o// de nas gas bsngags kyi gang dag gsung ba de dag ye shes kyi rgyu las byung ba'i
495b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ thogs pa medadra ba'i rdo rje'i tshogs tu rig par bya'o// de nas de dag gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ cho gar bya ba thams cad la/ gtsor slob dpon la brten par bya ba yin pas de'i phyir slob dben slob ma gnyis
495b3(rgyud 'grel): stosta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga bshad cing bstan par bya ba ni/ des ni rab khrus gtsang ma yin// mdo sde dam po mnyan par bya// gang dag yid dag sems dang zhing // gtsang ma'i gos kyo rib brgyan te// zab mo
495b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas spyod yul ba zhes bya ba la/ shin tu brus bri ba dang / gos gtsang ma bgo ba ni phyi'i gtsang sgra'o// sgo gsum nas sdig pa mi byed pa ni yid dge ba'o// byang chub tu smon pa ni sems dang ba ste/ de dag ni
495b5(rgyud 'grel): phyi nang gi gtsong sgra'o// mdo sde dam pa mnyen par bya zhes pa'i don no// rig sngags dA rnams ye shes las byung bar rig par bya'o// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba zhes pa yang ye shes kyi rang bzhin du rtogs
495b6(rgyud 'grel): po nyid do// de nas slob dpon gyi cho gar bya ba ni mdo sde 'di nyid las dbang bskur ba'i yan lag bstan pa tsam du zad de/ dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i cho ga gsungs pa de nyid gsungs pa las mi mngon
496a1(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ba 'am yang na spyi rgyud dag las gsul ba'i phyir ro// de dag du mya bstan pa de gnyis ka ltar na yang de dag dang sbyar de las ni/ phyugs lhas shing gcig lha yi khang pa dang / lam
496a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi bzhi mdo khang stong nags tshal du// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa khru bzhi'i tshad // tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis bri// phyogs kyi lha rnams kyis yongs su bsrung / sgo bzhi ru ku sha'i rtsa rnams dgram zhes
496a3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa la rig par bya ste/ de ltar dkyil 'khor bya ba yang slob dpon gyis dang po brtag pa dang sbyang ba la sogs pa'i cho go tshul bzhin du bya ste/ 'thas par bcag sde ba'i rnam pa lnga dang spos chu gtsubyams
496a4(rgyud 'grel): byugs te steng yang b+hA re bri zhing / dar gyi lnga ldi dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / me long dag gis kyang brgyan par bya'o// gzhan yang dbang bskur ba'i cho ga la bkra shis kyi bum pa tshul dang mthun par yon tan
496a5(rgyud 'grel): 'grub pa'i phyir 'di nyid las de'i rgyu bstan pa ni/ gser ram yang na ni/ dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang rung zhes bya bus ston to// de'i nang du dgade ba ni chu yis zhes pa smos te/ tsan dran dang gur gum la sngogs pa'i
496a6(rgyud 'grel): spos chus bkang ste/ de'i lhan cig ldan pa'i rin po che ni shel dang rdo rje zhes pa ni dngos su zad nor bu zhes pa spyi 'i tshig tu smos te/ rnam par ma phye ba'i pad+ma rA ga dang / in+d+ra nI la la sogs pa ni rin po che'i rigs su
496b1(rgyud 'grel): gtogs pa dang mu tig dang sa la sbram la sogs pa ste/ de dgra gas chag med pa rgyan gyi bye ba byed nus pa ste rin chen rma med ces bya'o// gzhan yang de'i zla la yungs kar dang / rtswa durba dang / me tog rnams gzhug
496b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// tshul de bzhin spyi rgyud las kyang / bum pa pad+ma dmar po'i mdog 'dra zhing / nag po ra ri med cing rin chen bcas// sman dang 'bri dang spos chus bkang ba dag/ kha brgyan ras kyis ma gul ba dkri bar bya zhes bstan
496b3(rgyud 'grel): to// dau dag gi lto bar chu bra gabashong ba la sogs bstan to// mtshan nyid gzhan rgyud dag las rig par bya'o// yang gong ma'i 'bru dang sman zhes bya ba la/ bya kli sreng kri la sogs pa'i sman rnam pa lnga dang / ti l-i dang sran ma
496b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i rgyud las grags pa bzhin no// mgul chings gtsang ma'i gos zhes bya ba ma sbyang pa ma nyams pa'i ras dkar po kha tshar dang bcas pa'o// dkri zhing dgang ba ni gong du bstan pa rnams kyi mdor bsdus te
496b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'o// bum pa de ltar byas pa yang rtog pa gzhan cho ga las 'byung ba ji bzhin du glengs po zhi 'am lnga gu gul gyi dud pa la sogs pas gdugs la dbus dang gra bzhir gzhag pa'o// de nas slob dpon pa dag
496b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid las kyi khro bor bsgyur nas/ lag pas rdo rje dang yungs kar blangs te/ bskrad cing bsrung ba dang / mtshams btsong pa dag byas na/ thig skud lag tu blangs te/ phyogs ma 'khrul par sa gcad de/ rim pa
497a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum par thig gdab par bya'o// de nas ri mo bri ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i phyag rgya rdo rje rgya gram las phyogs gcig med pa pad+ma'am khyi'i steng du bzhag go/ de'i gru gzhir 'khor rnams
497a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyag mtshan brub shar nas brtsams te/ khro bo rdo rje godangs pa dang / rdo rje rtswa gcig pa dang / be con rdo rje mtshan pa dang / rdo rje tho ba rnams bri'o// de nas rim pa gnyis par dbang ldan la sogs pa phyogs skyong bcu dang /
497a3(rgyud 'grel): de'i bkra shis kyi lha mo brgyad kyi phyag mtshan bri'o// rim pa gsum par rin po che chun 'phyang dang mu tig gi phreng ba dag dgod cing phyogs bzhir sgo khyung dang rta babs kyis mdzes par bya'o// de'i phyi rol ste gso bu'i mtha'
497a4(rgyud 'grel): bskor du rtswa ku shas bskor cing / me tog gi sil ma dag kyang dgram mo// de nas phyi rol du byung ste/ 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse ba 'i phyir/ bza' ba sha chang la phug la sngogs btsos/ 'bras chen 'bras
497a5(rgyud 'grel): bu mang po'i gtor ma sbyin zhes bya ba dgu khyer nas/ lha dang lha min+d+ra gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul zhes pa la sogs pa'i bstod pa dang bcas pa'o// bden pa byang rU ba byas nas lag pa gnyis kyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar
497a6(rgyud 'grel): ba las kha bye ste/ bskon nas bstan pa'i tshul du bya ba ni gtor ma sbyin pa'i phyag rgya ste/ 'byung po de dag la so so'i rig sngags brjod cing na mkha' mdzod kyi rig bas byin gyis brlabs te bsngo ba'o// de nas slar
497b1(rgyud 'grel): log ste lha'i gnas su song la tshon gyi dkyil 'khor de dgu mdun gyi bar snang la gyen du dpag cing rin po che'i grwa zhal yas khang gdan seng ge dang pad+mar bcas pa'i gdan khri bsams nas der rig sngags kyi lha
497b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang ba ni pa brang ba na po brang lhung lo can gyi dpal phrag na rdo rje ye shes kyi snang ba'i khyad par las byung ba'i/ dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba mdog ljang sngon zhal gyi smin
497b3(rgyud 'grel): ma khro gnyar can pa ga g.yas rdo rje rtse lnga pa thugs kar 'dzin pa/ phyag giyon pa dkur brten cing 'gying bag tso na/ stong g.yogs drang smad g.yogs dar ljang gu'i tshig gu go sol ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis
497b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa 'khor rig sngags kyi lha dang / khro bo phyag rgya grangs med pa'i phyag brnyanA can bdag nyid kyis phyag rgyas spyan drang ste/ lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la srin lag gnyis nang du bcug la phan tshun
497b5(rgyud 'grel): bsnolnga pa'i rtse mo mdzub mo'i drung du cung zad bkug pa byas la/ gung mo gonyis gzhibs pa'i phyi rol nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug la/ bA ra na sA gang tsam gyis ma reg par byas na mthe bong gnyis mthe chung gnyis go zhibs
497b6(rgyud 'grel): la dzi'i sngags ni/ oM badz+ra dza la na ya swA hA zhes bya'o// yang na rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drang ngo // de nas tho ga mar dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan par bya ste/ log pa g.yas pa'i mthe chung gis sen mos
498a1(rgyud 'grel): mthe bo mnan la/ lhag ma rnams rdo rje rje gsum pa'i tshul du byas te/ de'i sngags ni oM sha ra ma hA sa ma ye swA hA/ zhes brjod do// de nas yang dkyil 'khor nang gi grwa bzhir khro bro bzhi gzhug ste
498a2(rgyud 'grel): byang shar mtshams nas gzung ste khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje gtum po zhes bya ba sku mdog smug nag/ bzhin khro gnyer tsan phyag gra yos na rdo rje rtse lnga gdengs par byas te thogs par bsams te/ de'i phyag rgya ni lag
498a3(rgyud 'grel): po g.yon pa'i mdzub mo snying ga'i phyogs su gzhag/ g.yas pa'i sor mo gsum rdo rje ltar bya ste/ de nyid kyi sngags kyang 'di nyid las// ts+tshin+dats+tshin+d+ra ma hA kI la ki lA ya swA hA/ zhes sbyar bar bya'o// de nA~Ms shar lho
498a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su rdo rje ki lA ya~M zhes bya ba/ mdog ljang nag dpral ba khro granyer can phyag g.yas rdo rje rtse gcig pa ka nA si'i dbyibs 'dri ba thogs per bas ma ste/ de'i phyag rgya ni log pa gnyis khu tshur
498a5(rgyud 'grel): nang du bcangs twa/ cung zad bsnol ba'i tshul du ben+d+hag ste mthebong gnyis gyen du gzhibs la bsgreng la/ de'i sngags ni ban+d+ha ban+d+ha kr-i d+ha k+Sho d+ha kI li kI lA ya swAhA/ zhes bya bar sbyar ro// de nas yang lho nub mtshams
498a6(rgyud 'grel): su rdo rje be con zhes bya ba sku mngag mthing ni ga smai raM ser po gyen du 'khyil ba/ g.yas na be con gyi rtse mo rdo rjes mtshan pa bsams te/ ngo'i phyag rgya ni phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar ba las mtha bong gnyis bsgreng ste/
498b1(rgyud 'grel): tshigs bkug nas srin lag gI drung du gzugs par bya'o// de'i sngags ni/ tsu ru tsu ru tsat+ta kI li kI la ya swA hA zhes bya bar sbyar/ na mas da rnams [] mas pa nyin su
498b2(rgyud 'grel): ga sa du byas chu tug du sa gyu pa mas s+ho su / rgya g-i hrI hrI brgyad kyi phyag mtshan rnams dgod par bya ba'i phyir/ de dag so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya bcings la spyan drung shing rang rang gnas su bkod nas
498b3(rgyud 'grel): glatso bo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la gus pa khyad par n+dan byas te/ mchod yon dong mye tog dang bdug spos la sogs po dang zhal zas mar me'i mchog rnams rim bzhin dbul lo// de nas phyogs bcu dag na ji ltar
498b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i lha rdzas dang / kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa dag gis mchod la/ na mkha' mdzod kyi rig pas kyang byin gyis brlab ste/ 'di ltar na maHsar+b+ba tathA ga teb+h+yo bi shA ma khe b+h+rU~M/ oM sar+b+ba tado khaM Ang gau te/ s+pha raN
498b5(rgyud 'grel): mig g+ha nA khe swAhA/ de nas bstod pa gang yang rung bas bstod/ de nas rig sngags gdon pa ni// lanr-i grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// yang na len grangs bairgya rtsa brgyad ces bya bas grangs nges par gsungs pa la/
498b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i rig sngags dang mjug nas yang snying gi sngags rnams dang gnyis bskul ba dang bcas par zlon ni lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig zlos par 'gyur ro// yang na pa rnams gnyis ka zlos par mi nus na 'jug
499a1(rgyud 'grel): nas na maHtsaN+Da badz+ra zhes pa nas a mr-i tAM hUM phaT ces pa'i bar ni rig sngags 'di'i yang snying ste bskul tshig dang bcas pa ldan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o// de ltar bzlas brjod zin nas yon
499a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang slob ma gnyis ka yang dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor dbus su khri lta bu bzhag pa'i sar yang na ri mo yid kyis gdag pa dang / yang na phyag rgya nyi tshe bya'o// de nas der bum pa rnams
499a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi chus blugs shing dbang bskur te/ shu ti dang nyi shing la sogs pas kyang bkru/ rol mo dang bkru shis la sogs pa yang gdon no// khrus zin nas sgor 'byung ba'i dus su zho mar dang sman dang 'bras bu la sogs bkra
499a4(rgyud 'grel): shis kyi rjes rnams la sogs pa bkag pa med do// de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i cho ga'i phan yon 'byung ba mdor bsdus na gnyis su 'dus te/ sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa dang bde ba bskyed par byed pa'o// de la sdug
499a5(rgyud 'grel): bsngal sel bar byed pa ni/ sems can dbang po nyams pa dang / tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang zhes bya ba nas/ de dag thams cad zhi ba lta zhes bya ba dang / sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad med
499a6(rgyud 'grel): par byed ces bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa bzhis bstan to// bde ba bskyed par byed pa ni// rgyud do cog gis rtsa ba ste/ dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan zhes bya ba dang // tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur//
499b1(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa kun las rnam par thar zhes bya ba rnams kyis bstan te/ de dag gi phan yon mad+mor bsdus pa tsam du zad kyi/ gzhan yang rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun dang / me dang chu dang / dug dang mtshon la sogs
499b2(rgyud 'grel): pas 'jigs pa thams cad las sgrol bar rig par bya'o// rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga'i 'grel pa slob dpon rdo rje go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la
499b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// las kyi mtha' bco brgyad pa'i sgrub thabs sil mar bshad pa la spyi don bzhir shes par bya ste/ sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang / lhag par gnas pa sta gon gyi cho ga dang / lngas su bya ba dkyil 'khor
499b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi cho ga dang / mjug bsdu ba'i cho ga'o// bsnyen po'i cho ga spyir mthun no// lhag par go nas pa sta gon gyi cho ga lo lnga ste/ se so'i ling kha bca' ba dang / bdug pa'i rdzas gdab pa'i rdzas// brub pa'i rdzas byug pa'i rdzas so//
499b5(rgyud 'grel): las kyi mtha' bco brgyad kyang las bzhir bsnu na/ zhi ba la lce dpog dkar po/ rgyas pa la glu rtsi dang ga bur// dang nga laM tsan dan+ya gur kum/ drag po lA gu gul nag pa'o// zhi bya la 'o ma can gyi shing / rgyas pa la gsar can
499b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi shing / dbang la khrag can gyi shing / drag po la dug can gyi shing ngo // sor bzhi dang / ser drug dang / sor brgyad dang / sor bcu gnyis pa bya zhing / rtse mtshan zlum po dang gru bzhi/ zla kham/ zur gsum mo// de
500a1(rgyud 'grel): dag lte ba dang / dpung ba dang / gsang ba dang / snying gar so sor gdab po// gzhan yang yung sA kar kun gtsor byas te/ til dang ske tshe shang tshe dang / yungs kar brab pa'i las dang sbyor/
500a2(rgyud 'grel): las su bya ba dkyil 'khor chen po dang mthun pa las/ gro la 'am ras sam shing shun las gang 'dod pa'i gzugs dang ming bris te/ dkyil lo bor chen po'i dbus su gang yang rung ba'i phur bus gzir te gzhu go/
500a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas po la bab pa dang / traT nas sa gA'i bor du yang snying rtse sngags so sor sbyar ro// gautor ma'i cho ga yan chad rdzogs nas mjug bsdu ba'i cho ga shes par bya ste/ sems can gang zhig bsgrag par bya ba'i cho ga nI/ tra Ta
500a4(rgyud 'grel): dang sbyar te ri mo bdun du blangs te/ rdo rje khro bo'i sngags bzlas shing lan po rgya rtsa brgyad du gu gul nag po'i dud pas bdug cing phu re pa snying gar btab ste/ bribs nas yul wa ra NA se'i sas byugs nas/ ri mo rlung
500a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po la phyar na gang la bya ba de kho na skrag par 'gyur ro// dmag gi dpung bzhil ba ni tro Ta dang sbyar te/ sbyar ba thams cad gong dang 'thun pa las mjug bsdu ba'i cho ga'i dus su ri mo bdun du blangs te lce dpog dkar
500a6(rgyud 'grel): pos bdago// phur pas btob ste brabs nas mi rus kyi phye mas byugs nas 'bi 'bi'i nang du bcag lo mchod rten byas te mchod nas skra mtshams su spyi tshugs su sbas na/ dgra bgegs kyi dpung nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro//
500b1(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags thams cad gcod pa spu Tu dang stAr te/ ri mo la bdug pa brub bya'i las byas nas thal chen gyis byugs la/ mtshon rnon pos gtubs la dug gi shing gi me la/ byang kyi rdzas gnyis dang mar nag tu byas pas
500b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg tu byas te/ thal ba chu chen por gau tor na nges par gzhan gyi smod pa zhi ba'o// rig sngags thams cad gnon pa ni/ s+pho Ta dang sbyar te/ thal chen gyis byugs pa yan tshod 'thun pa las rdzas dang bcas te mchod
500b3(rgyud 'grel): rten chen po'i 'og tu sbas na/ gzhan gyi rig sngags thams cad kyi mgo ginon par 'gyur ro// las thams cad 'joms pa ni g+hur+N+Na dang sbyar te/ de ni lho phyogs kyi rgyal po stobs ldan gyi rnam smin mi bzang pa ste/ bram ze'i
500b4(rgyud 'grel): phre gu rig pa 'dzin pa dang / mdo sde dang gzungs sngags ltar bzlas pa'i rdzas la/ rgyal po'i nad mi bzang pa de thams cad/ sar+b+bA bodrA g+hur+t+ta g+hur+N+Na mA ra ya ku ru yaM swA hA/ bram ze chen pos bzlas pa'i yon tan de tsam na bsgrubs
500b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yon tan bsams las 'das rig sngags rgyal po dge bar gsungs zhes pa dang // sgrub pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshig gI thung ltar byas la bzlas pa'i dus su yang snying dang rtsa sngags la sar+b+bA bid+yA d+hAd+ya g+hud+b+ha s+thi ro//
500b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa dang dbang bskur ba dang / mjug gi don bya ba dang / byab pa dang bsrung ba byas ni sa til nag po la sdig pa byas te mtshon rnon pos gtobs te/ shing sar pa la sbyin sreg byas pas nges pa kho nar sngon gyi las
501a1(rgyud 'grel): bcom mo// gzhan gyi las thams cad 'jig par byed pa ni/ g+hur+N+Na pA ya dang sbyar te/ gzhan dag las 'gran sems can gyi ming gang yin pa'i ri mo bris la/ dkyil 'a khor chen po'i
501a2(rgyud 'grel): dbus su bzhag ste/ cho ga yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ ri mo mdun du blangs te bdug pa dang byab pa byas te/ ro'i sol bas byugs nus tsher ma can gyi me blangs te sbyin sreg bya ste/ thal ba rlung chen po la phyar na'o// dgra
501a3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs brlag par byed nA ni/ sar+b+ba satwa ni la sogs pa ni gsung ba thun mong ma yin pa'o// gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa ni bo d+ha dang sbyar te/ 'di ni thar por byed pa yin gyi rlag par mi byed de btson ra nas
501a4(rgyud 'grel): thar pa dang 'dra zhes pa'o tha tshig go// thar bar 'dod pa'i ri mo dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su gzhag ste/ las thams cad gong ma dang 'dra ba los phur pa dang bcas po la chas dril bya la/ gse ro dang g.yu rgod dang /
501a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rgod che ba g.yas rdo rje dang bcas pa lus sam mgul du btags na/ gdon la sogs pa las thar par 'gyur ro// 'byung po thams cad 'gugs pa ni bshaM dbang du bya ba dngos so// rig sngags kyi las thams
501a6(rgyud 'grel): cing byeng du 'jug pa ni saM bo d+ha dang sbyar te/ gro ga 'am ras sam shog bu la gang 'dod kyi ming byang bris te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su bzhog ste/ cho ga rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bdug pa dang / gdab pa
501b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / brab bya'i sbyor ba byas te sbyar spos dang dri sna tshogs pa byugs te/ tsan dan la sogs pa'i shing bsrung can gyi me lha sbyin sreg byas nas sol ba dang de nyid mar dkar dang bsres te/ bza' ba dang byug pa byas na nges
501b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'grub bo ma grub par byed pa nI pra ma dang sbyar te/ gang grub par 'dod pa'i ri mo bris la/ cho ga gong me nyid dang 'thun no// yang ni ming mgul khug du bzhag go// grub pa chung ma za bar byed pa ni si b+hU ma sbyor te/ gang
501b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon du gyur pa'i nor rdzas kyi ming bris te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su bzhag la bdug pa dang gdab pa dang brab pa rdzogs pa dang a shwa ta yi khu bse byugs nas za ma tog tu bcug la ros gtsang ma dkri so nas phur
501b4(rgyud 'grel): pa de nga bcas te rgyas btab la/ sku gzugs sam mchod rten gyis mnan te/ shin tu dben pa'i sar bzhag nA nges par chud mi za'o// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa ni ku Ta dang sbyar te/ de la lnga ste/ bu sbyin pa dang nor
501b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa dang / 'bru sbyin pa dang / rkang 'gyogs sbyin pa dang / tshe dang bsod nams sbyin pa'o// bu sbyin pa ni bu 'dod pa'i ming byang bdug gang ba bra ba pa bya ste/ ga bur la sogs pa'i dris byugs te lung thang dang po daM tsa dang glus
501b6(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas te/ sor po shing la me btang la sbyin sreg bya ste/ sol ba 'bru mar dong sbyar te byin na bud med pa bu yod pa ro gyur te/ nor dang 'bru 'dod pa la nor dang 'bru'i ming bris la bdug gdab pa bya ste/ phyug po'i
502a1(rgyud 'grel): bang mdzod dang / rgyal po'i dkor mdzod cha gang gi nor sna tshogs pa tshogs na 'grub bo// dud 'gro'i ming bris te lcags la bzlas nas byin na 'grub bo// tshe dang bsod nams sbyin pa ni bkra shis kyi
502a2(rgyud 'grel): zhal zas la brten te/ A yu bar tan bulding ku ru ye swA hA/ dang sbyar ro// de dag thams cad la 'jug cing dbang bskur ba la sogs pa ni dkyil 'bor chen po dang mthun no// sems can thams cad bsrung po ni/ saM kun+d+rA ya dang
502a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar te/ de la yang lnga ste/ rims bsrung ba dang / gdon bsrung po dang / 'khor dang nor phyugs bsrung ba dang / lo tog bsrung ba dang / sri'u bsrung ba'o// de dag ni gdams ngag las shes par bya'o// ser ba bsrung ba la
502a4(rgyud 'grel): spyi'i 'khor lo lus la bcangs te/ so so'i 'khor lo'i thig tu gzugs pa dang / yang snying rtsa sngags dril te gdong bzlog bya ba'o// rangs par byed pa ni g+ha Ta dang sbyar te/ gang rengs par 'dod pa'i maung bris te/ bdug gdab
502a5(rgyud 'grel): brob pa yan chod so so'i las kyi bye brag spyir 'thun pa las thal chen byugs te shing bsrang ba'i rna me'i shing dag la me sbar te me tog ker btsugs dong / rlung gI rta mo'i dang / ril ma la sbyin sreg byas nas thal ba dre byi bo'i rling bur
502a6(rgyud 'grel): blugs te yungs kar dang yungs nog du sbyor nas gar gtor ba de rengs par byed do// rmugs par byed pa ni saM b+ha Ta ya dang sbyar te/ gang rmugs par 'dod pa'i ming byang gdug gang ba pi brab pa byos nas la cas dril la/ rkang bog
502b1(rgyud 'grel): dang lce 'og du bcug na nges pa kho nar rmugs par 'gyur ro// las kyi mtha' bco brgyad pa'i man ngag slob dpon rdo rje go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
503a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzardoHrjernam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi cho ga bzhugs so// /
503b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra bi dA ra Na nA ma d+ha ra Ni bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi cho ga/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// zhi yang gdug 'dul khyo mchog
503b2(rgyud 'grel): sku 'dud de yi cho ga bshad// rang skad cig gis lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i thugs ka raM zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzungs kyi sngags bsams la de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / bcom ldan
503b3(rgyud 'grel): 'angs phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pa spyan drangs la/ mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol baM dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed
503b4(rgyud 'grel): bA dang / lam la gnas pa dang / lus dbul ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba byas la/ oM shu nu dz+nyA na badz+ra sa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM zhes pas chos thams cung stong pa nyid du lhag par mos par bya'o// de'i rjes la gzungs kyi
503b5(rgyud 'grel): yi ge sgra tsam la dmigs pa dang / de yongs su gyur pa las/ gzungs kyi yi go 'bru rnam par bsam pa dang / de yongs su gyur pa las/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gzungs kyi yi ge rnams/ gzungs kyi tshul du
503b6(rgyud 'grel): nang na gnas par bsams la/ de las phyag na rdo rje'i sku dpag tu med pa 'phros pas sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa sdug bsngal sbyangs te/ bla na med pa'i byang chub la bkod de/ slar 'dus nas zla ba la thim/ de yongs
504a1(rgyud 'grel): su gyur pA las/ bcom ldan 'das phyug na rdo rje'i thugs kyi sprul pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms bsku mdog ljang sngon phyug g.ya stan+da sna tshogs rdo rje ngos gcig med pa bsnams pa g.yon pa dril bu
504a2(rgyud 'grel): dku ru bstan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs ba/ de'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzungs kyi yi ge rnams bsam mo// de'i sngags kyi 'od kyis mdun du ye shes
504a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' rang dang 'dra ba lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas spyan drangs nas// me tog li sogs pas mchod nas bstod de/ de gnyis kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng gi sngags kyi 'od 'phros pas yi ge ra pa 'od bskal pa'i me 'dra
504a4(rgyud 'grel): ba bsam/ ye shes sems dpa'i sku dang de'i thugs ka'o zla ba dang / de'i steng gi gzungs kyi yi ge la dmigs te gzungs gdon no// yang dam tshig sems dpa'i gsung la dmigs te gzungs gdon no// de bzhin du rim
504a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis thun bzhi ru gzungs 'dum bzlas pa ni sngon du bsnyen pa'o// de nas nad pa la sogs pa'i don du sa phyogs gtsang ma ru ba yi rnam pa lngas byugs te/ me tog gi sil ma dgram par bya'o// phyogs skyong bcu dang bcas pa'i
504a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bro ba 'am/ maN+Dal gang yang rung ba byis la/ rin po che 'am sa las byas pa'i bum pa rtsa ba mi gnag pa nag po ra ri med pa'i rin po che sna lnga dang / 'bru lnga dang / sman lnga dang / snying po lnga da // spos dri zhim thugs
504b1(rgyud 'grel): te/ ldum bus kha brgyan la mgrin pa ras kyis dkri'o// bruM las rin po che'i bum par bskyed de baM las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho/ baM las pad+ma/ de'i steng du gong bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bskyed la/ ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs
504b2(rgyud 'grel): te mchod bstod byas la gtor ma gtang ste/ gong bzhin bzlas pa bya'o// de na so nad pa sdom pa 'dzin du bcug la/ bum pa'i chus khrus byas na nad parga sa thar par 'gyur ro// rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khros kyi
504b3(rgyud 'grel): cho ga slob dpon byang chub snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rnam par 'joms pa ye shes sku// rab tu btung nas mdor bsdus bshang // dben gnas 'dus la maN+Dal bca'// khrus byas gos
504b4(rgyud 'grel): bgros mchod po bshom// spyan drangs la sogs sngon 'gro bas// tshad mang bzhi po bsgom par bya// de nas stong pa nyid be sgoms te// rang sems zla bar hUM bsams bya// hUM las 'od zer 'phros pa yi// rdo rje ra ba dro ba dang // 'gro/
504b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don mdzad tshur 'dus te// hU~M las rdo rje rtse lngar gyur// glanag cing 'bar ba'i me 'od bcas// de nas 'od zer 'phros pa yis// sngar bzhin sems can don byas te// slar yang rdo rje nyid la 'dus// rdo rje yongs su gyur
504b6(rgyud 'grel): sku ru gsal// sku mdog mthing mig spyan gsum pa// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gnon// phyag gnyis thabs deng shes rab brda// zhabs gnyis stag yo pags pa bsnams// klu lngas lus brgyan ma dpung 'bar//
505a1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar rnam par bsgoms nas kyang // ye shes khro bo spyan drangs te// mchod nas rab la gzhug par bya// nam par sangs rgyas spyan drangs te// sprul pa'i lha mos dbang bskur ro// spyi bor sna tshogs
505a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bsam// spyan drangs lha rnamasra gshegs par gyur// de nas rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis// spyi bo la sogs gnas gsumo du// zla ba'i steng du yi ge gsum// yongs gyur mtshan ma gsum du gnas// de
505a3(rgyud 'grel): las bzlas pa bya ba ni// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs la// sngags dong 'od gzar bcas pa los// phyag na rdo rje sku ru gsal// thams cad 'dus pa'i dbus dag na// bdag nyid khro bo chen por gnas// kun gyi thugs kar
505a4(rgyud 'grel): nyenyi steng du// rnam par 'joms pa'i yi ge dgod// phar spros don ni rdzogs pa dang // tshur 'dus sgrub pa nus par ldan// sngags kyi 'brug sgra lta bu ste// skyon gau tor ma btang bar bya// mchod pa byas te ye shes gshegs// dam tshig pa
505a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal kun spyod bya// 'dis ni sgrub pa mdor bsdus te/ bsod nams mchog ni gang thob pa// bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis// rnam par 'joms pa thob par shog/ 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs mdor
505a6(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mos mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra bi dA ra maN+Da la bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag
505b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// gdug pa 'dul mdzad khro bo che// rdo rje can la phyag 'tshul nas// gang gis legs par smin byed pa'i// 'khor lo'i cho ga bshad par bya// slob dpon mtshan nyid bzang ldan pas// legs par brtags pa'i slob
505b2(rgyud 'grel): ma lata/ tshul bzhin bsnyen pa sngon song nas// rI bo bzang sogs shis pa'i sararA// bslang dang sbyang dang gizung ba dang // bsrung ba'i cho ga legs byas pas// thog mar bum pa'i bya ba la// gser ra ma dngul lam yang na zangs//
505b3(rgyud 'grel): kham la sde gnyis lnga nyi shu la// dkar po rdzas kyis legs byugs la// rang lha'i mtsha na mo ldan par bya// ma nyams res kyis mgul dkris pa// dri zhim chu yis bkang ba dong // 'bru sman rin chen lngar ldan pa// bza'
505b4(rgyud 'grel): bA'i shing gis khwa brgyan nas// ku sh+ya'i stan la yang dag bzhig/ lha yi 'khor lo bsgom pad+ma 'i// bzlas mthar mchog zhu bdud rtsir bya// slob ma gsum la skyabs 'gro drang // byang chub tu ni sems bskyed pas// sgo gsum
505b5(rgyud 'grel): mi dge lngas bzlog cing // kun tu spyod pa gtsang ldan pas// rang lha'i rnal 'byor brtson byed pa'i// dam tshig rjes su 'dzin pa la// gnos gsum yi ge gsum gyur pa'i// mtshon ma gsum gyis byin po rlabs te// rdo rje dang
505b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas dris reg dang // mchod pa lnga yis legs mchod bya// dkyil 'khor byi dor legs byas par// dri dang me tog tshem bur bcas// bskyed dang gnyis mang mchod pa la// bstod de na mkhar gshegs gsol bya// dri
506a1(rgyud 'grel): dang bA yi lci ba yis// legs par byugs pa'i stegs bu la// glu tsang ma'i ras kyis srang bu dang // man ngag rig pas thig btab ste// derA ni kha dog lnga ldan pa'i// tshon gyis khro bo'i 'khor lo bri//
506a2(rgyud 'grel): gru bzhi kun nas sgo bzhi pa// to ra na bzhis rnam par brgyan// phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng ba dang // 'bar ba'i phreng bas yongs su bskorA// nang dbus rdo rje kha bzhi pa// 'phar la rtsibs bcu'i 'khor lor ldan// der ni rang lha mtshan ma
506a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams// ji ltar mthong ba'i rdzas 'brang bri// der yang bum pa dgod pa dang // bla bre me tog phreng mdzes pas// sna tshogs mchod pa'i bkod par ldan// dri zhim bum pa gtor ma bcas// slob dpon kun spyod gtsang ldan pas// gtsang
506a4(rgyud 'grel): mchu yis khrus byas te// sar pa'i gos dang rab ldan pas// bde ba'i stan la legs 'dug ste// mdun gnas 'khor lo gtong ba yis// rnam sbyangs dam tshig bskyed pa dang // ye shes gnyis maud byin brlabs dang // dbang
506a5(rgyud 'grel): bskur mchod da bstod bzlas bya// dri zhim chu yis legs bkrus te// bzang po'i dri yis legs byugs shing // sar pa'i gos dang rgyan ldan pa'i// slob ma dkyil 'khor nang bcug ste// ku sha'i stan la legs gzhag nas//
506a6(rgyud 'grel): thog mar bum pa'i chung bang bskur// rdo rjes dri yos thig leng ngo // mngon par mngags pa'i me tog phreng // bkra shes tshigs bcas mgo le sbyin// bsgom dang bzlas dang gtang po dang // sbyin bya bsgrub bya sgra dang gsung //
506b1(rgyud 'grel): thugs dang yon tan phrin las la// 'khrul 'khor sbyin sreg phur bu dang // mnan pa'i las la dbang bar bya// de nas mchod dang gtor ma dang // gshegs dang dkyil 'khor bsdu ba'o// tshul 'dis smin byas slob ma ni// las dang
506b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub kun dbang phyug/ gzhan la phan byed bdag nyid che// lha rig sngags rnams kun mnod 'gyur// rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du// slob ma yongs su smin byed pa'i// cho ga legs bkod bsod na mos des// kun gyis bla med
506b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog thob shog// rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bram ze dza ya wa rmos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
507a1(rgyud 'grel): tu na 'jugs dpa las na
507b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra bi d+ha ra sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// chos dbyings ye shes
507b2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyis// 'gro ba'i gdug pa kun 'dul ba'i// rdo rje canu le phyag 'tshal te// de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song zhing // byang chub sems dang rab ldan pas// dkyil 'khor
507b3(rgyud 'grel): zhugs shing dbang blangs te// rjes su ga nang po thob pa dang // ri bo bzang zhing 'jug ngogs so gas// rnam par dben zhing nyams dga' b.raro// kun nas gtsang po'i kun spyod kyis// bde ba'i stan la 'dug pa dang //
507b4(rgyud 'grel): rang snying pad zla ra gnas pa yi// hUM yig mthing shun mdog lta bu// 'od zer phreng bas 'khrigs pa yi// phyogs rnams kun tu khyab pa dang // rdo rje khro bo 'jigs chen po// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpar bcas
507b5(rgyud 'grel): na mkha' gang bar gsal dmigs te// phyag 'tshal la sogs bcu gcig bya// rdo rjes phung po la sogs pa'i// chos kun rnam par dben pa yi// stong pa'i rang bzhin la gnas pas// gsang sdug
507b6(rgyud 'grel): brjod de bstan par bya// na mkhar gnas pa'i baM yig dang // a las pad+ma zla bar gnas// hUM yig 'od gzer phreng 'phros pas// ra ba sa gzhi bla re gur// dra ba me yis yo// ngas su bskor// de gnas hUM las spros
508a1(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pas// khro bo rdo rje rtse lnga pa// de yongs gyur las rang lha'i gzugs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis char sprin mdog/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyi// rab 'bar rdo rje rtse lnga dang // dril bu
508a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgyings bcas sdig mdzub bcas// rdo rje phreng ba rin chen sprul// stag gi pags pas rnam brgyan pa// g.yon brkyang ba yi goms pas bzhugs// kun nas 'od kyi tshogs 'phros pas// gdug pa ma lus bsreg par bsgom// lus
508a3(rgyud 'grel): babacog yid kyi gnas gsum du// pad+ma nyi ma zla ba la// rdo rje rtsi gsum rang yi ga gsum// dkar dang dmar dang nago por bsgom// hUM yig las 'phros 'od gzer gyis// mdun du ye shes spyan drangs te// mchod dang bstod pa sngon song
508a4(rgyud 'grel): bas// dbang bskur de nas bzlas pa brtsim// oM na maHtsiN+Da badz+ra kro d+ha ya/ hu lu hu l+yA/ tiSh+Ta taSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha nA hA na/ a mr-i taM hU~M phaT/ dam tshig ye shes snying gar gnas// spro dang bsdu ba'i bsam gtan tsa nA// khro bo'i sgreng
508a5(rgyud 'grel): gsang mthon po yis// sngags mchog yang dag bzlas par bya// bzlas pa'i mthar ni mchod pa dang // bstong dang yi ge brgya pa gang ni// mdunu nas yis gabye gsol la// khro bo'i ngar 'dzin brten pos gnas// bla ma'i man ngag ji bzhin
508a6(rgyud 'grel): du/ sgrub thabs yang dag bkod pa la// dge ba thob pa ga yin des// 'gro kun sangs rgyas thob par shog/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs dpal gaM gA d+ha ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta tshan
508b1(rgyud 'grel): po d+hA na shri dang / lo tsa ba cog gru ra ba zhis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra bi dA ra Na nA ma d+ha ra Ni sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms
508b2(rgyud 'grel): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rang gi rang bzhin zhe ba la// gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bo'o sku// ma rungs tshar gcod rdo rje can// rdo rje tshi la mgos phyag 'tshal// ji ltar bla ma'i zhal snga nas// legs rtogs gang de bri bAr bya// rdo rje rnam par
508b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jomos pa sgrub par 'dod pas dben zhing yid dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba dang ldan pa stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ sems can thams cad srid pa'i sdug bsngal las bsgral la rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bode ba la dgod pa'i
508b4(rgyud 'grel): blo sngon du bting ste rang gi snying gar baM las pad+ma dang / der a los bsil ba'i 'od gzer gyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa/ hU~M yig mthing shun gyi mdog lta bu bsam par bya'o// de las rnam par 'phros pa'i 'od gzer gyis sangs rgyas dang
508b5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' dang / rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mdun du dmigs la/ yid las byung ba'i mchod pa rnams kyi yang dag par mchod do/ phyag btsal ba la sogs pa bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// gdug pa tshar gcod
508b6(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i sku// rdo rje chen po 'jigs chen po// rdo rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// thogs med 'khor bar log pa yi// rnam rtog dbang gyur sgo gsum gyis// sdig pa bgyis la bdag 'gyod cing // mgo na po'o spyan sngar rab tu bshags//
509a1(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas// so so'i skye bo byang chub sems// kun gyi dge la dga' ba yis// bdag ni rjes su yi rang bgyid// sems can khams ni ma lus rnams//
509a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bde la dgod pa'i phyir// bdug gi dge kun bltos med par// byang chub chen por bsngo bor bgyi// 'gro ba'i skyabs chen gcig pu ba// sangs rgyas theg pa mchog gi chos// tshogs mchog phyir mi ldog pa la// bdag
509a3(rgyud 'grel): bas su nye bar mchi// srid pa'i rgya mtsho sdug bsngal gyi// nyam thag mgon med gyur pa rnams// bla med bde la gzhag pa'i phyir// sems mchog yang dag bskyed par bgyi// lam gang gis ni der 'gro pa// sngags kyi theg
509a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lam 'di la// deng nas byang chub snying po'i bar// bdag ni tshul bzhin gnas par bgyi/ zhes bya/ rjod la de nas byams pa dang / snying rje dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / kun la btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o// de'i rjes la brtan
509a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang g.yo bar snang ba'i chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dbyen pa'i don can du rig par bya ste/ oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+ha sar+b+ba~M d+har+m+ma swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho \u0f85haM zhes pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab bo// stong par gnas po'i paM yi ga dang // raM las
509a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma nyi ma la// hUM byung ba las rgya gram gyi// rdo rje chen po rnam par bsgom// der gnas hUM las 'od 'phros pas// rab sa gzhi gur yang bsgom// danas bruM las gzhal yas khang // kun nas gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa//
509b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs bcu 'khor lo'i lte ba la// rgya gram rdo rje dang bcas bsgom// der yang zla ba nyi ma dang // hUM byung rdo rje chu las 'od// spros shing bsdus las khro bo che// khro bo'i 'khor lo rdzogs par bskyed// dbus gnas rdo rje'i lte dbus su//
509b2(rgyud 'grel): khro bo rdo rje 'joms chen po// char sprin sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba// rdo rje dril bu 'gying bcas 'dzin// shar phyogs rdo rje'i ra dbus su// rdo rje khro bo phur bu che// At+pal sngon po'i mdog mtshungs pa// phyag g.yas rdo rje phur bu 'dzin//
509b3(rgyud 'grel): lho yi phyogs su khro bo che// rdo rje be tson steng zil mdog/ g.yas na rdo rje be con ste// rdo rje'i ra dbus gnas pa'o// nub gnas rdo rje'i ra dbus su// rdo rje tho ba khro bo che// na mkha'i mdog cani phyag g.yos na// rdo rje tho ba 'phyar ba'o//
509b4(rgyud 'grel): byang gonas rdo rje khro bo che// gtum po bung ba'i mdog lta bu// rdo rje rgya gram phyag g.yas 'dzin// rdo rje'i ra dbus gnas par bsgom// phyi rol rdo rje'i rtsibs rnams la// gzhan gyiso mi thub gshin rje gshed// rta myagrin
509b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byil// ut+pal kun nga dza pa dang // mar gang mdog can g.yas pa na// thod pa dbyug pad+ma dang // rgya gram rdo rje phyar ba 'dzin// shar nag g.yas skor rim pas bsgom// 'dod pa'i rgyal po dbyug pa sngo//
509b6(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yo stobs tshon sku mdog gnag/ g.yas rnams rim bzhin lcags kyu dang // dbyug pa ral gri rtse gsum 'dzin// byang shes nas ni nub byang mthar// 'di yang g.yas bskor rim pas bsgom// mkhar nas rdo rje hUM mdzad
510a1(rgyud 'grel): dang // sa 'og gnod mdzes rdo rje che// mdog gnag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin// khro bo 'di dag thams cad kyang // phyag g.yon sdigs mdzub zhags par ldan// kun kyang g.yon brkyang gom pa
510a2(rgyud 'grel): // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu dkar// lhor gnas rdo rje zhags pa ser// nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar// rdo rje dril ljang bang sgor te// ljags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog
510a3(rgyud 'grel): drang // dril bu 'dzin cing g.yon brkyang bas// nyi ma'i steng na gnas pa'o// thams cad mche gtsigs spyan gsum zhal// dmar ser dbu skra gyen brdzes dang // sta go gi pags pas smad dkris shing // sbrul dang

510a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lor gnas pa thams cad dang // mgrin gcig skad gsang mthon po yis// sngags mchog yang dag bzlos par bya// na mo rat+na tA yA ya/ na maHtsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na yaM/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ oM ha ra ha ra
510a6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra/ ma tha ma tha badz+ra/ d+hu na d+hu na badz+ra/ da ha da ha badz+ra/ pa tsa ba tsa badz+ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra badz+ra/ dA ra ya dA ra ya badz+ra/ da ru Nang ru Na badz+ro/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da badz+ri/ b+hin+da b+hin+da baHhUM phaT/ na ma sh+tsa N+Da badz+ra kro d+ha ya hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha taSh+Thi/
510b1(rgyud 'grel): ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mr-i taM hUM phaT/ 'dis ni rdo rje khro bo rnams kyi thugs bskul nas/ sgrub la bgegs meng byed cing / dngos grub ster ba'o// ji srid mi skyo'i bar du mngon par 'du bzlas pa'i mthar/ aHshes
510b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo phyung nas mdun gzhig mchod pa dang / yi ge brgya pa'i mthar ni rdo rje'i sngags pa rjod de/ rang gnas gshegs la 'khor lo snying kar bsdu bar bya/ rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs

510b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can// bcom ldan rdo rjes 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// gong gi rang bzhin chags sdang rnam bral yang // gdul bya'i dbang gis khro la khro ba dang // 'dod chags can la chags can ltar ston
510b6(rgyud 'grel): bau ta byang chub mchog gnas de la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig las dang rnam smin mkhyen pa yi// 'gro ba kun dang ji ltar 'thun pa yi// gsang sngags rol pa rab tu ston mdzad pa// bsam yas sprul pa mnga' la phyag 'tsha lo//
511a1(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig sdang dang gdug pa tshar gcod phyir// bsdigs pa'i tshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa'i sku// nyon mongs dug chen rtsad nas gcod mdzad pa'i// sbrul gdug rgyan gyis brgyan la phyag
